Although it seemed the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao was powerless against the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate and the Immortal Ruins True Immortal, in reality, with the current incorporation of various cultivation remnant worlds into the Xuanhuang Realm, the power of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao was not much weaker than when it was originally intact. Strength and weakness were relative. At this moment, in Xu Ke’s eyes, he once again saw that graceful figure from the past, whose every movement was imbued with the will and rhythm of heaven and earth. He was loved by heaven and earth, favored by all. However, there was a difference; Mr. Bai was gentle and refined, while the figure before him was… domineering, majestic, inspiring both fear and faith. In a daze, Xu Ke recalled Mr. Bai’s parting words. “On the matter of whether to leave, my opinion differs from this consciousness. I don’t believe I was wrong, nor do I believe this is a betrayal. I am simply looking for a better way to save the world. Xu Ke, if you can, please help me watch over it. I believe that one day, it will understand.” … At the time, Xu Ke did not understand Mr. Bai’s words. Over the past thousands of years, the consciousness of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, separated by Mr. Bai, not only failed to understand but instead developed in an increasingly extreme direction. Not only were its conveyed intentions and curses becoming more vicious, but it even affected any being that approached it. The pocket world where Xu Ke was located, used to seal the consciousness of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, slowly lost its vitality, turning into barren desert. His own body also aged more rapidly than it should have. Until today, Xu Ke had believed he would eventually be devoured by the malevolent thought. He never expected… “Is this what Mr. Bai meant by ‘understanding’?” “It’s just the other part of the main body’s understanding.” Xu Ke couldn’t help but think. “Return it to me,” Li Ping spoke again as Xu Ke’s mind raced. This jolted Xu Ke out of his reverie. He couldn’t help but step back, the golden wheel still suppressing the rotting wooden coffin.

Chapter 1237

"Empty words, how can you prove it?"

Even though Xu Ke could sense that familiar aura on the other party, the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought sealed behind him was far too important. If he entrusted it to the wrong person, it could lead to unimaginable calamities.

This was also why Xu Ke, after so many years, had always sealed it alone.

He simply couldn't find anyone who was capable and trustworthy.

Seeing how cautious Xu Ke was, Li Ping did not get angry when he refused him. Instead, his laughter echoed continuously.

"It's not that I should prove it to you, but that you should see the truth!"

As Li Ping spoke, the palace roof of the Sacred Emperor's Throne, and even the sky of the Great Qi pocket world seemed to be torn apart.

Xu Ke's vision instantly returned to the Xuanhuang Realm, and scene after scene unfolded before his eyes.

In the endless night, specks of golden light appeared from nowhere. In the dark sea, they stirred up invisible waves.

On the boundless ocean, golden chains crisscrossed, like a giant net. Within the golden net, sharp, unwilling, and resentful wails echoed. A consciousness was slowly being ground away. In the center of the golden net, the Faceless Sacred Emperor stood in the void, his aura chilling.

In a desolate region, powerful spatial energy was amplified upon the Faceless Sacred Emperor. Beside him, a shadowy, dark figure flickered in and out of existence. Although there was nothing before them, Xu Ke instinctively felt a sense of unease.

These successively appearing scenes all pointed to the close connection between the Faceless Sacred Emperor before him and the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao.

Coupled with the increasingly violent struggles from the coffin behind Xu Ke, as if it was eager to return to the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought, this judgment was basically confirmed.

However, for some unknown reason, Xu Ke's heart still hesitated.

"Perhaps it's because I've been with this Azure Nether Malevolent Thought for too long and have been unconsciously influenced?" Xu Ke was suddenly startled.

The image of the Faceless Sacred Emperor was far too positive. This made Xu Ke, who was currently on his opposing side, involuntarily doubt himself.

"The Azure Nether Malevolent Thought has been sealed for far too long. It's almost reached the limit that ordinary cultivators can control. And It is one with the existing Azure Nether Heavenly Dao. If it were to return abruptly, it might cause unpredictable and extreme changes to the Heavenly Dao itself."

"Only by suppressing it first, and then slowly eradicating the malevolent thoughts, can the Dao be returned to Heaven. During this process, your assistance might be needed." After a moment of stalemate, Emperor Li Ping spoke again.

As soon as these words were uttered, the Sacred Emperor's Throne exhibited two completely different reactions.

Xu Ke was overjoyed.

And the lid of the coffin behind him, after a brief silence, began to vibrate even more frantically.

Li Ping could even vaguely see the resentful gaze on the pale figure's face, a hundred times more venomous than before.

"Follow me."

Li Ping did not urge Xu Ke to hand over the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought. Instead, he led him to a spot above the Great Qi pocket world.

"Can you feel anything different here?"

"The fluctuations of the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought are suppressed, almost imperceptible. Not only the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought, but also this pocket world, and the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao itself..." Astonishment flashed in Xu Ke's eyes.

"This is the core of the [Great Myriad Spirits Formation]. This formation seals heaven and earth. Let alone the world's will, even a True Immortal descending could be resisted to some extent," Li Ping said in a calm tone.

In his memory and knowledge, this formation could indeed hinder the descent of a True Immortal for a while.

Although Xu Ke had lived for a long time, he had never truly witnessed the power of a True Immortal. Therefore, he had no doubts about Li Ping's words.

"With this formation, even if it were released directly, it wouldn't be able to escape."

Xu Ke knew a thing or two about formations.

The more he observed, the more he was shocked.

This Great Myriad Spirits Formation was indeed as Li Ping said, infinitely profound and mysterious.

"If I had this formation back then, I wouldn't have had to suppress it myself for thousands of years." Xu Ke felt a sense of daze amidst his shock.

After touring the Great Myriad Spirits Formation, Li Ping then took Xu Ke to Senior Yin.

It was like a school, filled with diligent young children learning. Their innocent faces brought Xu Ke's thoughts back to the dilapidated temple in Ningyuan City a thousand years ago. The scene then overlapped slightly with the current one, and Xu Ke was momentarily stunned.

Senior Yin's reaction, however, was one of horror.

As he was teaching the children, he suddenly froze completely.

After a moment's pause, he stood up abruptly, staring intently at the coffin behind Xu Ke.

His body trembled, and then it split open directly, revealing another self that had been hidden all along.

All four of his eyes were filled with an unprecedented greed.

Xu Ke frowned slightly. That predatory gaze made him very uncomfortable.

What concerned him even more was the reaction of the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought in the coffin behind him.

It was very strange.

Suddenly, it calmed down, and the curses and temptations that had been ringing in Xu Ke's ears disappeared again.

However, unlike before in the Great Myriad Spirits Formation, the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought itself did not seem affected.

Instead, it became quiet as if it had been startled into submission.

A moment later, the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought began to pound on the coffin lid again, making its presence known.

But in Xu Ke's eyes, it was more like a bluff.

Li Ping's body blocked the space between Senior Yin and the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought, which then allowed them to return to normal.

The body of Senior Yin, which had split open, rejoined. He grinned and said, "I didn't expect that a part of the noble Azure Nether Heavenly Dao would fall to such a state?"

"If my brothers knew, they'd be overjoyed."

As Senior Yin spoke, he licked his lips, "I've eaten quite a lot of these 'world spirits' that are like trash. I haven't tasted a complete world will before. I wonder what it tastes like."

Xu Ke's heart filled with dread upon hearing this.

Then, he heard Li Ping's telepathic introduction to Senior Yin's origins.

"A world spirit left behind by the Xuanhuang Realm's devouring, who greatly admires Mr. Bai?"

Initially, Xu Ke was somewhat doubtful, but after seeing the white rib bone that Senior Yin treasured, he had no other thoughts in his mind.

Even though it just looked like an ordinary rib bone, like any other person's.

But with just one glance, Xu Ke knew it belonged to Mr. Bai.

Mr. Bai's smiling face reappeared before Xu Ke's eyes, and then instantly shattered.

Only this white rib bone remained.

Xu Ke was suddenly overwhelmed with grief.

And Senior Yin, after learning of Xu Ke's special relationship with Mr. Bai, retracted his ferocity and became peaceful.

However, his eyes still occasionally swept over the decaying coffin.

"With Daoist Yin here, even if it escapes the heavy restrictions, at most it will be a mere meal on the table," Li Ping said indifferently.

With his emotions somewhat soothed, Xu Ke finally believed the identity and plan of this Faceless Sacred Emperor.

The moment his obsession was released, Xu Ke felt an unprecedented sense of ease.

"I've held on for so long. From now on, let the Xuanhuang Realm handle itself," Xu Ke thought.

"What, you're interested in It too?" Senior Yin looked at Li Ping with some surprise.

Li Ping briefly recounted what happened in Luoyan Prefecture, and then said, "It helped me greatly."

Senior Yin shrugged, "Then I won't snatch it from you. Even if I eat it, at most it will just be a tasty meal, and it will still have to be expelled."

Li Ping remained silent, not replying.

"That silver needle..." Senior Yin suddenly showed Li Ping an image.

"Does it look like this?"

Li Ping nodded, "Why? Have you seen it?"

"I seem to have some impression, but it was a long time ago," Senior Yin squinted, recalling something.

"Ah, a long time ago, I saw something in this place. But it wasn't me at the time; it was residual memory from a part of myself that I had swallowed. So, I can't recall the specific details clearly. If you're interested, you can try looking there; perhaps you'll find something."

Senior Yin transmitted a location to Li Ping.

It seemed that as a world spirit, he still had a faint connection to his original body. The location Senior Yin conveyed was precisely the current location of the Xuanhuang Realm.

"I understand. Let's deal with this matter first. With my current strength, even if I really found something, it would be difficult to delve into it." Li Ping did not hide anything and spoke very frankly.

"The Xuanhuang Realm indeed has too many strange and demonic beings," Senior Yin grumbled.

Li Ping then looked at Xu Ke, "Daoist Yin and I, previously planned to gather and bury Mr. Bai's scattered bones, to give him a peaceful rest. After this matter, if you are willing, you can assist us."

Xu Ke naturally agreed without hesitation, even his voice trembling slightly, "Okay, okay."

Having successfully persuaded Xu Ke, the gatekeeper, the next step was to release and absorb the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought.

Although Li Ping had absolute confidence, he did not act carelessly.

Instead, he made thorough preparations.

The next day, news spread throughout the entire Sacred Dynasty.

In seven days, the Supreme Sacred Emperor would bestow his blessings.

Any citizen who sincerely prayed during these seven days would receive the Sacred Emperor's reward.

The more sincere their heart, the more generous the reward.

Praying to the Sacred Emperor was already a required lesson for the citizens of Great Qi. Now that the Sacred Emperor had explicitly stated that rewards would be given, how could they dare to neglect it?

Thus, within half a day of the sacred decree being conveyed, Li Ping felt the destiny of the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty condensing unprecedentedly.

Even the destiny power formed by the [Heavenly Emperor's Qi Codex] within his body showed a faint trend of changing from purple to golden.

"This method is only effective for a short time and cannot last long."

"If I go back on my word, I will suffer a backlash. It's even possible for my cultivation to drop."

Li Ping felt his strength continuously climbing towards its peak, yet his heart remained very calm.

The golden primal force was drawn out, and all beings' hearts were united as one.

The Great Myriad Spirits Formation slowly began to operate.

It concealed all connections with the outside world.

At this moment, not only could the Great Qi pocket world not be observed from the Xuanhuang Realm, but even those in close proximity, like Daoist Bai Hua in the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven, suddenly lost their senses of the Great Qi pocket world.

If Li Ping had not informed her in advance, Bai Hua would have mistakenly believed that Great Qi was suffering some terrifying disaster.

The process of devouring the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought required blocking out the external Azure Nether Heavenly Dao.

Otherwise, unforeseen events might occur.

Seven days passed in a flash.

During the seven days of brewing and preparation, Li Ping's state had reached its peak.

At this moment, at the core of the Myriad Spirits Formation, Senior Yin, Xu Ke, and Yi Shu stood in a triangular formation.

Li Ping hovered in the air in the center of the three.

Yi Shu, as part of the Grand Origin Dao-Dissolving Stone, naturally perceived the unusual changes occurring in the Great Qi pocket world.

He actively sought them out to inquire.

Li Ping, who had nothing to hide, directly revealed his plan to devour the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought.

After a brief moment of astonishment, Yi Shu immediately proposed to participate and help.

He even proactively suggested that the cooperation between the Grand Origin Sect and the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty could be deepened in the future.

After contemplating for a moment, Li Ping agreed to Yi Shu's request.

He had invited these three merely to go through the motions.

In the Great Myriad Spirits Formation, everything was within his control.

If Yi Shu behaved himself, it would be fine. But if he made any moves, Li Ping could refine him with a single thought.

And devour him along with the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought.

"Formation, activate!"

Li Ping shouted coldly.

The three people within the formation felt the sky instantly turn chaotic.

Occasionally, purple starlight would flash within it.

It was as if they had entered infinite void, leaving the world of true existence.

All three were startled.

Li Ping then gently pointed at the decaying wooden coffin placed beside him.

There was no sound of violent destruction.

The wooden seals dissipated like black smoke, vanishing.

A figure, from blurry to clear, appeared in the formation, before Li Ping.

Unlike the resentful appearance Li Ping had seen before, this figure in front of him bore no resemblance to Mr. Bai from his memory.

He asked with a slight smile, "Are you going to eat me?"

There was no resentment in his eyes, but rather relief and peace.

"Mr. Bai?!" Xu Ke was the first to exclaim in disbelief.

It wasn't that Xu Ke lacked self-control; it was just that this figure was too similar to Mr. Bai.

Li Ping remained unmoved, nodding calmly, "Indeed."

"To be able to merge with me, you can be considered to have died without regret."

A single sentence caused the previously nonchalant Azure Nether Malevolent Thought's expression to freeze instantly.

"What do you think you are?!"

The Azure Nether Malevolent Thought could no longer maintain its facade and screamed in agitation.

It suddenly transformed into a black gaseous form and lunged towards Li Ping.

But before Li Ping, there seemed to be an infinite distance.

No matter how hard it tried, it couldn't get close.

"Noisy."

"Once you merge with me, you'll know who I am."

Li Ping glanced at the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought.

An immense, majestic force descended from the heavens.

It instantly bound the black smoke that the malevolent thought had transformed into.

"Myriad Spirits' Will, Heaven and Earth's Great Grinding Wheel!"

Li Ping chanted softly, and a purple-gold vortex slowly formed above their heads.

Chapter 1238: The Great Heavenly Venerate's Immortal Body

Within the purple-gold vortex, wind and thunder stirred. At the bottom of the funnel-shaped energy vortex was the somewhat panicked figure of the Azure Nether Malice. Images of faces of different lifeforms flashed rapidly within the wind and thunder vortex, tearing at the Azure Nether Malice like a hurricane, causing its form to become progressively distorted and blurred.

"I am the Heavenly Dao of Azure Nether! The father and mother of you cultivators! How dare you treat me like this!"

"Again! Again! All of you humans deserve to die!"

The Azure Nether Malice roared. It did not choose to await its doom. The visage that had originally resembled Mr. Bai finally revealed its true form. Its body expanded like an inflated balloon, transforming in the blink of an eye into a terrifyingly deformed monster covered in blue and purple mottled lumps. Even more horrifying was that the Azure Nether Malice's face had disappeared. Alternatively, the countless masses of black shadows rapidly moving on its shell were its faces!

Each bore a different expression, yet none revealed positive emotions. Madness, hatred, despair, brutality… everything dark and twisted within a living being was displayed on the Azure Nether Malice. Tangible black malevolent energy surged out from within it, shooting towards the sky to confront the rotating force of wind and thunder in the purple-gold vortex. A silent collision occurred, causing Li Ping's Great Grinding Mill of Heaven and Earth to pause slightly.

Li Ping noticed that about a third of the faces of the Azure Nether Malice were all staring at him.

"Die! Die! Die! Die! Die! Die! Die!"

Sharp curses erupted, sweeping forward. The three protecting Li Ping's formation all frowned slightly at this moment. Even the empty face of the Sacred Emperor Li Ping, struck by this malice, vaguely revealed blurry features. Countless tentacles covered in blue and purple flesh tumors extended from the Azure Nether Malice's monstrous body, whipping wildly as it attempted to break free from the restraints of the Myriad Spirits Great Formation.

However, this ultimate formation, pushed to the limit of the Dissolution Disc's derivation, was not so easily broken. After a brief pause, the purple-gold vortex slowly began to turn again. The sound of wind and thunder roared even louder than before. Within it, sounds of human prayers could be heard, resonating to form a unique rhythm that forcefully suppressed the Azure Nether Malice's heaven-shattering roars.

"Evil, in the end, cannot defeat righteousness."

"Look at your current state, do you really deserve the title of 'Heavenly Dao of Azure Nether'?!" Li Ping's calm voice, tinged with a hint of mockery, pierced through the cacophony of the formation's resistance and accurately reached the ears of the Azure Nether Malice.

"Bastard! Who did this to me?!" After a moment of stunned silence, it became utterly enraged. Clearly, even the Azure Nether Malice itself could hardly accept its current predicament. Its body, suppressed by the Great Grinding Mill of Heaven and Earth, showed signs of rallying and resisting once more.

Li Ping, however, nodded slightly, continuously provoking and agitating the Azure Nether Malice with his words while intently presiding over the Myriad Spirits Great Formation. He absorbed the fragments stripped from the Azure Nether Malice into his own body through the vortex. Negative emotions flowed into Li Ping's consciousness like a trickling stream.

The three formations guardians couldn't help but feel a little nervous. Being within the formation, they could more clearly feel its terrifying power. Despite being sealed for thousands of years, it was still a part of the Heavenly Dao of this great world. Yet, before this formation, it was said to have no power to resist at all. It even rendered the three of them idle, leaving them only to watch Li Ping's display.

The more terrifying the formation, the more their worries grew. What if the Sacred Emperor was affected by the malice and lost control? That would likely be a disaster far more terrifying than the Azure Nether Malice breaking free. Even though they had confidence in the Sacred Emperor's strength, they couldn't help but feel nervous at this moment. After all, they were still inside the formation.

"No need to worry, I am fine," Li Ping seemed to sense their emotional fluctuations and calmly transmitted his thoughts to explain. Setting aside Li Ping's own formidable willpower, the enhancement of the Azure Nether Heart Refining Incantation alone made it impossible for him to have his personality twisted by this Azure Nether Malice. Moreover, he was not forcefully swallowing it whole, but using the Great Grinding Mill of Heaven and Earth to slowly crush and absorb the Azure Nether Malice bit by bit, minimizing side effects.

"Furthermore, the aspirations of the billions of citizens of Great Qi are anchored to me."

"Billions of lifeforms can refine spirits. This is merely a part of the original Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, how can it influence me?" Li Ping's mind was clear. Rather than dealing with 'malice', Li Ping's greater pressure at this moment was in digesting the mottled and chaotic memories within its body. Although the vast majority had blurred through thousands of years of twisted despair, these fragmented memories were deeply hidden in its consciousness and now, as its body was torn apart, they flowed into Li Ping's mind.

Scenes flashed rapidly in Li Ping's mind. Most of them were difficult to discern in detail. Only one scene repeatedly appeared. Clearly, this was a memory that the Azure Nether Malice found unforgettable, replaying countless times in its mind during its years of imprisonment.

In the endless dark void, a rapidly moving figure suddenly stopped.

"Why aren't you going anymore?" the voice from the memory asked. The original emotion was a mixture of relief and joy. But now, it carried a hint of confusion. The figure in white, Mr. Bai, turned around and looked back. His expression changed constantly, filled with complexity.

"What happened?" The perception from the memory gradually grew agitated in the deathly silence.

"I can't leave," Mr. Bai finally said slowly, taking a deep breath.

"Why can't you leave?"

"The tribulation is set, the general trend is thus, and it can no longer be reversed. Rather than staying there, it's better to head towards the The Great Barrier and fight with all your might, perhaps there's a glimmer of hope," the voice from the memory was stunned at first, filled with incomprehensible emotions. Then, it became urgent, hastily trying to dissuade him.

"With the remains left by the First Great Heavenly Venerate as protection, and using those few immortal artifacts as power, the two of us working together have a great chance of crossing the The Great Barrier!"

"We've prepared for so long, how can you suddenly change your mind?!" Even after a long time, Li Ping could feel the confusion and anger within the separated consciousness of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao. Mr. Bai might have known he was in the wrong and remained silent.

"Say something!" Only when the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao finally stopped did Mr. Bai slowly respond.

"That place is my home."

"From birth until now, everyone I've ever known, everyone I've ever heard of, and those I love and hate, have all lived their lives there."

"Now it has encountered a tribulation, I can indeed leave. But what about them?" Mr. Bai asked quietly.

The Azure Nether Heavenly Dao could not comprehend Mr. Bai's emotions. In its view, ensuring its own survival was the most important thing. "As long as I am here, and we find another suitable world, we can quickly conceive another Xuanhuang Realm."

"I can even recreate the people you are familiar with," it explained. Mr. Bai merely smiled lightly and shook his head. Without further hesitation, he turned back towards the Xuanhuang Realm. Seeing that things were escalating uncontrollably, the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao grew increasingly anxious, constantly trying to persuade him. Mr. Bai, however, turned a deaf ear, his mind made up.

"I know you treated me well."

"You always said I was the reincarnation of that person."

"But I know, I am myself."

"Su Bai. An ordinary mortal." The Azure Nether Heavenly Dao's memory had become somewhat unstable due to its increasing rage. However, Mr. Bai's words, though intermittent, remained incredibly clear.

"I don't want to cultivate at all, nor be an immortal."

"I just want…"

"To save the people I care about."

"I'm sorry."

"As for what you have given me, the Great Heavenly Venerate's immortal body, and those immortal artifacts…"

"Even this cultivation, I will return to you." Mr. Bai said very calmly.

…

Boom!

The memory burst like a bubble. Having inherited the power of the Azure Nether Malice, Li Ping now felt the extreme anger of being deceived and betrayed firsthand.

"Die! Die!" The voice, as if that of the Azure Nether Malice, began to swirl in his mind. Even Li Ping's aura fluctuated slightly. In the formation, the monstrous entity suppressed and crushed by the Great Grinding Mill of Heaven and Earth also seemed to sense the changes occurring in Li Ping. It screamed, "Did you feel it?! Can you understand me?!"

"This pain of being deceived, and then sealed again for thousands of years!"

…

Unexpectedly, its outpouring was cut short by a single sentence from Li Ping.

"I am currently in a human form."

"Therefore, I can empathize more with the one you loathe."

"I think Mr. Bai did the right thing."

"Some things, ultimately, you will never understand. So…"

"Rest in peace." Li Ping's words gradually became icy. The features that had vaguely appeared due to the impact of the Azure Nether Malice's memories disappeared again. A cold and emotionless aura emanated from the faceless Sacred Emperor. Without hesitation, he accelerated the rotation of the Great Grinding Mill of Heaven and Earth, blocking the onslaught of the malice like an indestructible, towering dam.

The three formation guardians, witnessing this scene, couldn't help but breathe a sigh of relief. They had genuinely feared the Sacred Emperor being influenced by the malice. Especially Senior Yin. He jokingly said to Xu Ke, "Actually, my essence is not much different from the Azure Nether Malice. If he can swallow it so easily, swallowing me would be a piece of cake. It seems I have to keep my distance from him in the future."

Xu Ke remained silent. Looking at the figure in the formation that seemed to grow taller and taller, a sense of gain and loss filled his heart. He wondered if he had done the right thing by handing over the Azure Nether Malice.

The purple-gold vortex continued to spin, the sound of wind and thunder growing louder. The Azure Nether Malice's struggle, however, grew weaker and weaker. It was only a matter of time before it was completely devoured. As the power of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao was absorbed and refined, the majestic figure of the faceless Sacred Emperor became even taller, as if about to tear through the heavens of the Great Qi pocket world and reach another realm.

Li Ping's figure appeared in the sky. The billions of Great Qi citizens could now clearly see the Sacred Emperor's face. The surging public sentiment reached its peak at this moment. The condensed destiny, in an instant, completely broke through purple and transformed into incomparably dazzling golden light. Even if it was only for this moment, and would soon fall back, Li Ping felt a connection and acutely seized this sliver of opportunity. He lightly waved his hand, dispersing some of the Azure Nether Malice's power, absorbed and transformed by the Great Grinding Mill of Heaven and Earth, into the Great Qi pocket world.

Countless purple-gold dots, like petals falling from the sky, scattered across the land. From the perspective of the ordinary people of Great Qi below, they saw the legendary blessing from the Sacred Emperor from a few days ago. These purple-gold flowers seemed to carry a natural, heart-tempting magic, causing the Great Qi citizens to ignore the Sacred Emperor's authority and attempt to touch them. The changes that followed after the purple-gold flowers entered their bodies caused those people to immediately kneel and shout, praising the Sacred Emperor's might. The Great Qi destiny, which had already reached its apex, was like being catalyzed, ushering in another change. This time, under the unified cheers of countless Great Qi citizens, the previously unstable golden destiny completely stabilized. Billions of lifeforms roared like a surging tide, causing the three formation guardians above to be momentarily entranced.

"This is the legendary 'one attains the Dao, and his poultry and dogs ascend to heaven'," Senior Yin exclaimed. Xu Ke unconsciously observed Sacred Emperor Li Ping's motionless body. For some reason, he saw the figure of Mr. Bai on him. "Perhaps, I didn't do the wrong thing," Xu Ke thought. As for Yi Shu from the Grand Origin Sect, his eyes narrowed, as if he was deducing something, a look of shock on his face. The Heavenly Emperor's Qi Codex had transformed to its final stage and was completely stable. With the diminishing power of one and the waxing power of the other, the Azure Nether Malice finally had no chance of resistance left.

"I will wait for you."

"You will eventually end up like me." Before its consciousness completely dissipated, the Azure Nether Malice, for some reason, suddenly cursed venomously. Sacred Emperor Li Ping ignored it, unmoved. The Great Grinding Mill of Heaven and Earth pressed down with a roar. The power of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao flowed ceaselessly into his body. Li Ping felt a sense, as if an invisible shackle had been broken.

"Longevity Realm?"

"Or, perhaps, an alternative Longevity Realm." He mused thoughtfully.

…

At the same time. Within the Dharma Deduction space at the Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters. The feedback from his clone's breakthrough suddenly stopped when the Sacred Emperor reached the power of the Longevity Realm. Therefore, it did not attract the attention of others in the space. The Sacred Emperor's breakthrough was within Li Fan's expectations. What Li Fan truly cared about, however, was the memories from the Azure Nether Malice.

"Immortal artifacts?"

"And, the First Great Heavenly Venerate's immortal body?" Li Fan closed his eyes, hiding the shock in his gaze.

"Mr. Bai's sentence, 'I will return it to you,' means that these items are still within the Xuanhuang Realm?"

Chapter 1239: Source Power Sealing Immortal Calamity

In the 119th Era, Li Fan had once fabricated the rumor of a "True Immortal's Decaying Remains." Using this as bait, he lured cultivators from the Myriad Immortals Alliance into a pocket world where the Gate of Life and Death Great Formation was located, exposing the Heavenly Venerate of Rebirth to the world prematurely.

He never expected that the Xuanhuang Realm would actually hide a True Immortal's decaying remains. Moreover, it wasn't just any immortal.

"The immortal body of the First Great Heavenly Venerate?"

"Interesting."

This single sentence harbored many secrets. The Azure Nether Great Heavenly Venerate was not a specific cultivator but represented a certain status, a title. Li Fan had already learned this at the deepest level of the Fallen Immortal Realm.

"My guess back then was correct. As long as the trials of the Fallen Immortal Realm were passed, one should be able to succeed as the new Azure Nether Great Heavenly Venerate, and very likely, simultaneously obtain the several immortal artifacts left behind by Mr. Bai."

"Then, where would Mr. Bai have hidden the immortal body of the First Great Heavenly Venerate? Would it still be within the Fallen Immortal Realm?"

Li Fan's thoughts raced. The First Great Heavenly Venerate was someone Li Fan paid close attention to. The decaying remains could indeed be called an immortal body, undoubtedly indicating that this Great Heavenly Venerate was at least a True Immortal in cultivation. Why did this True Immortal die? Before their demise, why did they choose to leave their decaying remains in the Xuanhuang Realm? Was the creation of the Fallen Immortal Realm related to this True Immortal Great Heavenly Venerate?

Currently, the clone of the Sacred Emperor stood at the apex of the Xuanhuang Realm. Considering the Xuanhuang Realm's own expansion over the years, the Sacred Emperor's strength, compared to Mr. Bai in his prime, was likely only a sliver short. With a concrete reference, Li Fan was now certain that Mr. Bai alone could not have created the colossal Fallen Immortal Realm, which was both illusory and real. However, during the era of the Myriad Immortal Sects, no one knew of the Fallen Immortal Realm's existence. Therefore, it was certain that even if Mr. Bai did not personally create it, the Fallen Immortal Realm must have had significant ties to him. The multiple illusory trials undoubtedly confirmed this.

"Although Mr. Bai 'betrayed' the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, he did not break his word. Both the immortal artifacts and the immortal body were returned to the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao. Even his cultivation, through the process of defying the mortal-immortal principles, returned to the Dao with his demise."

Li Fan pondered this silently, not making any immediate move to search for the Great Heavenly Venerate's immortal body. While the Great Heavenly Venerate's immortal body could be considered a supreme treasure, it was of little use to Li Fan at present. Even if he could use the immortal body's protection to cross the The Great Barrier, Li Fan would never rashly leave without knowing anything about what lay beyond. Not to mention that Li Fan's current realm was still insufficient to utilize immortal Spirit Qi. How to detonate an immortal artifact and use its explosive power to cross the The Great Barrier without harming himself was not something Li Fan understood.

"I must proceed step by step. Anyway, as long as it's within the Xuanhuang Realm or the range of the Utter Darkness Star Sea, it will eventually be mine."

Li Fan had a very clear understanding of his advantages.

"The Sacred Emperor's clone in this world now possesses enough capital to contend with the Myriad Immortals Alliance. With numerous enhancements, its strength has surpassed mine. Let's see how he stirs up trouble."

"This Xuanhuang Realm is like a small pond. Only by thoroughly stirring up the water will those old fellows hiding in various corners of the pond reveal themselves one by one. And I, I only need to quietly observe the changes in the world."

"However, the Nascent Soul clone I left in the Sun family can be cultivated into a future Great Heavenly Venerate."

His attention shifted in an instant. The Nascent Soul clone had completely taken control of Wu Ninglu's body, but without her realizing it. It subtly influenced every decision and action of hers. The most crucial aspect was to sacrifice her own cultivation to nourish the fetus in her womb, without hesitation. If it were the original Wu Ninglu, she would certainly not have done this. She merely saw the unborn child as a bargaining chip to restrain Sun Ang. But with Li Fan's intervention, things were naturally different.

Since the Nascent Soul clone had previously detected the fetus's unusual nature, it began its meticulous prenatal education. Li Fan possessed considerable experience from his past life in the Fallen Immortal Realm, where he had undergone a cultivation stage before birth with the Heavenly Mandate Black Bird, Little Black. With his personal guidance, the fetus absorbed the essence of its mother's cultivation, gradually replenishing the congenital deficiency caused by the previous sealing. Its physique grew stronger, and its consciousness slowly stabilized from a faint state. In a state of complete chaos, knowing nothing about anything, Li Fan's Nascent Soul clone led it into one meticulously crafted illusion after another.

"They say saints are born, but in reality, it's not impossible to forge saints through cultivation. 'Judge by deeds, not by heart.' Regardless of their inner thoughts, as long as they consistently hold themselves to strict moral requirements and behavioral standards, never breaking them even until death... then in the eyes of outsiders, they are true saints."

Cultivating from a state of innate chaos was certainly easier than postnatal education. What Li Fan was doing now was more like shaping a being's personality. He did not have specific experience and could only explore through practice. If this proved feasible, then even if not saints, it would at least be entirely possible to mass-produce gentlemen. Li Fan had discovered that although the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao had been deceived by Mr. Bai once, it still trusted people like Mr. Bai more. Just like the Faceless Sacred Emperor in this life.

"The fundamental reason for this can likely be traced back to the Azure Nether King Xuanyuan Hong, and even the first Azure Nether Great Heavenly Venerate," Li Fan mused.

Li Fan had planned for the birth of the fetus within Wu Ninglu to occur simultaneously with her consuming the Heavenly and Earthly Essence and achieving Dao Integration. "If the method is appropriate, perhaps the power of the heavenly laws condensed within the mother's body can be directly transferred to the child during childbirth."

"Perhaps, it might even give birth to the Xuanhuang Realm's first cultivator to be born with Dao Integration..."

"With such an anomaly, who would dare say he is not a saint?"

Li Fan thought this way, and even felt a sense of anticipation for the fetus's future. He had even pre-written the script for its destiny. "Such a prodigy would absolutely be regarded as the hope of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's future. And it is precisely such a figure who, when the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty and the Myriad Immortals Alliance are at war, ablaze with conflict, would resolutely choose to turn against them. And firmly claim that he stands on the side of justice."

...

"The scene of everyone in the Xuanhuang Realm forcing the Dharma-Preachers should be quite interesting."

Vivid scenes flashed through Li Fan's mind. Without needing the Dao-Melting Stone for deduction, he could already roughly predict the future trajectory of this world. However, this was the ideal scenario. Both forging a congenital saint and the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty truly developing to a point where they forced the Dharma-Preachers to appear would still require a long time to develop.

Also in the Sun family, the divine sense hidden within the Boundless Mirror lived a much more leisurely life than the Nascent Soul clone. Besides continuously peeking into the secrets of the Heavenly Profound Mirror, most of his energy was spent on trying to lure out the Devouring Calamity within the mirror. As Sun Luyuan had defected to the Sacred Emperor, he had the good fortune to borrow over a hundred newly born, robust Netherfolk. Currently, they were hidden in a secret underground chamber of the Sun family, next to the family's ancestral blood pool. These Netherfolk received better treatment than their kin in the Sacred Dynasty. They even had two hours of rest time each day. Of course, this wasn't Li Fan's act of benevolence; it was because the Boundless Mirror could not withstand overly frequent experiments and needed time to rest.

"My guess was correct; this Devouring Calamity does indeed actively attack anything approaching 'Immortal' power."

At this moment, the Boundless Mirror emitted waves of dim light, floating in the air. Its surface did not reflect the external scene but showed rapid flashes of calamitous scenes of various civilizations being destroyed. An aura of desolation and ancientness emanated from the mirror. The Boundless Mirror, which had just recovered after absorbing essence blood, became dilapidated once more. The black, formless Devouring Wind was drawn out from the Boundless Mirror and flew towards a golden square not far away. This square was naturally formed by pure Primal Force. Although not as refined as the Sacred Emperor clone's essence of Primal Force, it was sufficient to lure out the Devouring Calamity.

As the Devouring Calamity entered the Primal Force's range, its form instantly changed. The power that transcended the mundane vanished. The reduction in the purity of the Primal Force led to a decrease in its energy level. Losing its target, the Devouring Calamity briefly remained in place before continuing to spread outwards. However, the Primal Force transformed, forming a Great Formation that sealed the Devouring Calamity's power within. Li Fan referenced the incomplete "Profound Origin Spirit Array" for this Great Formation, simulating a relatively static space. The formation contained nothing, a state of absolute void, resembling a post-apocalyptic scene after everything had been destroyed. The Devouring Calamity was indeed enticed, and its energy no longer erupted outwards but slowly became dormant. The remaining residual power of the calamity within the Boundless Mirror also subsided.

"Senior's methods are truly divine. With just a few more attempts like this, the hidden dangers within me will be completely eliminated," the Boundless Mirror spirit, Sun Luoyao, said joyfully.

Li Fan ignored him, carefully collecting the golden cube containing the Devouring Calamity. He had already created over twenty such small cubes. Due to differences in technical proficiency, the power of the calamity contained within them varied. But without a doubt, if the balance of each golden cube were to be broken, a terrifying calamity would erupt. Sun Luoyao paid no mind to Li Fan's silence and continued to describe his changes.

"Senior, I have a premonition that after completely removing this calamity, my control over the Boundless Mirror will reach a new realm. At that time, I might be able to sense the whereabouts of other Boundless Mirror fragments and fully restore this immortal artifact."

"Not bad," Li Fan nodded faintly, his attention still focused on the golden cubes. Seeing Li Fan's methods, Sun Luoyao, eager to take credit, hesitated for a moment before speaking again: "Senior, once I'm fully restored to an immortal artifact, I might even be able to simultaneously sense the whereabouts of other potential immortal artifacts remaining in the Xuanhuang Realm."

Hearing Sun Luoyao's words, Li Fan finally turned his head slightly. "Oh? You're so certain?"

Sun Luoyao's spirit surged, and he quickly explained, "Beings like us can always sense each other. Especially since my Boundless Mirror also possesses the ability to measure the heavens and survey the earth. If there are other immortal artifacts in the Xuanhuang Realm, then after I recover, the probability of finding them is quite high."

Li Fan smiled: "I think you've been confined for too long and are simply unable to restrain yourself and want to go out for a stroll."

Sun Luoyao smiled sheepishly: "That's part of it, of course. But my desire to help Senior find immortal artifacts is definitely not fake."

Li Fan glanced at him: "Let's focus on completely removing this calamity first."

Li Fan's expression was somewhat solemn: "Don't look at how weakened it appears now; its root cause shows no signs of complete reduction."

"After all, it is a power that transcends the mortal realm; one cannot be careless." Sun Luoyao nodded in agreement.

...

Great Qi Sacred Dynasty.

More than ten days had passed since Li Ping completely devoured the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought. Having gained such a significant power, Li Ping needed some time to digest and adapt. He finally had a rare moment of rest. However, within the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty, a period of unprecedented prosperity and flourishing had begun. Currently, the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty's destiny was highly bound to the Sacred Emperor Li Ping. Generally, after cultivating the Heavenly Emperor's Qi Codex, the dynasty's destiny would grow, leading to the emperor's strength. But in the Great Qi at this moment, it was a rare breakthrough in the Sacred Emperor's strength that fed back into the Sacred Dynasty's destiny. And as the Sacred Dynasty's popular support and destiny further strengthened, it finally brought a feedback loop to the Sacred Emperor. Thus, in addition to the power boost from devouring the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought, Li Ping's Heavenly Emperor's Qi Codex was once again close to a transformation shortly after his breakthrough. However, this time, the original text provided no record of the path forward. There was no further path.

"Below True Immortal, realms like Longevity are the limit for destiny-based cultivation. After all, to break through the shackles and achieve True Immortal solely through imperial destiny... it's still too difficult. Unless it's a great sacred dynasty that spans the star sea."

Li Ping shook his head slightly, suppressing this thought. The Utter Darkness Star Sea was a prerequisite. Even if the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty unified the Xuanhuang Realm, it would not be enough to support him in breaking through to the True Immortal realm.

"Since this path is blocked, I must find another way. The Azure Nether Malevolent Thought has been devoured by me. Next, if I want to become stronger... First, the Treasure Fishing Pond. Second..."

The Sacred Emperor sat on the Sacred Emperor's Throne, figures of native creations of the Xuanhuang Realm like If Wood and the Genesis Stone Slab appearing in his mind. "As part of the Xuanhuang Realm's laws, when the Heavenly Dao faced great calamity, they were unharmed. Heaven's gifts, since they are useless to Heaven and Earth, must be reclaimed by Heaven and Earth."

A killing intent surged from the Faceless Sacred Emperor.

Chapter 1240

A surge of killing intent churned in Li Ping's mind, but soon the aura emanating from his body vanished without a trace. As the Sacred Emperor of Great Qi, he was expected to conceal his emotions. Even though no one was present, he had to maintain such composure.

"Recalling the power of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao is not necessarily about killing them," he mused. "If they willingly return the power, I would not wish to spill more blood. But if..."

A chill settled in Li Ping's heart. Wood That Does Not Wilt and the Stone Slab, though appearing solitary, possessed combat power equivalent to cultivators at the Longevity Realm. A battle against them would be an excellent warm-up before the decisive confrontation with the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

"Even a lion attacking a hare uses its full strength. I must not underestimate them." He pondered, "If Wood That Does Not Wilt is weaker, I will start with him. I also need to avoid the Stone Slab's awareness..." A plan began to take shape in the Sacred Emperor's mind.

The Earth Vein Ancient Tree, as one of the three major branches of Wood That Does Not Wilt when he descended to the mortal realm, must have a specific connection to its mother body. After being severely injured by cultivators, Wood That Does Not Wilt had gone mad and remained hidden from the world. Perhaps, by using the Earth Vein Ancient Tree, he could first pinpoint Wood That Does Not Wilt's true hiding place, and then weaken his power.

With a thought, Wang Xuanba arrived in the Sacred Emperor's throne room shortly thereafter. Li Ping had completely absorbed the Azure Nether Malevolent Thought, so Wang Xuanba no longer needed to remain on the mountaintop of the sealed miniature world. After receiving the Sacred Emperor's telepathic message not long ago, he had already returned to the Sacred Capital. Li Ping's breakthrough that saw heavenly blessings descend had also benefited him slightly due to the presence of a clone in the miniature world.

Wang Xuanba's cultivation had now reached the cusp of the Nascent Soul peak, not far from Soul Transformation. However, Wang Xuanba's strength was more evident in his various wild beast abilities; his cultivation realm was not as important to him.

"Dao One Insect," Li Ping commanded. "There are mutated varieties that can erode spiritual wood. Cultivate some for me first, I will have a great use for them soon." Wang Xuanba nodded and accepted the order.

...

Just as Sacred Emperor Li Ping was preparing to reveal his might to the Xuanhuang Realm for the first time, on the other side of the distant Sea of Utmost Darkness, outside the Mystic Immortal Boat, the Sacred Embryo Li Fan encountered a crisis. The source of the danger was not the remnants of True Immortal power in the star sea, nor unknown cultivators. It was the Sea of Remnants where he was located. Not long ago, this seemingly stable ruin inexplicably began to vibrate slightly. The trembling of the Sea of Remnants was secondary; more importantly, as the continuous ruins became less like a unified body, the suction from the The Great Barrier in the deeper parts of the star sea became increasingly powerful.

In the Sacred Embryo Li Fan's eyes, the entire starry sky suddenly seemed to be experiencing a high tide, sweeping countless gathered remnants and dragging them towards the shore. The Mystic Immortal Boat activated a special contingency plan. Even though the immortal boat did not manifest, remaining hidden in the void, the Sacred Embryo Li Fan could still clearly feel its movement. It wasn't traveling in a fixed direction but was constantly shifting its position, dodging and weaving. It was like a continuously rotating compass, deflecting the suction from the The Great Barrier.

The Sacred Embryo Li Fan initially considered learning this method to resist the The Great Barrier's suction, but it was not as easy as it appeared. "The rotation of the immortal boat is not merely a node of its own body, but it's subtly connected to the entire Sea of Remnants. It's by borrowing the power of these nearly infinite remnants that it can barely escape." The Sacred Embryo Li Fan felt a force dragging his body. Even flying in the opposite direction with his sword, he was slowly being pulled down.

As he moved further and further away from the Mystic Immortal Boat, about to be dragged into the depths of the Sea of Remnants, the Sacred Embryo Li Fan thought of a desperate idea: to forcibly break into the immortal boat for refuge. Even if it meant a fierce battle, it was better than crashing headfirst into the invisible The Great Barrier.

Just as he was about to act, a beam of seven-colored rainbow light erupted from the direction of the Xuanhuang Realm and the Immortal Ruins in the Sea of Utmost Darkness, instantly grabbing his attention. He was stunned for a moment, then quickly realized it was the sixteen Dao Integration cultivators summoned by the Myriad Immortals Alliance for the Doctrine Transmitter's summons! "They've arrived so quickly?" The Sacred Embryo Li Fan couldn't help but be surprised. Even with the varying time flow in different regions of the star sea, the arrival of this rainbow light was much earlier than Li Fan had anticipated.

"Wait, could this sudden change in suction be to guide the Myriad Immortals Alliance's rainbow light?" As he watched the beam of light speeding through the star sea, this thought flashed through Li Fan's mind. After a moment of contemplation, he gave up his futile struggle and, using the suction, also began to fly towards the depths of the star sea. The rainbow light was extremely fast, but within the Sea of Remnants filled with ruins, it inevitably slowed down. Li Fan, protected by his sword formation, quietly followed.

Li Fan had initially thought the Sea of Remnants should have a limited range. But after following for about three days according to the Xuanhuang Realm's time, and still not having left the continuous ruins, Li Fan finally had a rough understanding of the scale of the once prosperous cultivation world in the Sea of Utmost Darkness. Beyond the remnants, there was no discernible end, no sense of direction. However, the Myriad Immortals Alliance's rainbow light clearly possessed a special guidance, maintaining a fixed direction. And its path seemed to have been meticulously calculated, avoiding all dangerous areas within the ruins. Thanks to them, the Sacred Embryo Li Fan also followed smoothly.

Four more days passed. The dense, broken remnants ahead suddenly became sparse. Li Fan's spirit surged, knowing they were about to fly out of the Sea of Remnants. With no more obstructions, the rainbow light gradually accelerated. After only half a day, Li Fan witnessed a scene that would be unforgettable for eternity. A long wall stood erect in the dark void ahead. At first, Li Fan thought it was the so-called The Great Barrier. But after seeing the details of the long wall, Li Fan suddenly understood. The "bricks" that formed the endlessly extending city wall were clearly shattered worlds, one after another! Like the ruins and remnants in this Sea of Remnants, what lay ahead were the ruins of worlds!

Li Fan estimated that even after absorbing numerous fragments of cultivation worlds, making its scale far surpass that of the ancient Xuanhuang Realm, it was merely an insignificant segment in this Great Wall of Broken Realms. "How many cultivation worlds perished in the ancient calamity?" "And by what great power were they all gathered here?" "The Great Barrier..."

Li Fan gazed into the distance, trying to find the The Great Barrier, whose name he had heard but whose form he could not see. But in the darkness, apart from countless world fragments, no other anomalies were visible. After a brief moment of distraction, Li Fan found that he still couldn't control himself and was flying towards the ruins of broken realms, his speed increasing. "If I crash into it headfirst, even with my Heavenly Sword Physique, I will perish," Li Ping muttered inwardly, frowning. But he quickly fixed his gaze on the Myriad Immortals Alliance's rainbow light that was ahead of him. For some reason, that beam of light showed no intention of slowing down. Instead, it accelerated again, speeding forward.

"This..." After a moment of contemplation, the Sacred Embryo Li Fan resolutely followed closely. "The Dharma-Preachers went to so much trouble to summon these Dao Integration cultivators, they wouldn't just let them die for nothing, right?" As if confirming Li Fan's guess, after a certain distance into the Sea of Broken Realms, the beam of rainbow light, ignoring the suction of the The Great Barrier, suddenly changed direction and flew into one of the world fragments. It was as if something there possessed an attraction more powerful than the echoing stellar force of the The Great Barrier.

A sense of unease inexplicably flashed through the Sacred Embryo Li Fan's mind. "The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate?" As he approached the location where the rainbow light turned, he also felt that power. However, with the warning in his heart, the Sacred Embryo Li Fan did not fly over with it. Instead, he continued to fly deeper into the Sea of Broken Realms for some time. Due to the possible influence of the doctrine transmission power, Li Fan's speed gradually slowed down. He finally found a stable point and was able to stabilize himself.

However, Li Ping knew that this stability was only temporary. As soon as the suspected doctrine transmission power disappeared, he would again lose control and be pulled towards the The Great Barrier. Li Fan attempted to fly into the ruined worlds here to take shelter. But the 'corpses' of these worlds clearly did not offer protection to cultivators like the Xuanhuang Realm. "It seems I'm about to meet my end," the Sacred Embryo Li Fan thought.

Just as the Sacred Embryo Li Fan was contemplating this, in the distance, at the original destination of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's rainbow light, the sudden disappearance of an aura jolted him awake. Before he could react, the auras of the second and third Dao Integration cultivators also vanished. Dao Integration cultivators, even those who had achieved it rapidly through accelerated growth, were still supreme beings below the Longevity Realm. They were existences that countless cultivators dreamed of. Yet, here, in the dark void, within the Great Wall of Broken Realms, they died silently without even a whimper of struggle.

"What's happening?" "Did the doctrine transmission do this?" "After all the trouble calling them here, just to slaughter them?" While the Sacred Embryo Li Fan was filled with unease and doubt, the speed at which the Dao Integration cultivators in the Myriad Immortals Alliance's rainbow light disappeared did not decrease. In the blink of an eye, all sixteen Dao Integration cultivators were dead.

"If they die here, will their Dao return to the heavens?" Li Fan suddenly thought. "Wait, 'return Dao to heaven'..." Li Fan suddenly recalled something and quickly focused his attention, sensing the spot where the rainbow light had vanished. Although the life force of the cultivators had disappeared, the power of heavenly laws still faintly existed there. But it was like ice slowly melting into water, gradually weakening in a rhythmic pattern.

"This is..." Li Fan's heart trembled, realizing what had just happened. And then, the previously turbulent Sea of Broken Realms, for some unknown reason, became stable again. This further cemented Li Fan's judgment. "They actually used the Heavenly and Earthly Essence within the Dao Integration cultivators to repair the Great Wall of Broken Realms?" Li Fan was both shocked and enraged. "All this effort, just to steal from Peter to pay Paul?" Li Fan found it utterly absurd. But the complete stabilization of the Great Wall of Broken Realms, and the gradual weakening of the The Great Barrier's echoing stellar force, forced him to believe it.

Although his heart longed to rush to the spot where the rainbow light had disappeared to see for himself, the Sacred Embryo Li Ping was not yet ready to face the doctrine transmission. Especially since his Sacred Embryo body was formed from the sword law of the Xuanhuang Realm. Rushing over rashly would likely lead to the same fate as those sixteen Dao Integration cultivators, becoming materials to repair the Great Wall of Broken Realms. While the Sacred Embryo Li Fan did not fear death, dying in such a demeaning way was truly frustrating.

"The great turmoil in the Xuanhuang Realm originated from the echoing stellar force of the The Great Barrier." "According to the current scene, this echoing stellar force and the Great Wall of Broken Realms have achieved a subtle balance. Under normal circumstances, it wouldn't be enough to propagate to the Xuanhuang Realm." "So, it was because the balance of the Great Wall of Broken Realms was broken by an external force, thus causing the great disturbance in the star sea?" "..."

"This continuous expanse of broken world ruins, existing since ancient times, would experience imbalance." The Sacred Embryo Li Fan couldn't help but recall how he had previously destroyed a broken realm within the Chizha Abyss in the Xuanhuang Realm. Afterwards, a figure resembling the doctrine transmitter had appeared and replaced it with a new world fragment. "Could it be that this action caused the subsequent series of changes?" Li Fan suddenly felt a sense of ironic amusement. "What is this? Stealing from Peter to pay Paul, and then stealing from Paul to pay Peter?"

After some thought, Li Fan felt that the possibility was indeed very high. "After all, judging from the current reality, he actually managed to reverse this catastrophe." "..." Li Fan was speechless. He then carefully recalled and reviewed the details of the event. "There are still some strange aspects." "Since the state of the Great Wall of Broken Realms can be so easily broken, the doctrine transmitter should have been extremely cautious when taking world fragments back then. Acting so short-sightedly is simply not in line with the doctrine transmitter's usual style." "Unless the operating mechanism of this Great Wall of Broken Realms is too profound, and even the doctrine transmitter only has a superficial understanding. Or..." "That node within the Chizha Abyss is crucial for the Xuanhuang Realm's re-establishment, and cannot be lost. Therefore, even if it caused the imbalance of the Great Wall of Broken Realms, the doctrine transmitter had to act this way."

The Sacred Embryo Li Fan's thoughts raced. With the current conditions, it was impossible to determine which guess was correct. However, it was now certain that the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate was within this Great Wall of Broken Realms. Or perhaps, it was the Heavenly Physician. The Sacred Embryo Li Fan cautiously concealed his aura again, not acting rashly, but quietly hiding. Fortunately, the energies here were complex and chaotic. The echoing stellar force, though contained by the Great Wall of Broken Realms, had already rippled through the void like waves, effectively concealing the sliver of fluctuation Li Fan had exposed.

After patiently waiting for more than ten days, until the warning in his heart completely disappeared, the Sacred Embryo Li Fan slowly flew towards the place where the rainbow light had vanished. He flew very slowly; a distance that could have been covered in a blink of an eye took him nearly half a day. Once he confirmed that no one was present, Li Fan began to examine the miniature world he was in. It seemed no different from the other broken world fragments here. But for some reason, Li Fan felt a sense of familiarity with this place. "What could it be..." After a while, Li Fan realized. "Cloudy Sea..."

Chapter 1241

"Part of the Cloudy Sea, or perhaps a remnant with an extremely similar aura, belonging to the Heavenly Law Realm..."

Li Fan had previously used the Azure Sea Pearl to establish his foundation, merging his consciousness with the Cloudy Sea. In this life, the Sacred Emperor's clone had directly devoured the residual consciousness of the Cloudy Sea. Thus, Li Fan was intimately familiar with the land of the Cloudy Sea. Even though this world remnant was long desolate and dead, after standing there for a moment, Li Fan still felt a trace of familiarity.

He suddenly realized, "Perhaps it's because the Doctrine Transmitter took action to repair it, and this is also its homeland."

He wandered through the ruins of the Heavenly Law Realm. Although thousands of years had passed, the terrifying traces of the world's destruction were still clearly visible. Not a single complete building could be found on the surface, only scattered ruins and debris. Occasionally, he saw the skeletal remains of cultivators in the ruins. Judging by their postures, they didn't seem to have died in combat with others.

"It seems the catastrophe struck very suddenly, leaving no time for even a struggle."

Although he had tried various methods to destroy the Xuanhuang Realm, each time the Xuanhuang Realm was destroyed, Li Fan had returned to the peak of Dissolution Mountain through Return to Truth. He had witnessed worlds being annihilated only a few times.

A sense of oppression inexplicably surged into the heart of Sacred Embryo Li Fan. It wasn't that his state of mind was shaken, but rather a spontaneous reaction of the body in such an environment.

This world remnant wasn't very large, and Li Fan soon searched it all. He didn't find any valuable clues. "However, this remnant realm is relatively well-preserved. Currently, the Doctrine Transmitter hasn't acted due to concerns about the fragile balance of the Remnant Realm Great Wall. I imagine He will take it away soon."

"This place is not suitable for lingering." Li Fan was decisive and silently transformed into a stream of light, leaving the area. After some thought, he didn't immediately return to the Mystic Immortal Boat. Instead, he chose to live in seclusion within this Remnant Realm Great Wall.

Firstly, one of his consciousnesses was already lurking within the Mystic Immortal Boat, residing within and manipulating Zhao Xian. He didn't need to act personally at this point.

Secondly, because... "The upper limit of the laws here has increased again." "Is it because it's closer to the The Great Barrier? Or because of the remnants of a thousand worlds?" "Ignoring the environmental factors, it's truly a good place for comprehending the Dao and cultivating."

Sacred Embryo Li Fan, having achieved his Dao foundation and Grotto-heaven through the Azure Nether Sword Dao, was exceptionally sensitive to laws. If the intact Xuanhuang Realm was a depression in the height of the law ceiling within the ultimate dark star sea, then this place, the Remnant Realm Longevity, was the pinnacle of the law ceiling in the entire star sea.

Even though it was affected by the distant stellar force, making the rhythm of the laws difficult to grasp, and it was inherently incomplete and chaotic, if one could seize the fleeting opportunity to comprehend, one might achieve in a single enlightenment what would normally take a hundred years of arduous cultivation.

"The supreme principles of the mortal realm were crudely torn to shreds by the power of True Immortal Sigils from the Immortal Realm, scattering throughout the star sea." "As a survivor who came later, I can more easily perceive and comprehend them. Under normal circumstances..."

Sacred Embryo Li Fan's mind flashed back to the fragments of light he occasionally saw from the ancient period of the Xuanhuang Realm in the 119th life, when they interacted with other cultivation realms through the blood-colored river. "At that time, when all realms still existed and everything was in order, cultivators would find it extremely difficult, let alone comprehend, to even touch these supreme dark principles. Those who, by chance, had such an encounter would likely have hope of reaching immortality."

Sacred Embryo Li Fan's thoughts flowed, and countless inspirations for enlightenment surged into his heart. Fearing that his sword light might attract any Dharma-Preachers or Heavenly Physicians potentially present in the Remnant Realm Great Wall, he suppressed the myriad insights and only simulated them in his mind. Even so, it filled him with joy.

At the same time, a thought emerged: "Spending a long time here, it seems the cultivation of the Doctrine Transmitter and Heavenly Physician must have already reached the pinnacle of the mortal realm." He had harbored suspicions during his journey through the star sea. Now, he was utterly convinced.

Li Fan had no doubt about their talent. Their ability to comprehend the supreme laws of the star sea was undoubtedly no less than his own. However, compared to before, the slight apprehension in Li Fan's heart had vanished.

"They have indeed reached the limit of this ultimate dark star sea, but that's all. The immortal path is severed, and becoming an immortal is hopeless..." A faint light flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

The reason people thought the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate was invincible was because they didn't know His true cultivation realm. Because of the unknown, they felt fear and confusion. Although Li Fan had a vague guess before, that it was the pinnacle of the mortal realm below True Immortal, he couldn't precisely quantify the difference between this peak realm and the Longevity Realm.

However, now, standing at the foot of the The Great Barrier and personally feeling the upper limit of power in this ultimate dark star sea, Li Fan's doubts were completely dispelled. With a goal, it became easier to pursue.

Li Fan also felt very fortunate that even after thousands of years, the Doctrine Transmitter and Heavenly Physician remained at this realm because the star sea's limit was like that. Essentially, their cultivation had stagnated for a long time, indirectly giving Li Fan time to catch up.

"Furthermore, with the True Immortal of the Immortal Ruins present, even if they found a way to break through the mortal realm, they would have to reconsider for the sake of the Xuanhuang Realm's safety."

"In a tortoise and hare race, the tortoise is the winner." Sacred Embryo Li Fan cast aside his杂念 and peacefully began to comprehend the supreme laws of the star sea circulating in this place.

...

Xuanhuang Realm.

After a period of cultivation, Wang Xuanba had successfully cultivated enough of the Dao One Insect that the Sacred Emperor had named.

"Heaven and Earth Spiritual Woods all have their own functions. My little insects have another marvelous use: after they devour the spiritual trees, the trees don't die immediately. Instead, they gradually transform into insect-infested spiritual woods. The original consciousness can freely choose whether to retain it, or even merge other consciousness sources into the Dao One Insect swarm, achieving a kind of clone-like existence," Wang Xuanba boasted to Ou Shangtian with some pride.

"Alas, I still feel that the path of exotic beasts, with its myriad transformations, is more interesting. Array formations are truly dull," Ou Shangtian said, a hint of envy in his eyes.

Wang Xuanba laughed, a little mischievously, "Who told you, young brother, to be too ambitious, wanting to learn everything you see, thus displeasing master."

"Yes, until my array formation skills meet master's requirements, I cannot be distracted. Alas, it seems like a distant hope," Ou Shangtian sighed.

"By the way, master also said that he would have me act as bait in the future to lure out a hidden expert in the Xuanhuang Realm. That person is not weak. If I don't study array formations diligently, my life might even be in danger. I wonder if it's true," Ou Shangtian said carelessly.

Wang Xuanba's expression changed upon hearing this, "Junior brother, do not speak such nonsense! Since master said so, it must be true. You've also seen Senior Xu Ke before. The hidden experts in the Xuanhuang Realm are truly not to be underestimated. Junior brother must take this seriously!"

Ou Shangtian outwardly agreed with a nod, but in his heart, he remained somewhat dismissive. He had also seen that Xu Ke. But he was just a decaying old man on the verge of death. Although his strength was much greater than Ou Shangtian's, with the Seven-Colored Jade Void Golden Light around him, Xu Ke wouldn't be able to stop him if he wanted to escape!

"I want to see just how powerful this expert master mentioned is!"

Beneath the Sacred Emperor's throne, in the Sacred Dynasty's treasury. Li Ping glanced subtly in the direction of Ou Shangtian and Wang Xuanba, shaking his head. He had faintly sensed Ou Shangtian's thoughts. Young and arrogant, with many divine artifacts by his side, it was understandable. "But if he doesn't meticulously study array formations and relies solely on the Seven-Colored Divine Light, escaping from the Stone Slab will be quite difficult."

He chuckled inwardly, but Li Ping had no intention of reminding him again. It would be good for him to suffer a setback. The Stone Slab wouldn't kill him rashly. As long as the Stone Slab appeared, Li Ping would deal with it himself. After retrieving the Stone Slab and dealing with If Wood later, Li Ping set this matter aside for now and gently stroked the orange cat lying on his shoulder.

Compared to before, Cat Treasure's size had increased. Its fur had also become thicker and subtly smoother, changing from sparse to dense. What concerned the Sacred Emperor even more was Cat Treasure's second transformation. Previously, Cat Treasure could transform into a small square box. When the square box released light, it could replicate whatever it enveloped. Its limits were still unclear, but at least it could replicate "World Artifacts" refined by the power of a realm without much issue, though it would be somewhat over-exerted.

Not long ago, when Wang Xuanba brought the Dao One Insects that had devoured spiritual wood to report to the Sacred Emperor, Li Ping felt Cat Treasure's thoughts being actively transmitted for the first time. After Wang Xuanba left, Li Ping began an experiment. He placed a cluster of about tens of thousands of Dao One Insects in front of Cat Treasure.

Cat Treasure initially appeared somewhat fearful, watching from a distance, but its eyes revealed longing. Taking a step forward and then a step back, Cat Treasure slowly approached the swarm of Dao One Insects. The Dao One Insects, always sensitive to external anomalies, showed no reaction to Cat Treasure's proximity.

Finally reaching the swarm, Cat Treasure emitted a faint blue glow and, under Li Ping's gaze, transformed into a blue sphere of light, enveloping the Dao One Insects. The insect swarm within the blue sphere seemed to freeze instantly, falling into a state of stillness. On the surface of the sphere, various views of the Dao One Insects' body structures flashed intermittently. Li Ping's expression became solemn.

The sphere did not last long, as this form seemed to consume an extreme amount of energy. After a short while, Cat Treasure reverted to its small kitten form and returned to Li Fan's side, lazily lying on Li Ping's shoulder. The previously stagnant Dao One Insects then resumed their movement, completely unaware of what had happened to them.

"It's not that the Dao One Insects have low intelligence. If they were cultivators in the Xuanhuang Realm, the outcome would likely be no different." "This blue light of Cat Treasure..." It was a mystical power that Li Ping had never seen before.

With a thought, he patted Cat Treasure. The little orange cat was somewhat reluctant, but considering Li Ping's long-term feeding of the Golden Origin Energy Essence, it perked up. The blue light enveloped its body and instantly shattered. A moment later, Cat Treasure had transformed into a swarm of Dao One Insects! It was exactly identical to the swarm enveloped by the blue sphere not far away!

The entire transformation process happened right before Li Ping's eyes, yet he couldn't discern any difference between them. "It's not a transformation technique, but a complete alteration of its life form. That's why no difference can be detected." Even considering himself the Chosen Emperor, capable of Soul Transformation in the Xuanhuang Realm, Li Ping couldn't help but marvel at this seemingly divine skill.

"Moreover, the transformation is not limited to replicating the original body. It can also evolve completely based on the characteristics of the copied entity." Li Ping gained a sudden insight and a golden light reappeared on his fingertip. Cat Treasure understood Li Ping's intention. The swarm of Dao One Insects suddenly expanded, and in a visible change, it grew from tens of thousands to hundreds of thousands, its numbers instantly multiplying tenfold.

The swarm of Dao One Insects, transformed from Cat Treasure, returned to Li Ping's side as if seeking praise. After receiving permission, the blue light shattered, and it reverted to its orange cat form, happily swallowing the Origin Energy Essence.

"This is actually also a form of replication. However, it replicates living beings, and it can also achieve Cat Treasure's own transformations." "Such a technique..." Li Ping fell silent. In his memory, only treasures from the Immortal Realm could achieve this. Yet, he couldn't sense the slightest trace of immortal Spirit Qi from Cat Treasure.

"Outside the The Great Barrier..." A fact that had to be admitted became clear. "It's just unknown what level of treasure Cat Treasure is outside the The Great Barrier."

Li Ping's resolve was firm; he was not shaken by the potential gap between the inside and outside of the The Great Barrier. "Object replication, creature mimicry... I wonder if Cat Treasure has any other functions?" He wanted to find answers from the little orange cat, but Cat Treasure itself didn't know much about its own abilities. It would only learn automatically when triggered by specific conditions. "Furthermore, it's not every creature that Cat Treasure is willing to replicate or mimic." "I've tried some ordinary exotic beasts, and it had no reaction at all. Only peculiar existences like the Dao One Insects would arouse its interest."

Li Ping gently stroked this treasure from beyond the The Great Barrier while pondering its various uses. "Although Cat Treasure has no offensive capabilities, its value is far greater than purely destructive treasures." As if sensing Li Ping's thoughts, the little orange cat let out a proud meow.

Seven days later, Wang Xuanba arrived in the Xuanhuang Realm carrying a wooden box. Standing on the ground with both feet, Wang Xuanba closed his eyes and sensed the flow of Earth Vein energy deep underground.

"I'll give you a small appetizer first. The real dish is coming later." A smile appeared on Wang Xuanba's face, and he transformed into a black shadow, drilling into the ground. In an instant, he reached the extreme depths underground. The surging Earth Vein energy formed a protective layer, preventing him from getting close. He even vaguely sensed a wisp of consciousness sweeping over. Wang Xuanba sneered inwardly and broke open the wooden box. A mass of shadows immediately flew towards the yellow Earth Vein. The protective layer was devoured and disintegrated as easily as paper.

Chapter 1242: Heavenly Dao as Nourishment

The power originally meant to protect the earth veins, after being devoured by the Dao One Insects, instead transformed into nourishing sustenance.

Initially a mere fist-sized mass of dark shadow, it instantly spread like thick ink dissolving in water, gradually blackening the surging river of earth veins.

Even more bizarre was that the black torrent, after being corrupted by the Dao One Insects, retained the same aura and energy fluctuations as the previous yellow earth veins, with only its color altered. A simple perception would be unable to detect such a mutation.

however, Wang Xuanba, who had a clone among the Dao One Insects, could clearly sense the terrifying speed at which the insect swarm grew and expanded.

Following the earth veins, centered on Yueyang Prefecture, it fiercely spread towards various parts of the Xuanhuang Realm.

In addition to horizontal expansion, the Dao One Insects also relentlessly eroded downwards along the roots of the dense, inverted trees, penetrating deeper into vertical space.

"The ingenuity of creation is truly astonishing. If not for my master's guidance, I would never have imagined that such a great tree was hidden beneath the earth of the Xuanhuang Realm," Wang Xuanba mused inwardly.

Through the images transmitted by the bodies of the Dao One Insects, Wang Xuanba saw the previously dense but still roots, as they were gradually blackened, begin to seemingly come alive, swaying slightly.
