"Hmm? Isn't this your physical body from when you were alive?" The Sacred Emperor recognized the origin of the bones at a glance.

"Yes..." Tian Yang's expression was unreadable.

"I can vaguely sense a very peculiar power on it. It comes from the obsession I had before I abandoned my body.

"It's different from the current methods..."

Upon hearing Tian Yang's words, the Sacred Emperor also became more serious.

At Tian Yang's suggestion, Li Ping took the bones and frowned as he sensed them.

After a long while, he shook his head slightly and frankly said, "I don't sense the energy you're talking about."

Tian Yang touched his chin, then thoughtfully said, "Perhaps this will work."

A crimson-gold color instantly surged to his skin.

Tian Yang's body dissolved and disappeared into the suddenly appearing crimson-gold armor.

The crimson-gold armor split into several pieces and flew to the Sacred Emperor's side in succession.

They were put on one by one.

According to the Sacred Emperor's physique, they changed shape spontaneously.

In a short while, a puppet battle armor, as if tailor-made for the Sacred Emperor, took shape.

It enveloped him completely, exuding a majestic and sacred aura.

Tian Yang's voice came from his mind, "Don't resist."

"Please, look at my life..."

BOOM!

"Tian Yang, it's time for your medicine!"

Countless images instantly appeared before the Sacred Emperor Li Ping.

These were the experiences of Tian Yang's entire life.

However, transmitted by Tian Yang himself, it was as if Li Ping had personally experienced it all as Tian Yang.

His senior brothers and master, who transformed into the Dao, willingly went to the battlefield to fight and die one by one to protect him.

The incredibly vivid scenes and emotions deeply moved the Great Qi Sacred Emperor.

"Tian Yang's life was second to none!"

Tian Yang's inner cry, initially ethereal, became solid and finally echoed in Li Ping's ears.

And so...

The Great Qi Sacred Emperor could finally synchronously sense the peculiar trace of energy from Tian Yang's遺骨.

It seemed incompatible with everything in the world.

Like a plum blossom in the snow, standing proudly alone.

Although it appeared quite weak, it had endured for thousands of years without fading with the passage of time.

Instead, it grew fresher with age.

"This is..."

Li Ping seemed to recall something, his hand trembling slightly.

But an invisible presence severed this connection.

The Sacred Emperor felt a sense of loss in his heart.

However, with his extraordinary willpower, he quickly suppressed this anomaly.

He first used Mao Bao to test it, and when he found that even Mao Bao couldn't identify this peculiar energy, he looked towards the Tribulation Passage Sect below.

The paper figures of the Tribulation Passage Sect seemed completely unaware,

Still huddled together.

"Yi Jue, do you know anything?" The Sacred Emperor Li Ping asked, uncertain.

Yi Jue Daoist actually retracted his protruding eyeballs from the vortex.

The two eyeballs, with long paper ribbons attached, flew to Tian Yang's遗骨.

They circled it several times.

Judging from Yi Jue Daoist's expression, he seemed to have recognized something.

"This old Daoist priest merely has a guess."

"It cannot be considered true."

The Sacred Emperor waved his hand, "Speak freely."

As if afraid of being overheard, Yi Jue Daoist turned his eyeballs and looked outside the Sacred Emperor's Throne.

Then, he said word by word, "Regarding that Grand Master Tiandu, our Tribulation Passage Sect has had a guess since ancient times."

"The Grand Master has fallen, and what is passed down as the Ten Sects' immortal pháp is merely a strand of his consciousness retained after his fall."

"Adhering to the lingering thought of the Grand Master's 'transmission of the Dao'."

As Yi Jue Daoist spoke, the paper figures of the Tribulation Passage Sect huddled even tighter, as if some terrifying existence was approaching.

"A lingering thought for transmitting the Dao is neither a living being nor energy."

"It's more like..."

The Sacred Emperor continued thoughtfully, "A resonance of the Dao."

Yi Jue Daoist clapped his hands and praised, "The Sacred Emperor truly has keen insight!"

"When all immortals fall, their Dao becomes empty. The Immortal Path is everywhere. If there is anyone who can even slightly approach its essence, it will create a resonance of the Dao."

"Within the Heavenly Capital, it is the Dao of transmitting the Dao."

"And on this skeleton, it might be the 'Dao of Contention'."

Chapter 1295

"The Path of Contention... " the Sacred Emperor meditated, sensing the surging energy on the Heavenly Yang's remains.

After a long time, he exhaled. "The Dao can prove immortality, but it does not align with me."

The Sacred Emperor's tone held little regret. He retreated from his Heavenly Yang armor state.

Returning the remains, Li Ping said to Heavenly Yang, "The [Path of Contention] is empty. This resonating remnant is an invaluable treasure for you. Absorb its essence diligently. Although the Immortal Path is not apparent now, the resonance exists, proving the Dao endures."

"In time, perhaps you can truly achieve the True Immortal realm with this!"

The Daoist Jue, from the Guiding Tribulation Sect, watched covetously as Heavenly Yang took the remains. He then tucked his elongated eyeballs back into the passage.

"A pity, a pity..." Jue sighed.

"What wisdom does the Sect Master of Guiding Tribulation Sect possess?" Jue's actions, however, displeased Heavenly Yang.

Jue shook his head and chuckled, "I merely lament that the Guiding Tribulation Sect missed a splendid opportunity. As they say, when one ascends, even their chickens and dogs ascend with them. If the great Sacred Emperor, by comprehending the lingering will, could one day prove the Great Dao, we might benefit as well."

"As for you..."

"Perhaps a day may come. But we of the Guiding Tribulation Sect likely won't live to see it." His words unsparingly conveyed his pessimistic view of Heavenly Yang's potential to achieve immortality.

This time, Heavenly Yang was not angered by the Guiding Tribulation Sect's provocation. He merely sensed the thread of unyielding spirit within his remains, as if recalling his human form.

But perhaps due to his current puppet form, after trying for a long time, Heavenly Yang could not summon the fiery passion from within.

The eight words, "Heavenly Yang's life, never weaker than another," when spoken now, felt different from before.

A silence fell upon the Sacred Emperor's Grand Hall.

However, it was not long before the commotion from the Myriad Immortals Alliance below drew their attention.

Light flashed, and a group of austere cultivators in black, radiating murderous intent, appeared at the moonlit border of Tianquan Prefecture.

They first bowed slightly to the Mirror Controller in the sky, then, with solemn expressions, they prepared their spells and stances against the yet-unbroken Bright Moon Starlight Grand Formation. It was as if they were about to launch a full-scale assault on the formation the next moment.

Indeed, various spells were unleashed, but their expressions were as if time had been paused, frozen in mid-air. Purple spears like heavenly thunder, spatial rifts twisting reality, and continuous yellow talismans... all were activated and converged. They waited for the Bright Moon Starlight Grand Formation to be breached, at which point they would erupt in unison.

The black-robed cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance took turns channeling their inner power into stances, concentrating them. After several hours, the black-robed cultivators rotated one after another. The accumulated stances at the formation's border reached a level that was almost shocking.

A hint of solemnity flashed across the Sacred Emperor's face. Undoubtedly, if this suspended sphere of converged energy were to detonate on the surface of the Xuanhuang Realm, it could easily turn several prefectures into ruins.

"I'll go," Heavenly Yang said, intending to step forward to resolve this hidden danger, but Li Ping stopped him.

"Wait a moment longer. I have my own way to handle this," Li Ping said with a deep voice.

Heavenly Yang nodded slightly, not forcing himself.

Another half a day passed. In total, the full power attacks of over a thousand individuals had been infused. The resulting small sphere of light was now more dazzling than the moon in the sky.

Even the Mirror Controller seemed to feel a trace of apprehension. The mark on its forehead released an ancient bronze mirror, enveloping itself, nine Dissolution Discs, and the illusory forms of other secondary bodies. Within the Dissolution Discs, the optical images brought by the array analysis rapidly changed, finally yielding feedback. Occasionally, a strand of colored thread flew out, drifting towards Lu Xichan not far away.

As Lu Xichan comprehended the content of these threads, her body trembled, and a look of intoxicated fascination appeared on her face. She then conveyed her understanding to the surrounding array masters, who responded with waves of astonished exclamations. At this moment, they looked at the Bright Moon Starlight Grand Formation before them, devoid of their previous despair.

Led by Lu Xichan, the array masters began to decipher the formation. The moonlight, originally as if substantial, like a silver ribbon, began to blur under the influence of external forces.

The Sacred Emperor felt as if these Myriad Immortals Alliance array masters were like countless insects, gnawing at the foundation of the Bright Moon Starlight Grand Formation.

Admittedly, Li Ping could fine-tune the formation further. He was confident that the speed at which the twenty-eight Array Breaking Discs worked together to decipher it would not catch up to his speed of altering the formation. If the Myriad Immortals Alliance did not employ any special means, he could trap them for a lifetime using formations alone.

But... his goal was never merely to trap them. The arrangements he had made outside the Xuanhuang Realm told him that the Star Sea was already stirring. The struggle between the power of the Star Sea's resurgence and the residual immortal energy was about to officially begin.

The Sacred Emperor, who had been sitting motionlessly, slowly rose. In a thought, his majestic figure was projected onto the Azure Nether sky curtain. As if in coordination, the radiance of the Sacred Dynasty's Great Qi, like the moon, suddenly dimmed slightly, yielding the stage to the Sacred Emperor of Great Qi.

The moment Li Ping's image appeared, the soldiers fighting in various prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance instantly felt their blood boil, their fighting spirit soaring. They shouted in unison, "Welcome, Sacred Emperor!" The thunderous cheers echoed incessantly across the Azure Nether land.

The captured and besieged cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance looked at the majestic, imposing figure filling the sky with a mixture of fear and awe. Legends of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerates involuntarily surfaced in their minds.

"At this very moment, where is that Heavenly Venerate?"

As for the Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators still engaged in a desperate struggle, upon witnessing this figure that filled their entire vision, they were all stunned into a daze.

"In the past, doctrine was transmitted, spreading across all living beings, creating a magnificent millennium of cultivation. However, the method of transmitting doctrine went against the heavens. Heaven and Earth are what nurture cultivators. Consuming Heaven and Earth is like matricide and patricide. This is not the righteous path."

...

The Sacred Emperor's voice echoed throughout the Xuanhuang Realm. Empowered by the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, it reached the ears of every living spirit with perfect clarity.

Initially, the cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance did not understand what the Sacred Emperor of Great Qi intended to do. But when they heard the phrase "not the righteous path," their faces changed drastically.

The Mirror Controller, who was overseeing the Dissolution Discs, wore a grim expression. In the Central Four Prefectures, lights flashed incessantly. This was the Myriad Immortals Alliance's high-ranking officials, stationed at headquarters, finally provoked. To slander the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate was to slander the entire Myriad Immortals Alliance, to shake the legitimacy and foundation of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's rule. For the Myriad Immortals Alliance's higher-ups, the consequences of this event were even more severe than the complete loss of all territories. After all, territory could be regained, but once hearts turned...

"Break the formation! Break it immediately!" Lu Xichan heard the enraged roar of Doctrine Transmitter Ren beside her ear.

The Myriad Immortals Alliance array masters became as silent as cicadas in winter and began to desperately work. However, while breaking the formation, they could not help but secretly listen to the voice from the heavens. Accompanying the divine and auspicious phenomena that constantly appeared in the sky, it drifted to every corner of the Xuanhuang Realm.

"I too possess a method, one that does not rely on the power of Heaven and Earth, yet can tread the immortal path."

"It is: Establishing Foundation with Myself, Primordial Golden Core, Physical Nascent Soul, Mind Manifesting Soul Transformation..."

"Star Sea Dao Integration..."

"Resonating Dao, Longevity!"

The Sacred Emperor's words, like a thunderclap, resounded throughout the heavens and earth of the Xuanhuang Realm. They had captured the attention of all cultivators. After all, judging by the names alone, the Sacred Emperor's method sounded far superior to the doctrine transmission method. Coupled with the omnipresent auspicious signs of swirling clouds and golden light, it caused cultivators' minds to waver.

The last time the Xuanhuang Realm had a supreme expert lecture on the Dao was thousands of years ago, with Doctrine Transmitter Immortal Venerable. After the doctrine transmission method was verified by the world, Doctrine Transmitter Immortal Venerable, who was at the Dao Integration realm at the time, became Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate, who was at the Longevity realm. If this new method proved feasible, wouldn't it mean that the Xuanhuang Realm would have another peerless expert capable of rivaling doctrine transmission?

Bandits of unknown origin surrendering might face retribution from the Myriad Immortals Alliance later. But if they surrendered to the Sacred Emperor... A peculiar atmosphere began to circulate among the Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators.

The Sacred Emperor's lecture continued.

"The first step on the path to immortality is Establishing Foundation with Myself."

"With the Oddities of Heaven and Earth, one can establish a foundation. Why? The oddities of the world are the physical manifestation of laws."

"However, the greatest oddity in the world is not things, but spirits."

"Establishing Foundation with Myself, one must lay down the myriad principles of the world!"

...

The seemingly profound method of Establishing Foundation with Myself, when expounded by the Sacred Emperor, became easy to understand. At this moment, even mortals in the Xuanhuang Realm who had not yet embarked on the path of cultivation could vaguely grasp the general idea. Not to mention the Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators who had already successfully traversed the doctrine transmission method!

The Sacred Emperor's new method was, in essence, built upon the foundation of the doctrine transmission method, then shattered its shackles and underwent a metamorphosis. The Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators practicing the doctrine transmission method naturally felt an intense sense of familiarity. Even just listening, their hearts were filled with thoughts like "So that's how it is," "It's indeed feasible," and "Marvelous!"

Some cultivators who had just reached the peak of Qi Refining and were attempting to break through to Foundation Establishment, but were struggling to find Oddities of Foundation Establishment, suddenly had an epiphany. As if a divine revelation, they became incredibly excited: "Why bother finding any oddities? The Sacred Emperor is right, I myself am the oddity!"

"Establish Foundation! Establish Foundation!" They immediately entered seclusion to comprehend.

Although the method of Establishing Foundation with Myself was not easy to practice, the number of Qi Refining stage cultivators in the vast Xuanhuang Realm was the largest. With such an enormous base, even a small probability multiplied would result in thousands!

The Sacred Emperor had only reached the middle chapter of Primordial Golden Core when, throughout the Azure Nether land, new cultivators practicing the method of Establishing Foundation with Myself began to appear! Unlike the breakthroughs of cultivators practicing the doctrine transmission method. After the new method cultivators broke through, the Spirit Qi of heaven and earth surged into their bodies madly and spontaneously, as if they were the fated protagonists of legends, favored by the Heavenly Dao. Some even had auspicious clouds descend upon them with colorful light during their breakthroughs. Within the auspicious light were various rare heavenly materials and earthly treasures, as if gifts from Heaven and Earth. The stark difference in the attitude of Heaven and Earth made it impossible for other cultivators not to feel envious.

Cultivators at the Golden Core stage and above might have had some reservations. But for cultivators at the Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment stages, relinquishing their current cultivation and starting anew carried no burden. After all, even if this new method from the Sacred Emperor proved uncultivable, as long as the Oddities for Foundation Establishment remained, they could start over at any time. After relinquishing their cultivation, they would temporarily store the oddities and focus on practicing the method of Establishing Foundation with Myself. The number of Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment cultivators in the Xuanhuang Realm far exceeded the total number of cultivators in all other realms. Even if only one out of ten of these individuals chose the Sacred Emperor's new method, it would be a devastating blow to the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate and the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

Apart from Doctrine Transmitter Ren, the other Dharma-Preachers could no longer remain indifferent. Because within the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters, experiments had already proven the actual feasibility of the method of Establishing Foundation with Myself. If they allowed this Sacred Emperor to continue lecturing...

The high-ranking cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance shivered involuntarily.

In the Myriad Immortals Alliance's Nether Prison. At the deepest level of the space where thousands of heinous criminals were imprisoned. A figure, appearing to be nothing more than a skeleton, lay spread-eagled, nailed in the void in a cross shape. Upon closer inspection, it seemed that every bone of the figure was constantly being scorched by flames, struck by lightning, and gnawed by strange insects... The pain was indescribable, yet the figure seemed accustomed to it, his face serene. Or rather, on his almost skeletal face, no expression could be seen anymore.

At this moment, enduring the suffering of his countless afflictions, he slightly raised his head. His pitch-black eye sockets, piercing through the layers of space in the Nether Prison, gazed towards the heavens of the Xuanhuang Realm.

"Establishing Foundation with Myself..."

"Establishing Foundation with Myself..."

A black flame, like a serpent, emerged from the void, flying directly towards him. In an instant, it pierced through his chest. The black flame passed through his heart, yet some remained scattered at the wound, burning the figure's remaining flesh, bones, and even his remnant soul. Even with his endurance, he could not help but let out a muffled groan.

"Establishing Foundation with Myself, Establishing Foundation with Myself..." But he continued to murmur. A faint starlight seemed to flicker in his pitch-black eye sockets. For a long time, other than pain, no other sensation had appeared in his heart. But now, he faintly saw a glimmer of hope. A hope of escape. How long had he been imprisoned? In the dark, sunless Nether Prison, he had almost forgotten the concept of time. But judging from the injuries on his body, it should have been a full five hundred years. After being captured and imprisoned here, he had abandoned the thought of escape. After all, all his abilities had been completely drained by the Myriad Immortals Alliance. Even if he were to miraculously escape from here, he would not be able to find his way back under the Myriad Immortals Alliance's pursuit. But now, perhaps through this voice reaching the depths of the Nether Prison, he could truly escape.

"Every bit of pain is built upon my body."

"It is [I] who feel it."

"The source of the pain is [I]."

"I establish my foundation..."

Flickers of golden light began to flash with the figure's words. These golden lights seemed to originate from the figure's remaining dry bones. They had been hidden until this moment of desperate struggle, only to be ignited now. With a creaking sound, the golden light, like flames, baked the dry bones. The dry bones dissolved like candles, but after condensation, they formed a slightly smaller, yet normally shaped body. The surrounding restrictions sensed the figure's anomaly. Punishments were continuously triggered, bombarding the figure. Yet, the figure was accustomed to them, even absorbing these forms of punishment and converting them into energy to condense his new body. Under the illumination of the golden light, the figure grew smaller. Eventually, it was only the size of an adult's palm. Emerging from the original dry bones, "Establishing Foundation with Myself actually returned me to the form I was in when I first began cultivating."

"As expected, it is a supreme and profound method!"

"Even if I was delayed for over five hundred years within these The Great Barriers, it is not a loss if I can bring this method back." The miniature figure transformed into a beam of golden light and flew directly out from the deepest part of the Nether Prison, ignoring all restrictions along the way. Even the jailers of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's Nether Prison did not seem to notice this escaping golden light at all. The golden light figure landed on the ground and gazed at the Sacred Emperor's image in the sky.

"Indeed, talents emerge from desperate places. In over five hundred years, such a figure has appeared in this world..."

"Primordial Golden Core." The golden light figure listened intently for a long time, its brow perpetually furrowed. "It's a bit peculiar. Could it be that I've been imprisoned for too long and have become stupid?"

"Regardless, I'll note it down. When I get out, there will be plenty of people to study it."

...

The Great Qi Sacred Emperor was unaware that he had silently gained a listener from beyond the The Great Barriers. At this moment, his sermon had reached the final part, [Resonating Dao, Longevity].

"Beyond the Azure Nether, above the Star Sea, lies the Immortal-Piercing Great Dao."

"True Immortals perish, the Great Dao is empty."

"Reverse Dao Shadows, True Meaning of Resonating Dao, one can glimpse the Longevity realm..." The Sacred Emperor lectured solemnly. And these profound and mysterious words even caused the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao itself to gain some comprehension. The winds of the world all stilled. In the vast Xuanhuang Realm, apart from the Sacred Dynasty's sermon, there was no other sound. This included the Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators who were previously eagerly trying to break through the Bright Moon Starlight Grand Formation. They were all stunned, listening to the Sacred Emperor's words in a daze.

The higher their realm and strength, the greater the shock they felt.

At the Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters, in the Divine Treasure Museum. Xu Ke and Senior Yin, who were waiting for the battle between the Myriad Immortals Alliance and the Sacred Dynasty to commence so they could detonate the Golden Tree and retrieve Mr. Bai's skull, suddenly felt the ground beneath them begin to shake. What started as a slight tremor gradually escalated into violent shaking.

"This is..." Xu Ke was slightly startled, as he sensed that it was not just the Divine Treasure Museum they were in, but the space itself where the Divine Treasure Museum was located that was shaking! The shaking intensified, and the Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters, which had previously resembled a dim starry sky, began to illuminate with faint starlight.

"The Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters is within the Heavenly Profound Mirror. Is this phenomenon indicating that the Heavenly Profound Mirror is evolving?" Senior Yin's face showed a hint of astonishment, unsure whether this anomaly was a blessing or a curse for them.

In the Dharma Deduction space. Li Fan's main body also sensed the slight tremors from outside. The three stationary Dao Integration cultivators instantly became tense. After all, such a scene had not occurred for hundreds of years. Zhang Xu and Hua Yueye guarded in front of the Dharma Deduction, while Li Fan stood at the entrance of the space. Fortunately, Elder Xu from the Law Enforcement Hall soon sent a message indicating that everything was normal, and they breathed a sigh of relief.

"If my prediction is correct, it should be the Sacred Emperor's clone that has attacked," Li Fan mused in his mind. Just then, he sensed that the Dharma Deduction little loli had woken up from her deep slumber and was attempting to contact him through her simulated personality. With a thought, he took control of the latter's simulated personality.

"Wow, something big is happening outside!" the little loli exclaimed with an exaggerated expression. "It's a real shame you're trapped here and couldn't see it!" Dharma Deduction looked at Li Fan with a look full of regret.

"You can see the outside?" Li Fan asked suspiciously, staring at the little loli. Dharma Deduction snorted and put her hands on her hips, "Me... of course not."

"But someone told me! What, you disagree?" "How about it? If you beg your great-aunt, I'll tell you what's happening outside!" the little loli said proudly. Seeing that Li Fan remained unmoved and was still contemplating something, she enticed him further, "You're in the Dao Integration realm now, right? If you knew all this, it would definitely be of great help to you! Even I, after hearing it, have seen my deduction speed increase significantly..." Dharma Deduction said matter-of-factly.

"The one who secretly told you about external matters... is it the Heavenly Profound Mirror?" Li Fan suddenly asked. Dharma Deduction's expression froze instantly, then she waved her hand, "Hahaha, how could that be!" Li Fan narrowed his eyes, "The tremors outside just now..."

"The Heavenly Profound Mirror is evolving? How is that possible? In this life, there was no Myriad Immortals Alliance measuring the sky and mapping the earth..." "Even Dharma Deduction has benefited." "Could it really be the Sacred Emperor's sermon that caused it?" Li Fan was somewhat astonished and uncertain. His two clones outside had indeed witnessed the Sacred Emperor's lecture. But he already knew that it was something the Sacred Emperor had concocted to strike at the foundation of doctrine transmission. Apart from the chapter on Establishing Foundation with Myself, everything else was fabricated castle in the air, utterly uncultivable. Therefore, he had not paid much attention. But now, judging from the performance of Dharma Deduction and the Heavenly Profound Mirror, this sermon by the Sacred Emperor... truly had some merit.

Li Fan looked at Dharma Deduction, who was still flaunting and trying to make him beg, and let out a cold snort, directly reciting the content of the Sacred Emperor's sermon. Dharma Deduction immediately looked as if she had seen a ghost, "Did the Heavenly Profound Mirror brother also tell you?" Li Fan snorted coldly, not answering. The little loli drooped like a bruised eggplant, becoming disheartened.

"Boring!" "I'm going to sleep!" "Wait!" Li Fan called out to stop her. Dharma Deduction looked at Li Fan with a vigilant gaze. "This new method of the Sacred Emperor is useful for us cultivators, that's understandable." "It's also inspiring to you, Dharma Deduction?" Li Fan appeared suspicious. Dharma Deduction rolled her eyes at Li Fan, "Didn't you hear? Beyond the Azure Nether, above the Star Sea, lies the Immortal-Piercing Great Dao!" "True Immortals perish, the Great Dao is empty!" "Reverse Dao Shadows, True Meaning of Resonating Dao..." Dharma Deduction's eyes widened, "Let me use myself as an example. Dharma Deduction, originally, is the manifestation of the Xuanhuang Realm's laws. And the laws of Dharma Deduction in the Xuanhuang Realm are the projections of that immortal-proving Dao above the Star Sea..." "In other words, in terms of resonating with the Great Dao, we have a natural advantage." Dharma Deduction could not help but feel a little proud, "This is something you cultivators can only dream of!" "If you want to resonate with the Great Dao, you at least need to find traces of the Great Dao first, right? The Path of Proving Immortality is ethereal and fleeting. Even if you happen to glimpse it, maintaining that connection is extremely difficult!" Seeing Li Fan's somewhat heavy expression, the little loli became even more triumphant. Then, as if remembering something, she looked vigilant, "Don't you dare try to steal mine! Honestly, even if you could forcibly borrow my power to comprehend the Path of Dharma Deduction, it would be useless."

"Why?" Li Fan asked. "Remember that character I showed you earlier? If you think about it now, it's like a painting, depicting the Path of Proving Immortality. For others to view." "It's not the physical manifestation of the Path of Proving Immortality, just a painting. So, even ordinary cultivators can perceive it." "But we are projections of the Path of Proving Immortality. You are not me, so how can you 'look upwards' and see the essence of the Dao?" Dharma Deduction spoke slowly, word by word, as if conveying this meaning was also quite difficult for her.

"The Great Dao is empty..."

"True Immortal Script, Script-Carving Immortal..." Li Fan mused. All the scenes related to immortal power in the past flashed through his mind, circulating rapidly. Finally, four words subtly surfaced.

"Eternal Residual Will?" Li Fan felt a slight uncertainty in his heart.

"It's not a projection of the Path of Proving Immortality, but 'Dao Resonance'."

"Resonating Dao, Longevity. So that's how it is."

"Could the Sacred Emperor have discovered the existence of Eternal Residual Will?" Li Fan's mind flashed with the image of Heavenly Yang.

"Hmm, it's probably like that." After all, it was his clone. Even though the connection was now severed, Li Fan quickly inferred the likely truth from the scattered clues. "It's interesting. It seems this Great Qi Sacred Emperor, who has integrated the vital blood of Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba, has a higher comprehension than I imagined?" "After all, my comprehension is already extraordinary..." Li Fan re-examined the incomplete new law, which he had previously not valued.

"If Eternal Residual Will is Dao Resonance, then every time 'Return to Truth' sensed Eternal Residual Will, it felt so hungry. Does this indicate that Return to Truth's true need is the Path of Proving Immortality?"

"It can replenish Return to Truth's abilities..." Li Fan's mind raced.

...

Outside the Xuanhuang Realm, the Sacred Dynasty's sermon was nearing its end. Regardless of whether they belonged to the Sacred Dynasty or not, all living beings who listened to the sermon lowered their heads slightly, showing their astonishment towards the Sacred Emperor. After all, they had never had the opportunity to hear such a profound method in their lifetimes. Now, the Sacred Emperor was selflessly sharing it with them. Many cultivators even wept with gratitude, kneeling and kowtowing incessantly, becoming the Sacred Emperor's most loyal believers.

In the Myriad Immortals Alliance's four prefectures, at the moonlit border. The array masters, brought back to their senses from the shock of the Sacred Emperor's sermon, looked at Lu Xichan privately.

"Continue breaking the formation!" Although they had received favors from the other side, on this matter of principle, Lu Xichan, as the Chief of the Hall of Strategic Formations, would never make a mistake. She commanded coldly.

"No need." The voice of a Doctrine Transmitter from behind her made her freeze on the spot. "The Heavenly Venerate has returned." Doctrine Transmitter Ren looked towards the sky, his eyes filled with fanaticism.

Chapter 1296: Doctrine Transmitter Battles Sacred Emperor (7K)

"Lord Heavenly Venerate, you have returned."

Lu Xichan, along with all the formation masters present, felt a momentary jolt upon hearing this.

Then, inevitably, intense fear surged into their hearts, and they lowered their heads.

Their bodies trembled uncontrollably.

This was the formidable oppressive aura of the Heavenly Venerate of Longevity, who had crushed the Xuanhuang Realm for millennia and single-handedly created the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

As the Doctrine Transmitter Ren spoke, the Sacred Emperor talismans affixed to the massive Doctrine Transmitter statues across all the prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance began to flutter in the wind.

They flapped and danced, as if on the verge of being blown away at any moment. The statues, suppressed by the talismans, seemed to come alive, subtly shaking. The Sacred Emperor talismans radiated a purple-gold starlight, while the Doctrine Transmitter statues emitted white light. The two forces clashed continuously.

The world's weather in the Xuanhuang Realm turned tempestuous. The Sacred Emperor, sensing something amiss, glanced at the sky while expounding the Dao, though his discourse did not falter. Only his speaking speed increased slightly. Amidst the Xuanhuang Realm's anomalies, some immortal cultivators had already guessed what was happening. Their faces turned pale, cold sweat trickling down their foreheads. They lost all interest in the Sacred Emperor's sermon, their bodies trembling with fear. Others, however, with eyes alight, focused intently on the Sacred Emperor's teachings, silently praying that the Doctrine Transmitter would return later.

"The changes of past and present, the principles of the Great Dao,"

"The method of doctrine transmission, cannot tolerate the Azure Nether."

"I have now attained the Dao, I shall attempt to change it..."

Finally, the Sacred Emperor's sermon neared its end. His gaze shifted from the teeming masses below entirely to the figure in the starry sky beyond the Xuanhuang Realm. He nodded slightly and then vanished from the heavens.

Without the Sacred Emperor's protection, various anomalies descended upon the Xuanhuang Realm. Rolling dark clouds materialized spontaneously, endlessly obscuring the bright moon transformed by the Sacred Dynasty's Great Qi. On the ground, birds and beasts that had ventured out to listen to the Sacred Emperor's sermon scattered in fright, rushing back to their nests to seek refuge. Even flowers and plants were battered and torn apart by the increasingly violent winds.

*Boom!*

Thunderclaps erupted from the dark clouds, followed by torrential rain pounding the ground. Wind, rain, and thunder raged, plunging the entire Xuanhuang Realm into an apocalyptic scene. Although the Doctrine Transmitter himself had not yet arrived, all living beings in the realm trembled beneath his shadow.

Those immortal cultivators whose hearts had wavered while listening to the Sacred Emperor's sermon felt as if a basin of cold water had been poured over their heads, their fervent excitement instantly clearing. "What was I thinking! That's the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate! The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate who has suppressed the Xuanhuang Realm for thousands of years with a single hand! How could I have imagined the Sacred... no, these bandits would win?"

"The Sacred Emperor... though powerful, will never be a match for the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate. Damn it, I need to forget this new law quickly."

"Heavenly Venerate above, forgive this humble one's momentary bewilderment..."

"With the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate taking action, everything will be alright!"

The Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators, awestruck by the Doctrine Transmitter's might, trembled with fear. The Sacred Dynasty's soldiers, due to the vast disparity in their innate realms, also experienced a moment of terror. But soon, their eyes regained their resolve. Some recalled the words the Sacred Emperor had spoken to them before the campaign. Then, someone shouted at the sky, "The Sacred Dynasty will win, the Sacred Emperor will win!"

Initially, it was just sporadic shouts. But soon, it spread like wildfire. No one had deliberately orchestrated it; all the Sacred Dynasty soldiers, as if telepathically connected, shouted in unison. Their voices grew louder and louder, transforming from shouts to roars, and from roars to guttural cries. The voices of the Great Qi soldiers, like rolling waves, surged across the entire Xuanhuang Realm with the force of toppling mountains and overturning seas.

As if responding to their call, the bright moon in the sky erupted with purple-gold radiance, re-emerging from the boundless dark clouds. The swaying wind and rain of the Xuanhuang Realm actually began to subside amidst the roaring war cries.

Listening to the distant sounds, the Doctrine Transmitter Ren let out a cold laugh, "A dying struggle."

As if in response to his words, teleportation gates appeared in the four central prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. A continuous stream of massive flying ship formations emerged, instantly filling the skies of the four prefectures. At the prow of each flying ship stood a Doctrine Transmitter. They looked up at the sky and offered a slight bow to the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate beyond the stars.

Lu Xichan secretly observed this scene, astonished. "These must be the forces from the Dharma-Preachers' respective pocket worlds. Now that the Heavenly Venerate has appeared, they naturally won't hide behind the scenes anymore."

"Judging by the auras emanating from those flying ships, there are quite a few Dao Integration cultivators among them. The Myriad Immortals Alliance's hidden strength is far greater than I imagined..."

As Lu Xichan pondered, a voice laced with mockery echoed from the heavens: "You deployed the Dissolution Disc and nineteen Heavenly Mysteries secondary bodies, and yet, after so long, you still can't break a mere trapping formation. Your Hall of Strategic Formations truly gets worse with each generation. If Lu Xia knew, he would probably be so angry he'd rise from the grave."

Hearing her master's name and the mockery directed at her, Lu Xichan felt a surge of anger. However, she recognized the speaker as Dou, one of the Dharma-Preachers. Despite her anger, she dared not show it, merely lowering her head and saying, "This subordinate is incompetent."

"Forget it, have your people step aside." With a lazy remark from the Doctrine Transmitter Dou, a group of young boys descended from the flying ships in the sky. They first bowed slightly to the Mirror Controller guarding the Dissolution Disc. After receiving the formation data analyzed by the Dissolution Disc so far, they began their attempt to break the formation. These boys numbered thirty-six. Their faces were devoid of expression, and even their eyes showed no trace of emotion. One of them extended his hand into the beam of light of the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation. Instantly, his body became ethereal, gradually transforming into the same starlight as the formation, from his hand to his entire body. Just as the boy, testing the formation with his own body, was about to be completely engulfed by the starlight, he suddenly vanished and transformed into a streak of light, flying towards another boy. This second boy also touched the light with his hand and then tested the formation with his body. This process repeated. By the time the thirty-sixth boy was about to become starlight, his body shook, and he ejected the thirty previous companions. He himself returned to his normal appearance. The thirty-six boys huddled together, whispering amongst themselves. Then, as if reaching a consensus, they nodded in unison. They divided into two groups. One group began the task of breaking the formation, while the other group repeated the process of testing the formation with their bodies. The Myriad Immortals Alliance formation masters observing nearby immediately sensed the extraordinary nature of these boys. Judging by their speed of deciphering, the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation would be breached within half a day at most. As the Chief of the Hall of Strategic Formations, Lu Xichan's shock far surpassed that of ordinary people. She looked at the thirty-six formation-breaking boys, and the words "Formation Spirit Sacred Body" flashed in her mind. This was an extremely rare physique, as if their bodies were naturally formed by formations. Not only did they possess a natural sense and affinity for various formations, but they could also merge with formations, greatly enhancing their strength, much like artifact spirits to magic artifacts. They could transform into formation spirits, causing the formation to transcend and transform. The Formation Spirit Sacred Body was a treasure rarely seen in a century. Lu Xichan's master, Lu Xia, had desperately sought to find cultivators with this physique to inherit his legacy during his lifetime, but unfortunately, he failed to do so even in death. Reluctantly, he passed on all his lifelong learning to Lu Xichan. She never expected that more than thirty such individuals would appear all at once! Lu Xichan looked up at the sky again, at the figures standing atop the densely packed flying ships. A chill ran down her spine. "How many secrets are these Dharma-Preachers still hiding?"

The Doctrine Transmitter Ren, upon understanding the progress of breaking the formation, couldn't help but flash a murderous glint in his eyes. The Myriad Immortals Alliance had been put in such a difficult position this time, and the Heavenly Venerate's punishment was inevitable. Therefore, before facing punishment, he would vent his anger on these troublemakers. With a wave of his hand, the black-clothed cultivators who had been gathering their moves, only to be forced to stop by the Sacred Emperor's sermon, resumed their actions. Several more cultivators in blue Daoist robes, holding whisks and talismans, descended silently from the flying ships. Wielding their whisks and talismans, they molded the power within the accumulating light spheres into formidable, grim-faced divine figures exuding a deadly aura. These energy deities, upon descending, emanated an aura that filled even Lu Xichan, a Dao Integration cultivator, with genuine dread. The Myriad Immortals Alliance's counterattack was poised to strike.

Outside the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation, the Sacred Dynasty's soldiers were also prepared for a close-quarters engagement with the Myriad Immortals Alliance. The battlefield's overall commander, Sun Erlang, was methodically relaying orders through the Sacred Emperor's Star Net.

"Those below the Nascent Soul realm, hold your positions and do not move rashly. Continue to supervise the construction progress of the suppression array. Remember, completing the array on time is a great merit!"

"For cultivators at the Nascent Soul realm and above, I will implement the following deployment adjustments." The brighter stars in the star sea, under Sun Erlang's mental guidance, dispersed and re-formed.

"Do not engage the Myriad Immortals Alliance head-on. Extend the front line to every corner of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. We do not need to breach the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters; what we need is to wait for the Sacred Emperor to return victorious from the star sea!" Sun Erlang's tone was resolute.

The Great Qi soldiers responded with a thunderous roar. Once everyone's emotions were stirred, Sun Erlang observed the scene within the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation and made final adjustments to the troop assignments. Simultaneously, with some remaining energy, he connected with the silently standing Dark Gold Sacred Punishment Puppet. "Finally, I can stretch my limbs." A scorching battle intent surfaced in Sun Erlang's calm gaze.

Three hours later. The Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation, which had firmly sealed the Myriad Immortals Alliance's four prefectures for seven days, finally had a small opening torn through it. In an instant, powerful attacks imbued with the fury of the Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators poured out of this breach. Tangible spell techniques, ferocious divine manifestations with glaring eyes, and countless beams of magic artifact light intermingled, erupting forth. The terrifying energy, capable of leveling several prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance, impatiently sought targets. However, what awaited the Myriad Immortals Alliance's long-accumulated counterattack was merely a plain, dark void. As the dark void opened, all the frenzied attacks were completely devoured. It was like a colossal beast from the abyss opening its cavernous maw, leaving no ripple of energy for the Myriad Immortals Alliance. After consuming all the accumulated explosive energy, the dark void vanished as silently as it appeared, leaving the Myriad Immortals Alliance members momentarily stunned.

"The Sea of Darkness?" The Doctrine Transmitter Ren's expression flickered slightly; he sensed a familiar aura from this void. As he had predicted, the "vast" energies swallowed by the Sea of Darkness merely formed another brewing cloud in its depths, causing no other disturbance. "It seems the recent anomaly in the Sea of Darkness is also related to these culprits." With new and old grudges combined, the Doctrine Transmitter Ren's rage reached an extreme. The thirty-six boys continued to break the formation, aiming to completely shatter the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation. Other Dharma-Preachers' subordinates also streamed out of the formation's breach, intending to clear out and eliminate the bandits in each prefecture. However, the Doctrine Transmitter Ren's plan met with setbacks in the first prefecture. The entire prefecture was empty. It seemed the bandits had completely withdrawn, and even the celestial city's interior had been swept clean. No one remained. "They fled?" The Doctrine Transmitter Ren was bewildered and uncertain. Just as the Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators looked around in confusion, flashes of light erupted from various corners of the prefecture, streaking towards them with incredible speed. The silver light seemed to have received special reinforcement, its speed several times faster than when they had fled earlier. They arrived in an instant. "What is this...?" "Sky-Patrolling Arrows?!" Some Dharma-Preachers recognized these objects that had appeared so close. Their faces changed drastically. The next moment... *Boom! Boom! Boom!* Continuous, violent explosions resounded through the sky.

Meanwhile, outside the Xuanhuang Realm, within the Abyssal Star Sea, the figure rapidly returning to the Xuanhuang Realm suffered an almost identical fate. However, what detonated in the star sea were not mere Sky-Patrolling Arrows, but the residual True Immortal energies scattered throughout the star sea. The Sacred Emperor Li Ping was not a pedantic individual who insisted on a fair duel with the Doctrine Transmitter. He only sought victory. Utilizing the "strong wind" blowing in the star sea, Li Ping harnessed the star sea's revival power to alter the positions of the residual True Immortal energies. He then concealed them with formations, creating a trap of sorts. This path back home had been traversed by the Doctrine Transmitter countless times. It was familiar to the point of being ingrained. He had never expected to encounter an ambush this time. Like wind churning waves, the figure flickered, becoming illusory and distorted under the influence of the various True Immortal residual energies. He appeared somewhat disheveled. The Sacred Emperor gazed at the approaching figure from afar. Its appearance, identical to the tall stone statues erected throughout the Xuanhuang Realm, undoubtedly revealed its identity: a high-crowned, long-bearded Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate. Yet, even under attack, the figure's expression remained unchanged, just like the stone statues on the ground. The Sacred Emperor did not wait for the figure to recover from the ambush. The phantom of the Sacred Dynasty appeared behind him, accompanied by swirling starlight.

"Destiny is mine..."

"The Great Dao is mine..."

"The future is mine!"

The destiny of the Sacred Dynasty, accumulated over a long period, was instantly channeled into him. The devout prayers of countless Great Qi citizens, soldiers, and Netherfolk survivors pierced through space like celestial music, sounding around the Sacred Emperor. In the Abyssal Star Sea, a whirlwind erupted around the Sacred Emperor. The darkness receded, and starlight gradually brightened. At this moment, the Sacred Emperor seemed to become the center of the entire Abyssal Star Sea. Infinite star domains, endless void, countless stars rotated around the Sacred Emperor. All living beings in the Xuanhuang Realm felt this change and looked up at the sky. Beyond the gloomy firmament, brilliant silver swirling starlight illuminated the world like night. And at the center of the layered swirling stars, the Sacred Emperor's solemn and majestic figure could be seen. His starlit Sacred Robes danced with the galaxy, shining brightly and ceaselessly!

"Dao Erasure..."

"Dao Birth!"

The Sacred Emperor's figure, accompanied by a calm and vast Dao sound, vanished into the swirling starlight. Brilliant silver light then unfurled, plunging towards the high-crowned elder who had not yet stabilized his form, like a galaxy descending from the heavens!

For the first time, a flicker of emotion appeared on the Doctrine Transmitter's eternally unchanging face. Within this boundless starlight, he seemed to see the ancient cultivation world, a prosperous era of cultivation in this star sea. He also saw the emergence of subtle dissonances as prosperity waned, and the quiet descent of terrifying calamities as the Immortal Path collapsed. One prosperous cultivation realm after another was annihilated amidst these tribulations. The Doctrine Transmitter's eyes wavered as the brilliant star sea before him began to dim. The starlight entered his eyes, his body, his soul. The Doctrine Transmitter's high crown and robes began to decay. His beard and hair fell off. His once upright and majestic figure became hunched. The residual True Immortal energies that still clung to him continued to entangle him. The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate appeared perilously close to destruction.

"Cough cough..."

"A remarkable technique, *Dao Erasure, Dao Birth*."

Amidst the howling starlight wind, the Doctrine Transmitter finally spoke. His voice, unlike the benevolent tone of the sermon in the memories of the Xuanhuang Realm's inhabitants, sounded feeble and weak, like a dying mortal, likely due to the heavy blow. The Sacred Emperor offered no reply. He didn't even reveal his form. The impact and erosion from the river of starlight were nearing their end. However, the Sacred Emperor's attack was not yet over. What had just happened to the Doctrine Transmitter was merely *Dao Erasure*. What followed would be... *Dao Birth*! Black hair burst from the Doctrine Transmitter's head, growing rapidly in the wind. Explosive muffled sounds emanated from various parts of the Doctrine Transmitter's body, with visible signs of tumors and bone protrusions. *Dong! Dong! Dong!* A strong heartbeat accompanied the revitalized starlight wind. With each beat, flesh exploded from the Doctrine Transmitter's body. As the new Dao was born, the old law was to be purged. The Doctrine Transmitter, an ancient being incompatible with the star sea's revival, was undergoing intense Dao erosion. The heartbeat grew faster, and the Doctrine Transmitter's hunched body became increasingly incomplete. Even his bones beneath the flesh vanished. He floated erratically like a broken puzzle piece amidst violent explosions. His newly grown hair circled his neck before returning, tightly strangling him, like a sharp sword intent on severing his head. *Bang!* The heartbeat reached its limit, and the Doctrine Transmitter's chest exploded. There was no bloody mist, only pure, absolute void. Not even energy remained, a complete manifestation of Dao annihilation! The Dao annihilation spread from the void in his chest, consuming his already tattered body. The starlight wind grew more violent, as if celebrating the victory. However... just as the void of Dao annihilation was about to engulf the Doctrine Transmitter's head. The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate, this figure of mysterious origin who had dominated the Xuanhuang Realm for several eras, suddenly had points of starlight appear in his eyes. Although the lower half of his head had been consumed, a voice still echoed in the star sea. It was the exact same words spoken by the Sacred Emperor: "Dao Erasure..." As the Doctrine Transmitter spoke, the star sea seemed to fall into silence and darkness once more. The wind subsided, and the rampant hair slowly receded. The void that was devouring the Doctrine Transmitter was halted by some power, its spread ceasing. In an instant, all destructive anomalies on the Doctrine Transmitter vanished. An invisible barrier seemed to surround him, repelling all encroaching forces. The wind still howled, and the starlight shone brilliantly, yet he remained unharmed, even with only half a head remaining. "Dao Birth," the Doctrine Transmitter calmly stated again. Black hair reappeared, and flesh was born and developed from the void. His high crown and robes were restored in the blink of an eye. In just a moment, the heavily wounded and near-death Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate was fully restored! What a terrifying sight! "What a pity, just a little bit more," the Sacred Emperor's sigh suddenly echoed. A beam of starlight swept across, and Li Ping's figure reappeared. He stared at the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate, the regret in his eyes gone, replaced by infinite fighting spirit and unwavering conviction. The Doctrine Transmitter did not retaliate directly but observed the assailant who had tried to kill him without hesitation. Seemingly amused, the Doctrine Transmitter paused for a moment before saying, "Since when did this star sea produce another at the *Supreme* realm?" He spoke with a hint of wistfulness and emotion. "Supreme..." the Sacred Emperor savored the words before shaking his head slightly. "It is merely the current limit of this star sea." "Not the limit of this star sea." "How can it be called Supreme?" The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate did not refute. Instead, he looked back towards the distant center of the star sea. "Fellow Daoist, do you know how the tide lifts all boats?" "My Supreme, and your Supreme..." "Are somewhat different." The Doctrine Transmitter spoke with calm, not boasting, but stating a simple truth. The Sacred Emperor listened thoughtfully. He naturally understood the Doctrine Transmitter's meaning. The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate's current display of power was due to the star sea's capacity limit; however, the power he could wield far surpassed this limit but was currently suppressed. As the star sea's limit was broken, his strength would only grow. The Sacred Emperor, despite reaching the star sea's current limit, had achieved it through the Sacred Dynasty's destiny, the star sea's favor, and many other factors. Once the star sea's limit was opened, he would need time to cultivate further to catch up. This was the gap between him and the Doctrine Transmitter. "After all, a Doctrine Transmitter who has survived for who knows how long," the Sacred Emperor thought, not showing much surprise or fear. Even though his ultimate attack was blocked, and there was a disparity in their strength, the Sacred Emperor's attack had only just begun. Li Ping extended his hand forward, sensing the wind rising in the star sea. This time, it was not the wind of the star sea's revival, but the chaotic wind gradually rising from the conflict with the residual True Immortal energies! The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate also noticed Li Ping's action. "Your recent technique, *Dao Erasure, Dao Birth*, was indeed extraordinary." "It evoked memories and has benefited me greatly." "I also have a technique, please, Fellow Daoist, evaluate it." The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate struck first this time. "This technique is called..." "...Object in the Palm." As the words "Object in the Palm" reached the Sacred Emperor's ears, a sense of unease arose in his heart. Then, the scene before him rapidly changed. His body instantly began to shrink infinitely, while the surrounding scenery rapidly magnified. The high-crowned elder, who was originally several circles smaller than his three-zhang-three body, rapidly expanded. By the time the Sacred Emperor realized the change, the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate had become as colossal as the majestic statues standing on the surface of the Xuanhuang Realm. It was not just a change in size. The Sacred Emperor even felt his connection with the Sacred Dynasty, the Xuanhuang Realm, and the entire star sea weakening as he shrank. The Sacred Emperor had a subtle premonition: if this continued, his connection might be completely severed, and he would be forever lost in this miniaturized scene. While his mind raced, the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate's attack descended. In the brief moment of thought, the Doctrine Transmitter's full form became indiscernible. Only his colossal palm, like a mountain, like a peak, like the earth, like the heavens, pressed down. The surrounding space was locked, and the Sacred Emperor had nowhere to escape. Looking up, even the palm lines of the Doctrine Transmitter had become like towering, continuous mountain ranges. Facing the descending colossal palm of the Doctrine Transmitter, the Sacred Emperor showed no fear in his eyes. "Xuanhuang Realm..." "Is not something you can hold in your palm!" A cold glint flashed in the Sacred Emperor's eyes. "Allow me to show you the true power of the Azure Nether." "Body Transformation..." "Azure Nether Heaven!" His body was completely engulfed by the Doctrine Transmitter's colossal palm. Then... infinite Azure Nether light erupted from beneath the colossal palm. At this moment, all living beings in the Xuanhuang Realm felt the ground beneath them shake violently. The dark clouds in the sky were dispersed by this tremor. Many sharp-eyed cultivators even saw what appeared to be missing lines in the fabric of heaven and earth. With a creaking rumble, as if celestial pillars were breaking, the sky of the Xuanhuang Realm seemed to descend slightly.

Chapter 1297

The cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm were not mistaken; the sky truly was collapsing!

After a brief silence, a magnificent and never-before-heard booming sound, like roaring thunder, reverberated through the world.

"Ahhhh!" It was as if their heads had been directly struck by a heavy club. Countless cultivators’ vision went black, nearly causing them to lose consciousness and fall unconscious.

The ringing in their ears persisted for nearly half a day without subsiding.

This was a tremor originating from their souls; even sealing off their five senses was of no avail.

Those who looked up at the sky discovered, without exception, that the heavens now seemed within reach.

Furthermore, the concentration of Spirit Qi in the world had noticeably decreased.

The winds and rains of the Xuanhuang Realm had also weakened considerably as a portion of the world’s power was drawn out.

The vast majority of cultivators in the world did not understand the reason behind such a terrifying phenomenon.

Only those standing at the pinnacle of the Xuanhuang Realm's power understood what these anomalies represented.

In a peculiar space, five statues whose faces could not be discerned were arranged in a circle.

The statues looked down, gazing at the center.

There, representing the current state of the Xuanhuang Realm, floated a luminous cloud mass.

All the changes in the Xuanhuang Realm since the war began were displayed in the cloud mass in meticulous detail.

At this moment, with the heavens collapsing and the earth sinking, the Azure Nether cloud mass slowly writhed. It had shrunk by nearly a third.

"Tsk, tsk, tsk, they've really gone all out this time," a somewhat flippant female voice suddenly chimed in.

"Are we just going to watch? This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity…" One of the statues instantly came alive, revealing its true form.

Her hair, like silk, cascaded smoothly to her waist.

A slender, form-fitting white robe tightly wrapped her voluptuous figure, yet somehow, it left her fair thighs exposed.

Her eyes were languid, and her delicate fingers were placed by her lips as she spoke to the other four statues.

"And what if we don’t watch? Are we going to help that unknown 'Sacred Emperor'?" a cold voice emanated from the statue garbed in a daoist robe.

"I heard the Doctrine Transmitter preach his new methods, and my heart was moved. The Sacred Emperor can be considered my teacher. If possible, I would truly like to lend a hand. Alas…" The statue resembling a scholar also came alive, looking up towards the void beyond the Xuanhuang Realm with a sigh.

"The contest for the orthodox Azure Nether lineage is of no consequence to us. The Doctrine Transmitter has wolfish ambitions, and this Sacred Emperor, whose origins are unknown, is likely no saint either. The Xuanhuang Realm, and even this sea of stars, are not places for us to reside permanently. Esteemed colleagues, our future hope still lies with 'Carefree.' Maintaining stability with the Myriad Immortals Alliance and the Xuanhuang Realm, and awaiting the final outcome, is what we should do. Participating in this conflict is truly not a wise move." In the center of the space, a statue whose face remained indiscernible spoke deeply.

"Besides… the Doctrine Transmitter cannot possibly lose," that statue added.

The gazes of the four statues converged on Carefree Heavenly Venerate, who seemed to still be slumbering.

Senior Sister Zhao said with some wistfulness, "Alas, I wanted to take this opportunity to tease those fellows from the Myriad Immortals Alliance. After all, they’re all fresh faces; it’s so much more exciting."

The scholar, the daoist, and the statue with the indistinct face all pretended not to hear.

"Being bound to the heavens and earth truly has too many flaws. With the Xuanhuang Realm drawing out power to assist, I’ve also become much weaker," Senior Sister Zhao said, covering her fragrant lips and yawning lazily.

"I’m going back to recuperate. Call me if anything happens."

Before her words even faded, Senior Sister Zhao’s statue once again became silent.

The scholar statue chuckled, "She couldn't help herself and went to join the fun."

"A thousand people, a thousand faces. Zhao Ruoxi is more than ten thousand. A bit of split personality and an inability to control herself is normal," the daoist statue said without politeness. "Let her be. It’s not that easy for her to die."

After Senior Sister Zhao left, the statue whose face remained indiscernible suddenly came alive.

It revealed the image of a middle-aged cultivator with a square face and a solemn expression.

"The Land of Carefree Bliss, after years of development, has now spread to the borders of the sea of stars and begun to infiltrate the High Wall."

"This is the most crucial moment."

"This sudden outbreak of conflict, regardless of the final outcome, is both beneficial and harmless to us. At the very least, there will be numerous casualties… and after this, another surge of vast Carefree Power will be added. Perhaps Carefree can break through the constraints of the High Wall with this opportunity." The square-faced cultivator said solemnly.

"After all, the sealing effect of the High Wall on consciousness spaces like the 'Land of Carefree Bliss' is far weaker than that on physical forces."

As the square-faced cultivator spoke, a peculiar atmosphere began to flow through the space.

And Carefree, in whom the hopes of the five Heavenly Venerates for escape were vested, remained calmly dormant. However, the occasional twitch of his eyebrows indicated potential intense turmoil within him.

After a moment of silence, the daoist statue spoke, "Beyond the High Wall… is not a peaceful place either. The fact that those who escaped back then now want to escape back in is a testament to that. It is a pity that climbing the High Wall is difficult. It is the same both inside and outside the wall."

"Even if this plan ultimately succeeds, and we eventually escape the High Wall with the dream power of the Land of Carefree Bliss, without the foundation of the Xuanhuang Realm's laws, our strength will inevitably plummet. At the Dao Integration realm, outside the High Wall, it will likely be impossible to move forward."

The square-faced cultivator continued solemnly, "Even if there are dangers, only the dream bodies will be lost. For my true self, this will not be a fatal blow. However, if the outside of the High Wall is a true paradise, I can cultivate from my dream body there and gradually transfer my true self’s power."

"Once my dream body is completely solidified in reality and surpasses my true self’s strength, we can then swap places and successfully shed our shells like a golden cicada!"

The scholar statue nodded slightly upon hearing their conversation, "This is indeed the most stable method we can think of currently. If it weren't for the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate's terrifying strength, and his insistence on clinging to the Xuanhuang Realm, we wouldn't have to be so dejected."

The daoist statue said, "If that's the case, then let's each add a bit more fuel to the fire. The more concentrated the Carefree Power, the better. As long as it doesn't endanger the Xuanhuang Realm, it doesn't matter how many die."

…

While they were discussing, it was as if a great wind swept in from outside the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Azure Nether cloud mass in the center of the five statues visibly wobbled.

A glint of shock flashed in the eyes of the three Longevity Heavenly Venerates.

"The Doctrine Transmitter being so powerful is understandable. After all, he has lived for so many years."

"This 'Sacred Emperor' who appeared out of nowhere is also this terrifying? Even with the Xuanhuang Realm's assistance, it shouldn't be like this, should it?"

The three Heavenly Venerates exchanged glances, filled with surprise and uncertainty.

Meanwhile, Carefree Heavenly Venerate slept even more soundly.

…

"Body Transformation…"

"Azure Nether Heaven!"

A colossal power surged into his body, and the Sacred Emperor roared.

Violet, gold, and Azure Nether hues merged, and the Sacred Emperor’s figure vanished beneath the Doctrine Transmitter’s gigantic palm.

In its place appeared an endless expanse of Azure Nether heaven and earth.

The Xuanhuang Realm, a single realm.

Although it had been patched together and integrated with many other surviving cultivation realms, its scale was ultimately limited.

However, at this moment, the Azure Nether heaven and earth, suppressed by the Doctrine Transmitter’s palm, became boundless and endless, showing no sign of a limit.

The sky was high and the land vast, with the scenery of heaven and earth constantly changing.

Seas turned into mulberry fields, and stars shifted their courses.

As time passed, the distances within heaven and earth also gradually increased.

It was as if an invisible giant stood between the earth and the sky.

Continuously pushing the sky upwards.

"Azure Nether Transforms, Heaven and Earth are Boundless!"

"The Azure Nether of the Past, the Azure Nether of the Present, the Azure Nether of the Future!"

"Gather!"

The Sacred Emperor's voice echoed within the Azure Nether projection.

As the heaven and earth expanded, his voice grew increasingly resonant.

The past, the present, and the future.

The Xuanhuang Realm across infinite time and space merged as one at this moment.

Countless illusory figures, layered upon each other, seemed to have been forcefully pulled from the river of time.

Forming an unprecedentedly vast and eternal expanse of time and space.

The giant palm suppressing downwards from the Doctrine Transmitter was propped up by the infinite canopy of heaven. It trembled violently but could not advance further.

The expansion of the eternal Xuanhuang Realm was without end.

At a speed even faster than its contraction, under the reversed pressure of immeasurable Azure Nether light, the Doctrine Transmitter’s giant palm rapidly shrank to the size of a normal person.

The size of space reverted to normal.

The Doctrine Transmitter retracted his palm and looked at the circular black mark in the center of his palm, as if scorched by intense flames, a trace of solemnity flashing in his eyes.

Even as light and shadow flowed around him, with principles of destruction and creation, he could not heal this black mark.

Opposite the Doctrine Transmitter, the projection of the eternal Xuanhuang Realm illuminated the dark, silent star sea.

It was as if a supreme immortal domain, which existed in the past, exists in the present, and will exist eternally, had truly been born in the world.

The Doctrine Transmitter’s gaze shifted from the wound on his hand to the vast scene before him.

Mountains towered, fertile land stretched for hundreds of millions of miles. Strange spirits and exotic scenes were countless.

It was like the immortal realm described in legends.

The Doctrine Transmitter, looking at the Xuanhuang Realm before him, was briefly lost in thought.

A beam of starlight exploded from the sky of the eternal Xuanhuang Realm.

He emerged slowly from the eternal Xuanhuang Realm, clad in a starlight robe, wearing a nine-heavens jade crown, and treading upon the river of time.

The Sacred Emperor walked out of the eternal Xuanhuang Realm, like stepping out of a painting into reality.

The illusory and the real twisted and intertwined at this moment, making it difficult to distinguish between them.

An intense sense of contradiction even arose faintly.

"This is…"

"The Law of Time?" the Doctrine Transmitter's voice held a trace of surprise, some disbelief.

However, after a moment, he shook his head slightly, negating his previous guess.

The black scar on his hand not only did not heal with the passage of time, but it worsened, even showing a tendency to spread to other areas.

This was an almost unbelievable matter for his Supreme body.

The Doctrine Transmitter could faintly sense that the power gnawing at his palm was not related to the passage of time.

Instead, it was…

a predetermined fact.

No matter how time flowed, or how the sea of stars was born and died, this wound would not change.

The Sacred Emperor, who emerged from the eternal Xuanhuang Realm, gave the Doctrine Transmitter no chance to rest.

"Glorious Sacred Spirits, bear my banner, become my spear and shield!"

Amidst the Sacred Emperor's resounding voice, shadowy figures, also clad in starlight robes, emerged from the eternal Xuanhuang Realm.

Their faces could not be seen, and even the moves they employed differed from the Sacred Emperor's.

But without exception, they all regarded the Doctrine Transmitter as an enemy.

Without preamble, they began to fight.

Some used fists and feet, some used talismans, some used flying swords.

Their daoist arts and divine abilities were illusory manifestations. They seemed ordinary and unremarkable, lacking any special power.

Yet, even without making substantial contact, they still inflicted damage upon the Doctrine Transmitter.

All the wounds were identical to the black circular spot on his palm.

And before the vast, seemingly ever-expanding eternal Xuanhuang Realm, the Doctrine Transmitter’s power appeared to be suppressed.

Facing endless, tireless illusory avatars, the Doctrine Transmitter could only parry defensively.

Even if he instantly blasted them away, soon, an even greater number of illusory avatars would emerge from the eternal Xuanhuang Realm.

Conversely, these avatars, before their demise, were certain to inflict a trace of damage upon the Doctrine Transmitter.

Even if it were only a trace, they were all unhealable fatal wounds!

Slowly, more and more black scars appeared on the Doctrine Transmitter’s body.

Under the illumination of the terrifying black energy, the Doctrine Transmitter’s compassionate face appeared somewhat ferocious.

In such a critical situation, the Doctrine Transmitter remained unperturbed.

He was contemplating the essence of this illusory Xuanhuang Realm before him.

The comprehension of Heavenly Venerate Doctrine Transmitter was beyond doubt.

His ability to create the heaven-defying path of "Reversing the Principles of Heaven and Earth to Prove Longevity" was enough to demonstrate his world-illuminating, astonishing talent.

Moments ago, he had been attacked by the Sacred Emperor's "Destruction and Creation of Dao" but instantly comprehended it and used it to counterattack, which also showed the Doctrine Transmitter’s terrifyingly high comprehension.

Even the residual True Immortal power scattered in the sea of stars, and the nature of the High Wall, he had some inkling of.

But only…

this eternal Xuanhuang Realm, situated between illusion and reality.

He could not fathom it, could not guess its nature.

As a fellow being at the Supreme realm, the Doctrine Transmitter naturally knew that the limit of this power absolutely could not create such a vast Xuanhuang Realm out of thin air.

Otherwise, he would not have had to laboriously patch up worlds.

But before him, the pressure of the world’s projection seemed real.

Those imprints of past cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm seemed real.

The wounds inflicted upon him also seemed real.

What precisely…

A flash of insight flickered in the Doctrine Transmitter's profound eyes. He seemed on the verge of discovering the answer.

But a sword light severed his high crown.

It interrupted his train of thought.

Facing the Sacred Emperor’s life-threatening pressure, his physical state was no longer sufficient to support further observation and learning.

The Doctrine Transmitter felt a slight regret in his heart.

He had a premonition that if he could comprehend the great divine ability of this "Eternal Xuanhuang Realm," it might be immensely beneficial for the future recovery of the Xuanhuang Realm, and even for escaping the Immortal Ruins and crossing the High Wall.

Unfortunately, his opponent clearly would not grant him this wish.

"Fellow Daoist's talent, among the past ten thousand years, is only seen once."

"But to want to kill me…"

"Is still not enough."

The Doctrine Transmitter’s expression turned solemn.

A murderous aura, unseen since the beginning of the battle, also emerged in his eyes.

"To die under this move, fellow Daoist should have no regrets," the Doctrine Transmitter, covered in wounds, said calmly.

In front of the eternal Xuanhuang Realm, a rift suddenly appeared.

*Boom!*

A thick arm, seemingly composed of countless worlds, thrust out from the rift.

*Bang!* *Bang!*

Without a moment's hesitation, the world-arm fiercely collided with the eternal Xuanhuang Realm.

The river of stars trembled.

The eternal Xuanhuang Realm, after all, was not yet truly eternal.

However, the world-arm summoned by the Doctrine Transmitter contained actual worlds.

They were, however, filled with an aura of deathly silence and decay—fragments of worlds.

Under the brutal impact of countless world fragments, the projection of the eternal Xuanhuang Realm became faint and flickering.

And the attacks of those illusory avatars were of no consequence to these worlds that had already perished.

Even the residual True Immortal power on those world fragments gradually transferred to the eternal Xuanhuang Realm through the collision of worlds.

Numerous black symbols representing disaster appeared in the heaven and earth of the eternal Xuanhuang Realm.

*Boom!*

Another arm, entirely composed of world fragments, appeared in another corner of the eternal Xuanhuang Realm.

It targeted the Sacred Emperor standing within, charging aggressively.

Wherever it passed, the illusory realm shattered with a roar.

Revealing the true dark void.

"Corpses of worlds…"

The Sacred Emperor looked at the scene of countless shattered worlds overlapping, rapidly approaching his vision.

He looked at the ruins scattered everywhere, and the bones occasionally exposed.

The scene of the ancient calamity descending, worlds shattering, and cultivators wailing in pain and despair before turning to dust, flashed before his eyes.

"So many…"

The Sacred Emperor was moved.

As the arm of world fragments, sweeping through everything, was about to sweep over him.

A ray of light appeared before him.

"Dust to dust, earth to earth."

The light illuminated the Sacred Emperor's compassionate face as he recited words.

Those world fragments, upon being illuminated by the light, seemed to melt like ice and snow, evaporating into thin air.

The brutal, fierce arm did not harm the Sacred Emperor in the slightest.

Instead, nearly a hundred world fragments were directly disintegrated.

The arm cracked open.

"Hmm?!"

The Doctrine Transmitter was genuinely astonished this time.

Looking at the somewhat incomplete world-arm, he moved his thoughts and quickly retracted it.

He stared at the Sacred Emperor, who was protected by the light.

"This light is…"

Another incomprehensible thing appeared before him.

The Doctrine Transmitter narrowed his eyes and no longer acted rashly, but began to re-evaluate the other party's true identity.

The Sacred Emperor also seized this opportunity to rest.

After all, launching successive killing blows had, despite the remote assistance of the Xuanhuang Realm, been a significant drain on him.

The eternal Xuanhuang Realm was a grand world formed by layering the wisdom of the [Truth into Falsehoodhood, Falsehood Becomes Truth] principle he had comprehended with the countless past geniuses of the Xuanhuang Realm, as well as the possible future prodigies deduced.

In the Sacred Emperor’s deductions, if one's strength was sufficient, it would be possible to summon this eternal Xuanhuang Realm out of the void.
