Originally, Li Fan was not qualified to know this secret of the Immortal Boat. However, Li Fan had now risked his life to scout for the Immortal Boat and ultimately brought back crucial information.

Calling him a hero who saved the Mystic Immortal Boat would not be an exaggeration, so there was no need to conceal it.

After discussing with the other elders and finally obtaining their permission, Ai Tianjue replied, "The Chief is not speaking in jest. The ancestral teachings are indeed no longer on the Mystic Immortal Boat…"

Li Fan seemed to understand Ai Tianjue's meaning: "Not on the Mystic Immortal Boat. Teacher, do you mean…".

"On the Merchant Immortal Boat?"

Ai Tianjue nodded. "Back then, the Immortal Boat split into two due to internal strife. Our Mystic Immortal Boat, although it obtained the 【Hundred Heard Immortal Record】, the most important part of the Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat fell into the hands of the Merchant Immortal Boat."

Given Ai Tianjue's personality, he felt a slight regret when discussing this matter.

"The most important thing?" Li Fan's eyes flickered.

"Back then, after leaving their homeland, fearing pursuit by Monitors and even True Immortals, the ancestors of the Mystic Merchant drifted in the starry sea while also devising ways to completely escape True Immortals." A look of yearning flashed in Ai Tianjue's eyes.

"As the saying goes, there is a difference between immortals and mortals. Even at the Dao Integration level, facing True Immortals is no different from being an ant. Seeking to escape True Immortals through ordinary means would be like a fool's dream…"

"However, the ancestors of the Mystic Merchant realm did achieve it."

A flicker of enlightenment appeared in Li Fan's eyes. "Immortal artifacts?"

"Indeed. And not only that." Ai Tianjue said somewhat mournfully.

"As you know, in ancient times, some cultivation worlds were closely connected to the upper realms. As time passed, some immortal artifacts scattered everywhere. The Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat traveled through the starry sea, collecting immortal artifacts, and attempting to decipher their power to use for themselves…"

"Back then, they must have achieved some results. Unfortunately, before they could translate these research findings into practical applications, a change occurred in the starry sea." Ai Tianjue sighed.

"The Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat had internal strife and split into two. Our Mystic Immortal Boat seized the vast majority of the stored resources, which is the 【Hundred Heard Immortal Record】. The Merchant Immortal Boat, however, took possession of the research findings from that time and an unknown number of immortal artifacts…"

Li Fan was slightly taken aback. "So, in the internal strife back then, our Mystic Immortal Boat was actually the loser?"

Ai Tianjue nodded. "You could say that."

Li Fan then fell silent.

He thought to himself, "No wonder everyone on the Mystic Immortal Boat has always been tight-lipped about information concerning the Merchant Immortal Boat."

After a long while, Li Fan looked puzzled and asked again, "The Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat drifted in the starry sea for a long time. Why did internal strife occur simply due to the descent of calamity?"

"Even when faced with a desperate situation like confronting the Monitor, our Mystic Immortal Boat did not experience internal strife. The Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat back then should not have been worse than us, right?"

"That's because the leader of the Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat back then was going to do something suicidal, taking everyone on board with him." Ai Tianjue said coldly.

"Hmm?"

"They were going to pilot the Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat to crash into the The Great Barriers, attempting to break out of this star sea." Ai Tianjue said slowly after a moment of silence.

Li Fan couldn't help but stare in astonishment.

…

While everyone on the Mystic Immortal Boat was still searching for an exit within the Yin-Yang Pearls, the changes in the Xuanhuang Realm had entered a new phase.

The Sacred Emperor, who was fighting the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate to a standstill for the moment, couldn't help but look up at the anomaly in the sky.

The fusion of the various fragmented realms had initially been completed.

The white mist barriers that once spanned the heavens and earth, under the crushing power of the inherent forces of growth and decay in the Xuanhuang Realm, shattered one by one.

The boundless firmament, encompassing all prefectures and regions, was revealed to the cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm for the first time.

The scattered Immortal Spiritual Qi in the world had been completely absorbed by the Azure Nether Heaven and Earth.

The cultivators also slowly awoke from their greed and madness.

They stared dumbfounded at the clear sky they had never seen before, frozen in place.

Boom…

With a slight tremor of heaven and earth, something seemed to be activated.

Lines flashed across the sky momentarily and disappeared.

Even with the Sacred Emperor's strength, he could not discern their reality.

The Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate's attacks grew increasingly fierce. Li Ping could feel that the Doctrine Transmitter was no longer holding back.

He knew in his heart that they were approaching the most critical moment, and the Sacred Emperor was making his utmost effort to block the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate.

The rumbling of heaven and earth grew louder.

However, a sudden sense of unease surged within the Sacred Emperor's heart.

Looking at this sky, Li Ping felt a sense of being within a formation.

It was as if the entire Great Qi world was enveloped by the Great Myriad Spirits Formation.

And the moment the Sacred Emperor had this thought, an extremely subtle fluctuation of will instantly appeared in his mind.

It was from the Xuanhuang Realm!

Although it was fleeting, Li Ping could discern the meaning the Heavenly Dao of the Xuanhuang Realm wished to convey.

Danger! Escape!

Li Ping couldn't understand why. The Xuanhuang Realm was currently unprecedentedly powerful.

Where did the danger come from?

Just as Li Ping was in a daze, a golden light suddenly came from beyond the sky.

It was like a golden needle, flying rapidly and piercing fiercely into the Azure Nether land!

The rumbling of the Xuanhuang Realm abruptly ceased.

It was as if this single needle had forcibly interrupted the process of the Xuanhuang Realm's transformation!

A surge of anger immediately rose in the Sacred Emperor's heart.

Starlight surged on his body, and he instantly flashed, bypassing the Doctrine Transmitter.

He arrived before the golden needle.

He enveloped his palm with Primal Force Essence, intending to pull this golden light out of the Azure Nether land.

However, to the Sacred Emperor's utter astonishment, this golden needle, which clearly came from beyond the sky, was like the meridians and blood vessels of the Xuanhuang Realm itself, integrated with it.

As he applied slight force, the Azure Nether land beneath his feet vibrated violently.

Mountains rose and fell, and the power of the earth veins spewed out.

Seeing this, the Sacred Emperor couldn't help but loosen his grip and abandon the idea of forcefully pulling it out.

And as he attempted to pull out the needle, countless golden needles rained down from beyond the sky like shooting stars.

One by one, arranged in an extremely mysterious pattern, they were embedded in the Azure Nether land.

Not only was the Xuanhuang Realm's transformation process interrupted, but numerous vortices appeared in the sky. The Immortal Spiritual Qi that had already been absorbed by the Azure Nether Heaven and Earth was actually forced out again.

From the locations of the golden needles, wisps of white mist emerged once more.

Like sharp surgical scalpels, they began to cut into the Azure Nether land again.

A strange power began to slowly envelop the Xuanhuang Realm.

The creatures within the Xuanhuang Realm, upon witnessing the re-released Immortal Spiritual Qi, did not rush to grab it. Instead, their minds became hazy and confused.

Many creatures even fainted and fell to the ground, falling into a deep sleep.

They did not witness this miraculous transformation of heaven and earth with their own eyes.

"Heavenly Physician!!" The Sacred Emperor now understood the perpetrator of this event.

He looked up at the sky, trying to locate its position.

However…

The attack from the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate suddenly arrived.

This time, there was no holding back.

The extreme power that the Xuanhuang Realm could just barely withstand erupted.

"Since the Heavenly Venerate has arrived, why do you not bow!"

The cold voice of the Doctrine Transmitter simultaneously resounded.

It seemed to emanate from every corner of the heavens and earth at once.

The Sacred Emperor's body froze instantly.

It was as if he were facing the direct gaze and questioning of all cultivators who practiced the new law in the heavens and earth.

Those countless eyes, like shackles, tightly bound him.

"So the Xuanhuang Realm is the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate's home ground…" A flash of understanding crossed the Sacred Emperor's mind.

"However, in this Xuanhuang Realm, I also have an ally!" The Sacred Emperor's starlight robe surged.

He roared, "Mo Rufang, how long are you going to watch from the sidelines!"

Although he didn't know where the Law King of the Heavenly Mysteries Sect was hiding, Li Ping was certain that when the anomaly in the Xuanhuang Realm occurred, he would be hidden in a corner, silently observing everything.

From their brief exchange earlier, Li Ping could tell that this Law King of the Heavenly Mysteries Sect did not particularly care about the so-called Azure Nether Orthodoxy.

As long as the world beneath his feet remained intact. He was more concerned with finding the missing Heavenly Mysteries King and leaving this Abyssal Star Sea.

So, regardless of whether Mo Rufang responded, the Sacred Emperor inwardly roared, "Dao One!"

The Spirit Qi in the heavens and earth instantly came alive.

Released through the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven, and with the Xuanhuang Realm's previous rampant growth, the Dao Insects had already spread throughout the world. Now, upon receiving the Sacred Emperor's summons, they transformed from dormant to alive, surging towards the Sacred Emperor's body.

Like a chasm swallowing the sea, the Sacred Emperor's body gradually expanded as the insect-transformed Spirit Qi continuously poured in.

Ten feet, a hundred feet, a thousand feet…

The chains of the Doctrine Transmitter entwining his body instantly turned to ashes.

In the blink of an eye, the Sacred Emperor had transformed into a truly colossal giant, standing tall and majestic.

Dominating the Azure Nether land.

And the infusion of insect-transformed Spirit Qi did not stop.

It was as if it intended to devour all the Spirit Qi of the Xuanhuang Realm in a short period!

As his body continued to expand, the vast, merged Xuanhuang Realm slowly became the size of a room in the Sacred Emperor's eyes.

The Doctrine Transmitter's attacks also became less difficult to resist.

The Sacred Emperor even had the spare capacity to look beyond the Xuanhuang Realm to search for the Heavenly Physician's location.

"I will hold him off!"

Just then, Tianyang's voice suddenly rang out.

He blocked the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate and said to the Sacred Emperor, "Don't worry."

"Even the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate won't be able to kill me in a short time."

Tianyang was no longer a young child, but had transformed into a puppet of intermingled dark gold and crimson colors.

He was about the same size as an ordinary person.

"Take this!" The Sacred Emperor handed the white ring to Tianyang and then flew out of the Xuanhuang Realm, following the continuously arriving golden needles to search for the Heavenly Physician's trace.

He also attempted to intercept this golden light midway.

But the golden needles came from beyond the sky, too fast and too dense.

He had no time to intercept them.

Only by finding and resolving the source of the golden needles could he stop them.

Seeing Tianyang already locked in combat with the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate, without any sign of Mo Rufang's appearance, the Sacred Emperor could not afford to hesitate and headed towards the starry sky once more.

The insect-transformed Spirit Qi began to dissipate rapidly after entering the void.

If it weren't for the Mystic Immortal Realm absorbing Immortal Spiritual Qi during its sublimation and the Dao Insects benefiting slightly, the rate of death would likely be even faster.

The Sacred Emperor knew he had to find the Heavenly Physician's trace as soon as possible.

It was a pity…

This powerful being, who was also subtly at the 【Supreme】 realm, seemed to have no intention of appearing to fight him, always concealing his whereabouts.

The Sacred Emperor also discovered that these golden needles seemed to have been pre-arranged.

They were not fired from a single point in the starry sky, but from all directions, countless golden needles.

They descended upon the Xuanhuang Realm with extreme precision.

The Sacred Emperor felt a sense of frustration, a feeling of having immense power but nowhere to use it.

In his mind, a vision of the annihilated immortal calamity sealed outside the Great Qi's pocket world, and the remains of the Grand Master, suddenly appeared.

He even harbored a thought of unsealing them and detonating them.

"Hmm?"

The Sacred Emperor was shocked by his own thought and forcefully suppressed it.

"Why would I even have such an idea?"

The thought flashed and disappeared, and the Sacred Emperor could only continue his search for the Heavenly Physician's trace.

As the golden needles continued to fall, the Xuanhuang Realm gradually returned to its original appearance.

The white mist barriers reappeared in the heavens and earth, dividing the prefectures.

The restless Xuanhuang Realm seemed to be sealed by the golden needles and fell into a slumber.

The Sacred Emperor's sense of helplessness reached its peak.

He inadvertently glanced at the Xuanhuang Realm below once more…

And his heart suddenly trembled.

Because he suddenly discovered that the Xuanhuang Realm had not completely returned to its original state.

Instead…

That feeling of being within a formation had not faded!

On the contrary, it grew stronger with the passage of time!

Chapter 1301: Azure Nether Wind Calamity (7K)

"This formation…"

"Who on earth is it?!" The Sacred Emperor was both shocked and enraged.

The Doctrine Transmitter, the Heavenly Physician, and even the Mystic Immortal Boat from the distant starry sky were clearly not the ones who set up this formation.

In this sea of stars, who possessed such power to set up a grand formation that could make him tremble with fear?!

What was the Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate, who had descended into the world not long ago but had never revealed himself, doing?!

Countless thoughts flashed through the Sacred Emperor's mind.

Outside the starry sky, the golden needles continued to fly, as if there were no end.

They alternated between reality and illusion, dense and fast.

The Sacred Emperor was already unable to block all these golden needles. Now, he also sensed that the Xuanhuang Realm seemed to have inexplicably fallen into crisis.

Yet, the Heavenly Physician seemed completely unaware of this.

"Heavenly Physician! The Xuanhuang Realm!" Helpless, the Sacred Emperor roared towards the outside of the starry sky in a reminder.

The continuous rain of golden needles seemed to pause slightly, but it did not stop.

However, the positions where the golden needles landed on the Azure Nether land had changed somewhat compared to before.

It was likely that the Heavenly Physician had also perceived the hidden changes in the Xuanhuang Realm and was attempting to rectify them through formations.

But...

"It's useless!"

The Sacred Emperor saw that it only slightly delayed the speed at which the drastic changes would descend.

This formless, unknown formation was still in the process of preparation for its descent.

His spiritual intuition's instinctive warning made the Sacred Emperor feel an inexplicable unease. Suppressing the inner anxiety, the Sacred Emperor's mind raced. He ultimately decided to disregard the Heavenly Physician's golden needles for now and reluctantly returned to the Xuanhuang Realm.

"Find the Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate!" the Sacred Emperor's voice echoed.

Currently, the Azure Nether heaven and earth were filled with golden needles. The vast majority of living beings had fallen into a deep slumber.

The True Yang, who had previously blocked the Doctrine Transmitter, had a body that was already in tatters.

However, he resolutely stood in front of the Doctrine Transmitter.

But the Doctrine Transmitter had also gradually sensed the impending crisis facing the Xuanhuang Realm, and the movements in his hands gradually stopped. Otherwise, the immortal puppet body of True Yang might have been completely destroyed.

His massive divine sense swept across the Xuanhuang Realm again and again, but he could not find any trace of the Great Heavenly Venerate.

"If Wood! Earth Vein! Stone Slab!"

The Sacred Emperor attempted to communicate with these individuals through the connection of the Primal Force Essence network.

However, they all seemed to have collectively disappeared, and none of them responded.

The Xuanhuang Realm before him was like a pot of water slowly coming to a boil.

The Sacred Emperor could only watch helplessly as everything unfolded, unable to find the source of the heat that was boiling the water.

In the sky, the illusory figure of the Doctrine Transmitter suddenly appeared, dispelling all the clouds. He manifested his Heavenly Lattice, looking down upon the Xuanhuang Realm. His gaze was like a torch, sweeping back and forth.

On the ground, golden light continuously emitted from the golden needles, spreading outwards. With each flash, the golden needle pulse had already encircled the Xuanhuang Realm.

This extraordinary sight was the combined effort of the Doctrine Transmitter and the Heavenly Venerates, searching the heavens and the earth.

Their aim was to find the whereabouts of the mastermind behind the scenes.

But an unbelievable scene unfolded.

After nearly half a day, the combined efforts of the two strongest cultivators in the sea of stars, the "Supreme Ones," still yielded no clues.

It was as if it simply didn't exist.

...

While the three supreme powerhouses of the sea of stars gathered, utterly at a loss.

Beneath the ground of Tongyan Prefecture.

The secret chamber, originally dug out and only ten feet square, had now transformed into an endless void.

At the boundary of the void, where the ritual to enter the Fallen Immortal Realm had been, a mysterious power beyond description now enveloped it.

It was the existence that drove all cultivators to madness: the power of immortal spirits.

The power of immortal spirits, like a gentle stream, like faint, delicate threads of light, circled the ritual, opening up an infinite void.

Here, in this void, was the Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate, whom the Doctrine Transmitter, the Sacred Emperor, and the Heavenly Physician had been desperately seeking, and the mastermind behind all this turmoil!

Let alone the fact that Li Fan here was merely a divine sense. Even if Li Fan himself were to appear, with his current strength, he would not be able to manipulate the power of immortal spirits.

He could not even touch or comprehend it; at best, he could only gaze at it from afar.

And the reason why the power of immortal spirits could be integrated into the immortal formation deduced by the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc...

In the void, Sun Tianci still maintained the posture he had before entering the test of the Fallen Immortal Realm.

Two completely opposite auras erupted from him simultaneously: one divine and sacred, the other filled with overpowering demonic energy.

Although the intensity of the divine and sacred aura far surpassed the sinister demonic energy, facing the relentless pressure of the surging demonic energy, the divine aura only retreated again and again. Even though it could have thoroughly swept away the entangling demonic energy with just a slight burst, Sun Tianci had never done so.

His brow furrowed, and his face bore a sorrowful expression.

"Fortunately, I left myself a way out..."

Sensing Wu Ninglu, whom he had released, causing havoc in Sun Tianci's sea of consciousness, Li Fan coldly snorted.

Ten thousand demonic thoughts incessantly gnawed at Sun Tianci, accompanied by vile curses and roars.

"I carried you for three years and gave birth to you. How could you treat me like this?"

"Not only did you snatch the Heavenly and Earthly Essence that I combined with the Dao, but you also watched me die with folded arms!"

"Truly my mother's good son!"

"Everything you have now was stolen from me! You shouldn't have lived from the very beginning!"

"Come on! Kill me again! Let me completely perish and disappear!"

...

Facing his mother's revenge, Sun Tianci chose to endure it silently.

He naturally felt his mother devouring his power, but this was precisely what he desired.

In Sun Tianci's perception, although Wu Ninglu had split into ten thousand demonic thoughts, they were merely chaotic consciousnesses filled with madness and destructive intentions. If their host, the object of her desire for revenge, were no longer present, these demonic thoughts would soon dissipate into the world.

And if that were to happen...

He, Sun Tianci, would truly never see his mother again.

Sun Tianci, who had memories since childhood and witnessed with his own eyes how he "killed" his birth mother on the day he was born, had always felt guilty. This time, he was prepared to save her.

In Sun Tianci's perception, as the demonic thoughts consumed more of his energy, their chaos gradually decreased. As long as he continued to feed them, his mother would eventually calm down completely.

It seemed like he was cutting flesh to replenish his mother, but in reality, it was not that exaggerated.

After all, the power of a Great Heavenly Venerate was like a vast ocean, boundless and limitless.

Compared to that, his mother's ten thousand demonic thoughts were merely a school of fish in the vast sea.

However, it would take some time for Sun Tianci to complete this feeding process.

Sun Tianci was naturally aware of the drastic changes happening in the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Chosen Emperor, the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate, and the countless golden needles that appeared later, all made Sun Tianci, the newly appointed Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate, feel very perplexed. However, it was his duty to save the Xuanhuang Realm.

To be honest, it was somewhat difficult to execute this task alone.

Fortunately, he had his master's help.

After experiencing trials in the Fallen Immortal Realm, involving stories he had heard since childhood, and after seeing his master's true appearance before sending him into the Fallen Immortal Realm,

How could Sun Tianci not understand his extremely mysterious master's true identity?

It was a wisp of the remnant soul left behind by the previous Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate, Su Bai, after his death.

Attached to him by the obsession to save the Xuanhuang Realm.

He had been trained and taught since childhood, and finally helped him succeed to the position of Great Heavenly Venerate.

Although his master had not explicitly stated all this, Sun Tianci himself had deduced these conclusions based on numerous details from his daily interactions with his master and his experience inheriting the position of Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate in the Fallen Immortal Realm.

After all, who else besides the previous Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate could be so clear about the details and even the answers to the inheritance trials?

He had just succeeded to the position, and a large amount of complex memories flooded his mind, leaving him no time to sort them out.

But his master could already skillfully use the power of immortal spirits to set up formations...

Sun Tianci's mind recalled the words his master had just spoken to him.

It was when he successfully inherited the position of Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate and awakened from the Fallen Immortal Realm.

His master looked at him with a gratified expression: "You did not disappoint me, my good child."

Then, he earnestly admonished him: "Ten thousand years have passed, and the Xuanhuang Realm is no longer what it was. Since the immortal path has been severed, and the Immortal Realm no longer exists, the Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate should henceforth only be the Great Heavenly Venerate of the Xuanhuang Realm, not the Great Heavenly Venerate of the Immortal Realm..."

"Now, as the Xuanhuang Realm is the only pure land in the sea of stars, outsiders are endlessly coveting it. Since you have inherited the position, you must shoulder the responsibility of the Great Heavenly Venerate and protect the Azure Nether."

"The Doctrine Transmitter, the Heavenly Physician, the Mystic Immortal Boat... I'm afraid only that Sacred Emperor will stand with us."

"The time you've been given is too little. After all, you've just inherited the position. You might not even be able to deal with the Doctrine Transmitter..."

"The only chance to turn the tide lies in the ancient realm-protecting formation!"

Sun Tianci's mind was instantly filled with some blurry memories.

"Master, do you mean..."

"Upon inheriting the position of Great Heavenly Venerate, one should simultaneously inherit the power of immortal spirits after detonating the immortal artifact?" Li Fan inquired.

"That's right," Sun Tianci nodded.

His master was merely a remnant soul, and so many years had passed. It was normal for his memory to be somewhat incomplete. Knowing about the inheritance of the Great Heavenly Venerate was even more proof of the other party's identity.

Upon hearing Sun Tianci's affirmative reply, Li Fan looked at the Xuanhuang Realm on the ground, his eyes flashing: "The realm-protecting formation has been abandoned for ten thousand years. It has even undergone repairs by the Heavenly Mysteries Sect..."

"Even so, as long as it is activated, these invaders can be successfully repelled. Even killing them is not impossible."

"Just a little bit of that immortal spirit power needs to be mobilized, like this..."

The formation diagram that Sun Tianci received from Li Fan awakened some of his inherited memories.

The traces of the formation diagram almost perfectly matched, but as his master had said, some parts had changed over time.

The mysteries of immortal formations were profound. Sun Tianci, having just successfully inherited the position of Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate, was not yet proficient enough to fully grasp them.

Just as he was about to ponder further, Sun Tianci sensed that the Doctrine Transmitter had already returned to the Xuanhuang Realm, seemingly searching for him.

Sun Tianci's heart tensed.

The strength of this Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate was no less than his own.

If he didn't use those immortal artifacts.

However, within the Xuanhuang Realm, immortal artifacts could not be easily used.

Especially since he was not yet familiar with the use of the four immortal artifacts inherited from the Heavenly Venerate. If he made a mistake and caused harm to the Xuanhuang Realm...

That would be an unforgivable sin.

The situation was urgent. Sun Tianci followed his master's suggestion and decided to activate the ancient realm-protecting formation to deal with the Doctrine Transmitter.

He had almost complete trust in his master, and he himself was not proficient in formations.

Sun Tianci did as Li Fan instructed.

Originally, everything was progressing smoothly.

Unexpectedly, just as the formation was about to take shape, his mother, who was supposed to have died, suddenly appeared in Sun Tianci's sea of consciousness for some unknown reason.

Transforming into myriad demonic souls, burning with the flames of revenge, she instantly engulfed Sun Tianci's mind.

That familiar, incredibly intimate aura, the face that only existed in memories and dreams, had now transformed into a vengeful spirit of death!

This caused Sun Tianci's mind to descend into chaos.

Li Fan seemed to sense Sun Tianci's unsteadiness and quickly transmitted a serious reminder: "This is your own karma and sin. You must resolve it with your heart."

"Although you were born with the Dao Integration at that time, you incurred a blood debt because of it. The resulting inner fear and unease could not be calmed even by the Immortal Heart Incantation."

"It has always been hidden deep within your heart, accompanying your growth. When you inherited the position of Great Heavenly Venerate and gained access to immeasurable power, she also transformed because of it and finally manifested. However, for you, this is also a rare opportunity. As long as you can resolve this inner demon this time, you will be flawless from now on..."

While Li Fan quickly reminded Sun Tianci, he continued, "As for the changes in the formation, just continue to do as I said. Focus on dealing with your own inner trial."

One must understand that Sun Tianci was, after all, just a child less than ten years old.

Although he had obtained fortuitous encounters and successfully succeeded to the position of Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate.

Facing his long-thought-of birth mother at this moment, his emotions were inevitably in turmoil.

Li Fan's continuous teachings and guidance over the years had caused Sun Tianci to subconsciously obey the other party's commands.

A terrifying immortal formation, based on the Xuanhuang Realm-protecting formation, thus slowly took shape.

Sun Tianci, who was providing the immortal power, was still unaware.

He was only more determined to cast the immortal formation after seeing how the Heavenly Physician used golden needles to forcefully interrupt and restore the Xuanhuang Realm's integration.

Li Fan's divine sense, with a look of infatuation, gazed at the immortal formation that was about to take shape.

There were no dark thoughts of killing or destruction in his heart, only a sigh of regret and admiration for witnessing the Great Dao.

"This is true formation art."

"What is deduced will always have subtle differences from what is actually seen."

"I want to see if the Doctrine Transmitter, the Heavenly Physician, and the like can survive in this immortal formation..."

As the saying goes, spilled water cannot be recovered.

Once this grand formation was completed, even Sun Tianci, as the "power source," would be powerless to stop it if he discovered it later.

Only he, as the one who set up the formation, could make minor adjustments to the formation during the activation process.

But he could not reverse the process.

Li Fan sensed the Doctrine Transmitter and others still searching for him in the Xuanhuang Realm, and he snorted coldly.

He was ready to activate the grand formation at any moment.

...

After several fruitless searches, the Sacred Emperor released the Spirit Qi of the Dao One that he had absorbed back into the Azure Nether heaven and earth.

He pondered for a solution.

The Sacred Emperor's inner unease had reached its peak.

So had the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate.

Finally, seeming to have made up his mind, the Doctrine Transmitter's figure vanished briefly and then reappeared.

His face was solemn, and he held an ancient bronze mirror.

The Sacred Emperor's pupils contracted. He felt a faint aura of immortal spirits from the mirror.

"The true form of the Heavenly Profound Mirror?"

The Doctrine Transmitter tossed the Heavenly Profound Mirror high into the sky.

The ancient bronze mirror grew as it encountered the wind. Its momentarily illusory body instantly enveloped the entire Xuanhuang Realm.

The sky was no more; instead, the mirror surface covered everyone's heads.

Beneath the Heavenly Profound Mirror, even the Sacred Emperor felt as if he had been completely seen through.

Subconsciously, starlight enveloped him, obscuring the Heavenly Profound Mirror's view.

Two lines, one black and one white, intertwined and emitted from the surface of the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

They extended infinitely, instantly encompassing the Xuanhuang Realm.

Then followed a continuous scan of black and white lines.

The black and white lines swept across, integrating into the Azure Nether heaven and earth. Within the mirror surface covering the sky above, the scene of the Xuanhuang Realm gradually appeared.

Not only the mountains, rivers, lakes, and seas, but also the myriad beings within them.

Only the Sacred Emperor, the Doctrine Transmitter, and others were not within its sight.

However, as the black and white lines continued to sweep, the Sacred Emperor's figure eventually slowly appeared within the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

The Sacred Emperor looked up at his blurry image in the mirror. For some reason, he felt that the figure was subtly different from his real self.

The Xuanhuang Realm seemed to have fallen into stillness.

Awaiting the results of the Heavenly Profound Mirror's search.

Only the Heavenly Physician's golden needles did not stop. They traveled across the Azure Nether land, as if to completely restore the Xuanhuang Realm to its state before the great battle.

Within the Heavenly Profound Mirror, the scenes became clearer and clearer.

Various locations and positions were being ruled out.

The Doctrine Transmitter had already begun to search the remaining areas.

So had the Sacred Emperor.

The former enemies had now, quite tacitly, reached a new cooperation.

After all, whether the Xuanhuang Realm evolved into the Heavenly Law Realm or not, the existence of the world beneath their feet was the prerequisite for everything.

Just as Li Fan's hiding place beneath Tongyan Prefecture was about to be exposed, a figure appeared outside the Great Qi pocket world without anyone noticing.

In the void, the Sacred Emperor had set up layers of formations.

Within them, sealed and carefully placed by the Sacred Emperor, were...

The remnants of the One Beginning Sect, carrying the Devouring Calamity and the remains of the Grand Master.

And a faceless stone statue.

That figure was another divine sense of Li Fan.

After parting ways with the simulated personality of the Boundless Mirror and causing trouble within the Myriad Immortals Alliance by deducing the Dao Integration techniques using the Dharma Deduction Jade, this divine sense had hidden itself.

It had been silently waiting for an opportunity.

Now, the opportunity had finally arrived.

"After meticulous planning for so long, how can it be interrupted at the last moment?"

"You should all return..."

Facing the obstruction of layered formations, Li Fan's divine sense effortlessly bypassed them all.

He directly flashed into the interior of the formation.

Simultaneously.

In the Xuanhuang Realm, the Sacred Emperor's expression changed dramatically.

He had already sensed the figure that had quietly appeared outside the Great Qi pocket world.

A strange sense of familiarity made his heart tremble!

Forgetting everything else, starlight pierced through the sky and landed directly within the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty.

Then, he shot out rapidly towards the void outside.

However, it was already too late.

The previous moment, Li Fan's divine sense had instantly broken all the formations.

The items separated on both sides were thus gathered together.

The divine sense detonated, leaving no trace behind.

Using the last bit of power from the exploding divine sense, he flung the faceless stone statue fiercely towards the remnants of the One Beginning Sect.

As the stone statue was about to collide with the remnants of the One Beginning Sect, the remaining divine sense transformed into a sharp sword.

It directly cleaved towards the head of the faceless stone statue!

Boom! Boom! Boom!

Although it looked like a very ordinary stone statue, the moment the divine sense sword collided with the stone statue, there was an instant descent of some power.

It did not hinder the desecration of the stone statue, as if it had merely glanced at it casually from afar.

But it was precisely this action that alarmed...

the Devouring Calamity lurking within the remnants of the One Beginning Sect.

The entity that descended into the stone statue vanished in an instant.

However, the terrifying Devouring Calamity did not stop because of this.

A storm slowly began to form in the void outside the Great Qi pocket world.

The Sacred Emperor's figure arrived a step too late.

The storm had already engulfed the entire remnants of the One Beginning Sect. The terrifying energy fluctuations, even when blown from afar, made this expert of the Supreme Realm feel an endless sense of crisis.

Like a weak mortal facing a world-destroying cataclysm.

There was nothing he could do but watch.

Cold sweat dripped from his forehead. The Sacred Emperor quickly regained his senses.

Without any further reservation, he mobilized all his Golden Origin Energy in an attempt to prevent the spread of the Devouring Calamity.

Simultaneously, countless World-Cracking Whales emerged from the Sacred Dynasty.

They severed the void where the calamity was located from the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty.

The Primal Force Essence, infinitely close to true immortal power, was no match for this Devouring Calamity.

It crumbled upon contact.

The Sacred Emperor could not retreat and could only continue to try to block the calamity with the Primal Force Essence.

A beam of white light also blocked the spreading Devouring Calamity.

The newcomer, with a tall hat and long beard, holding a bronze mirror, was the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate.

The Doctrine Transmitter's expression was also more solemn than ever, no longer calm.

And the Heavenly Profound Mirror in his hand flickered erratically, as if it had seen something extremely terrifying, issuing a warning.

The Sacred Emperor transmitted the scene of the remnants of the One Beginning Sect being triggered, which he had sensed earlier, to the Doctrine Transmitter.

The Doctrine Transmitter said little, merely manipulating the Heavenly Profound Mirror to emit rays of ancient green light, attempting to seal the Devouring Calamity.

Even with the combined efforts of the two Supremes, they were still unable to completely block the Devouring Calamity.

This terrifying calamity seemed capable of devouring everything.

Even the void was its target for annihilation.

Along the gaps in the Doctrine Transmitter's and Sacred Emperor's defensive lines, the calamity flowed like a surging tide, swallowing all existence in its path.

It headed towards the Xuanhuang Realm.

Once this calamity erupted in the Xuanhuang Realm, all living beings within, including the Xuanhuang Realm itself, would likely be destroyed by this tribulation from the Immortal Realm.

Just as this happened, several golden needles suddenly flew from afar.

Like unshakeable divine needles, they formed an indestructible dam, firmly blocking the straggling remnants of the Devouring Calamity!

The calamity roared, and the golden needles' light dimmed.

Soon, the great dam collapsed, and the calamity continued to surge forward.

However, countless more golden needles soon arrived from the front.

They formed continuous defensive dikes, obstructing the path of the terrifying calamity.

A benevolent-looking old man, along with the arrival of the golden needles, appeared in the void.

As if performing surgery on a difficult ailment, the old man's expression was solemn, and he continuously inserted needles.

At the same time, he continuously unleashed rays of light, which fell into the Devouring Calamity ahead.

The Sacred Emperor saw from afar that those rays of light seemed to be extremely old objects.

Attached to them was an aura of stillness and coldness.

After they fell into the calamity, they seemed to attract the calamity, causing it to gather and encircle them.

Thus, small whirlpools were formed.

The appearance of the whirlpools absorbed most of the energy of the Devouring Calamity.

Therefore, this terrifying disaster that erupted from the void outside the Great Qi pocket world began to show signs of gradual weakening.

The benevolent old man did not show any signs of relief but became even more cautious.

His golden needles did not cease, shooting out continuously.

He completely sealed the whirlpools.

With a slight exertion of force in his hand, with a pull, the calamity whirlpools were captured by the old man along the golden threads.

He opened his mouth slightly and actually swallowed the golden needle seals containing the Devouring Calamity!

The Doctrine Transmitter seemed accustomed to this.

The Sacred Emperor, however, showed a shocked expression.

It seemed that the Heavenly Physician's strength was even superior to his and the Doctrine Transmitter's.

In the eyes of the Heavenly Physician, it seemed that besides the calamity, there was nothing else.

He completely ignored the Doctrine Transmitter and the Sacred Emperor.

One by one, the golden needles fell, sealing and swallowing the Devouring Calamity.

This action was by no means easy for the Heavenly Physician.

He had to take short breaks periodically.

Fortunately, with the combined efforts of the three Supremes, they finally managed to eliminate this world-ending catastrophe in its infancy.

Looking at the void that had returned to its tranquil state, the somewhat exhausted Sacred Emperor still felt a lingering fear.

If this calamity had erupted directly in the Xuanhuang Realm instead of the void, they might not have had time to save it.

As the Sacred Emperor pondered this, he suddenly noticed that the Doctrine Transmitter and the Heavenly Physician, who had resolved the catastrophe, were still standing grimly in the void.

Their gaze was not directed at the Xuanhuang Realm or the Sacred Emperor.

Instead, it was directed at...

A faint illusory figure of a Dao page that had appeared at some unknown time!

The Dao page stood quietly with its eyes closed.

It seemed as if its eyes did not see anyone present.

However, the Doctrine Transmitter and the Heavenly Physician seemed to be facing a formidable enemy.

"Grand Master Tiandu?"

The Sacred Emperor was startled.

He thought of the Grand Master's remains in the remnants of the One Beginning Sect, which had now completely disappeared in the Devouring Calamity.

He had not expected...

that this would have led to the appearance of the legendary Grand Master Tiandu!

The realm of the Grand Master had surpassed the current limits of the sea of stars.

It had surpassed the so-called Supreme Ones.

Even though it was only a mere illusory figure standing there, the Sacred Emperor could not discern whether it was real or fake.

Judging from the expressions on the faces of the Doctrine Transmitter and the Heavenly Physician, they were also extremely shocked by the sudden appearance of this Grand Master.

Since the Grand Master did not move, the three of them dared not act rashly.

For a moment, a stalemate ensued.

However, the Sacred Emperor sensed that the formation in the Xuanhuang Realm not far away was still progressing.

Just as the Sacred Emperor decided to ignore the Grand Master before him and return to the Xuanhuang Realm to continue searching for the mastermind.

A voice suddenly emanated from the Grand Master's illusory figure.

All three Supremes' hearts tensed, and they listened attentively.

"Dao, follows the ancient; Xin, annihilates."

"Act, think, cultivate; connect intent, reach spirit."

"..."

At first, the words sounded nonsensical and completely incomprehensible.

But as he listened, a flicker of realization suddenly flashed through the Sacred Emperor's mind.

This was actually an immortal scripture!

Chapter 1302: Void Return, Return to Truth Finally Achieved (7K)

"A thousand soul movements, a hundred spirit rotations."

"No blame."

...

The illusory figure’s dao transmission continued.

It wasn't conveyed through sound or divine sense, but directly resonated within everyone’s minds.

Even the Sacred Emperor, Doctrine Transmitter, and Heavenly Physician present, whose hearts were deeply concerned with the safety of the Xuanhuang Realm, found their minds irresistibly drawn into the immortal incantation imparted by the Daoist boy.

When an entire immortal incantation had been recited, the Daoist boy’s illusory figure became indistinct once more, his voice fading in and out.

Only then did the three snap back to reality with a cold sweat.

Exchanging glances, they tacitly retreated backward, further away from the Daoist boy’s phantom.

The illusory figure did not stop them, as if its mission was complete, allowing the three to depart.

The sound of the dao transmission grew increasingly faint, ultimately vanishing into the void along with the Daoist boy’s spectral form.

Upon witnessing this, the expressions of the three were remarkably subtle.

They pondered the reason for the spectral figure's sudden appearance to transmit the dao, followed by its gradual disappearance.

Simultaneously, the three were replaying the immortal incantation they had just heard.

Immortal incantations, unlike mortal cultivation methods, were extremely arduous and obscure.

Especially since the Daoist boy’s phantom had merely recited the content directly, without any explanation.

Although the Sacred Emperor and the other two possessed the pinnacle of mortal comprehension, it was still somewhat strenuous to fully grasp an entire immortal incantation in such a short period. They could only grasp the general idea.

"This is not a cultivation technique, but a method to avoid calamity. Within it, there also seems to be some record of the Immortal Realm..."

The Sacred Emperor’s thoughts raced, but his actions did not cease. He turned back and returned to the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Doctrine Transmitter followed closely.

As for the Heavenly Physician, he had vanished at some unknown point.

Glancing casually towards the direction of Dao Origin State in the Xuanhuang Realm, the Sacred Emperor detected no sign of Heavenly Capital’s awakening.

"The Xuanhuang Realm is about to be destroyed, yet it remains indifferent."

"Yet it actively revealed itself just now..."

"Is it due to the Calamity of Erasing Flames?"

Despite his myriad doubts, this was not the time for deep introspection.

His thoughts swept away, the Sacred Emperor refocused his attention on the current state of the Xuanhuang Realm.

Outside the Xuanhuang Realm, an unending rain of golden needles began to fall again. However, the power dispersed by the golden needles upon landing had subtly changed. The Sacred Emperor discerned some clues. If the earlier needles were like a heavy dose of medicine for a critical illness, then the current ones were like healing treatments after recovering from a severe sickness. The power of the golden needles had become much gentler and soothing.

Distant thunder rumbled, and fine rain drizzled.

It was as if, during the Awakening of Insects, all things were reviving and flourishing.

The turbulent Xuanhuang Realm displayed a scene of vibrant life.

If not for the hidden, intermittent aura of the great formation lurking in the shadows.

Truly worthy of the name "Heavenly Physician," to have, in such a short time, solely through golden needles, forcefully reversed the merging Azure Nether Worlds, restoring the Xuanhuang Realm to its original appearance. What was even more commendable was that the world itself suffered no damage in the process.

Healing the heavens like healing a person, golden needles reverse death and life. To reach such a realm required more than just high cultivation; it demanded a profound understanding of the world's essence.

As a Supreme Being himself, who had once claimed to be an incarnation of the Heavenly Dao and had an extraordinarily close connection with the world, the Sacred Emperor knew in his heart that he could never achieve what the Heavenly Physician had.

"But even someone like the Heavenly Physician cannot find the mastermind behind this..."

The Sacred Emperor’s heart grew heavy.

Since returning from the void outside Great Qi, the Xuanhuang Realm felt increasingly ominous to the Sacred Emperor.

Before, it was like water simmering in a pot; now, it was just a hair's breadth away from boiling over.

A qualitative change could occur at any moment.

The Doctrine Transmitter and the Heavenly Physician also sensed this, no longer holding back, their trump cards finally revealed.

In the Heavenly Cities of each province, where the statues of the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate originally stood, regardless of whether the statues still existed, a phantom of a colossal Doctrine Transmitter figure appeared with a tremor of space, eclipsing the original.

Like interconnected points of light, they illuminated more than half of the Xuanhuang Realm.

And from the Five Elders Council, five points of light of different colors also lit up simultaneously.

Six colors intertwined, forming lines.

Like the meridians of the Xuanhuang Realm, they radiated brilliant light in broad daylight.

"Spirit Sealing!"

"Substitutive Realm!"

The Heavenly Physician's cold, stern voice echoed through the heavens and earth.

The Doctrine Transmitter's phantom once again manifested as a colossal being, mimicking heaven and earth.

The Heavenly Physician appeared faintly above the Doctrine Transmitter's colossal form.

Then, with his right hand holding a colorful needle, he, with a grave expression, pierced the baihui acupoint on the Doctrine Transmitter's phantom.

The Doctrine Transmitter's colossal form instantly erupted in a dazzling, multicolored light.

Afterward, its form seemed to dissolve, flowing like a stream of light towards the continuously flashing meridians of the Xuanhuang Realm below.

Silently, the multicolored light circulated through the Azure Nether meridians upon entering, completing one full cycle.

After a moment of stillness, the seven-colored light began to flow again through the meridians.

"Spirit Sealing, Substitutive Realm?"

"This is the Heavenly Physician temporarily sealing the Doctrine Transmitter's soul and guiding it into the Azure Nether Heaven and Earth, to act as a temporary substitute for the world?"

The Sacred Emperor, witnessing this from afar, was profoundly shaken.

Having once merged with the heavens, the Sacred Emperor understood how difficult it was to achieve such a feat.

Let alone an entire world, even trying to possess a cultivator was not an easy task.

The Xuanhuang Realm not only possessed a Heavenly Dao consciousness but also, due to its location outside the Immortal Ruins and its precarious environment, was extremely active.

Not long ago, someone had inherited the position of the Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate.

With so many advantages, how could the Heavenly Physician and the Doctrine Transmitter, working together, still manage to suppress and seal the Xuanhuang Realm's origin consciousness, substituting themselves for it…

"Even if the Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly Dao is unaware of the current crisis, if the Doctrine Transmitter replaces it and examines it himself, he will absolutely be able to find the location of that hidden great formation!"

This method of suppressing the origin would cause immense harm to the Xuanhuang Realm. However, with the current crisis, such considerations could not be prioritized!

The Sacred Emperor's expression turned solemn as he awaited the Doctrine Transmitter's discovery.

When the seven-colored light had circulated through the Azure Nether meridians for more than three thousand six hundred cycles, the circulation suddenly halted.

At one location, as if the meridians were blocked by something, black fiendish energy erupted, soaring towards the heavens.

The Heavenly Physician abruptly opened his eyes, his benevolent gaze uncharacteristically revealing a hint of killing intent.

Nine golden needles, like threads, instantly shot towards the locked location.

The Sacred Emperor reacted simultaneously.

His figure flickered, appearing alongside the nine golden needles.

The surrounding land had already been reduced to nothingness by the preceding eruption of black qi.

Revealed beneath was a hidden void of unfathomable depth.

Within the void, two figures sat and stood.

The seated figure was only about seven or eight years old, his brows tightly furrowed.

The standing figure’s face was obscured.

However, facing the Heavenly Physician's golden needles and the furious Sacred Emperor, that figure showed no fear.

He remained utterly calm.

"This familiar feeling again..."

The Sacred Emperor felt as if he had fallen into an abyss, his heart chilling to the bone.

In a trance, the rapidly descending golden needles seemed to slow down.

The Sacred Emperor appeared to see the figure below slowly utter a sentence:

"Immortals descend...

"All things return to the void!"

BOOM!

An invisible storm instantly erupted,

scattering the Heavenly Physician's nine golden needles like leaves in the wind.

The rapidly fleeing Sacred Emperor felt as though he had slammed headfirst into a wall, not just seeing stars, but his body and soul nearly collapsing. Fortunately, starlight surged forth, barely repairing the Sacred Emperor's injuries.

Even with the continuous replenishment of primal force essence, the Sacred Emperor, a Supreme Being, could only barely maintain his survival in the chaotic, violent environment.

The void where the mastermind was hidden had long since vanished from sight.

The Sacred Emperor could not even see the entire Xuanhuang Realm.

Like a terrifying sandstorm, it blotted out the sun and rolled in,

enveloping everything in the world.

The Heavenly Physician’s nine golden needles had long since drifted away in the violent onslaught.

The aura of the Doctrine Transmitter and the Heavenly Physician could not be detected.

All that could be sensed was the surrounding chaos.

The Sacred Emperor’s mind went blank for a moment, then immense grief and indignation surged within him.

Even without witnessing it firsthand, he knew that the Xuanhuang Realm was disintegrating, inch by inch, within this terrifying great formation.

Nothing could be salvaged.

"Scoundrels! Scoundrels! Scoundrels!"

The Sacred Emperor lost his composure, cursing wildly.

Disregarding his own safety, he charged blindly through the chaotic storm, trying to find the familiar yet unfamiliar mastermind.

However, his only response was the increasingly powerful, merciless storm.

...

Once the power of immortal energy transformed by the immortal formation into a void storm capable of destroying everything,

the destruction of the Xuanhuang Realm was sealed.

This land, where myriad worlds converged, the only sanctuary in the Abyssal Sea, was now rapidly being swallowed by this world-ending storm.

At the heart of the formation, Sun Tianci, who had been trying to awaken his mother, could no longer heed her curses.

He suddenly jolted awake, staring at the Xuanhuang Realm, which had become riddled with holes in an instant, and was utterly stunned.

"Master... Master?"

After a long while, Sun Tianci managed to call out with difficulty.

However, his master, who had always responded and seemed omnipotent, never appeared again.

As the Xuanhuang Realm was on the verge of destruction, Sun Tianci not only felt the power he had recently inherited from the Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate rapidly draining away.

Due to his severe dereliction of duty, the backlash from the Great Heavenly Venerate also struck suddenly.

A nameless fire ignited in Sun Tianci's heart.

Without any pain, Sun Tianci felt his very existence being incinerated by this fire.

In his sea of consciousness, his mother, who had been incessantly scolding him despite the unfolding events, gradually seemed to forget his existence.

She slowly quieted down, lost in a daze.

"Tianci, Tianci..."

"Who is Tianci?"

Myriad demonic thoughts turned into a wisp of smoke and vanished without a trace.

In the end, only Wu Ninglu’s original appearance remained, staring blankly at the empty surroundings.

A tear inexplicably fell from the corner of her eye.

Wu Ninglu and Sun Tianci perished together in the heart-burning flame of the Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate.

At the center of the immortal formation, Li Fan’s clone slowly revealed its form.

He frowned slightly, sensing that he seemed to have forgotten the existence of certain individuals.

However, after a series of deductions, confirming that they were merely insignificant pawns who facilitated the formation of the immortal formation, he shook his head slightly and paid them no further attention.

Instead, he focused his attention on the few figures still struggling within the immortal formation.

...

Senior Yin and Xu Ke. Shortly after escaping the Divine Treasure Museum, they witnessed the earth-shattering changes occurring in the Xuanhuang Realm.

While they were marveling at the events, a world-ending storm suddenly descended.

Although both were considered powerhouses within the Xuanhuang Realm,

before this world-ending immortal formation, they could only await death in despair.

If not for the skull of Mr. Bai they carried, which shielded them, they would have perished long ago.

The chaotic storm intensified.

The protective power emanating from Mr. Bai's skull also slowly weakened.

They likely would not survive much longer.

As they faced imminent demise, Xu Ke and Senior Yin were not filled with the fear that other beings felt.

Xu Ke, his hair white as snow, cradled Mr. Bai’s skull and stared blankly, "I should have died a long time ago. But for Mr. Bai's mission, I lingered on. Now, to be buried with Mr. Bai, I can consider it a worthy end..."

Senior Yin looked at the storm ahead with calm, slightly mad eyes. "I am a spirit of the world, someone who has died once. Who knows what will happen if I die again?"

The response was the howling, formless wind.

Senior Yin and Xu Ke were slowly consumed entirely by the chaotic storm.

The skull of Mr. Bai in their hands was also in precarious danger.

Just before the skull disappeared into the storm, a flash of light and shadow appeared, and it vanished.

...

Surrounded by countless golden needles, a hard protective outer shell was formed, attempting to resist the erosion of the external storm.

It was quite effective, but under the progressively fierce onslaught of the storm, the golden light barrier inevitably dimmed.

The Heavenly Physician’s gaze swept around, appearing somewhat lost.

As if having lost the goal he had strived for so long, he was momentarily stunned.

However, his gaze soon turned grim again.

Reaching a hand out of the golden protective barrier, he drew in a wisp of the immortal formation’s world-destroying storm.

The Heavenly Physician's hand vanished into nothingness within the storm.

Yet, at the same time, a storm seemed to brew within the Heavenly Physician's eyes.

...

Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate recovered from his celestial manifestation.

When the world-ending immortal formation was activated, he was temporarily possessing the Xuanhuang Realm through the Spirit Sealing, Substitutive Realm method. Thus, when the rampaging world-ending storm erupted throughout the Xuanhuang Realm, he was essentially facing this terrifying catastrophe head-on.

Although this storm seemed slightly inferior to the Calamity of Erasing Flames he had seen before,

it was undoubtedly a manifestation of immortal energy.

The Calamity of Erasing Flames, on the other hand, was merely a residual trace of power.

The original Calamity of Erasing Flames possessed far greater destructive power than the immortal formation storm.

Yet, the immortal formation calamity erupting in the Xuanhuang Realm now far surpassed the residual Calamity of Erasing Flames by countless times.

Even for Doctrine Transmitter, a Supreme Being, being within it was like being a helpless mortal.

The heavily injured Doctrine Transmitter's body slowly dissolved.

The Heavenly Profound Mirror he carried also fell powerlessly.

The Heavenly Profound Mirror emitted a faint ethereal green light, flickering unsteadily, as if on the verge of extinguishing completely.

A transparent figure emerged from the dissolving body of the Doctrine Transmitter.

It bore some resemblance to the Doctrine Transmitter's appearance, yet was subtly different.

The transparent figure seemed to possess strong resistance to the immortal formation's annihilating storm. Even with its eyes closed, slumbering, it could temporarily withstand the storm's onslaught.

...

The Five Elders Council territory.

The vast majority of sentient beings were annihilated in an instant with the activation of the immortal formation.

However, an unseen dark cloud seemed to have always loomed over the Five Elders Council's territory. Even after the Xuanhuang Realm vanished, the dark cloud remained.

It even seemed to have protected the countless lives that disappeared within the immortal formation.

...

Within the White Mist Barrier.

"Finally out."

With the concerted efforts of everyone on the Immortal Boat, they finally deciphered the mysteries of the Life and Death Reversal Great Formation.

Finding the formation's core, the Immortal Boat successfully broke through.

However, before they could seek out the Doctrine Transmitter for trouble...

the world-ending immortal formation had already descended.

The Mystic Immortal Boat, which they relied on for survival, swayed unsteadily like duckweed in the wind.

The Immortal Boat’s hull, protected by numerous restrictions, rapidly disintegrated like ice and snow.

"Quick! Use True Immortal Sigils, Immortal to Immortal!"

The elders on the Immortal Boat cried out in unison.

However, it was ultimately a crude imitation, not true Immortal power.

The fluctuations caused by the True Immortal Sigils only caused the immortal formation storm to waver slightly.

Then, it was instead swallowed by the immortal formation,

becoming energy to augment the immortal formation storm.

The Mystic Immortal Boat was reduced to dust amidst the painful wails of regret from everyone.

"Using True Immortal Sigils indeed possesses immense destructive power. However, to this day, no True Immortal Sigils related to protection has been found. For the Mystic Immortal Boat, which could restrain two Supreme Beings during the calamity, to be so vulnerable..."

Li Fan, in his Sacred Embryo form, offered no resistance.

He simply watched his own body dissolve in the chaotic storm.

...

As the sole pure land in the Abyssal Sea,

the Xuanhuang Realm undoubtedly harbored many, many secrets.

However, at this moment, the "Immortals Descend, All Things Return to the Void" great formation was truly like a fierce storm.

It ruthlessly stripped away all the secrets shrouded above it.

Within the heart of the immortal formation, Li Fan’s clone watched the events unfold within the immortal formation with great concentration.

After all, the formation’s power source was not provided by him.

He could not see the entire picture within the formation,

but he only needed to observe the energy nodes that fluctuated violently within the formation.

These were beings that, in their struggle for survival, revealed everything without reservation, resisting the immortal formation storm.

Li Fan suddenly recalled the scene after first encountering the Scarlet Flame Burning Sea.

The Cloudy Sea had been evaporated, and countless beings had perished.

Yet, it also revealed the secrets buried deep beneath the sea.

At that time, the young Qi Refining cultivator had gained an intimate understanding of the Cloudy Sea's secrets.

Now, observing the energy fluctuations emanating from the Xuanhuang Realm, some of which were even unexpected, he couldn't help but feel a sense of realization:

"It seems principles are always the same."

"Secrets are often revealed after destruction."

Li Fan's clone fell into contemplation, unconsciously stroking a crystal-clear skull in his hand.

"What a pity, it's not the Main Body, so there's no sensation at all."

"The Heavenly Profound Mirror seems to still possess its own spiritual consciousness, yet it cannot be captured..."

As Li Fan’s clone’s thoughts raced, recording all the scenes, he, the observer who activated the formation, suddenly discovered something highly unusual.

The world-destroying immortal formation, which had consumed more than half of the Xuanhuang Realm and should have intensified and spread further into the void,

was now, for some unknown reason, showing signs of its storm gradually subsiding.

"??!!"

This was something that logically should not happen.

Unless...

There was a being deliberately stopping this storm!

An intense sense of crisis instantly surged within Li Fan's heart.

Not only within his clone, but also within his Main Body!

"The 'All Things Return to the Void' immortal formation, and the double protection of the Heavenly Profound Mirror..."

"Even a True Immortal cannot prevent my return to reality."

Having managed to return to reality before a True Immortal in the Immortal Ruins, Li Fan was not deterred by the fear in his heart.

Instead, after calm analysis, he made a decision.

After all, the only one who could prevent the immortal formation from expanding was likely the one near the Xuanhuang Realm...

Li Fan thought to himself.

Li Fan's guess was soon confirmed.

A figure suddenly appeared in the center of the immortal formation.

The surrounding raging storm calmed down as it approached him.

In the chaotic storm, the beings of the Xuanhuang Realm were sinking.

But this figure's appearance

was like a descending sun, illuminating the darkness anew.

He was so conspicuous.

So incongruous with his surroundings.

The moment he appeared in the immortal formation, Li Fan’s clone detected his presence.

Li Fan was no stranger to this figure.

He had even met him once before.

It was the True Immortal who sat outside the Xuanhuang Realm, eyes closed in contemplation!

However, unlike the skeletal appearance he had seen on the Immortal Ruins' ground,

the True Immortal who appeared now did not seem to be the Main Body.

It was merely a phantom manifestation.

Not only had his form become full again, but the shackles binding him were also gone.

The True Immortal's gaze swept across the immortal formation, and he frowned slightly.

He slowly extended his palm.

The raging, howling world-destroying storm gradually gathered towards his hand.

The immortal formation sensed this being attempting to disrupt it, and its defenses were triggered.

In the chaos, humanoid phantom figures manifested.

They were formed from the power of the immortal formation, appearing as the Xuanhuang Realm beings who had died within the immortal formation.

With fierce eyes and fearless resolve, they surged towards the True Immortal.

Like a rolling tide, mixed with the immortal formation's power of annihilation.

The True Immortal's figure remained completely unfazed, his posture unchanged.

All the immortal formation power that attempted to approach was absorbed into the True Immortal's palm without any resistance.

There was no sign of energy gathering, only that the True Immortal's form seemed to become slightly more solid.

With the True Immortal’s continuous absorption, the immortal energy driving the All Things Return to the Void Great Formation rapidly depleted,

all falling into his palm.

Within the great formation, the chaotic storm gradually subsided.

The Heavenly Physician, the Sacred Emperor, and other survivors were initially bewildered.

However, without exception, their gazes focused on the True Immortal’s figure moments later.

As if it were only natural, they could not tear their eyes away.

The survivors of the Xuanhuang Realm trembled.

Although there was no explanation, upon seeing the True Immortal's figure, they understood his identity.

Ten thousand years after the severance of the immortal path, the True Immortal had returned to the mortal world!

The survivors bowed their heads in reverence, expressing their awe of the True Immortal.

The True Immortal’s phantom did not speak, as if searching for something.

The Sacred Emperor finally reacted.

The burning rage in his heart temporarily offset the True Immortal’s natural suppression.

Even though the Xuanhuang Realm had already turned into a void, he immediately pointed in the direction of the immortal formation’s core where he had discovered it earlier.

The True Immortal’s gaze instantly fell upon the void where Li Fan’s clone was located.

The remaining immortal energy of the immortal formation rapidly dissipated. Under the True Immortal's gaze, Li Fan’s clone, whose thoughts were nearly frozen, was instantly revived by the Main Body’s urging.

Just as he was about to self-destruct to return to reality,

Li Fan’s clone witnessed a scene he could not comprehend at all.

He involuntarily halted his action of returning to reality.

"This..."

"How is it possible?"

The True Immortal phantom was gazing at Li Fan’s clone in the center of the immortal formation.

And another figure was also gazing at him.

And without anyone noticing, it was slowly approaching.

When Li Fan’s clone, who had a panoramic view from the center of the immortal formation, detected the existence of that figure,

it had already silently arrived behind the True Immortal’s phantom.

"Meow~"

As if finally finding the prey it had long awaited, Mao Bao, who had always been lazy, let out an excited meow.

WWW▲ ttКan▲ C〇

With a leap, it landed on the True Immortal’s shoulder.

The True Immortal’s figure was startled, looking at the cute creature that suddenly appeared on his shoulder.

Mao Bao’s beautiful large eyes stared intently at the True Immortal's figure.

The True Immortal's expression slowly shifted from surprise to horror.

"Meow~"

Mao Bao meowed again and then opened its mouth slightly.

It instantly swallowed the True Immortal’s phantom.

Then...

Mao Bao looked up towards the True Immortal's Main Body, who was sitting in contemplation in the Immortal Ruins outside the Azure Nether void.

Its body arched, and with a leap,

it disappeared.

The next moment, it appeared beside the True Immortal in the Immortal Ruins.

BOOM!

The entire Abyssal Sea trembled slightly.

The sound of something shattering echoed from afar.

The Sacred Emperor’s mind, stupefied, replayed the scene he had just witnessed.

He could not reconcile the Mao Bao, who could so easily devour the True Immortal’s phantom, with the usual lazy cat that loved to sleep on his shoulder.

Mao Bao was fished up accidentally by a citizen of the Sacred Dynasty from a fishing pond.

Despite its numerous divine abilities, the Sacred Emperor had never imagined that Mao Bao’s true prey would be...

a True Immortal?!

The Sacred Emperor was immensely shocked.

The survivors of the Xuanhuang Realm present, regardless of their cultivation level, also looked incredulous.

"Did the fishing pond reel in Mao Bao..."

"Or did Mao Bao actively take the bait, sensing the True Immortal's presence?"

"The angler is also being fished..."

The Sacred Emperor's heart turned icy cold.

"Even True Immortals are like this..."

"What lies beyond the wall..."

Not only the Sacred Emperor, but all the survivors of the Xuanhuang Realm now felt an uncontrollable surge of fear after their initial shock.

The fear was even greater than that of the world-ending calamity.

...

Li Fan was naturally also immensely shaken.

However, having reincarnated through many lifetimes, he had a certain psychological expectation regarding Mao Bao's divine abilities.

At this moment, he was the first to react, looking towards Mao Bao's destination, the Immortal Ruins not far away.

The observation there seemed to be blocked.

However, what Li Fan could sense was...

the suction force of the Immortal Ruins was disappearing.

BOOM!

The Abyssal Sea rumbled again.

Continuous sounds echoed, and many survivors who had managed to evade the world-ending immortal formation were annihilated by this grand sound.

"Return to Reality!"

In the Dharma Deduction space, Li Fan’s Main Body, without hesitation, mentally uttered the command.

Chapter 1303: Looking Back and Reviewing

Anchor point three years, at the peak of Dissolution Mountain.

Li Fan, who was meditating, suddenly opened his eyes.

His emotions were disturbed, and he could no longer maintain his composure.

He let out a long sigh, slowly got up, and walked out of the wooden cabin.

He came to the edge of the cliff and gazed into the distant sea of clouds. The mountain wind gusted, causing Li Fan’s robes to flutter and rustle.

It took him nearly half a day for his state of mind to gradually calm down.

In the past three years, this scene was not the first time it had occurred.

Unlike before.

This time, when Li Fan successfully "Returned to Truth" to a point one year after his anchor point, the experiences of his past reincarnation were still profoundly affecting him.

It wasn't a passive influence like falling into the True Immortal’s Net, but rather Li Fan’s own mindset had developed a problem.

Even with the Azure Nether Heart Refining Incantation protecting him, he couldn't escape it.

Whenever he became immersed in his thoughts, a scene of Cat Treasure leaping up in the darkness and then devouring the True Immortal figure from the Immortal Ruins would uncontrollably surge from the depths of his mind.

He would break out in a cold sweat, his mind in disarray.

He could no longer maintain a calm state.

"Cat Treasure, Cat Treasure..."

Li Fan's eyes flickered, and he muttered these two words repeatedly.

Cat Treasure clearly possessed three abilities: item replication, creature mimicry, and marrow cleansing. However, when it was fished out of the Fishing Pond, it was only of white quality.

The Fishing Pond was subtly a creation of an unnamed True Immortal who had comprehended the Dao of Fishing.

And how could Cat Treasure, which could deceive the Fishing Pond, be simple?

Cat Treasure's consumption of Primal Force essence as food also indicated its extraordinary nature to some extent.

However, neither the Sacred Emperor, who was a chess piece, nor Li Fan, who considered himself a chess player, had expected...

That Cat Treasure would be such a terrifying creation.

True Immortal's power, as if a True Immortal had personally arrived. Even if it was just an illusion and not its true body, it could shatter the "Immortals Descend, All Things Return to the Void" Great Formation of the Xuanhuang Realm with mere gestures. In stark contrast were the three Supreme experts from the Star Sea. Even with all their might, they could only barely survive within the immortal formation.

The gap between Supreme and True Immortal was immeasurable.

And Cat Treasure, which could swallow the True Immortal illusion in one gulp...

Its true strength was unimaginable.

In his previous life, Li Fan "Returned to Truth" when the suction force of the Immortal Ruins disappeared, the The Great Barriers crumbled, and the Star Sea became turbulent.

The instinct for survival, after the shock, briefly suppressed the fear in his heart.

It was only in this life that he fully recovered.

He felt an immense sense of dread.

He had once directly faced the True Immortal of the Immortal Ruins. Even though it was through a clone and there were many side effects after "Returning to Truth," Li Fan had ultimately succeeded.

Therefore, in his previous life, when the True Immortal descended, Li Fan, though shocked, remained calm and vigilant, not "Returning to Truth" immediately. This was precisely to glimpse more secrets about the True Immortal.

He never expected...

That the True Immortal's descent would reveal Cat Treasure's true form.

The Immortal Ruins' True Immortal, capable of destroying the Xuanhuang Realm with a single glance, did not even have time to react before being swallowed by Cat Treasure.

If Li Fan were targeted by Cat Treasure, how could he escape?

Centuries of planning, nearly annihilated in an instant, leading to eternal damnation. How could Li Fan not feel a sense of dread?

"Originally, I thought I was cautious enough."

"The waters of the Xuanhuang Realm have been largely explored. From now on, I don't need to be so apprehensive. I didn't expect that beyond the The Great Barriers, I would receive such a fright..."

Ignoring the continuously flashing information about the "Return to Truth" inheritance options, Li Fan returned to the wooden cabin.

The room was filled with small cats carved from wood. Their shapes varied, and they were lifelike.

However, they were all unfinished products with missing limbs, making it impossible to discern the original appearance of the cats from these statues.

These were all carved by Li Fan himself over the past three years.

He had not used any Spirit Qi, purely crafting them by hand.

Li Fan gazed at them for a moment, then selected another suitable piece of wood, and picked up a file placed nearby.

He began to carve with patience.

Li Fan was using the method of wood carving to confront the fear at the root of his heart, in order to eliminate the influence that Cat Treasure had on him.

It did have some effect.

The frequency with which Li Fan was awakened from his Cat Treasure nightmares had greatly decreased compared to three years ago.

But Li Fan knew clearly that it would take a long time to truly resolve this "inner demon."

He decided to take this opportunity to thoroughly review and contemplate.

In the critical moments of his previous life, the Star Sea was in turmoil. The impact of the crumbling The Great Barriers caused many powerful cultivators who had survived the world-ending immortal formation to perish, turning into dust.

At that time, at the center of the immortal formation, Li Fan's clone, utilizing the residual power of the immortal formation, vaguely sensed... that the turmoil in the Star Sea was not solely due to the collapse of the The Great Barriers.

It was also caused by the sudden descent of some entity.

Like a massive stone dropped into a deep pool, causing countless splashes. In the already turbulent Abyssal Star Sea, it stirred up monstrous waves!

This was a major change that the Abyssal Star Sea had not experienced in ten thousand years since the immortal path was severed.

In such a chaotic and perilous situation, due to his decisiveness and alertness, Li Fan had indeed "Returned to Truth" successfully.

However, the scenes he experienced during the "Return to Truth" process were different from before.

The normal phenomenon of "Returning to Truth" was that the surrounding scenery would dim, as if covered by a layer of mist, making it unclear. After "Returning to Truth" was activated, all scenes would freeze, shatter, and fly into one's mind.
