When facing an extremely strong threat, such as when the Xuanhuang Realm was destroyed by the Immortal Ruins' True Immortal's glance, or when the Faceless True Immortal came searching, these formidable beings could move within the frozen scene of "Returning to Truth." However, their speed was very slow, as if the space inside and outside of "Returning to Truth" were not the same dimension.

In his previous life, the "Return to Truth" scene experienced by Li Fan was completely different.

The scene outside of "Returning to Truth" seemed unaffected and remained frozen. However, the surrounding scene, as if wrapped in mist, flickered intermittently. It was bright and dim, like an old television losing signal.

At that moment, Li Fan's thoughts were almost blank.

He had no means to counter it and could only await his final fate as if undergoing judgment.

Fortunately, however.

The "Return to Truth" was ultimately activated successfully, and he, Li Fan, had returned to the anchor point of one year ago.

When the familiar scenery appeared before his eyes, Li Fan felt almost exhausted, breaking out in a cold sweat.

Thinking of this, Li Fan's file knife slipped, and the perfectly carved cat wooden sculpture was instantly ruined.

Li Fan threw it aside, took out another piece of wood, and began to carve.

He banished all distracting thoughts from his mind and focused with utmost seriousness.

After a statue highly similar to Cat Treasure, but missing two ears, took shape, Li Fan felt his heart calm down considerably.

He began to review his experiences from his previous life.

His greatest gain in his previous life was undoubtedly discovering Cat Treasure's existence and gaining a concrete understanding of what lay beyond the The Great Barriers.

Li Fan had previously planned to cross the The Great Barriers using the legacy left by Mr. Bai if he had the opportunity. Now, he had temporarily put aside this idea.

Although the place beyond the The Great Barriers was terrifying, its impact on Li Fan currently was not significant.

After all, judging by Cat Treasure's performance, only True Immortal-level beings were truly worthy of its attention.

Li Fan was still too far from the realm of True Immortals.

Because he was too weak, there was no need to worry unnecessarily.

Regarding the origin of the terrifying Cat Treasure, based on his experiences in his previous life, Li Fan had two hypotheses.

First, Cat Treasure was originally a creation of the unnamed Immortal who created the Fishing Pond.

It might even be an extension of the unnamed Immortal's power.

There might be more than one Fishing Pond and Cat Treasure, possibly distributed across different locations.

Their mission was to search for any remaining True Immortals in the world.

Upon discovering their traces, the unnamed Immortal would descend and devour them.

Just like the fate of the "Fish Kings" Li Fan had seen in the Fishing Pond in Cloudy Sea.

However, there was a problem with being devoured: it was because of their value.

The "Fish Kings" were divided because they were nourished by the Spirit Qi of the cultivators participating in the fishing competition. For other fish kings, they were a great supplement.

And for an unnamed Immortal who had comprehended a certain Dao and transcended, ordinary True Immortals seemed to have no value worth devouring.

"Or perhaps, the true target is True Immortals like the one from the Immortal Ruins, who have comprehended the Dao for ten thousand years and are about to ascend. They can claim the insights into the Dao as their own, embodying a second, or even more, Dao realms..."

True Immortals were already unreachable. There was very little information about unnamed True Immortals. Li Fan could only make reasonable deductions based on his past understanding of things.

Besides the possibility of Cat Treasure being an extension of the unnamed Immortal, there was a second hypothesis.

Cat Treasure appeared in the Fishing Pond because its target was precisely the unnamed Immortal who had entered the Dao through fishing!

The Fishing Pond collected treasures from the cosmos. When Cat Treasure sensed its power, it disguised itself and took the bait, actively entering the Fishing Pond. Its sole purpose was to find the unnamed Immortal behind the Fishing Pond.

As the saying goes, the angler is also being fished.

However, while bored and waiting for prey, it discovered another True Immortal, which could be considered an unexpected bonus.

From Cat Treasure's expression at the end of his previous life, it didn't seem to be picky about food.

It was also very surprised by the appearance of the Immortal Ruins' True Immortal.

The implications behind the second hypothesis were far more terrifying than the first.

After all, Li Fan had already known about the existence of unnamed Immortals.

The realm of unnamed Immortals was even higher than that of True Immortals, so instantly killing True Immortals was reasonable.

But if the second hypothesis were true...

It would mean that Cat Treasure was likely just a vanguard.

A hunter created by an extraterrestrial civilization specifically to hunt True Immortals, and even unnamed True Immortals.

Li Fan recalled the scene at the end of his previous life when Cat Treasure leaped up and went to the Immortal Ruins.

"I couldn't perceive the specific situation within. But the gradual disappearance of the Immortal Ruins' suction force already explained some facts."

"There were no combat fluctuations emanating..."

"The Immortal Ruins' True Immortal likely didn't have much time to resist before being captured."

He used the word "captured" instead of "perished" for a reason.

This was because Li Fan clearly felt the process of the Immortal Ruins' suction force slowly disappearing.

It was as if the source of the suction force was being slowly pulled into a quagmire and gradually vanishing.

Instead of the suction force instantly disappearing with the True Immortal's demise.

"If the hypothesis is correct, then the collapse of the The Great Barriers and the turmoil in the Star Sea are proof that the forces behind Cat Treasure descended to capture True Immortals."

"The forces that could create such a creation as Cat Treasure must have developed to an unimaginable degree beyond the The Great Barriers."

"Capturing True Immortals must be profitable."

Li Fan pondered as he placed another newly carved cat statue.

His heart calmed down a bit more.

After the fear was dispelled, Li Fan's thoughts turned to another idea: "Actually, if I think about it carefully, Cat Treasure's discovery is not entirely bad for me."

"At the very least, I now have a means to restrain True Immortals. I have the capital to flip the table if we disagree."

"Unlike before, when a True Immortal descended, I could only resort to a hasty 'Return to Truth'."

Li Fan's eyes flickered, "The only thing to be cautious of is the exposure of 'Return to Truth'."

"Judging from the scenes experienced during the 'Return to Truth' at the end of my previous life, the civilization behind Cat Treasure actually gained the power to influence 'Return to Truth'."

"It wasn't a direct effect on me like the power of a True Immortal, thus influencing the activation of 'Return to Truth'."

"But it truly affected 'Return to Truth' itself."

"Even if it was just a slight fluctuation in the 'Return to Truth' scene..."

"If I want to borrow Cat Treasure's power, it is unavoidable that I will have to use clones."

Thinking of this, Li Fan couldn't help but frown slightly.

In his previous life, his main body remained motionless within the Dharma Deduction space.

He had differentiated into multiple individuals to scheme in secret.

The clone Sacred Emperor, the Sacred Embryo, multiple spiritual manifestations...

Although overall there were no major problems, there were minor instances of loss of control.

For example, the clone Sacred Emperor displayed a high moral standard. Although Li Fan had imposed this setting on him when creating him, it led to an irreconcilable conflict with the main body. Later, he completely severed contact with the main body.

This severed the main body's perception, and Li Fan was unable to know some details during the battles against Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians.

Another example was that the spiritual manifestation's mental stability was inferior to both the main body and the clones. Its emotional fluctuations were sometimes too extreme, completely contrary to the main body's.

Although Li Fan could completely control the actions of the spiritual manifestation, he could not completely prevent this loss of mental control.

Besides the fact that the spiritual manifestation was merely a divine thought and too weak on its own...

Li Fan also vaguely sensed the fundamental reason for the spiritual manifestation's extreme emotional volatility in his previous life.

It was the Azure Nether Heart Refining Incantation!

First, the Sacred Embryo imparted the Azure Nether Heart Refining Incantation to the Azure Profound Army guarding the Chizha Abyss.

Then, the Sacred Emperor bestowed the Heart Incantation upon the Great Qi Imperial Army.

The number of beings cultivating this technique exceeded one hundred thousand.

Initially, Li Fan didn't think that widely spreading the Heart Incantation would have any impact on him.

However, the reality proved him wrong.

The Azure Nether Heart Refining Incantation had accompanied him since he stepped onto the immortal path.

As he cultivated it instinctively, it had already merged with him, becoming an intrinsic part of him.

When he disseminated it externally, the Heart Refining Incantation's ability to maintain mental stability was consequently affected.

Chapter 1304: The Changes of Return to Truth (7K, Seeking Monthly Votes!)

Li Fan should not have been able to embark on the path of cultivation.

When he left the Great Xuan to go to Glazed Island, the mere act of expelling the Celestial-Mortal Miasma from his body almost completely severed his cultivation path.

Fortunately, with the dual blessings of the Azure Nether Heart Refining Incantation and the Cleansing Spiritual Pool, he was able to formally begin cultivating.

As he shed his corporeal miasma, the Azure Nether Heart Refining Incantation officially transformed into the Azure Nether Heart Refining Incantation.

The Azure Nether Incantation thus became his unique Dao foundation, accompanying him throughout his cultivation journey.

The higher Li Fan's cultivation became, the more his Azure Nether Incantation Dao foundation expanded. It was like a series of pillars, becoming a vital component supporting Li Fan's cultivation.

In his previous life, when Li Fan widely disseminated the Azure Nether Immortal Heart Incantation, the consequence was that these Dao foundation pillars...

Became thinned and weakened due to extensive separation.

His true self's Dao foundation was not solely the Azure Nether Immortal Heart Incantation; it also included [Return to Truth] and the accumulated knowledge and experience from a hundred lifetimes of reincarnation. Therefore, the impact on him was minimal.

However, the negative effects of this extraction were naturally amplified in his clones and spiritual manifestations. This was especially true for the weaker separated entities.

He was not the only one affected by the widespread dissemination of the Immortal Heart Incantation.

Even the Immortal Heart Incantation itself, due to this propagation, had its efficacy weakened by more than a notch.

This could be seen from the performance of the Azure Profound Army and the Great Qi Imperial Army, who cultivated the Immortal Heart Incantation in his previous life, during their great battles.

They managed to remain calm in the face of danger, but they were far from the true Immortal Heart Incantation's [Experiencing a thousand tribulations of a lifetime, yet the Immortal Heart remains unchanged]!

The gap became even more apparent when Li Fan, through Return to Truth, returned to this lifetime and claimed the Immortal Heart Incantation solely for himself.

"Laws cannot be cultivated simultaneously..."

"It seems that it's not just the Heavenly Dao of the Xuanhuang Realm that suppresses the sudden evolution of cultivators. It is deeply ingrained in the depths of the Xuanhuang Realm, originating from some tradition in the Immortal Realm."

"Hmm, perhaps it's not just related to the inability to cultivate laws simultaneously. It's also closely related to the position of the Great Heavenly Venerate of Azure Nether."

Undoubtedly, the Immortal Heart Incantation, which Mr. Bai had passed down to the world to counteract and reverse the paradoxical forces of the Xuanhuang Realm, should have originated from the Great Heavenly Venerate of Azure Nether.

The Great Heavenly Venerate of Azure Nether, appointed by the Immortal Realm, wielded Immortal Artifacts and oversaw the Xuanhuang Realm.

Within the Xuanhuang Realm, he possessed supreme authority.

However, becoming a Heavenly Venerate of the Immortal Realm was not an easy task.

Not only did he have a colleague, the [Monitor], who secretly constrained him, but inheriting the position of Heavenly Venerate also meant inheriting the Immortal Realm's restraints and punishments for the Great Heavenly Venerate of Azure Nether.

After returning to this lifetime through Return to Truth, Li Fan recalled Sun Tianci, who had been burned to ashes by the Heart-Burning Fire, when he reviewed everything.

"Even though the Immortal Path is now severed, the Immortal Realm's countermeasures are still effective."

"The widespread dissemination of the Immortal Heart Incantation being impossible is likely one of the Immortal Realm's many restrictions on the Great Heavenly Venerate of Azure Nether."

Li Fan also remembered what happened after Sun Tianci successfully succeeded to the position in his previous life.

"The Great Sun Golden Bell, the Mount Taixu Azure Nether Lamp, the Purple Qi Dream-Weaving Shuttle, and the Primordial Five Elements Disk."

These four were the only remaining Immortal Artifacts from the Great Heavenly Venerate of Azure Nether's inheritance in the Xuanhuang Realm.

There was also a condensed mass of immortal Spirit Qi, originating from the Immortal Artifacts that Mr. Bai had detonated.

"After completing the trial of the Fallen Immortal Realm, there is still a probationary period before truly becoming the Great Heavenly Venerate of Azure Nether."

"Before the Immortal Path was severed, this probationary period was essentially the time waiting for the Immortal Realm's review and appointment."

"After the Immortal Path was severed, the Immortal Realm's appointment became a mere formality. However, according to the Immortal Realm's established procedure, if there was no response from the Immortal Realm within three years, the review would be considered automatically passed. Generally speaking, as long as nothing like the destruction of the Xuanhuang Realm occurred, like what Sun Tianci encountered, one only needed to wait for time to pass to obtain the full authority of the Great Heavenly Venerate."

"And before that..."

He could not wield any of the Immortal Artifacts within the Great Heavenly Venerate's inheritance. This was one of the reasons why Sun Tianci was so easily swayed by Li Fan's spiritual manifestation in his previous life.

Facing the oppressive Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate, the newly appointed Great Heavenly Venerate of Azure Nether was truly incapable of resisting.

"According to Sun Tianci, these Immortal Artifacts bestowed by the Upper Realm had no artifact spirits within them. The lower-realm Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate, lacking immortal spiritual power, could only drive them by relying on the restrictions left by the Immortal Realm and consuming the artifacts' own power."

"In a sense, they were consumables. When Mr. Bai collected them back then, these Immortal Artifacts had already been used countless times. It was difficult to say how much power they had left."

"However, they are Immortal Artifacts. Leaving them unused in the depths of the Fallen Immortal Realm would be like treasures gathering dust. In this life, I still need to retrieve them, not to mention that mass of pure immortal Spirit Qi."

Li Fan's firsthand experience of erecting a world-ending Immortal Formation with immortal Spirit Qi allowed him to truly comprehend the power and transcendence of an [Immortal].

In his sea of consciousness, the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc emitted an unusual seven-colored radiance.

Within the radiant light, true [Immortal Formations] were being deduced incessantly.

The birth of Immortal Formations, their operation, their destruction.

During the world-ending process of the Myriad Spirits Return to Numbers Great Formation in his previous life, the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc had collected a sufficient amount of formation data. As if it had truly undergone a transformation from mortal to immortal, it could now deduce Immortal Formations according to Li Fan's needs, just as it deduced mortal formations.

Even though the deduction speed was extremely slow and the burden on the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc was very high, under the systematic arrangement of its simulated personality, it would not affect Li Fan's normal cultivation.

Currently, the main direction of deduction for the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc's Immortal Formations was the downgrading of Immortal Formations.

This was to slightly reduce the formation's power and enable it to be driven by slightly weaker energy.

There was a difference between mortals and immortals. Li Fan could not create immortal spiritual power on a large scale. Even if he could obtain some from the Great Heavenly Venerate's inheritance, it would not be enough to support his plans for this lifetime.

However, the Essence of Primal Force, which was infinitely close to immortal spiritual power, was practically inexhaustible for Li Fan.

If he could drive Immortal Formations with the Essence of Primal Force, it would undoubtedly save him a lot of trouble.

Even if the Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians returned to the Xuanhuang Realm, he would still be able to handle them with ease.

He would no longer need to painstakingly create a Sacred Emperor clone to contend with them.

In his previous life, Li Fan had clearly seen the true strength of the Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians in the battle after the Sacred Emperor's physical body was annihilated.

With a predetermined strength contrast, he could have a clear grasp when creating Immortal Formations.

"As long as I don't push them into a corner, with Immortal Formations as a guarantee, it shouldn't be difficult to invite them to sit down and talk properly."

The transparent figure that appeared after the Doctrine Transmitter's physical body was annihilated flashed through Li Fan's mind.

At that time, amidst the world-ending storm, it was extremely chaotic, and he couldn't see clearly.

However, he vaguely sensed a familiar aura from the transparent figure.

"If there's an opportunity in this life, perhaps I can verify it."

When True Immortals descended, everything in the Xuanhuang Realm was like an ant.

With Cat Treasure's leap, even a True Immortal's phantom was not beyond its grasp.

The difference between the Xuanhuang Realm and the world beyond the The Great Barrier was evident.

But this did not mean that everything within the Xuanhuang Realm had lost its value.

When Li Fan was a mortal Grand Tutor, the gap between him and the longevity of the Xuanhuang Realm was the same as the current gap between the Xuanhuang Realm and the outside of the The Great Barrier.

However, after reincarnating one hundred and twenty-six times, the former mortal Grand Tutor could already use the longevity of the Xuanhuang Realm as a pawn.

Even if beings outside the The Great Barrier could hunt True Immortals, so what?

Give him another one hundred and twenty-six lifetimes, and Li Fan might be able to use True Immortals as pawns as well!

However, the outside of the The Great Barrier was, for the time being, a complete unknown to Li Fan.

With his current strength, he was not yet capable of venturing beyond the The Great Barrier.

Therefore, everything had to proceed step by step, according to the plan.

...

While contemplating this, Li Fan completed the carving of another Cat Treasure statue.

His divine sense swept over it, and in three years, he had carved a total of nine thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine wooden carvings.

They filled the wooden hut, further constricting the already not-so-spacious area.

A spark suddenly erupted from Li Fan's finger, and he flicked it towards the pile of Cat Treasure wooden carvings.

*Boom!*

The spark flared up, instantly turning into a raging inferno.

However, it only burned the Cat Treasure wooden carvings and did not spread within the wooden hut.

The wooden carvings perished in the flames, leaving no black smoke, not even ashes.

In an instant, these nine thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine wooden carvings were engulfed by the fire and disappeared completely from the world.

As if they had never existed.

Li Fan quietly watched the great fire slowly extinguish.

The images of countless Cat Treasures reflected in his eyes also gradually disappeared with the dying flames.

After standing silently for a long time, Li Fan shifted his gaze.

He looked at the Return to Truth panel.

The light flickered, reflecting familiar characters.

...

[This simulation has ended]

[You can choose one of the following options to retain:

1. One item currently held by yourself in this simulation.

2. Your cultivation realm in this simulation.

3. The simulated memories of a person closely related to yourself in this simulation. This memory can be inherited by that person.

4. Forgo the above choices and speed up the recharge progress.]

After this paragraph of text, which he had read countless times, he saw a brand new prompt.

Li Fan's gaze narrowed.

[New variable interference detected, an additional option can be chosen for this simulation to retain]

Compared to the previous paragraphs, this line of text was slightly different.

Instead, it was like the scene Li Fan had seen at the end of Return to Truth in his previous life.

It flickered intermittently, with a much faster frequency than the normal Return to Truth reminders.

And the ability to choose two items to retain was unprecedented.

"New variable interference..."

He had already waited for three years, so he was not in a hurry. Li Fan, as before, did not make a choice immediately.

Instead, he carefully considered and savored this reminder from Return to Truth.

Ever since he discovered that he could devour Heavenly and Earthly Marvels and Grotto-heaven Worlds to increase Return to Truth's anchor recharge progress, Li Fan knew that [Return to Truth] seemed to grow like something that eats, by devouring objects that were useful to it.

Heavenly and Earthly Marvels, Grotto-heaven Worlds, even Eternal Residual Wills, and Li Fan's own experiences...

All fell within the scope of objects that [Return to Truth] was interested in.

Of course, once [Return to Truth] devoured them, it would no longer be interested.

So Li Fan was very sure that even if he encountered forces from outside the The Great Barrier again in this life, if there were no other substantial gains, Return to Truth's reward would not appear again.

Li Fan did not care much about this extra choice.

As long as he wanted it, he could obtain it by simply reincarnating one more lifetime.

What Li Fan truly cared about was [Return to Truth]'s attitude.

Previously, without exception, only when [Return to Truth] genuinely benefited did it provide a reward.

But this time, it was being so generous and giving an extra reward simply upon sensing a so-called new interference variable...

This sudden generosity, in Li Fan's opinion, was an undeniable temptation.

It was guiding and alluring Li Fan towards exploring beyond the The Great Barrier.

It undoubtedly foreshadowed that beyond the The Great Barrier, there must exist objects that [Return to Truth] was extremely interested in, or even extremely useful to.

As his fundamental trump card for growth, if Return to Truth could undergo any change, Li Fan would be the biggest beneficiary.

Therefore, Li Fan could not help but feel a stir in his heart.

But just like his previous decision, the outside of the The Great Barrier was fraught with peril, and he needed to plan meticulously.

"It is difficult for me alone to step beyond the The Great Barrier."

"But the Xuanhuang Realm has proven its potential through multiple cycles of reincarnation."

"With the help of the countless beings of the Xuanhuang Realm, it will undoubtedly be much easier for me."

The first step to leaving the Abyssal Sea was to be able to cross the The Great Barrier.

Just this prerequisite alone would likely require Li Fan to make multiple attempts.

After all, the The Great Barrier had trapped the beings of the Abyssal Sea for ten thousand years, and Mr. Bai's plan to detonate immortal Spirit Qi to cross the The Great Barrier was merely a guess.

In the star sea, there were legends of the Heavenly Sword Sect, the Demon Race, and even the Myriad Immortal Sects who had crossed realms and left, but there was no substantial evidence to prove their success.

If, during the ten thousand years of the severed Immortal Path and the towering The Great Barrier, any force in the Abyssal Sea had truly crossed the The Great Barrier...

Then it would likely be only...

The [Merchant Immortal Boat].

Li Fan's mind flashed with the astonished expression of the Sacred Embryo when he learned this from Ai Tianjue in his previous life.

"They planned to pilot the Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat to ram the The Great Barrier, attempting to break out of this star sea," Ai Tianjue said with an unexplainable tone.

After his astonishment, the Sacred Embryo couldn't help but ask, "Then did the Merchant Immortal Boat succeed?"

Ai Tianjue was silent for a long time before saying with a complex expression, "If they had not succeeded, why would the Mystic Heavenly Boat consider the name [Merchant Immortal Boat] a taboo for thousands of years?"

"Did... did they succeed?" The Sacred Embryo was endlessly astonished, his heart trembling inexplicably.

"The Mystic Merchant Immortal Boat and the Mystic Heavenly Boat were originally one. They could still sense each other, whether they were completely destroyed during the collision or had successfully escaped."

"The Merchant Immortal Boat still exists, and it is beyond the The Great Barrier," Ai Tianjue sighed.

"Precisely because of the Merchant Immortal Boat's success, our Mystic Heavenly Boat clearly recognized the power of [Immortals], which might be the only way to escape this Abyssal Sea. But during the prosperous era of the star sea, searching for Immortal Artifacts was already extremely difficult, let alone after the destruction of the star sea."

"Fortunately, after the great tribulation, the entire shattered star sea was filled with residual power from True Immortal Sigils. Only then did our Mystic Heavenly Boat begin to research this power."

...

Everything within the Mystic Heavenly Boat flashed through Li Fan's mind.

"The Merchant Immortal Boat still exists. It is beyond the The Great Barrier."

Li Fan repeatedly savored this sentence.

He did not believe that Ai Tianjue would have lied to him in such a desperate life-or-death situation in his previous life.

Therefore, the escape of the Merchant Immortal Boat should be true.

"The Mystic Merchant Immortal Boats can still sense each other."

"If a method to cross the The Great Barrier is found, I can go to the Merchant Immortal Boat by relying on this sense."

"With the Merchant Immortal Boat as a bridgehead, it should be much easier to establish a foothold beyond the The Great Barrier."

Due to their initial division, the Mystic Heavenly Boat did not possess any information that could help traverse the The Great Barrier.

What was valuable within the Mystic Heavenly Boat was likely the secret treasure called [Hundred Heard Immortal Record] and the research on True Immortal Sigils.

"Azure Nether, Immortal Boats."

"Using these two realms as power, I shall forge a bridge over the The Great Barrier."

"Then I will drive the beings of the Xuanhuang Realm to explore the path ahead for me."

Li Fan faintly devised a plan in his heart.

With this goal as a phased endpoint, there was still much for Li Fan to do.

First, improve his own strength.

Even with Immortal Formations protecting him in the future, the Soul Transformation realm during the Changes of Azure Nether's Birth would be somewhat strained. Li Fan urgently needed to enhance his strength to confront the Dharma-Preachers, Heavenly Physicians, True Immortals, and even the forces beyond the The Great Barrier.

The battle between the Sacred Emperor and the Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians in his previous life had made him clearly see the future path.

Like the Sacred Emperor, relying on the luck of the Sacred Dynasty and the favor of the Heavenly Dao, was ultimately inferior to the Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians, whose power returned to themselves. Although they had also reached the upper limit that this star sea could bear, it was clear that the actual combat power of the Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians surpassed the Sacred Emperor by more than a degree.

"I am still under the constraint of the Doctrine Transmitter's new law. Cultivating in the star sea may not be suitable for me."

"The most practical method..."

Li Fan's eyes flickered: "Immortal power is diffused, Azure Nether is elevated. The Heavenly and Earthly Immortal Souls shall merge with my soul and body."

In his previous life, the Sacred Emperor's Method of Heaven and Earth, teaching the new law to all beings, seemed to directly point to the Great Dao.

Establish Foundation with Self, Primordial Golden Core, Physical Nascent Soul, Mind Manifesting Soul Transformation, Star Sea Dao Integration...

And the final [Resonating Dao, Longevity], truly made his heart surge with excitement.

In the first three years of this lifetime, every time Li Fan recalled it, he felt its endless mysteries.

But it was still the same problem.

The new law, though good, was only theoretically feasible. In fact, there was not a single cultivator in the world who could truly cultivate to the Primordial Golden Core realm according to the new law...

Li Fan, possessing the wondrous item [Return to Truth], found even the first step, [Establish Foundation with Self], to be as difficult as ascending to heaven.

Let alone the higher realms that followed.

In comparison, the methods of the Dharma-Preachers were more suitable for Li Fan.

The reason why cultivators of the new law lamented, "The immortal path ahead cannot be trodden, and the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate is above," was because the ceiling for cultivators of the new law in the Xuanhuang Realm at that time was fixed.

Even the Longevity realm was unable to make much of a splash in the entire Abyssal Sea.

But today was different from yesterday.

Through the thousands of years of continuous hard work by the Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians, the two supreme beings of the star sea, the Xuanhuang Realm today had gathered the essence of all surviving fragmented realms in the star sea.

Not only had its scale expanded dozens of times, but in his previous life, driven by immortal spiritual power, Li Fan had also seen the majestic vitality hidden in the depths of various prefectures, waiting to erupt.

As the Heavenly Physician's plan for his future homeland,

The potential of the Xuanhuang Realm had never been truly unleashed.

Although the current Dao Integration cultivators in the Xuanhuang Realm had limited strength, the Xuanhuang Realm after its sublimation might not necessarily be so.

"The blue is bluer than the blue, and the ice water is colder than the water," Li Fan gently chanted.

"Who says the power of a Grand Tutor cannot be equal to that of an Emperor?"

After the Xuanhuang Realm was nourished by True Immortal power and underwent sublimation, the Heavenly Laws, and everything nurtured by the world, would transform.

In his previous life, Li Fan had clearly witnessed this process.

"This is only because most of the immortal power was used for the [Myriad Spirits Return to Numbers] Great Formation. If all the immortal power were fed back to catalyze the Xuanhuang Realm, the Heavenly and Earthly Essence born would undoubtedly be unprecedentedly strong..."

"With this, perhaps I could even master immortal power when I reach Dao Integration," Li Fan secretly deduced.

Before Li Fan, all cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm, except the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate, were drawing from the Xuanhuang Realm's sustenance.

Their cultivation and foundation were all built upon the Xuanhuang Realm.

No matter how they refined the principles of heaven and earth, they could not exceed the power limit that the Xuanhuang Realm itself could provide.

What Li Fan intended to do was to first cause the Xuanhuang Realm's limit to skyrocket, and then proceed with Dao Integration.

"Even the uncontrollable sublimation of the Xuanhuang Realm might shake the foundation of the Doctrine Transmitter..." Li Fan's gaze flickered as he deduced something.

Still using the analogy of the prison from before.

The Longevity cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm dismantled the prison's beams and replaced them, integrating themselves into the prison.

What Li Fan intended to do was to expand this prison.

Once its size had multiplied several times, he would then replace them.

The Doctrine Transmitter indeed had almost complete control over the old prison. But if the prison's area suddenly expanded several times...

He would face the risk of the Xuanhuang Realm's loss of control.

"This plan has another benefit."

"With my understanding of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, as long as I do not reveal the intention to use the Heavenly and Earthly Essence for Dao Integration at any moment, it will not be hostile towards me. It may even secretly help."

"After all, I am helping it complete its sublimation."

"And with the assistance of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, I can fool the Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians outside the star sea without anyone noticing."

"By the time they realize something is wrong and want to return, the Immortal Formations I have already laid out will be enough to block them."

...

Li Fan pondered the plan for a moment and nodded slightly.

Apart from improving his own realm, enhancing his combat power could also be achieved through external forces.

For example: True Immortal Sigils.

In his previous life, on the Mystic Heavenly Boat, Li Fan comprehended five entirely new True Immortal Sigils characters.

Although they were not complete True Immortal Sigils characters, but rather imitations and restorations by the cultivators of the Immortal Boat, they were sufficient to deal with the supreme beings of the star sea.

In reality, Li Fan's greatest gain from the True Immortal Sigils in his previous life did not come from the Mystic Heavenly Boat.

It came from the Dharma Deduction Jade.

The True Immortal Sigils in the Dharma Deduction Jade's memory, unlike the pure destructive power permeating the star sea.

Li Fan's heart stirred, and he teleported outside Dissolution Mountain, above the sea of clouds.

Although he only had the cultivation of the Foundation Establishment stage, his physical and Spirit Qi condensed.

Using his hand as a brush, he wrote it in a single stroke.

An extremely profound character disintegrated the moment it appeared.

This was because the cultivation of the Foundation Establishment stage was insufficient to support it in displaying its power.

However, the instant this True Immortal Sigils character appeared in the world.

A thunderclap suddenly echoed throughout the Great Xuan's pocket world.

There were no dark clouds, but a rain descended, covering the entire pocket world.

The harsh winter, under the nourishment of the rain, gradually became as warm as spring.

Li Fan even sensed wisps of Spirit Qi in the world, appearing from nowhere.

Unlike being artificially created by the Dao One Insect.

Although this Spirit Qi was dilute, it was the pocket world's own evolution.

Li Fan, suspended high in the sky, watched the changes in the Great Xuan's pocket world in the rain.

What astonished him even more was that the Heavenly Dao consciousness of the Great Xuan's pocket world seemed to be gestating.

Because there was no Spirit Qi, the Great Xuan had no Heavenly Dao consciousness before; or rather, the Great Xuan Heavenly Dao consciousness was extremely weak, so weak that even Li Fan could not sense it.

However, under the True Immortal Sigils character he had casually written, the Great Xuan's pocket world had undergone changes in just a few days that might have taken thousands or tens of thousands of years to accumulate.

"Where does this power of evolution come from?"

Li Fan's gaze swept across the Great Xuan's heaven and earth, but he could not find its origin.

"There was no forcing the growth, no overdrafting the pocket world's potential."

"It seemed to arise from nowhere..."

"Perhaps this can be called [Creation]?"

Li Fan was slightly stunned.

The True Immortal Sigils character re-emerged in his mind.

"[Creation]..."

He repeated these two words in his heart.

The True Immortal Sigils seemed to come alive, wandering and shifting spontaneously.

It became slightly different from his memory.

However, it was still far from its true form.

"[Creation]!"

A sharp glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

An unstoppable urge to continue exploring the secret of [Creation] welled up in his heart.

But soon, Li Fan remembered something, and his eyes regained clarity.

He directly suppressed his greed.

"It is usable."

"But to try and comprehend it..."

"May lead to unknown dangers."

A hint of understanding flashed in Li Fan's mind.

This True Immortal Sigils character, which might be called [Creation], was clearly even more precious than characters like [Chaos] and [Starvation]. Even True Immortals were desperately fighting for it in the memories of the Dharma Deduction Jade.

Even though the Immortal Path was severed, Li Fan could not guarantee that there wasn't a True Immortal somewhere in the star sea.

Comprehending this Dao.

The strength of whoever snatched the Dao of [Creation] and claimed it as their own in the True Immortal war back then could be imagined.

A mere The Great Barrier likely couldn't stop them.

Having witnessed the great terror beyond the The Great Barrier of the star sea, Li Fan became increasingly cautious.

Even if it was a hypothetical enemy that was very likely non-existent, Li Fan harbored no侥幸.

"If the Xuanhuang Realm's transformation is aided by the power of [Creation]."

Li Fan looked down at the Great Xuan's pocket world, which was undergoing drastic changes in the present moment, and a vision of the Xuanhuang Realm in the near future seemed to appear before his eyes.

If True Immortal Sigils was the ultimate external force Li Fan could rely on.

Then the limit of Li Fan's own divine abilities still rested on [Return to Truth].

"When the true becomes false, the false also becomes true."

Besides being able to create the [Simulated Personality], a virtually omnipotent artifact spirit, Li Fan's greatest inspiration came from the [Transformation of True and False].

At this moment, he had not yet inherited his cultivation.

But in Li Fan's sea of consciousness, a Soul Transformation cultivation that he had once possessed, cultivated using the changes in the Xuanhuang Realm's destruction as material, appeared.

Silently recalling and comprehending.

It was as if those cultivations had not disappeared with the activation of [Return to Truth].

Standing motionless in mid-air for an unknown period.

Suddenly, Li Fan opened his eyes.

A powerful aura descended upon him instantly.

The Great Xuan's pocket world seemed to sense something, and heaven and earth trembled.

But the anomaly lasted only for a moment.

Soon, the anomaly disappeared.

The clouds were faint, and everything was as if it had never happened.

Li Fan, however, showed a smile.

Chapter 1305

“True transforms into false, and false also becomes true.”

“The change of true and false, infinitely wondrous!”

Li Fan chanted again in his heart, overjoyed. Although it only lasted for a fleeting moment, he had indeed conjured his Nascent Soul cultivation from his previous life out of thin air. However, as this was his first attempt at this great divine ability, the summoned cultivation disappeared like a dream and illusion the moment it appeared.

Li Fan was not disheartened by this, and his joy remained boundless. To create something from nothingness, even legendary True Immortals might not be able to achieve it. Yet, he had taken the initial steps thanks to the insights gained from multiple "Return to Truth" simulations. As the saying goes, the beginning is always the hardest. With this first success, he was sure to become more familiar with the application of this divine ability in the future.

“Not only my own cultivation. The items I once experienced and owned, and even… entire different individuals, the Xuanhuang Realm, the Abyssal Sea, and everything beyond the The Great Barrier. One day, all of them can be recreated by my single thought!”

Li Fan stood on the sea of clouds, reliving the sensations of using the "True-False Transformation," his heart surging with emotion. After a long while, he finally returned to his senses from his enlightenment. He looked at the inheritance options on the Return to Truth panel and first chose to inherit his cultivation.

The same scene unfolded again, with the Great Xuan sky rumbling. This was the anomaly caused by Li Fan’s Nascent Soul cultivation being poured into the pocket world. However, compared to the scene of him inheriting his cultivation in his previous life, the Great Xuan pocket world in this life, due to the world's transformation caused by the "Creation" True Immortal Sigils earlier, did not show signs of being overwhelmed. Only dark clouds gathered, and strange phenomena arose.

“Hoo…” As the familiar power of cultivation returned to his body, Li Fan let out a long sigh. Next, his gaze locked onto the second inheritance choice. The option to inherit cultivation had dimmed, leaving only options 1, 3, and 4. Without hesitation, Li Fan chose to inherit items.

The items he had possessed in his previous life, including his Nascent Soul clones, instantly appeared in Li Fan’s mind, awaiting his quiet selection. His gaze swept over them, and after a moment of contemplation, it settled on a seemingly ordinary white circle. This white circle, before it was fished up, was not yet completely separated from Li Fan’s main body by the Sacred Emperor, and thus was considered an item he had once owned.

After confirming his choice, a light flashed in his hand, finally condensing into a simple white circle. It felt slightly cool to the touch, and upon scanning it with his divine sense, he detected no Spirit Qi fluctuations. It seemed to be a transformation from "Return to Truth," requiring no refinement or master recognition. As he held the white circle, Li Fan already felt the sensation of being able to use it freely, and that outsiders could not snatch it away.

Li Fan looked at the name of the white circle displayed on the Return to Truth panel. “Falling Mortal Dust.” He stroked the white circle, murmuring the three words, his mind pondering the correct method of its use.

“Go!” Li Fan tossed the white circle towards the Dissolution Mountain below. With a thought, the white circle grew in the wind and instantly enveloped the entire mountaintop. Then, it began to descend. As the white circle landed, the mountainside it had encircled crumbled and disappeared before Li Fan’s eyes, transforming into Spirit Qi and dissipating into the Great Xuan world.

Thousands of feet of Dissolution Mountain vanished into thin air. Countless living beings inhabiting the mountain, due to the sudden disappearance of their home, began to fall uncontrollably from the sky. If not for the Spirit Qi rising from the dissolving mountain, which was held by the white circle, holding them up, Dissolution Mountain would have instantly turned into a hellscape. Perhaps this area could now be called the "Dissolution Circle." The ground was as if it had been cleanly shaved by a knife, smooth as a mirror. The creatures of Dissolution Mountain, having lost their homes, fled in panic due to primal fear. In a short while, the once vibrant Dissolution Mountain became a forbidden zone for life.

Li Fan took a deep breath,鲸吸 (whalesucking - a metaphor for absorbing rapidly) all the Spirit Qi obtained from the decomposition into his body. This bit of Spirit Qi was negligible to him now; it was mainly for analyzing the Spirit Qi of the "Falling Mortal Dust" white circle and comparing it to ordinary worldly energy. After careful consideration, Li Fan concluded that there was no difference. The Spirit Qi even felt incredibly familiar to Li Fan, as if it had naturally originated from the Great Xuan pocket world.

“It is clearly the energy from material decomposition, yet on the Return to Truth panel, it bears the name ‘Falling Mortal Dust’…”

“Falling Mortal Dust…”

“Perhaps, this should be a treasure specifically designed to punish immortal artifacts,” Li Fan suddenly realized. “In my previous life, the Sacred Emperor’s clone didn’t have the chance to test it much. In this life, perhaps I can use those near-immortal artifacts from the Xuanhuang Realm to verify my guess.”

Putting away the white circle, Li Fan looked down. In broad daylight, Dissolution Mountain had vanished into thin air. For ordinary mortals, this would undoubtedly be a terrifying event beyond imagination. Believing it to be a divine punishment, the mortals below Dissolution Mountain, in their fear, had spontaneously begun organizing sacrifices. They dared not approach the giant circle on the ground, only praying outside its perimeter.

Among these people, Li Fan, as expected, saw Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba, his former disciples. With a flick of his finger, a figure descended from the sky, landing on the mortal realm. The figure bore a seven-tenths resemblance to Li Fan, but with a long beard and white hair, and attire somewhat similar to that of a Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate.

“Look quickly, an immortal!”

The common folk immediately knelt on the ground. The figure waved a large hand, and the kneeling mortals rose again. The figure sat cross-legged in the air, chanting incantations and preaching the Dao to the surrounding mortals. All the Spirit Qi generated by the Great Xuan pocket world’s transformation was drawn to this spot, forming a visible vortex above the Dissolution Circle. Li Fan used this Spirit Qi to casually set up a formation, and in a short time, a miniature formation for expelling the miasma from the bodies of mortals took shape.

Under the dual effect of the figure’s preaching and the formation, in just the time it takes to brew a cup of tea, some of the mortals below who were listening had already completed the miasma purification. Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba were naturally among them. Within the Dissolution Circle, the ground rumbled, and the places where these beings, having completed the first step of cultivation, were located began to flow like water. They were gathered in one spot, and then slowly ascended, rising up. Thus, these people moved closer to the Immortal Master preaching from above.

The figure preached for a full seven days. Within those seven days, those who successfully drew in Qi and reached the Qi Refining stage continued to ascend, forming distinct steps like terraces. After seven days, the figure transformed into an escape light and flew away. A thought simultaneously flashed through the minds of all present: the Immortal Master’s preaching would continue in a month. The crowd was greatly shaken. Even the dullest individual realized this was an immense opportunity. Thus, the news of the Immortal Master's preaching spread like wildfire. At a terrifying speed, it propagated throughout the Great Xuan.

And within the Dissolution Circle, people also discovered the various marvels of this “Preaching Platform.” The Preaching Platform was the respectful term the mortals listening to the Immortal Master’s teachings gave to the Dissolution Circle. Within it, different tiers were formed based on individual cultivation, with higher cultivation leading to higher seating. Each person’s position was fixed and could not be exchanged or contested. Sitting on the Preaching Platform, even after the Immortal Master’s figure departed, one could still meditate and gain profound insights.

At the highest tier of the Preaching Platform, a luminous platform could vaguely be seen floating above. Engraved on the platform were the names of various cultivation techniques. While sitting on the Preaching Platform, with a mere thought, one could access the specific information about these techniques. Each cultivator could choose one to practice. Once someone made a selection, the name of the technique on the luminous platform would disappear, transforming into a beam of light that entered the cultivator's sea of consciousness.

Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba, looking at the thousands of cultivation technique names, were almost overwhelmed. “Erlang, which one do you think I should choose?” Wang Xuanba asked, scratching his head. “Don't rush. There are so many techniques, take your time. By the time people from other regions hear about this and arrive, it will take at least a few days. However, once you choose, you can only change it when you reach the next realm, so you must be cautious,” Sun Erlang analyzed calmly, not blinking an eye.

…

Above the Dao Discussion Platform, the preaching figure had never actually left. It had merely concealed its form, unseen by the crowd below. The cultivation techniques here were all obtained from the Dharma Deduction little萝莉 in the previous life. The mimicked personality deduced techniques, which Li Fan then recorded. At the anchor point of three years, these techniques had not yet been deduced by the Dharma Deduction little萝莉, so there was no need to worry about the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s Law Enforcement Hall’s vigilance. The backlog accumulated by the Dharma Deduction little萝莉 in the previous life was enough for Li Fan to use for a long time.

“In this life, I shall be the ‘Teacher of Heaven and Earth.’ I will spread the Dao throughout the Azure Nether, beginning with the Great Xuan.” The illusory preaching figure, sitting in the air, thought this as it watched the masses rushing from all directions of the Great Xuan. Controlling the Spirit Qi circulation of the Preaching Platform, Li Fan slightly expanded the range of the white circle on the ground.

…

The illusory figure silently preached, igniting the small flame of “Teacher of Heaven and Earth.” Meanwhile, Li Fan’s main body arrived deep beneath the Great Xuan. Since this life's plan was to achieve Dao Integration by merging with the Heavenly and Earthly Essence of the super Xuanhuang Realm, he naturally had to stimulate the Xuanhuang Realm’s potential to its extreme. Besides the Immortal Spiritual Power, the hidden power of the scattered realms, and the Creation Immortal Talisman, pushing the affiliated pocket worlds to return to the Xuanhuang Realm, achieving the unification of all realms, could also be a significant aid. After all, even the smallest ant is still a creature. Especially after Li Fan had used the "Creation" True Immortal Sigils to first achieve the sublimation and transformation of each pocket world, the return of all realms would undoubtedly be a considerable nourishing force for the Xuanhuang Realm. After all, the stronger the Xuanhuang Realm became in the future, the stronger the Heavenly and Earthly Essence it would nurture. This would be even more beneficial to Li Fan.

“The affiliated worlds, propelled by the Void-Cracking Whales and evolving for thousands of years, have drifted far from the Xuanhuang Realm’s main body. They are only connected to the Xuanhuang Realm through narrow void passages.”

“To push for their re-integration with the Xuanhuang Realm, the first step is to re-activate the severed connections.” Li Fan closed his eyes, and the scene of the Great Xuan pocket world and the Azure Nether light mass appeared in his sea of consciousness. The Great Xuan seemed like a flickering bean of light drifting outside, dimming and brightening, sometimes close, sometimes distant.

With a thought, the Great Formation activated. Tremendous Spirit Qi surged from Li Fan’s body, flowing ceaselessly underground and spreading to all parts of the Great Xuan. And from Li Fan’s perspective, formation lines also began to generate. Using the formation as a knife, he continuously reshaped the Great Xuan pocket world. Without anyone noticing, the pocket world slowly moved towards the Xuanhuang Realm in the void, nullifying thousands of years of effort by countless Void-Cracking Whales. Just before colliding with the Xuanhuang Realm, the Great Xuan pocket world finally stopped. From within the world, formation tentacles slowly emerged, silently attaching themselves to the Xuanhuang Realm’s main body. Like receiving nourishment from the mother body through the placenta, the transformation process of the Great Xuan pocket world instantly accelerated.

When selecting the attachment location, Li Fan also deliberately manipulated and changed the connection point between the Great Xuan pocket world and the Xuanhuang Realm. He did not choose the Cloudy Sea but instead opted for Stone Province, to avoid triggering a reactionary response from the Xuanhuang Realm. Compared to the vast Xuanhuang Realm, the scale of the Great Xuan pocket world was almost negligible. Therefore, the absorption of the Great Xuan had not yet attracted the attention of the Xuanhuang Realm, allowing Li Fan’s plan to proceed smoothly. Barely perceptible formation lines, following the Great Xuan’s tentacles, slowly entered the Xuanhuang Realm. While the connection between the Great Xuan pocket world and the Xuanhuang Realm became increasingly intimate, a part of a grand formation was also silently transferred into the Xuanhuang Realm. It was merely an incomplete formation structure, and even Li Fan himself could hardly detect it before its formal activation.

“The day of the return of all realms will be the day this formation takes shape.” This time, Li Fan was not setting up the "All Things Return to Void" Great Formation, but rather a formation to capture the Heavenly and Earthly Essence that would be born in the future. This was a measure to prevent future troubles. After the super Xuanhuang Realm was born, its first nurtured Heavenly and Earthly Essence would be Li Fan’s target for Dao Integration in the future. Through a series of guidance, the difficulty of the Heavenly Duties it needed to perform would be continuously increased. The more the Xuanhuang Realm borrowed power, the stronger the Heavenly and Earthly Essence would become. To ensure foolproof success and to achieve Dao Integration as quickly as possible, this precautionary immortal formation was crucial.

“The strongest Heavenly and Earthly Essence is undoubtedly the illusory shadows of successive Great Heavenly Venerates. All of it will be added to them. That alone is equivalent to more than half of the total Heavenly and Earthly Essence of the Xuanhuang Realm.”

“In the 115th life, Heavenly Dao Bai could slightly block the Dharma-Preachers. In this life, with my various methods to comprehensively strengthen it, it should reach the limit of the star sea. If there are breakthroughs in the research of Immortal Spiritual Power, it might even achieve the Half-Immortal realm…”

“The only thing to consider is that the illusory shadows of the Great Heavenly Venerates might carry traces of the Immortal Realm from before. While devouring them, one must be cautious.” Thinking of the strange influence Heavenly Dao Bai had on his mind back then, Li Fan pondered inwardly. As the bridgehead for spreading the Dao in the Azure Nether, and the template for formations in other pocket worlds in the future, Li Fan constructed the invasion formation of the Great Xuan with extreme caution. In his previous life, the Heavenly Physician and the Doctrine Transmitter had joined forces to use the "Spirit Sealing Substitutive Realm" technique. This indicated that their control over the Xuanhuang Realm had reached an extremely intricate level. If the invasion formation tentacles of the pocket world were discovered by them, and they returned from the starry sky, Li Fan’s plan would be disrupted.

Chapter 1306: Changes Between Immortals and Mortals (7K)

The primary objective of this life is to achieve the Dao Integration of the Heavenly and Earthly Immortal Souls of the Super Xuanhuang Realm.

Before reaching that goal, it would be wise to avoid these two individuals.

“The Soul Sealing World Replacement technique is also mentioned in the Heavenly Physician's Book of Heaven Mending.”

“A realm is like a person. A person can undergo possession; a world can as well.”

“However, to succeed in world replacement, there are two prerequisite conditions. Firstly, the divine sense acting as the ‘Realm Soul’ must be incredibly powerful. At the very least, it cannot be significantly weaker than the world’s Heavenly Dao's original consciousness. Otherwise, during the brief period of world replacement, the world itself will collapse from within. This is a disaster comparable to world annihilation.”

A transparent figure within the Doctrine Transmitter’s body flashed before Li Fan’s eyes. His gaze shifted slightly.

“Secondly, the caster must achieve complete suppression of the world, forcing its consciousness into a deep slumber. If two consciousnesses exist simultaneously, it could lead to the world splitting…”

“It is true that the Heavenly Physician, the Dharma-Preachers, and the five Heavenly Venerates of the Five Elders Council working together could achieve this.”

Li Fan, combining the contents of the Book of Heaven Mending with his recollection of the Heavenly Physician's textbook-like practical application, suddenly had a flash of inspiration.

“Soul Sealing World Replacement, Soul Sealing World Replacement…”

“Currently, the Great Xuan’s pocket world’s Heavenly Dao consciousness has just been born, presenting a perfect opportunity for me to test this out.”

Li Fan raised his head, his eyes piercing through the earth and reaching directly into the Great Xuan’s sky.

As if pierced by an arrow, a seven-colored vortex appeared in the sky. None of the beings in the Great Xuan, except Li Fan, could perceive it.

Within this seven-colored vortex, the world's consciousness, like that of an infant, was slumbering.

Fearing that any crude action might disturb It, Li Fan very carefully separated a wisp of his divine sense and infiltrated, approaching.

Then, he carefully perceived its essence.

In an instant, the winds rising and falling, the tides ebbing and flowing, the flowers blossoming and withering within the Great Xuan world – everything that transpired in the mortal realm – appeared before Li Fan.

It was as if these changes were happening to himself.

As his perception deepened, beyond the natural scenery, the joys, sorrows, fears, and griefs, the birth, aging, sickness, and death of the beings in the Great Xuan also began to appear in Li Fan's mind.

He felt as if he were of the same sensibility as the Heavenly Dao.

For most cultivators in the world, this would be a rare opportunity. Immersing oneself, focusing the mind, and comprehending astonishing divine abilities would not be difficult.

However, Li Fan actively withdrew from this state of enlightenment.

Maintaining a state of being half-awake and half-enlightened.

“Simulated, Hundred Forms of Living Beings!”

With a thought, a semi-transparent figure of Li Fan appeared within the starry vortex of the Great Xuan’s sky.

He poured all the insights gained from the Great Xuan's Heavenly Dao into it.

The semi-transparent figure gradually changed, as if regressing in age. It transformed from the appearance of a middle-aged man into a newborn infant, just beginning to cry for nourishment!

Despite its appearance, the infant’s actions were as seasoned as an adult's.

It approached the slumbering Great Xuan Heavenly Dao consciousness, moved forward, and abruptly covered it…

Taking its place!

The Great Xuan pocket world instantly entered a state of violent tremors.

The earth shook, and fissures, like scars, spread across the sky from the central starry vortex.

“Dissolution Disc! Deduce!”

Within Li Fan’s sea of consciousness, the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc temporarily halted its deduction task regarding the downgrade of immortal formations. Instead, it focused entirely on calculating the compatibility of the simulated Great Xuan personality.

After continuous refinement by the Simulated, Hundred Forms of Living Beings formation, the flickering, translucent infant finally stabilized.

“World Replacement!”

Deep underground, Li Fan conjured a golden needle in his hand. He then shot it towards the simulated Great Xuan Heavenly Dao in the sky.

It struck precisely at the center of the forehead, the Yin Tang acupoint.

The semi-transparent infant instinctively let out a faint cry. The heavens and earth heralded their birth, but the Great Dao was silent. No one in the world could hear it, yet it instantly spread throughout the entire Great Xuan pocket world.

From weak to strong, it grew more and more resonant. Finally, it became inaudible.

And amidst the cry of the simulated Great Xuan personality…

The anomalies in the world gradually disappeared, returning to their initial tranquility.

The wounds and the vortex in the sky healed. Li Fan, however, could sense the simulated personality that had replaced the nascent Great Xuan Heavenly Dao.

Or perhaps “Simulated Heavenly Lattice” would be a more appropriate description.

The Great Xuan’s nascent Heavenly Dao consciousness was not destroyed by Li Fan. Instead, it was forcibly suppressed and sealed.

All of the slow growth of the Heavenly Dao consciousness would be absorbed and synchronized to the Simulated Heavenly Lattice, ensuring the correct operation of the Great Xuan Heavenly Dao.

It was like nourishment for the Simulated Heavenly Lattice to grow stronger. Once the Simulated Heavenly Lattice could completely shoulder the responsibility of operating the Great Xuan pocket world's Heavenly Dao, it would completely devour the Heavenly Dao consciousness that had been slumbering since its birth.

Thus completing a true metamorphosis.

Li Fan carefully perceived the operational status of the Great Xuan's Simulated Heavenly Lattice.

The Simulated Heavenly Lattice was his creation. He could naturally sense all the information it received. The current situation was akin to having a Heavenly Dao clone continuously helping him comprehend the Dao.

Although it was only the Heavenly Dao of a pocket world, its advantage lay in its endless accumulation, growing from small to large.

Moreover…

“This is the first time I've done this, and my methods were a bit crude. If not for the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc’s timely adjustments, the Great Xuan world might have been destroyed by my hand.” Li Fan looked towards the surface of the Great Xuan, at the great rift caused by the terrestrial anomalies, and shook his head slightly.

“However, with this experience, the subsequent 'Soul Sealing World Replacement' for other pocket worlds should be much smoother.”

Compared to the traditional world replacement technique in the Heavenly Physician's Book of Heaven Mending, Li Fan's improved version used a “Simulated Heavenly Lattice.”

Drawing inspiration from "Falsehood into Truth" and the Great Xuan’s ancient realm-protecting immortal formation, the Nine-Star Red Pearl, this simulated technique was likely something only Li Fan could accomplish in the world.

The Simulated Heavenly Lattice did not truly possess its own consciousness. It was a purely mechanical operation, completely obeying its creator, making it easier to control.

More importantly, with thousands of pocket worlds in the Xuanhuang Realm, if the original Soul Sealing World Replacement technique were used, it would take considerable effort to find cultivators whose divine souls could rival the Heavenly Dao consciousness of various realms. Now, Li Fan could resolve this issue himself.

Furthermore, even with the manipulation of numerous pocket worlds, there was no risk of losing control.

“When all realms return to the Azure Nether, the pocket world Heavenly Daos will also merge with the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao. Although their volumes are not proportional, many ants can still bite an elephant. Coupled with my other methods then…”

A brilliant and sinister plan was instantly conceived in Li Fan’s mind.

“My current strength is limited, allowing me to create only Simulated Heavenly Lattices on the scale of pocket worlds. After I advance, it might be possible to create simulated Azure Nethers, or even simulated Star Seas…”

As he gradually reaped benefits from comprehending "Falsehood into Truth," Li Fan increasingly felt that this transformation between truth and falsehood, even more so than specific cultivation methods, was the fundamental source of his power.

“It’s a pity this path is too profound. Even after a hundred lifetimes of reincarnation, I’ve only grasped a sliver of it. Moreover, this path of ‘Falsehood into Truth’ is only comprehensible to me, who possesses ‘Return to Truth.’ I cannot borrow it even if I wished to.”

Li Fan also vaguely sensed that for the comprehension of "Falsehood into Truth," common discussions of talent and comprehension in the cultivation world were useless.

To further delve into its true profundity, the most important factor was…

Opportunity.

Or, to put it in more common terms, it depended on the mood of "Return to Truth.”

In his previous life, after "Return to Truth" encountered what was called the "new interfering variable," Li Fan discovered that his comprehension of the "Falsehood into Truth" transformation had significantly eased.

Although his own talent and comprehension remained unchanged, it was as if he were closer and could touch it more easily. Such was the profundity.

“Resonating Dao, Projection…” Li Fan recalled the Sacred Emperor's teachings in his previous life and the words of the Dharma Deduction little萝莉. His eyes narrowed, and countless speculations surged in his mind.

…

The anomalies in the Great Xuan's heavens and earth did not have much impact on its inhabitants. Soon, people refocused their attention on the “Sage Master” who was incessantly spreading his teachings.

For five years, the Sage Master's teachings continued uninterrupted.

In the blink of an eye, it had been eight years since the anchor point was established. The Preaching Platform had also expanded from its initial size to five hundred li in circumference. Even so, people seeking the Dao and seeking the Master continued to arrive in endless streams.

One day, the Sage Master’s illusory figure, holding a whisk, gently waved it.

The Preaching Platform, spanning a hundred li, under the watchful eyes of the masses, seemingly became the center of the world. The surrounding mountains and plains, rivers and seas, all rotated and flowed around the Preaching Platform.

The beings within the Preaching Platform, seated on the ground, did not move, yet traversed a thousand miles daily.

In less than half a day, the Preaching Platform, carrying millions of disciples, became the center of the Great Xuan world.

At this moment, the highest tier of the Preaching Platform represented the Golden Core Perfection realm.

On that platform sat three individuals, looking down at the beings of the Great Xuan, who were increasingly distant from them.

They were Sun Erlang, Wang Xuanba, and Yue Zhenwei.

Yue Zhenwei, having caught up later, demonstrated his extraordinary talent.

All three were disciples of the “Sage Master,” referring to each other as senior and junior brothers.

“Senior Brother Sun, the next stage, Nascent Soul, requires the devouring of heavenly and earthly grotto-heavens. It seems we will have to leave this Great Xuan for a while.” Even though the other party was much younger than him, Yue Zhenwei asked respectfully.

The Sage Master not only taught the profound mysteries of the Dao but also mentioned much about common cultivation knowledge and the specific situation of the cultivation world. Therefore, the cultivators of the Great Xuan were not entirely ignorant of the world beyond their realm.

Sun Erlang did not put on airs. “Brother Yue, there’s no need for formality. You are older than me; I should be the one calling you Senior Brother.”

Without waiting for a response, Sun Erlang got straight to the point. “We are fellow disciples. The Xuanhuang Realm is fraught with danger. This excursion should be undertaken together for mutual care.”

“We, as the Sage Master’s first disciples, have learned of the grotto-heaven locations he marked for us. But…”

Sun Erlang's tone was arrogant, a hint of confidence flashing in his eyes. “Those are merely ordinary grotto-heavens. They are sufficient for achieving Nascent Soul at best, but if one harbors ambitions to further probe the Soul Transformation realm, they are far from enough!”

“I intend to find a grotto-heaven that suits me.” Sun Erlang’s tone was resolute.

Yue Zhenwei’s face lit up with joy. “Senior Brother Sun, what I was thinking is precisely the same!”

“In the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s territory, most grotto-heavens are divided and monopolized by the Alliance and its powerful clans. Conversely, the Five Elders Council offers greater opportunities. Especially the Land of Carefree Bliss, where it is said all cultivators are immersed in dreams, leaving reality virtually undefended…”

The three of them discussed and reached a consensus.

They then bid farewell to the Sage Master, left the Great Xuan, and headed towards the location of the Land of Carefree Bliss.

Li Fan's illusory figure on the Preaching Platform glanced at them, almost imperceptibly.

He continued to speak his teachings.

This Preaching Platform had now become the center of the Great Xuan.

Over the years, under the manipulation of the Simulated Heavenly Lattice, the power of formations had been quietly circulating without pause. It was like a massive refining vessel, reflecting and inscribing all the disciples listening to the teachings into a silver-white bead.

Its principle was inspired by Li Fan’s previous observation of the Azure Nether’s Nine-Star Red Pearl. Although it could not yet fully record all the information of the beings, it could already project their experiences into the silver-white bead, recording and preserving them.

It was like a giant eye, watching the beings in the Preaching Platform intently, no matter how far they ran, they could not escape its scrutiny.

This surveillance only affected the beings themselves and thus would not be detected by other external forces. It was not limited to the beings' real-world experiences; even those in dreams and hallucinations could not escape its reflection.

“Beings of the mortal world, once seen, cannot escape.”

“Teacher of Heaven and Earth, Teacher of Myriad Spirits.”

The voice of the illusory figure, as it imparted teachings, echoed throughout the Great Xuan pocket world, lingering endlessly.

…

Concurrently.

Li Fan’s main body, alone, arrived at the pocket world inhabited by the Netherfolk.

Instead of directly capturing them, he hid in the shadows, observing the Netherfolk's lives.

Very orderly and simple.

Eating, praying, martial training, reproduction, sleeping.

“The bloodline of the first Great Heavenly Venerate, even though the Heavenly Mysteries Sect has long since been destroyed, the shackles imposed upon them remain unchanged,” Li Fan sighed with emotion.

Under the constant pursuit of the Myriad Immortals Alliance, the surviving Netherfolk numbers were dwindling. Without external intervention, they were likely destined for extinction.

Li Fan's appearance here this time was not to raise them like a “flesh and blood factory” as he had in his previous life. Instead, he had a different plan.

While "flesh and blood transformation" could provide a large number of Netherfolk and obtain a significant amount of Primal Force Essence, Li Fan was more curious about the origin of the “Primal Force Essence.”

Why was it that Netherfolk, also beings of the Xuanhuang Realm, could generate Primal Force Essence with near-immortal power through their prayers, while prayers from mortals, and even cultivators, could at most condense into powers like Destiny and Belief?

What exactly was the so-called “Great Heavenly Venerate” bloodline?

In his previous life, Wang Xuanba could not extract this so-called special bloodline from even tens of thousands of Netherfolk, which made Li Fan realize he was looking for the wrong method.

Since purification was not working…

He would try ancestor worship!

Li Fan separated a wisp of his divine sense and, using the Immortal Boat's Dao Pill technique, possessed the body of the strongest man among the current group of Netherfolk.

After a brief period of adaptation to the body, an examination revealed no abnormalities.

However, this was within Li Fan’s plan.

During their daily prayers, he would, using this Netherfolk body, perceive the generation and destination of the Primal Force Essence.

Ordinary Netherfolk would certainly not be able to achieve this. Even if they could temporarily wield the power of darkness, it was merely out of bloodline instinct and millennia of tradition.

But Li Fan was different.

After living as a Netherfolk for more than half a year, through hundreds of prayers and meticulous supervision, Li Fan finally discerned the method of generating the power of darkness.

A part of his body and divine soul, at a certain moment during prayer, triggered an internal mechanism, like a formation.

Through its transformation, it achieved metamorphosis.

That trace was fleeting and completely concealed within the Netherfolk's flesh and blood after the transformation was complete. If Li Fan had not possessed a special sensitivity to this subtle energy, he might have missed it!

The trace that generated the golden Primal Force Essence bore a striking resemblance to the feeling Li Fan experienced when comprehending his divine abilities related to “Falsehood into Truth”!

“It's not the transformation of truth and falsehood. But it is a residual power with extremely similar fluctuations!”

Discovering this secret, Li Fan was greatly shaken.

Suppressing his inner astonishment, Li Fan conducted multiple verifications.

His intuition was correct.

The trace within the Netherfolk that created the Primal Force Essence was indeed a powerful imprint similar to "Return to Truth's" "transformation of truth and falsehood"!

After the initial shock, Li Fan gradually calmed down.

His thoughts raced, analyzing point by point: “When the true becomes false, the false also becomes true. The reason 'Return to Truth' can return to true, bringing me back to the anchor point of 1 year regardless of how events unfold, is because it involves…”

“The Dao of Truth and Falsehood.”

“With a single thought, myriad worlds are born and destroyed. This Dao of Truth and Falsehood is clearly far beyond any Dao path I have encountered so far.”

“And the trace within the Netherfolk can transform mortals into immortals…”

“Although it may not be comparable to 'Return to Truth,' and cannot contend with it, it is undoubtedly an extraordinary existence that created the Netherfolk… or rather, the uniqueness of the Azure Nether's first Great Heavenly Venerate.”

Countless thoughts flashed through Li Fan's mind.

"‘Return to Truth’ is within me, integrated with me.”

“And this treasure has likely long since disappeared with the demise of the Immortal Realm. I can only imagine its whereabouts, and Li Fan felt an infinite sense of regret.”

“Looking at it this way, the birth of the first Azure Nether Great Heavenly Venerate likely involved some mission or conspiracy.”

Now that he understood the origin of Primal Force Essence generation, Li Fan attempted to replicate it.

Admittedly, this trace of a supreme treasure, far exceeding all current mortal means, could not be replicated by ordinary methods.

Otherwise, Nether King in the past, and the Myriad Immortals Alliance now, would not have had to rely on these Netherfolk for the acquisition of the power of darkness.

Nether King was extraordinarily talented, and the Myriad Immortals Alliance inherited the legacy of the Xuanhuang Realm for millennia.

Yet, they were all powerless in this regard…

But Li Fan was different.

He possessed means that surpassed even that inexplicable trace.

Falsehood into Truth!

The top-down suppression made replication possible.

Even though Li Fan failed in his initial attempts, he could distinguish between a dead end and a lack of sufficient strength.

Without any trace of dejection, he felt a growing excitement.

If he could realize his conjecture, then the usage of this "Falsehood into Truth" divine ability could be infinitely expanded!

Replicating that unknown trace of a supreme treasure was far more difficult than simulating the Heavenly Dao personality of a pocket world!

The only consolation that kept Li Fan persisting without giving up was that the trace remained constant.

Unlike the constantly changing and flowing Heavenly Dao of a world.

Each failure brought him one step closer to success.

To have more opportunities for success, Li Fan spent more time praying in the possessed Netherfolk body than other Netherfolk.

This was naturally noticed by the Netherfolk chief, who looked upon him with a pleased expression.

This was Li Fan's fifth millionth failure.

Continuously using the power of "Falsehood into Truth," Li Fan discovered that the charge progress of "Return to Truth" had, for the first time, decreased from 100% to 80%!

Slightly alarmed, Li Fan decided to temporarily halt his attempts and wait for "Return to Truth" to complete its charging.

Fortunately, the pocket world where the Netherfolk resided would not encounter any danger at this point.

As Li Fan was contemplating, the Netherfolk chief summoned him.

Among the Netherfolk, they did not refer to each other by name, but by code names based on their prayer order.

Li Fan arrived at the chief's cave dwelling.

After giving him some encouragement, the chief stated that the great Dark Sea had seen Li Fan's efforts during this period and decided to bestow a blessing upon him.

Li Fan feigned extreme excitement, awaiting the so-called blessing.

Inwardly, he had already prepared to sever the connection with his divine sense.

The predicted danger did not materialize.

When the Netherfolk chief's blessing ceremony was halfway through, Li Fan perceived the Dark Sea descending abruptly.
