The experiences and perceptions of cultivators within the Xuanhuang Realm will offer some assistance when exploring these levels of dreams. By enduring the trials of the world in the outer dreamscapes and gradually growing stronger, one gains the qualification to enter deeper dreamscapes…" Li Fan smiled, finding this pattern quite familiar.

"Within the Land of Carefree Bliss, it seems there are self-contained rules. To obtain more information about this paradise, we can let Sun Erlang and the others explore slowly."

Sun Erlang and his companions were merely the vanguard. Following them, numerous disciples under the Sage Master would continuously head to the Land of Carefree Bliss to gather information. As the saying goes, "Though the paradise is vast, even ants can navigate it!"

The reason Li Fan paid such close attention to the Land of Carefree Bliss stemmed from the conspicuous dark clouds within the territory of the Five Elders Council when the Immortal Extermination Formation was activated in his previous life. Under the cover of these clouds, even beings that had already perished were protected.

It was important to note that when the "Immortals Descend, All Things Return to the Void" Great Formation was activated, even Dharma-Preachers could only struggle to survive. Yet, this area of dark clouds not only remained intact amidst the world-ending immortal formation but also had the capacity to save lives…

In Li Fan's previous understanding, the strength of the Five Elders Council's five Longevity realm cultivators was nowhere near enough to achieve this! Through countless reincarnations, Li Fan had never discovered this secret of the Five Elders Council, which demonstrated how deeply it was hidden. However, in the midst of the world-ending storm, these deeply concealed existences were all exposed.

"Besides the Land of Carefree Bliss, the Five Elders Council also possessed another item that resisted the encroachment of the immortal formation." Li Fan's eyes flickered. "The remains of Dharma-Preachers, the Soul Grinding Plate."

In his 119th life, Li Fan had heard of this item. In that life, the Myriad Immortals Alliance used the Immortal Chosen to summon the manifestation of a Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate and launched a surprise attack on the Five Elders Council, eventually forcing them to hand over this so-called treasure of the Alliance.

"The Soul Grinding Plate contains fifty-six remnant souls and one hundred and three remnants of bone."

"Yet, these remnant souls and bones remained unharmed amidst the rampant immortal power…"

"Even the entire area where the Soul Grinding Plate was preserved turned to nothingness, yet it remained safe. The Soul Grinding Plate is merely an ordinary magic artifact…"

Four words flashed into Li Fan's mind: Eternal Residual Will.

"Eternal Residual Wills cannot be brought into Return to Truth. Neither clones nor divine senses can perceive their existence. Only I, through Return to Truth, can absorb them."

"Unfortunately, like Mr. Bai's skull, they are located within the core areas of influential powers, not easily obtainable."

"In this life, I can try to orchestrate things and see if I can acquire both items. If not, I'll wait until I reach Dao Integration and take them by force!"

Li Fan let out a soft hum and returned his thoughts to the present. Standing within the Xuanhuang Realm, Li Fan held a mortal steel spear, his eyes narrowed. A chill, as if about to freeze everything, suddenly descended upon Li Fan's head, but it vanished in an instant. This was Li Fan's divine ability of Transference of Heaven and Earth. Before the Heaven and Earth Essence could fully manifest, he had canceled the spell. Although the Heaven and Earth Essence appeared and dissipated without leaving a trace, during this process, the steel spear in Li Fan's hand seemed to have absorbed the power of this Heaven and Earth Essence, gradually becoming extraordinary. Silver light flashed, and a chilling aura emanated. Illusory snowflakes occasionally drifted around the spearhead. After only a few attempts, this steel spear had transformed from a mortal object into a peerless divine weapon.

Li Fan once again used Transference of Heaven and Earth. This time, instead of frost, it was a fiery red, flickering flame. *Pfft…* The scarlet flames poured onto the silver-white spear, instantly adorning it with a lifelike Nine Dragons motif. Li Fan sensed the increasingly hostile presence of heaven and earth and shifted his position.

"I shall call you the Blazing Dragon Ice Soul Spear," Li Fan casually named the divine weapon he had just crafted using the Heaven and Earth Essence, then tossed it into the Dao Discussion Platform, among the tens of thousands of oddity inventories.

By using the Xuanhuang Realm's laws to manifest and craft oddities, he had become increasingly skilled at this. It wasn't just for preparing Foundation Establishment materials for his students; its primary purpose was to constantly assess the specific progress of the Xuanhuang Realm's recovery through these newly born Heavenly and Earthly Marvels.

The nourishing effect of the Azure Nether Malevolent Thoughts on the Xuanhuang Realm was beyond Li Fan's expectations. For such a long time, the Xuanhuang Realm had been continuously improving. And because this sublimation was concentrated internally, conventional methods could not ascertain its specific progress. Therefore, Li Fan needed to find an alternative approach. He couldn't afford not to care. The Heavenly Dao's feedback for helping the Malevolent Thoughts return to the Xuanhuang Realm had yet to arrive.

"When I separated a portion of my consciousness to attach itself to Mr. Bai, the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao became incomplete. This deficiency was not compensated by absorbing other fragmented realms. Instead, as it grew stronger, it became even more… apparent."

Li Fan meticulously observed while constructing artificial Heavenly and Earthly Marvels.

"Simply put, the previous Xuanhuang Realm always had a weakness. Returning the Azure Nether Malevolent Thoughts is equivalent to mending this weakness."

"Wonderful! It seems this current Super Xuanhuang Realm will be even stronger than I deduced."

As his thoughts churned, another oddity was obtained.

"Hm? This time the improvement is almost negligible. It seems its digestion is finally complete." Li Fan's heart stirred slightly, and he looked towards the sky. A peculiar sensation slowly rose in his heart.

About half a day later, the connection with the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao re-established itself. However, because his main body possessed the Dao foundation of the "Azure Nether's World-Ending Mutations," the Xuanhuang Realm naturally harbored hostility towards him. This life's "Heavenly Mandate" feedback merely neutralized this hostility, with only a slight surplus. It was completely incomparable to the Sacred Emperor of the past.

"However, since the attitude has shifted, I will have plenty of ways to increase its favorability in the future," Li Fan mused.

Through his senses, Senior Yin and Skilled Artisan, among others, also detected the arrival of the Azure Nether Heavenly Mandate. For external cultivators like Skilled Artisan and Bai Hua, who had long felt a disconnect with the Xuanhuang Realm, this sense of separation finally vanished.

Xu Ke was already a person of destiny. However, after being tasked with guarding and sealing the Azure Nether Malevolent Thoughts, and the death of his companion spirit beast Xiao Hei, his destiny had dissipated over thousands of years. But now, Xu Ke received the Heavenly Mandate once again. His white hair turned black, and his hunched back straightened. In an instant, Xu Ke transformed from an aged, frail individual on the verge of death into a composed middle-aged man.

As for Senior Yin's reaction, it was somewhat peculiar. It was as if something had exploded in his head, and Senior Yin's head instantly turned into a pool of blood mist. Through the wound at his neck, one could vaguely see that his physical body, composed of the remnants of other realms, was disintegrating inch by inch.

The small figure's face contorted with ferocity, continuously spitting out blood foam and fragments. The flesh and blood on his external body writhed, reabsorbing these vomited substances. He waved his hand, stopping others who were about to rush forward to help. Senior Yin let out a strange laugh.

Li Fan's figure appeared beside them at that moment. "Don't worry, this is a good thing for him," Li Fan said, offering reassurance.

Senior Yin was a World Spirit, a conglomerate of fragmented realms that could not be absorbed by the Xuanhuang Realm, merely existing as a parasitic ghost. Previously, the Xuanhuang Realm's attitude towards Senior Yin was one of awareness, but indifference. Now, after Senior Yin helped return the Azure Nether Malevolent Thoughts, the Xuanhuang Realm's attitude had shifted. In other words, Senior Yin had been labeled as "beneficial." The consequence was that the Xuanhuang Realm began to try and accept him, integrating him into the natural workings of the Heavenly Dao. If no other forces intervened, then after many years, Senior Yin, as a "fragmented realm ghost," would become a being attached to the Xuanhuang Realm, similar to the Stone Slab and If Wood.

Li Fan was not speaking falsehoods; this was indeed a good thing for Senior Yin. Firstly, by drawing upon the power of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, he could crush the other fragmented realm consciousness within his body, becoming purer and no longer experiencing bouts of madness and mental confusion. Secondly… within the Xuanhuang Realm, there were still many "anomalies" – residual dregs left from the process of devouring fragmented realms. These laws, which did not integrate with the Xuanhuang Realm, previously required extreme measures like Black Slaughter to eradicate completely. However, with Senior Yin being integrated into the Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly Dao system, he could devour these anomalies, strengthening himself while also helping the Xuanhuang Realm clear its internal residue. It was a win-win situation.

Despite all these "good things," Li Fan sensed resistance from Senior Yin. If Senior Yin himself resisted, it was highly possible that the integration process could be interrupted.

Li Fan's expression grew solemn as he transmitted, "Why must you be so hesitant? Once integrated into the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, you will be no different from a cultivator of Reverse Principle Longevity."

"With the Star Sea's revival, the Xuanhuang Realm, as the sole pure land in the current Star Sea, may one day leverage this revival power to break through mortal limits and ascend to the legendary Immortal Realm. At that time, your achievements will be immeasurable!"

"This is the great trend of the Dao. Those who follow it prosper; those who defy it perish!"

As Li Fan's words of persuasion continued, Senior Yin's struggling expression gradually calmed down. Especially after hearing the words "Immortal Realm," his last trace of resistance vanished. His exploding head regrew. The wounds healed, masking the sound of his flesh tearing and chewing within his body. Senior Yin returned to his original appearance. However, compared to before, where hidden madness resided within his ordinariness, Senior Yin now looked somewhat similar to the Stone Slab—ancient and profound.

"Congratulations to all," Li Fan said with a slight smile.

"Thank you, Sage Master, for your guidance!" Senior Yin and the others no longer addressed each other as fellow Daoists. Instead, like Li Fan's students, they referred to him as "Sage Master." After all, whether it was guiding them to the center of the Star Sea to observe the Dao of Revival, or teaching them to purify and return the Azure Nether Malevolent Thoughts to gain significant Heavenly Mandate, any of these deeds could be considered a rebirth. To Senior Yin and the others, Li Fan was entirely worthy of the title "Sage Master."

"The Azure Nether has completed its initial transformation. Next, we must take the lead in guiding it to digest the fragmented realms in various regions. However, before that, some preparatory work is needed."

"Please elaborate, Sage Master."

"Although the Azure Nether has devoured its own Malevolent Thoughts and mended its shortcomings, over thousands of years of cultivators devouring heaven and consuming earth, some depletion has occurred. It's like a person who hasn't eaten for a long time suddenly starts eating. Abruptly stimulating the digestion of fragmented realms might lead to negative consequences," Li Fan explained.

Bai Hua nodded slightly, understanding. "So, what we need to do now is help the Xuanhuang Realm digest one or two fragmented realms first? Where should we start?"

"The fragmented realms of the Azure Nether are implicitly linked as one. Pulling one thread will move the entire body. Therefore, using these fragmented realms within the Xuanhuang Realm as medicinal catalysts is not feasible," Li Fan said with a smile, looking at everyone.

Skilled Artisan couldn't help but look towards the void outside the Xuanhuang Realm. "So, we need to go outside to find world fragments?"

"Where would we find them? We traversed more than half the Star Sea before, and all we saw was vast emptiness. I fear all the fragmented realms in the entire Star Sea have fallen into the Immortal Ruins!"

Senior Yin snorted. "Then where did the Xuanhuang Realm obtain the fragmented realms it has devoured over so many years?"

Li Fan nodded. "Indeed. There are still numerous fragmented realm shards in the Star Sea."

"At the fringes of the Star Sea, beneath the Great Wall!" Li Fan said sternly.

Upon hearing this, Senior Yin and the others trembled. Li Fan waved his hand, and a vision of countless continuous fragmented realms, resembling a vast and magnificent Great Wall, appeared before them. The few of them were lost in awe.

"This…" Even with their considerable strength, they were rendered speechless by such an incredible scene.

Chapter 1312

"The Great Wall of Fragmented Realms... how could such an anomaly appear at the edge of the Star Sea?" Skilled Artisan exclaimed in shock.

"No wonder worlds that were annihilated back then vanished without a trace; they all gathered at the foot of the The Great Barrier? Fragmented realms stretching endlessly, what kind of power could create such a scene?" Hundred Flowers' face was also filled with shock.

Both of them had survived the destruction of the Star Sea and witnessed countless cultivation worlds turn into barren lands. Therefore, more than others, they could deeply appreciate the awe-inspiring nature of the endlessly stretching Great Wall of Fragmented Realms.

"I seem to..." As if recalling something buried deep within his mind, Senior Yin pressed his forehead, wanting to speak but hesitating.

Li Fan glanced at him but didn't press further. Instead, he solemnly added, "Beyond the Great Wall of Fragmented Realms, there is another layer, the Great Wall of Remnants, serving as a barrier. These two guard the The Great Barrier, mirroring each other, forming a formation. The journey ahead is even more perilous than the previous trip to the center of the Star Sea, and there's even a high chance of perishing..."

Li Fan's gaze swept across everyone present, "Whether you go or not is entirely up to your own decision."

"I'll give you half a year to think about it. Don't blindly pursue higher-level power. Just by the merit of returning the Azure Nether Malevolent Thoughts, even if you do nothing further, you will gain enough benefits once the Xuanhuang Realm completes its ascension." His figure slowly vanished as he spoke.

Skilled Artisan and the others had varied expressions.

Indeed, the moment they witnessed the magnificent spectacle of the Great Wall of Fragmented Realms, their minds were shaken, and they felt an urge to witness it firsthand. However, Li Fan's words served as a reminder.

In this Star Sea, wonders often came with immense power, and immense power meant danger.

This was true for the Great Wall of Fragmented Realms, and it was also true for the Immortal Ruins.

Furthermore, to stimulate the Xuanhuang Realm's capacity for absorption and digestion, only three or four fragments of fragmented realms were needed as catalysts. It wasn't necessary for everyone to go.

If this endeavor was successful, there would be many more opportunities in the future to contribute to the Xuanhuang Realm's sublimation and gain the associated merits.

With these thoughts in mind, everyone began to ponder.

Li Fan, of course, saw the subtle changes in their expressions. Through countless reincarnations, Li Fan had come to understand their temperaments very well. He could guess their general thoughts at a glance.

"Walking the path towards the Dao is the instinct of cultivators. However, this path is fraught with peril and arduous. Inner fear and aversion are even greater obstacles to moving forward."

"How difficult it is to touch upon the so-called 'Dao'..."

As he watched Skilled Artisan and the others make their choices when faced with life, death, and the pursuit of the Dao, threads of insight flowed into Li Fan's heart.

Waiting for the Heavenly and Earthly Immortal Souls of the Super Xuanhuang Realm to achieve Dao Integration did not mean that Li Fan's cultivation would stagnate before then.

"Breathing, speaking, and acting are all cultivation."

"The thoughts and emotions of all living beings are like Dao scriptures."

On the Preaching Platform, within the Great Xuan Realm, the intentions and thoughts of countless beings, like scattered stars, all flowed into Li Fan's mind, whereupon he perceived them.

They became the driving force that propelled Li Fan's colossal wheel of cultivation forward.

This lifetime, he intended to be the Teacher of Heaven and Earth, not on a whim.

In his previous life, the Sacred Emperor had spoken of the concept of the 'Resonating Dao, Longevity'. By reflecting the Dao's shadow, one could comprehend the true meaning of resonating Dao.

Through multiple attempts of 'Falsehood into Truth', Li Fan had vaguely confirmed the Little萝莉's speculation about the Sacred Emperor's new derivation method.

The projection of the Dao from top to bottom indeed made it easier to touch upon the Dao itself.

Without the projection, the Great Dao remained hidden in the Azure Nether, unseen. One could only rely on cultivation and comprehension to seek the Dao's traces, and then deepen it step by step.

Although there were myriad Daos, how difficult was it for ordinary cultivators to glimpse the true face of the Dao?

True Immortals in the Immortal Ruins, even with the aid of the engraved Dao 'Starvation', still meditated for tens of thousands of years without breaking through.

This demonstrated the difficulty of comprehending the Dao.

If True Immortals were like this, what about those below the True Immortal realm?

Among the vast sea of sentient beings, Li Fan's situation was extremely unique. Possessing 'Return to Truth', he was more like someone who had already reached the end of the Dao, with the ultimate essence of the 'Dao' almost within reach. Therefore, miracles like 'Falsehood into Truth', which seemed inconceivable, could be performed by someone with only the cultivation of the Soul Transformation realm.

Regarding the True-False Transformation involved in Return to Truth, Li Fan could only gradually comprehend it by increasing the 'bond' with Return to Truth.

However, as his understanding of 'Falsehood into Truth' gradually deepened, and after previously coming into contact with the mysterious symbol hidden deep within the Netherfolk,

Li Fan vaguely sensed that he could use the method of drawing parallels and extrapolating to deepen the progress of the True-False Transformation by starting from other Dao traces.

The projection of the Great Dao formed the myriad realms from top to bottom.

Everything that existed in the Xuanhuang Realm, both matter and consciousness, could be seen as a projection of the Dao.

However, it was merely the terminal end of the projection. Tracing the Dao from the bottom up was an almost impossible task.

Yet, as the only surviving land in the Star Sea, the Xuanhuang Realm had already accumulated too many impossibilities.

For instance, the existence of Eternal Residual Wills, which resonated with the Dao.

In this lifetime, Li Fan had previously visited the True Yang Mansion at the bottom of the Cloudy Sea and collected the True Yang's lingering remains containing Eternal Residual Wills.

He had tried various methods but could not sense the Dao resonance within them.

However, Li Fan would not give up on researching Dao resonance. Instead, he turned to seeking inferior substitutes for Eternal Residual Wills.

In the 119th lifetime, Li Fan used the Faceless True Immortal statue as a catalyst to create the Worldly Compassionate True Immortal's Net. Among its myriad followers, only the intentions of Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi shone with particular brilliance and uniqueness.

Even within the Essence of Primal Force Net, they were extremely conspicuous.

They were undeniably 'earnest seekers of the Dao'.

Previously, Li Fan had believed this was merely due to their innate character and had no other benefit for him. But now, Li Fan discovered that the earnest pursuit of the Dao by Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi might be the germination of Eternal Residual Wills.

In other words, if guided appropriately, and they continually deepened their pursuit of the Dao, perhaps after Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi died, there was a chance for 'Eternal Residual Wills' to be born.

"I cannot utilize Eternal Residual Wills, but can't I use inferior substitutes?"

This discovery from Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi inspired Li Fan. Combined with the need to borrow the Super Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly and Earthly Immortal Souls for Dao Integration, he smoothly transitioned into his role as the Teacher of Heaven and Earth this lifetime.

On the Preaching Platform, the intentions of countless beings converged, like stars in the sky, each with its own unique brightness.

Those who were different received Li Fan's special attention.

Alas, no one who had the potential to evolve into Eternal Residual Wills had been discovered yet.

However, Li Fan believed that once the Preaching Platform eventually expanded to encompass the entire Xuanhuang Realm, in addition to Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi, he should be able to discover others.

As for Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi, with their current experience in this lifetime, they were still some distance from their former earnest pursuit of the Dao. Taking them as disciples would actually hinder their pursuit of the Dao. Therefore, Li Fan had not acted upon them yet; he had even increased the difficulty of their cultivation.

He would wait for the fruit to ripen in the future before harvesting it.

"The Dao projects itself across realms, and the beings of the world will always have some resonance with the Dao traces. These are the materials I can use to increase my comprehension of the 'True-False Transformation'."

Having personally experienced the power of 'Falsehood into Truth', Li Fan had decided to elevate the priority of promoting this matter to the second highest, just below self-preservation.

As for realm, cultivation, and treasures.

Things that could be acquired in every reincarnation were incomparable to this.

"However, I imagine these brilliant sentient intentions, like Eternal Residual Wills, can only be comprehended once. I wonder how many people in the entire Xuanhuang Realm will surprise me."

Li Fan's divine sense swept across the land, observing the citizens of Great Xuan still continuously streaming towards the central Preaching Platform. He nodded slightly.

His figure flickered, and in the next moment, Li Fan had already left the pocket world of Great Xuan and arrived at Flag Ridge Prefecture of the Xuanhuang Realm.

A vast underground space, filled with an invisible, bizarre aura.

Even with Li Fan's current cultivation, he had gathered enough Essence of Primal Force for protection before daring to come here.

Golden thread-like formations created a protective barrier, separating Li Fan from the formidable power within this underground space.

"My guess was correct. This ancient Celestial-Mortal Miasma, along with the Xuanhuang Realm, has undergone a sublimation and transformation." Li Fan concluded after careful observation.

In the 119th lifetime, an earthquake occurred in Flag Ridge Prefecture, and the ancient Celestial-Mortal Miasma sealed here leaked out, causing a bloody disaster. This underground space, sealed for thousands of years, seemed to have undergone some kind of mutation, becoming even more powerful than the original Celestial-Mortal Miasma.

The Celestial-Mortal Miasma was created by Mr. Bai against the principles of heaven and earth, and it was also a part of the principles of heaven and earth.

As this lifetime's Xuanhuang Realm began its evolution into a Super Xuanhuang Realm, the ancient Celestial-Mortal Miasma in this underground space was also accumulating power for its transformation.

"Mortal... can also slay immortals..."

Li Fan extended his hand, and the golden protective formation immediately opened. An invisible force seized the opportunity and began to erode Li Fan's palm.

Frowning, after sensing for just a moment, Li Fan decisively severed his entire arm.

Then, Essence of Primal Force reapplied its protection, shielding him from the miasma's erosion.

"Quite interesting."

In the time it took to take a breath, Li Fan's severed arm grew back.

As for the arm left in the ancient Celestial-Mortal Miasma, it was completely devoured by the surrounding invisible force.

Not even a bone remained, leaving only a pile of fine sand-like residue.

A rare glint of excitement flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

Among his Return to Truth bound items, there was one called 'Essence of Ten Thousand People', condensed from tens of thousands of executed prisoners.

However, the power of Celestial-Mortal Miasma contained within this Essence of Ten Thousand People was not even a fraction of this enhanced ancient Celestial-Mortal Miasma.

"If the Super Xuanhuang Realm completes its final transformation, to what extent will the Celestial-Mortal Miasma here be strengthened in the end?"

In Li Fan's deductions, the power of the Star Sea's revival, the Immortal Spiritual Power from the Great Heavenly Venerate's legacy, and the remaining myriad realms of the Star Sea...

These forces, driven by various factors, were enough to elevate the Xuanhuang Realm to a level infinitely close to the Immortal Realm.

Or, in a sense, this Super Xuanhuang Realm was the newly elevated Immortal Realm, albeit slightly weaker than the ancient Immortal Realm that had already been destroyed.

"At that time, even if I can't slay immortals, I might be able to heavily wound them."

"More importantly, the ancient Celestial-Mortal Miasma can continuously strengthen itself with the Xuanhuang Realm's enhancement. Its inherent nature of 'Mortal Slaying Immortals' dictates its crucial role."

"One day, when I have the ability to truly elevate the Xuanhuang Realm to the Immortal Realm, then this Celestial-Mortal Miasma will be a complete tool for slaying immortals!"

With this thought, Li Fan's gaze towards the invisible force in this vast space changed.

From the experiences of the Heavenly Mysteries King back then, and some clues gleaned from outside the The Great Barrier, becoming an immortal within the Star Sea might involve unimaginable dangers.

The birth of an Immortal Domain might also attract attention, but since it was not Li Fan's main body, even if a crisis were to arise, it would give Li Fan ample time to buffer.

Which was more difficult: becoming an immortal himself, or facilitating the Xuanhuang Realm's ascension to an Immortal Domain?

Unless one was crazy, they would definitely choose the latter.

But for Li Fan, the conclusion was the opposite.

"The Great Heavenly Venerate's legacy, the Immortal Spiritual Qi from immortal artifacts, are all resources that I can repeatedly utilize."

"In addition, there are other materials and powers from the entire Star Sea."

Li Fan's thoughts raced rapidly.

"Perhaps it's feasible."

"I only need to wait until the end of this lifetime and see how much difference the Super Xuanhuang Realm I orchestrated has compared to the legendary Immortal Realm, and then I can make a conclusion."

The changes in this ancient Celestial-Mortal Miasma opened up Li Fan's perspective.

In the Xuanhuang Realm, there were countless materialized laws.

When the Xuanhuang Realm ascended, these materialized laws would also ascend in synchronization.

"The entire Xuanhuang Realm can be seen as my weapon against Immortals."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes.

There was a distinction between immortals and mortals.

However, if this mortal were supported by an entire Immortal Realm, then the final outcome would be different.

"The situation outside the The Great Barrier is unknown."

"Using the realm as a foundation might make it easier to investigate."

Li Fan cautiously laid down formations around this underground space.

To prevent others from discovering the stored Celestial-Mortal Miasma here.

"Continue to grow. When you reach your limit, it will be time to forge a sword."

Only after ensuring there were no loopholes did Li Fan leave.

"If the plan is feasible, then it's time for me to collect some anchor points."

"Tools to slay immortals are naturally better the more there are."

Thinking this, Li Fan quietly arrived in the void of the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven in Heavenly Spirit Prefecture.

At this point in time, the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven had not fully descended.

It was a suitable time to absorb and replenish the conditions for anchor points: a newborn grotto-heaven.

However, Li Fan had already used the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven for charging once before. He wondered if Return to Truth would react this time.

With practiced ease, he entered the black and white interwoven gestation space.

Li Fan concentrated his mind, experiencing the sensations transmitted by Return to Truth.

"It's a bit difficult to swallow, but it's passable."

After a long while, Li Fan opened his eyes, his expression somewhat strange.

Calming his mind, his divine sense instantly enveloped the entire Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven.

A moment later...

The grotto-heaven inexplicably disappeared.

And the anchor point available to Li Fan increased by one.

A premonition surged in Li Fan's heart; if he did this one more time, Return to Truth might truly lose its appetite.

Unlike previously swallowing grotto-heavens that had already descended, the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven at this moment was still in the process of gestation.

Its inexplicable disappearance naturally caused spatial anomalies.

Chapter 1313

Instantly, countless black and white lines came alive, altering their original trajectories and hurtling towards Li Fan. They resembled tendrils intent on ensnaring and immobilizing him.

This place was known as the Root of Heaven and Earth, the cradle of the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven. Black and white lines, crisscrossing like the mechanisms of a colossal textile machine, wove the Xuanhuang Realm. It was not just the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven, but the very mountains, rivers, and grotto-heavens and blessed lands of the Xuanhuang Realm’s genesis that were born here. It was the origin of the world, the confluence of laws, and the beginning of creation.

When Li Fan had first witnessed this magnificent spectacle, he would have marveled at the wonders of creation and seized the rare opportunity to comprehend the nascent laws drifting within the Root of Heaven and Earth. Now, returning here after over a hundred cycles of reincarnation, Li Fan perceived many things he had previously overlooked.

For instance, though faint and almost integrated into the entire space of the Root of Heaven and Earth, an underlying influence on its overall operation persisted— a trace of human manipulation.

Facing the instinctive assault of the countless black and white lines within the Root of Heaven and Earth, Li Fan did not evade. He allowed them to deeply embed themselves into his body. Under normal circumstances, cultivators who encountered such an attack here would soon find their bodies, also composed of countless lines, disintegrating and dissolving, vanishing entirely within this space.

However, at this moment, a mysterious immense force within Li Fan firmly anchored his own lines. No matter how the Root of Heaven and Earth attempted to absorb him, he remained imperturburably still! The anchor point that so steadfastly fixed Li Fan in place was, naturally, the sliver of the Transfiguration of True and False he had comprehended.

Most creations originating from the Xuanhuang Realm struggled to resist the Root of Heaven and Earth's ability to revert them to their primordial state. But the Transfiguration of True and False stemmed from Return to Truth, something far beyond the Xuanhuang Realm's Root of Heaven and Earth's capacity to analyze and differentiate.

Instead, scattered gray imprints, following the lines embedded in him, spread deeper into the Root of Heaven and Earth. These were not the World-Ending True Immortal Scripts, but countless divine senses Li Fan had split off, intending to use this attack to probe the mysteries of the Root of Heaven and Earth.

Countless images flashed before his eyes. In the void, light pulsed and flickered. Each change from light to dark signified the interweaving of trillions of lines. From nothingness, worlds were being born in the darkness.

*Boom!*

Just as Li Fan's mind was immersed in observation, these profound images suddenly shattered. The Root of Heaven and Earth, having perceived Li Fan's intent to infiltrate, caused all the lines embedded in him to instantly fade and disappear. Li Fan's connection to the Root of Heaven and Earth was thus severed. Moreover, the lines constantly weaving and creating within his field of vision slowly receded into the void, becoming unobservable.

The light suddenly brightened, as Li Fan was repelled by the Root of Heaven and Earth and returned to Heavenly Spirit Prefecture of the Xuanhuang Realm.

"A pity," he murmured. "Its instinctive crisis response is indeed swift."

Though he spoke these words, he felt no great regret. Li Fan's eyes narrowed as he recalled the "traces of human manipulation" he had glimpsed. His probing of the Root of Heaven and Earth's secrets was merely a feint; Li Fan's true objective was to attract its attention, allowing him to better sense those hidden imprints.

The imprints were both new and old. If Li Fan could barely discern the new traces with his current strength, then the older imprints were almost indistinguishable. He could only sense their existence instinctively, relying on a familiarity he had encountered once before.

The distinction between new and old imprints was relative; even the new traces were thousands of years old.

"The Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven was the work of the One Beginning Sect in ancient times, intended to guide the generation of laws within the Root of Heaven and Earth to counter world-ending calamities. With the Five Elements complete and Primordial Unity flowing, it forms a world of its own. The birth of each Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven represents a significant depletion for the Xuanhuang Realm, akin to a mortal woman giving birth. Normally, one is the limit. But due to the One Beginning Sect's guidance within the Xuanhuang Realm's Root of Heaven and Earth, this process of gestation never ceases..."

Li Fan's gaze flickered as he deciphered the origin of the new traces. With a point of his finger towards the front, despite feeling a powerful repulsive force, Li Fan used his own strength to forcefully push his way back in.

It was as if he had stirred a hornet's nest; countless black and white lines within the Root of Heaven and Earth instantly erupted. They surged towards Li Fan, seemingly with an intent to kill. This time, Li Fan no longer played the role of a live target. His figure flickered as he evaded the attacks of the Root of Heaven and Earth, using his finger as a blade to sever the imprints left by the One Beginning Sect one by one.

*Buzz, buzz, buzz...*

The Root of Heaven and Earth vibrated in resonance. It seemed to understand Li Fan's actions, and the previously furious lines turned gentle. Returning to its original state, it became tranquil once more. In the fleeting moments, Li Fan had destroyed all the traces branded by the One Beginning Sect within the Root of Heaven and Earth. From this point forward, the Xuanhuang Realm would no longer birth new Five Elements Great Grotto-heavens. After all, Li Fan planned to usher in the birth of a super Xuanhuang Realm, and the gestation of Five Elements Grotto-heavens was a direct drain on the Xuanhuang Realm's power. Li Fan naturally would not allow such a thing to continue. Not only the Five Elements Great Grotto-heavens, but any other grotto-heavens within the Xuanhuang Realm whose gestation was unnecessary, Li Fan would prevent their arrival, accumulating strength for the Xuanhuang Realm.

The repulsive force of the Root of Heaven and Earth had completely disappeared, allowing Li Fan to observe the almost imperceptible ancient traces with greater detail.

"As expected. It's identical to the ancient immortal formation that guarded the Nine-Star Red Pearl." The ancient imprints, like natural birthmarks, had fused almost entirely with the space of the Root of Heaven and Earth. Had Li Fan not chanced upon a similar existence before, he might have mistaken them as inherent characteristics of the Root of Heaven and Earth itself.

A portion of the imprint had already penetrated the space itself, preventing Li Fan from discerning the original appearance of this immortal formation. However, when cross-referenced with the data from the array deduction within the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc, the majority matched.

"Finally, I've found you," Li Fan's eyes gleamed. His previous deductions indicated that the Sky Crossing Starry Sea Formation was composed of four sub-formations. In his past reincarnation, Li Fan had already confirmed three-fourths of them: the golden chains used to lock and capture cultivation worlds beyond the star sea; the Eye of the Tian Beast serving as an observation post; and the Abyssal Sea, also known as the Spirit Gathering Ascension Formation, used to escape the suction of the Immortal Ruins. The last one, however, had eluded him despite searching the entire Xuanhuang Realm. Even when the Immortal Array ended the world in his previous life, Li Fan had failed to pinpoint its possible location. Not expecting it, during this life’s journey to absorb the anchor point, he stumbled upon an unexpected treasure.

"The Sky Crossing Great Formation here was likely modified by King Xuan Tian based on the ancient realm-protecting immortal formation." Unlike the other formations, the modifications here were extremely minor, almost leaving it untouched. "With the Root of Heaven and Earth constantly weaving creations, the Xuanhuang Realm, even when navigating the star sea, possesses the ability to continuously repair itself and even grow. This self-growth, unlike the stitching together of external fragmented realms by Dharma-Preachers and Heavenly Physicians, does not involve the anomalies caused by conflicting world laws or side effects during the fusion process..."

A scene suddenly appeared before Li Fan's eyes. In the boundless dark void, the Xuanhuang Realm proceeded like a colossal starship, moving slowly. The Eye of the Tian Beast was responsible for observation and positioning; the golden chains sought external targets and gathered resources; the Abyssal Sea provided an endless source of power; and the Root of Heaven and Earth was responsible for repair and growth. It was truly a perfect survival strategy in the star sea.

"Sky Crossing Starry Sea, Sky Crossing Starry Sea." "With this great formation, one can indeed traverse the star sea and disregard calamities. King Xuan Tian is truly an unparalleled genius!" Li Fan praised sincerely.

"It's a pity..." "Such an extraordinary individual, on the verge of ascending to immortality, suddenly met with an accident." Li Fan's eyes narrowed. King Xuan Tian's disappearance was one of the greatest mysteries in the Xuanhuang Realm's history. Even after Li Fan's countless reincarnations, and even when the Immortal Array ended the world, uncovering all the dark secrets, he still could not ascertain the truth. He could only vaguely guess that the process of formal ascension to immortality might carry immense risks.

"Although King Xuan Tian is no longer present, this Sky Crossing Great Formation can be of use to me." "I had previously speculated that after King Xuan Tian's mysterious disappearance, he might have hidden within the last Sky Crossing Great Formation. But looking now..."

Because Li Fan had assisted in "birth control," the Root of Heaven and Earth had chosen to let bygones be bygones regarding his previous actions of absorbing the Five Elements Great Grotto-heavens. However, it did not generate much goodwill. It merely allowed Li Fan to freely roam within this world of converging laws.

Though it appeared boundless, it was an illusion created by the interweaving of laws and immortal formations. Li Fan, proficient in formations, did not get lost. In a short time, he had thoroughly searched the interior of the Root of Heaven and Earth. As Li Fan had expected, he found no trace of King Xuan Tian's possible whereabouts.

"In my previous life, when the Immortal Array ended the world, I never saw Mo Ruibin either." "If he were within the Xuanhuang Realm, with his strength, he could have resisted it somewhat. Could it be..." Li Fan frowned. Mo Ruibin had no reason to abandon his long-held goal and flee the Xuanhuang Realm directly. Therefore, it was highly probable that he had gone to the Eye of the Tian Beast, located outside the Xuanhuang Realm in some unknown location.

"The Eye of the Tian Beast can serve as a surveying formation for crossing the star sea, so its observational range should be far broader than I imagined. Perhaps even beyond the void outside the realm..." A flicker of realization crossed Li Fan's mind. "The Sky Crossing Starry Sea Great Formation is almost integrated with the Xuanhuang Realm. This Eye of the Tian Beast might even be able to reverse its function and observe the Xuanhuang Realm. However, Mo Ruibin might not know its exact location, and searching the star sea rashly carries certain risks. That's why in the 119th life, when I pretended to cooperate with him, he didn't choose this path. And in my previous life, when pursued by a clone of the Sacred Emperor and in near desperation, he was forced to make that choice."

Li Fan learned of the Eye of the Tian Beast from an unfortunate soul who, after using a teleportation array from Nine Mountains Province, was randomly transported there. He even encountered Heavenly Physician, who sensed the aura and came. Fortunately, relying on his wit, he gained Heavenly Physician's trust and, by chance, obtained Heavenly Physician's secret transmission, the Book of Heaven Mending. The probability of being randomly transported to the Eye of the Tian Beast was extremely small, so Li Fan naturally could not attempt it himself. However, Nine Mountains Province was formed from the ancient corpse of the Tian Beast, so it was bound to have some connection with the distant Eye of the Tian Beast. Perhaps he could use this thread of connection to locate the Eye of the Tian Beast.

"The Sky Crossing Starry Sea Great Formation is also extremely important for the sublimation of the Xuanhuang Realm in this life." "Although the great formation is broken, if I repair it and reactivate it..." During King Xuan Tian's era, the Sky Crossing Starry Sea Great Formation only covered a small area of the original Xuanhuang Realm, merely the central core region compared to the current merged Xuanhuang Realm. "I can expand the great formation and, without anyone noticing, control the Xuanhuang Realm."

The Tribulation End Dissolution Disc was currently too occupied with its heavy tasks to be of immediate assistance. Li Fan relied solely on his own understanding and deductions of formations. In his sea of consciousness, the Sky Crossing Great Formation radiated outwards from the center, gradually enveloping the Azure Nether light sphere, eventually transforming into a colossal starship.

"When expanding and rebuilding the formation, I can incorporate the world-ending immortal formation I comprehended in my previous life." "When the Xuanhuang Realm finally completes its transformation, even if the descending immortal souls are powerful beyond my expectations, with the formation as a restraint, they will be unable to escape my grasp," Li Fan mused inwardly.

It had to be said that working on the shoulders of giants made things significantly easier. With the foundation laid by King Xuan Tian, Li Fan's plan was almost halved in terms of effort. Or rather, without King Xuan Tian's arrangements, with Li Fan's current formation mastery, it would have been impossible to construct a new Sky Crossing Starry Sea Great Formation.

"Currently, there is still too little information about the four formations of the Sky Crossing." Li Fan's thoughts naturally turned to Mo Ruibin. In his battle with the Sacred Emperor in his previous life, he had seen through most of Mo Ruibin's techniques. As long as he made preparations in advance, Li Fan was confident in subduing him. He had been toyed with by Mo Ruibin before; now it was time for retribution.

However... before seeking revenge on Mo Ruibin and gathering information, Li Fan first arrived at the location of another Law King of the Heavenly Mysteries Sect. In Eastern Yong Prefecture, within a ring mountain.

The sky was filled with blooming Spirit Qi flowers, a breathtaking sight. Li Fan, however, knew that hidden within these magnificent flowers were the memories—or rather, soul fragments—of Ji Yuzhen, one of the former Law Kings of the Heavenly Mysteries Sect. Ji Yuzhen cultivated the Boundless Heavenly Axis Spirit Severing Art, a divine technique that even King Xuan Tian, Xuanyuan Hong himself, praised as unparalleled in his lifetime. Though Ji Yuzhen appeared to have perished, he retained a sliver of hope, hidden within these endless soul flowers. In the final moments of Li Fan's previous life, amidst the storm of the Immortal Array ending the world, this place was one of the last shining points of resistance in the Myriad Immortals Alliance region.

"My previous technique for prying into memories must still have some flaws." "Within Ji Yuzhen's memories, there are true secrets hidden." A sharp glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes. A seemingly ordinary white ring suddenly appeared in his hand—the Fallen Mortal Dust. He tossed it up gently, and the white ring instantly enveloped the entire ring mountain. It descended silently, transforming everything it covered into Spirit Qi. The vast ring mountain crumbled, section by section. The soul flowers, fused with the mountain and hidden within, almost impossible to detect by ordinary means, slowly drifted out.

Chapter 1314

After cultivating the Immeasurable Heavenly Axis Spirit Severing Art, there was a distinction between the myriad scattered souls and the primordial soul. What Li Fan had found in the ring-shaped mountains of Dongyong Continent previously was merely the memories of these scattered souls.

The truly important primordial soul had not been discovered until now.

It was only when the White Circle’s "Mortal Descends to the Dust" intervened, completely obliterating the ring-shaped mountains, that the primordial soul hidden within was finally revealed.

Unlike the scattered Spirit Qi flowers floating outside, the divine soul flowers hidden within the ring-shaped mountains seemed to remain dormant. Even when actively contacted, they did not launch an attack.

As these divine soul flowers were exposed after losing their hiding place, they began to gather spontaneously in a patterned manner, slowly forming a giant, luminous white flower. The countless Spirit Qi flowers drifting in the atmosphere of the ring-shaped mountain region seemed to have found their core, revolving around the glowing white flower.

Amidst the rising storm, the primordial divine soul flower gradually became like the surrounding Spirit Qi flowers, seemingly attempting to conceal itself by this method.

Unfortunately, the moment the ring-shaped mountains collapsed and the divine soul flowers scattered outwards, Li Fan’s colossal divine sense had already locked onto them. How could such a crude illusion trick fool Li Fan?

However, Li Fan soon realized he was mistaken.

When his divine sense contacted one of the primordial divine soul flowers, the scene that followed felt strangely familiar. It was the same scene he had encountered within ordinary Spirit Qi flowers before!

"As expected, there’s some skill involved. Even when locked onto by me, it can still silently swap and transfer…" Looking at the trillions of flowers before him, Li Fan snorted, "But since I've already discovered you, how can I let you escape again!"

"You hide within the endless sea of flowers, so I shall boil the sea!"

“Azure Nether World-Ending Mutation: [Heaven Punishes, Earth Destroys, Souls Gather, Life Forms Born]!”

A terrifying aura of malevolence surged from Li Fan. His eyes turned completely black, and the malevolent aura condensed into tangible form, like myriad tiny tentacles swaying in the wind. Within this black aura, faint streaks of lightning could be seen, as if divine punishment had descended, intending to exterminate all living beings in the world!

This was one of the variations of Li Fan’s Azure Nether World-Ending Mutation. Faced with a desperate situation of destruction, the Xuanhuang Realm, in order to survive, would annihilate all living beings within its borders, absorbing their flesh, blood, and divine souls to increase its chances against the world-ending crisis. This variation was even more extreme than Li Fan’s previous use of [Heaven and Earth Silence, All Things Frozen], representing a desperate gamble for survival where nothing would remain but oneself.

Above Dongyong Continent, boundless black clouds rolled in from the horizon. This was the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao’s responsive reaction to sensing the extreme change occurring here. Li Fan even felt that, due to the birth of this Heaven and Earth Mutation, the Xuanhuang Realm’s attitude towards him was rapidly deteriorating. The goodwill he had painstakingly accumulated was almost instantly erased.

However, Li Fan paid it no mind.

The malevolent aura tentacles continuously branched out, enveloping all the Spirit Qi flowers they could touch and piercing them ferociously. One by one, the Spirit Qi flowers withered.

Concurrently, streams of incredibly pure, yet subtly strange, energy were absorbed and concentrated, interspersed with numerous fragmented memories. Some belonged to Ji Yuzhen, while others were from cultivators who had perished here. Li Fan categorized and organized the memories belonging to Ji Yuzhen, gradually piecing together complete scenes. At the same time, he focused his mind, awaiting the discovery of the primordial scattered souls.

The immortal techniques of the Heavenly Mysteries Sect each had their own secretive aspects. To be safe, Li Fan did not greedily absorb the energy transformed from the Spirit Qi flowers directly. Instead, he gathered it all in one place and sealed it with the essence of primal force.

The black tentacles writhed and clawed. The flowers filling the sky vanished in large swathes at a speed visible to the naked eye. Soon, the first primordial soul could no longer hide and was found by Li Fan. He did not drain or destroy the divine soul, but merely peered into the memories hidden within.

Bang!

Like a phantom parade, scenes flashed by rapidly. It was as if they were covered by a layer of white light, flickering in and out of existence, hazy and indistinct.

"Zhen'er, have you remembered the method to activate the [Golden Lock Across the Heavens Array]?" The voice of the Heavenly Mysteries King was heard, but his face was hidden by the white light, impossible to discern clearly.

"Brother Xuanyuan, do you think I'm that foolish in your heart?" Ji Yuzhen replied with a hint of teasing.

The Heavenly Mysteries King quickly explained, "Zhen'er, don't misunderstand. I know your talent is no less than mine. However, this formation is an improvement upon an immortal formation. The difference between immortals and mortals, without personal experience, is truly difficult to comprehend correctly."

"Since Brother Xuanyuan is so worried, please teach me again." Ji Yuzhen said softly.

"Uh… alright." The Heavenly Mysteries King hesitated for a moment before nodding in agreement. He said gravely, "The Golden Lock spans across the heavens. Even if the target is at the far end of the distant star sea, once locked on, the chain can reach it in an instant and capture it."

"I told you before that the reason this effect is achievable is because it is embedded with the [Horizon at Arm's Length] grand formation. This formation was originally inscribed in the Immortal Realm's Ascension Platform. When I fled, I moved the entire immortal formation down…"

Ji Yuzhen looked at Xuanyuan Hong, as if imagining him collecting immortal artifacts while fleeing for his life, and couldn't help but chuckle again, "Even though I've heard this from you before, I still find it hard to imagine that Brother Xuanyuan is such a person."

Xuanyuan Hong coughed awkwardly, "The Immortal Realm faced a catastrophe, which would evidently affect the lower realms. Of course, I had to make ample preparations. Moreover, they were all ownerless items…"

The Heavenly Mysteries King earnestly defended himself before continuing, "The spatial and temporal shifts of the star sea mean that the location of the cultivation world observed by the Tian Beast’s Eye might have subtle deviations from its actual position. Therefore, when using the Golden Lock for capture, corresponding adjustments must be made. Currently, there is no perfect solution to resolve this deviation, so it relies entirely on the experience and intuition of the controller."

"The [Horizon at Arm's Length] grand formation consumes a tremendous amount of energy. After a period of use, it needs to be repaired and replenished. However, there’s no need to worry about damage. I have replicated the critical core components into three backups. At most, the capture efficiency will decrease, but it will not affect the formation's function…"

The Heavenly Mysteries King explained in great detail, and Ji Yuzhen listened to every word. However, her gaze remained fixed on Xuanyuan Hong's face, never wavering.

…

Returning from the memory to reality, Li Fan carefully sealed this primordial soul. He then turned his attention to the remaining flowers. As more incorrect options were eliminated, the retrieval of primordial souls became increasingly rapid. Ji Yuzhen's memories surfaced one after another.

…

Vaguely, in a secret chamber. Ji Yuzhen and Xuanyuan Hong stood facing each other.

"Brother Xuanyuan, you've finally come to your senses, inviting me here alone." Ji Yuzhen’s beautiful eyes rippled slightly as she gazed at the Heavenly Mysteries King.

"Zhen'er, don't be silly. We have important matters today." Xuanyuan Hong said seriously.

"The other eleven brothers have already chosen their immortal techniques, yet you are still undecided…"

"I said, I want Brother Xuanyuan to choose for me." Ji Yuzhen interrupted Xuanyuan Hong.

Xuanyuan Hong showed a helpless expression, "I sought you out precisely for this matter."

"Has Brother Xuanyuan chosen for me?"

"The Immeasurable Heavenly Axis Spirit Severing Art. Even among the many immortal techniques I've collected, it is of the highest caliber. It allows for countless scattered souls, without end or destruction. More importantly, it can nurture one's own divine soul, dividing it into primordial souls. Each primordial soul can embark on its own independent immortal path…" The Heavenly Mysteries King spoke eloquently.

"I believe in my elder brother. I will cultivate this." Before Xuanyuan Hong could finish, Ji Yuzhen had made her decision.

Xuanyuan Hong paused, nodded slightly, pointed to his own brow, and then groups of dark characters flew out. Xuanyuan Hong closed his eyes, his expression calm, but he occasionally frowned as if enduring immense pain.

"The divine, is the flower of destiny. Wandering the Supreme Void, its splendor is like the new green of a spring willow, abundant yet orderly, divisible yet united…" The moment she saw those flowing dark characters, an extremely profound cultivation technique appeared in her mind. It contained not only the content of the technique but also countless memories of cultivating it, along with specific insights. Although a beginner, it felt as though she had reincarnated thousands of times and had cultivated it countless times before.

After an unknown period, the dark characters slowly returned to the Heavenly Mysteries King’s sea of consciousness.

"Brother Xuanyuan, are you alright?" Ji Yuzhen stepped forward to check with great concern. She saw myriad ferocious faces flash across Xuanyuan Hong's face, as if attempting to possess him. However, he eventually returned to his original appearance.

"Brother Xuanyuan, you could have just directly transferred the technique. Why did you have to use this method of inheritance?" Ji Yuzhen's tone held a hint of accusation.

Xuanyuan Hong sighed softly, "Zhen'er, the complexity of immortal techniques is far beyond that of lower realm cultivation methods. Although your talent is exceptional, without guided inheritance, it would take you over a decade just to initiate this Spirit Severing Art. We don't have that much time…"

Ji Yuzhen remained silent. Xuanyuan Hong added, "Furthermore, judging by the cultivation progress of the other brothers, there is a clear difference between those who received inheritance and those who didn't. It should be due to the limitations of the technique within the [Azure Nether Orb]."

"This [Azure Nether Orb] might not be a good thing," Ji Yuzhen snorted coldly.

Xuanyuan Hong did not agree, "There is no good or evil in cultivation techniques; it all depends on the cultivator. The Azure Nether Orb is the same."

"It can absorb the corpses of fallen cultivators and refine the techniques they cultivated in life. This alone demonstrates the extraordinary nature of this treasure bead."

"It's a pity I obtained it too late. I could only hastily scan the nearby corpses before making a hasty escape," Xuanyuan Hong said with regret.

…

Fragment after fragment of scenes flashed through Li Fan’s mind. They were all part of the life of Ji Yuzhen, the Heavenly Mysteries Sect's Law King of the past. Compared to the fragments preserved in the Spirit Qi flowers, the memories within the primordial soul were more complete. Moreover, they involved many of the Heavenly Mysteries King’s secrets.

For instance, the origin of the Heavenly Mysteries Law King’s immortal cultivation technique, the mysterious Celestial Treasure, the Azure Nether Orb. The method of activating and controlling the Floating Sky Grand Formation, the Golden Lock Across the Heavens. And also, the intimate moments between Ji Yuzhen and Xuanyuan Hong.

However, what puzzled Li Fan was that the memories within these primordial souls were still not complete. Certain important fragments were missing.

Li Fan’s gaze swept around, ensuring no stray Spirit Qi flowers remained. "Did they escape while I wasn't paying attention, or… were those primordial souls never preserved?"

Li Fan obtained the complete content of the Spirit Severing Art from Ji Yuzhen's memories. Although it lacked the so-called inheritance method for entry, he had a general understanding of the immortal technique.

Besides being able to split into myriad souls and achieve immortality, the primordial soul had another significant function: upon attaining the Dao, it could serve as a medicinal guide. Whether consumed by oneself or others, it could perfectly merge and integrate two distinct paths of the Dao.

True Immortals pursued a single Great Dao. The Dao was singular. It not only repelled other cultivators who followed that path but also made it difficult to cultivate two different paths simultaneously. However, the Spirit Severing Art could ingeniously resolve this limitation. The healing effect of consuming a primordial soul was insignificant compared to this earth-shattering [Dao Merging] function.

"From the memories I accessed earlier, when the Heavenly Mysteries King was injured, Ji Yuzhen had considered offering her primordial soul to him."

"Now, her most important primordial soul is missing. Could it be that she found the Heavenly Mysteries King in the final moments and offered herself to him?" Li Fan couldn't help but speculate.

Ji Yuzhen clearly loved the Heavenly Mysteries King deeply. However, for some unknown reason, Xuanyuan Hong never accepted her affection and even deliberately maintained a distance. Sacrificing herself to save the Heavenly Mysteries King was entirely within Ji Yuzhen's character.

"Heavenly Mysteries King." Li Fan murmured, looking up at the sky. The accumulated dark clouds in the Xuanhuang Realm had reached their limit, as if ready to descend from the heavens at any moment.

All of Ji Yuzhen's scattered divine souls had been absorbed. Li Fan retracted the Heaven Punishing Earth Destroying Mutation. His figure flickered, and he vanished from his original position. The anomaly in the sky also dissipated.

The Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators, who had been held back by an invisible barrier, arrived late. Upon discovering the ring-shaped mountains and Spirit Qi flowers that had vanished into thin air, they were greatly alarmed and immediately reported to the Alliance Headquarters.

…

Li Fan did not immediately seek out Mo Ruobin. Instead, he went into seclusion to digest the memories from Ji Yuzhen's divine soul. The life of a Law King, even with certain crucial parts missing, was still vast. Especially within the primordial soul, not only were memories contained, but also the thoughts and emotions of that time. While observing, he was inevitably affected by these emotions. To prevent himself from being influenced or, conversely, overtaken by Ji Yuzhen's residual consciousness, Li Fan paused after experiencing each memory to temper and eradicate the infiltrating emotions.

"The memories of Ji Yuzhen's initial encounter with the Heavenly Mysteries King are also missing. It seems to be the crucial reason why she fell in love with him, and one of her most precious memories."

"However, Ji Yuzhen’s memories of the other eleven Law Kings have been preserved."

Chapter 1315

Here are the images of the twelve Law Kings of the Heavenly Mysteries Sect, appearing one after another before Li Fan, excluding Ji Yuzhen.

There was Sun Xingwang, who was rambling and perpetually hidden in shadows.

There was the giant Sikong Lin, full of bravado and unconcerned with trivialities.

There was Mo Rubing, taciturn and always following the lead of Heavenly Mysteries King.

There was Cui Zhiyuan, the eldest and most senior among the Law Kings.

There was Zhou Yangli, the youngest, yet remarkably sharp and ambitious.

There was Gongye Tianzong, with his curly beard, muscular build, and peak mastery in artifact refining. Even the Heavenly Mysteries King, upon returning from the Immortal Realm, would often seek his guidance.

There was Luo Yichen, a peerless beauty of the Xuanhuang Realm, whose face was perpetually veiled by white cloth. She originally excelled in dual cultivation and had countless male consorts. Later, she executed all those she had been involved with to solidify her righteous heart.

There was Madam Nie, who managed one of the Xuanhuang Realm's largest merchant guilds, the Azure Pavilion. Her informants were everywhere, and she navigated matters with exceptional skill.

There was Xing Wuque, missing all four limbs and with a disfigured face. He perpetually wore a bronze fanged mask and rarely communicated with others.

There was Tian Xingke, portly and always smiling, a peacemaker.

And there was Yue Qianjie, the martial powerhouse among the twelve Law Kings, widely recognized as the strongest in combat. He was infatuated with fighting and proficient in all laws.

Li Fan had only seen most of these individuals once in Ji Yuzhen's memories and therefore possessed little specific information about them. However, some of them were quite familiar to him.

"In my previous life, Mo Rubing once told the Sacred Emperor's clone directly that his strength was the weakest among the twelve Law Kings," Li Fan mused, observing the scant memories Ji Yuzhen had of other Law Kings. "I used to think it was a vain statement, but now..."

Although they were all twelve Law Kings, Ji Yuzhen had dedicated her heart entirely to Xuanyuan Hong. She was not particularly close to the other Law Kings, considering them mere colleagues. However, she had a general idea of their respective strengths. While they had never formally dueled, Mo Rubing's strength was indeed considered to be at the lower end among the twelve Law Kings. This impression, however, predated the Law Kings' cultivation of the immortal methods bestowed by the Heavenly Mysteries King. The immortal methods were exquisitely profound, and after their conversion, Ji Yuzhen could no longer discern the true extent of their abilities.

"The giant skeleton that Senior Sister Zhao discovered in the cave was indeed Sikong Lin. Sun Xingwang's cultivation method was also left there, suggesting he met a grim fate as well."

"Mo Rubing is still in slumber. As for the others..." After the destruction of the Heavenly Mysteries Sect, the Myriad Immortal Sects had relentlessly pursued them. Even so, Li Fan did not believe that all these Law Kings, except for Mo Rubing, were dead. "Perhaps they are still slumbering and recuperating in some corner of the Xuanhuang Realm," Li Fan thought, shaking his head slightly, not particularly concerned. Even if they had once stood at the pinnacle of the Xuanhuang Realm, as long as they couldn't survive the World-Ending Immortal Array, they wouldn't be of interest to Li Fan. In his previous life, these Heavenly Mysteries Sect Law Kings were not among the remaining glimmers of light that endured the ravages of the world-ending storm.

"Unless, of course, any survivors have long since left the Xuanhuang Realm," a thought suddenly flashed through Li Fan's mind.

It took Li Fan nearly half a month to fully digest all of Ji Yuzhen's memories. Aside from the information about the twelve Law Kings, the most crucial aspects were the Azure Nether Orb and the method for controlling the Star-Crossing Great Formation, the Golden Lock Array. Xuanyuan Hong had once displayed this treasure, obtained from the Immortal Realm, to Ji Yuzhen. Just as its name suggested, the orb's body displayed a scene of the radiant blue sky, slowly flowing. Besides being able to analyze the cultivation methods practiced by a cultivator's corpse during their lifetime and transform them into inheritances within the orb, the Azure Nether Orb was rumored to be able to devour other immortal artifacts, copying their original might and transferring it into the orb. It was a pity that the Azure Nether Orb was itself an immortal artifact, requiring a vast amount of immortal Spirit Qi to activate. The Heavenly Mysteries King had merely introduced it to Ji Yuzhen, not truly demonstrating its capabilities.

"This Azure Nether Orb is truly a treasure," Li Fan remarked.

"It is said that within the Heavenly Mysteries Sect, there is a secret art called 'Heaven's Usurpation,' which not only completely seizes cultivation methods and cultivation bases but can also transfer the realm and strength obtained from practicing Heavenly Mysteries Sect's cultivation methods, like grafting flowers. Perhaps this is achieved through the Azure Nether Orb, as the immortal methods practiced by all the Law Kings originated from its inheritance."

"The Azure Nether Orb is an immortal treasure and can absolutely withstand the World-Ending Immortal Array. Yet, in the previous life's storm, its presence was nowhere to be seen..." A multitude of thoughts flashed through Li Fan's mind.

Finally, he focused his thoughts and his gaze fell upon a transparent figure ahead, ensnared by a golden net of Primal Force Essence. The figure was extremely sparse, as if it could dissipate at any moment. Most importantly, it was incomplete, torn and tattered. This indistinct figure was, naturally, Ji Yuzhen's primordial soul.

"Even after being subjected to such torment, I can still sense its unceasing vitality. Truly worthy of an immortal method."

"Moreover, the most essential part of this primordial soul is missing, yet it still elicits a hint of temptation from me..." Li Fan praised inwardly. Despite the allure of such a divine soul bounty, Li Fan did not choose to feast directly. Instead, he extended a stream of pure divine soul power, like a flowing brook, towards the damaged primordial soul. It acted like an adhesive, slowly piecing together Ji Yuzhen's fragmented primordial soul, stabilizing it. This divine soul power was, of course, not Li Fan's own. It was obtained from the destruction of Ji Yuzhen's countless ordinary clones. Being of the same origin, it was accepted without any obstruction. The golden light continued to coil, completely sealing Ji Yuzhen's slumbering primordial soul. Li Fan waved his hand, retracting the golden light.

Next, he teleported to the ruins of the Purple Firmament Sect and his gaze fell upon Mo Rubing below. He let out a cold snort, not disturbing Mo Rubing. Instead, he silently began weaving a massive golden net outside the space where Mo Rubing was hiding. The downgraded derivation of the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc's immortal array had yielded initial results. While substituting immortal Spirit Qi with Primal Force Essence to construct the array inevitably weakened its power compared to a true immortal array, it was still considered the pinnacle of the mortal realm, unbreakable by anything less than a Supreme Dao artifact. Mo Rubing never awoke throughout this entire process. The space he occupied had already been enveloped by the immortal array and transferred.

Having temporarily placed the two surviving Heavenly Mysteries Sect Law Kings in one location, Li Fan did not wake them. After learning of the Azure Nether Orb's existence from Ji Yuzhen's memories, a vague plan began to form in his mind.

"The cultivation methods practiced by Mo Rubing and Ji Yuzhen both originated from the Azure Nether Orb's inheritance."

"Does this imply that there exists a subtle connection between them and the Azure Nether Orb? Even if this connection is almost imperceptible, it is still real."

"It is akin to how the Divine Tree, evolved from the Seed of Life Transformation on the Mystic Immortal Boat, still has a connection with the If Wood, which had devoured the Azure Nether Divine Wood Sect's outer-realm divine wood."

"In my previous life, the Mystic Immortal Boat amplified these subtle connections with the power of True Immortal Sigils, allowing it to cross the star sea and pinpoint the Xuanhuang Realm's location beneath the Immortal Ruins."

"If I replicate this method, I might be able to follow the trail and locate the Azure Nether Orb, or even the Heavenly Mysteries King's whereabouts," Li Fan's eyes gleamed. The only current obstacle was that the True Immortal Sigils learned on the Mystic Immortal Boat, while possessing the host Zhao Xian in his previous life, did not include the ability to amplify connections between objects. However, this was not a significant problem for Li Fan. Soon, he would be escorting Senior Yin and the others to the Great Wall of Broken Realms beneath the The Great Barrier, which happened to pass by the Mystic Immortal Boat. Having fully understood the temperaments of the influential elders on the Mystic Immortal Boat, Li Fan was confident that he could "borrow" this True Immortal Sigils without much difficulty.

Having laid down a pseudo-immortal array and sealed the two Heavenly Mysteries Sect Law Kings, the Primal Force Essence accumulated over these days was completely depleted. Maintaining the operation of the immortal array required a continuous supply of Primal Force Essence.

"Without the Cat Treasure's life simulation and marrow cleansing functions, I am currently unable to replicate the Great Heavenly Venerate's bloodline with my existing means." "I can only rely on the Flesh and Blood Factory breeding method to produce as many Netherfolk as possible." In this life, Li Fan had assigned the task of breeding Netherfolk to the Imperial Empire's pocket world. With Xu Ke's intervention, the Imperial Empire's pocket world offered no resistance. Xiao Qing, Xiao Hong, and the Imperial Daughter, after receiving the experience and memory inheritance from Li Fan's Dao-Sermon projection, immediately put it into practice. With the full might of the Imperial Empire's pocket world, they were dedicated to cultivating Netherfolk. "Compared to the direct replication of the Flesh and Blood Factory, this method still requires a complete growth cycle, making it significantly less efficient. However, it is the best method available at present."

Of course, Li Fan could also generate massive amounts of Primal Force Essence through the remnant statue of the Faceless True Immortal. Since he had escaped from the True Immortal's Net once, Li Fan could escape countless times. To a certain extent, he could almost disregard the threat posed by the Faceless True Immortal, especially now knowing of the Cat Treasure's existence.

"I wonder what the Faceless True Immortal's reaction would be if it were attracted here and then happened to run into the Cat Treasure..." Li Fan could not help but envision such a scenario in his mind. However, it was merely a thought. Both the Faceless True Immortal and the Cat Treasure were beings beyond his control. Even Li Fan's greatest trump card, the Immortal-grade Great Formation, would likely be unable to even slightly affect them. Therefore, for now, he could only avoid them.

"But it will not be long now," Li Fan's eyes flickered slightly. "After achieving Dao Integration in this life, perhaps I can take the opportunity to test it."

...

Time flowed by swiftly. There were still ten days left before Yin Shang and the others made their final decision. During this period, in addition to creating Dao-Sermon projections to continue spreading the Dao in the Great Xuan pocket world, Li Fan also summoned Ou Daozi and his son Ou Shangtian. Ou Daozi was not particularly important, but Ou Shangtian was. At this point in time, the Heavenly Bone Hand and the Myriad Deaths Scroll within him had not yet truly awakened. As Heavenly and Earthly Marvels fused with immortal artifacts, these two possessed incredible power. Especially in this life, as the Xuanhuang Realm underwent transformation and sublimation, these two oddities within Ou Shangtian were also undergoing corresponding changes.

Li Fan observed the specific situation within Ou Shangtian. The Heavenly Bone Hand had merged with Ou Shangtian's arm, making it difficult to distinguish. The Myriad Deaths Scroll, however, was hidden within Ou Shangtian's sea of consciousness, currently appearing as a faint transparent mark, not yet revealing its true form.

"Is this what is meant by the 'Child of Destiny'?" Li Fan sensed the oddities within Ou Shangtian and their continued connection with the Heavenly Dao of the Xuanhuang Realm, thinking thus. He attempted to find patterns in the circulation of immortal artifact remnants within the Xuanhuang Realm after their ingestion by the Xuanhuang Realm, hoping to discover more ancient immortal artifacts. However, it seemed purely random. Ou Shangtian's physical constitution was unremarkable. He was merely chosen by the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao at birth to be the companion to immortal artifacts. Based on Li Fan's understanding of the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao, it must have had some hidden purpose in doing so. After all, cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm devoured heaven and consumed earth, and the Heavenly Dao harbored immense hatred for cultivators. The Heavenly Dao had no reason to bestow blessings upon cultivators.

"The only explanation is that the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao itself is incapable of digesting these immortal artifacts." "Therefore, it requires an intermediary – cultivators. The immortal artifacts are first transformed by the cultivators' bodies. When the cultivators perish, the power contained within the immortal artifacts returns to heaven through the Dao, and is then absorbed by the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao…" Li Fan looked towards the sky of the Xuanhuang Realm. "Indeed, a clever scheme." Placing his hand on the head of the sleeping Ou Shangtian, Li Fan sensed the process of the two oddities integrating into his body and slowly confirmed his guess.

"However, this method is certainly worth emulating." In his other hand, an ancient mirror appeared – the Sun family's treasured Immeasurable Mirror. Its internal mirror spirit had already been erased by Li Fan and replaced with a simulated personality. The Sun family, meanwhile, remained unaware of the alteration to their treasure. Due to the scarcity of Primal Force Essence, the Devouring Calamity hidden within the Immeasurable Mirror had not been completely eradicated. Therefore, Li Fan had no plans to use the Immeasurable Mirror for the time being. Although the Immeasurable Mirror was an immortal artifact, its crucial deduction function was useless to Li Fan. Furthermore, due to the influence of the Devouring Calamity, it contained no immortal Spirit Qi. To Li Fan, the value of the Immeasurable Mirror was exceedingly low. Li Fan had even previously attempted to have Luo Fanchen, through the white circle, decompose the Immeasurable Mirror to see if immortal Spirit Qi could be extracted. However, it was unfortunate that regarding the existence of immortal artifacts, Luo Fanchen seemed to have certain inherent limitations, and the decomposition ability of the white circle did not activate.

"It's not that it cannot be decomposed, but that there are special restrictions." Li Fan speculated about the origin of the white circle. He had initially thought the Immeasurable Mirror would become a mere burden he carried around, a "useless chicken." However, the Xuanhuang Realm's actions provided Li Fan with inspiration.

"What if the Immeasurable Mirror is transformed into a Law Oddity, and then through the death of a cultivator, it integrates into the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao..."

"My thinking is broadening. This applies not only to immortal artifacts like the Immeasurable Mirror."
