"It not only includes the normal territories of the Five Elders Council. One can also normally reach the Myriad Immortals Alliance. However, within the dream Land of Bliss, there are no Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerates or the Myriad Immortals Alliance organization. Cultivation resources are inexhaustible, and there's no fighting or contention. Cultivators can fully enjoy the magnificent scenery of the vast world. Even with just a tiny amount of Land of Bliss Coins, one can establish a grotto-heaven anywhere in the Xuanhuang Realm."

"Furthermore, with the reflection of Heavenly Venerate's power, even in the same area, countless grotto-heavens can be superimposed. There's no need to fight for land, and when cultivators enter and exit, they won't encounter others..."

A miniature depiction of the Xuanhuang Realm appeared before Sun Erlang and the others.

Anywhere in the image, for a single-digit amount of Land of Bliss Coins, one could be instantly teleported.

Even...

"We can leave the Xuanhuang Realm and go to other cultivation worlds in the starry sky to live?"

"Each world has magnificent scenery, no less than the Xuanhuang Realm."

Sun Erlang's face immediately showed a longing expression.

"It's a pity that only those with a Land of Bliss Experience Level of 6 are qualified."

Their attempt to try failed, and Sun Erlang and the others couldn't help but feel a little regretful.

...

Silver eyes presented Sun Erlang and the others' experiences in the Land of Bliss one by one.

It was like Li Fan's eyes, allowing Li Fan to know the situation within even without personally stepping into the Land of Bliss.

"To be able to survive the Great Formation of All Things Returning to Void, and even have the leisure to protect it. This Carefree Land of Bliss is indeed not simple."

"Its dream scope even extends beyond the Xuanhuang Realm, reaching into the Abyssal Star Sea?" This point truly exceeded Li Fan's expectations.

In the Great Qi pocket world, he gazed at the territories of the Five Elders Council, his eyes flashing, "What Carefree described in the dream should not be fabricated. Some of the descriptions of the cultivation worlds also match what I know."

"In the star sea, it's clearly already a void, dead and silent."

"Yet [Carefree] can reproduce the scenes of past cultivation worlds..."

"There are several possibilities. First, Carefree has been to these cultivation worlds. Second, it's based on ancient records, copying them."

"Or perhaps..." Li Fan's heart stirred.

"The Carefree Heavenly Venerate used the remnants of countless worlds in the Great Wall of Broken Realms as a blueprint. If this guess is true, it means that the power of Carefree or the dream Land of Bliss has even reached beneath the The Great Barrier?"

"Deep unknown dreams..."

Thinking of this, Li Fan immediately became serious.

"The blockade of the The Great Barrier, the communication from the Heavenly Mysteries King, the flaws in the The Great Barrier."

"Mother Stone of Dao Dissolution, Primordial Sect's information remains, the entire sect fled."

"Carefree Dream Land of Bliss."

Countless known pieces of information converged in Li Fan's mind in an instant. Not long after, a bold thought suddenly emerged.

"Could it be that the Carefree Heavenly Venerate, with the power of the Land of Bliss dream, has already made some contact with the flaws of the The Great Barrier?"

If it were before, Li Fan would definitely not have made such a guess.

After all, the Azure Nether Reverse Principle Longevity, suppressed by Dharma-Preachers for thousands of years, suddenly possessed the ability to surpass the The Great Barrier. No matter how he looked at it, it seemed preposterous.

But if combined with Carefree Land of Bliss's performance under the World-Ending Immortal Formation in his previous life.

This guess became plausible.

"Perhaps it is precisely because in reality, constrained by the New Law, they could only remain under the Dharma-Preachers."

"These people from the Five Elders Council chose to seek an alternative path."

"If they truly had this capability, then the fact that these five Longevity Realm cultivators have been so quiet all along could be explained."

"They were merely stalling for time."

Li Fan knew that the above were just his own speculations without much basis.

But for him, whether there was substantial evidence or not was irrelevant. As long as there was a sliver of doubt, it was very necessary to verify it.

"Anyway, the Carefree Land of Bliss accepts everyone. As long as one passes the so-called dream trials."

"And what I lack the least are various types of cultivators."

In an instant, Li Fan's gaze, through the Preaching Platform, fell upon suitable candidates in the various pocket worlds.

Silently, they received the cryptic guidance of the Sage Master and disappeared from their original positions, heading towards the Carefree Land of Bliss.

They became Li Fan's eyes and ears to investigate the situation in the Land of Bliss.

"Though the Land of Bliss is vast, one thought can traverse it!"

Li Fan was not worried that Carefree Heavenly Venerate would turn hostile for his overt probing of the Land of Bliss's secrets.

In this life, he had always remained behind the scenes.

The means by which he controlled these cultivator pawns originated from the Nine-Star Red Pearls of the Immortal Realm and the power of ancient immortal formations.

Li Fan didn't believe that Carefree could detect and find him.

Moreover, even if Carefree discovered his clandestine actions, so what?

The current Li Fan, with his various divine abilities, as long as it wasn't a True Immortal himself, nothing else could pose a threat to Li Fan.

There was no need to be so hesitant anymore.

Li Fan created another simulated personality specifically to constantly supervise the information about the Land of Bliss that he had gathered.

The Land of Bliss hid too many secrets, and these pawns would not be able to uncover them overnight.

Li Fan then shifted his attention to the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc.

In this life, the Dissolution Disc's continuous derivation mission, the downgrading of immortal formations, had finally made a breakthrough.

Originally, the Dissolution Disc's derivation process had been very slow. Being able to derive immortal formations was one thing, but being able to simplify them without losing much of their power was another.

However, as Li Fan continued to ascend and repeatedly overlooked the star sea from a higher dimensional perspective, a turning point appeared.

"Projections of the Great Dao, from top to bottom, like an inverted cone."

"The principles of the Immortal Realm are indeed extremely profound and not something that mortals in the lower realms can comprehend."

"But mortals are the foundation of the Great Dao."

"The two have commonalities."

This was Li Fan's realization as he researched the transformation between true and false.

Based on this theory, the Dissolution Disc used the common points between immortals and mortals as a breakthrough, and finally completed the preliminary derivation of downgrading immortal formations.

The first immortal formation to be simplified and practically verified was naturally the "Immortals Descend, All Things Return to Void."

After all, in this life, the Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate's legacy of immortal spiritual power needed to supply the Xuanhuang Realm's sublimation.

If this World-Ending Immortal Formation could not be activated, Li Fan's deterrent power would undoubtedly be greatly weakened.

And if the plan to sublimate the Xuanhuang Realm succeeded, without the means to "flip the table," Li Fan would undoubtedly be in a very passive position.

A phantom of a wooden sword flickered, and Li Fan went into the Abyssal Star Sea to begin his experiment.

With a gentle point forward, a large number of golden thin lines instantly appeared, like brushes, depicting the profound structural units of the formation in the void.

The scope of the World Returning to Void Formation used for this experiment was only one zhang in area.

Therefore, the required Essence of Primal Force was not much.

As the details of the formation became more complete, the World-Ending Immortal Formation slowly took shape.

Downgrading immortal formations did not mean a reduction in their power or quality.

It only meant that at the cost of limited sacrifices, the energy forms existing in the mortal realm could drive the immortal formations.

Golden light diffused, and the moment the formation was completed, all the light instantly extinguished.

Sensing the pitch-black area ahead, yet containing a terrifying destructive power, Li Fan silently cast a layer of sword shadow protection on himself.

To ensure that no accidents occurred, Li Fan took out a black star stone and threw it into the World Returning to Void Formation ahead.

This black star stone was one of the treasures Li Fan had taken from the first level of the Immortal Boat's hidden treasury when he left the Mystic Immortal Boat.

It was condensed from impurities that could not be destroyed after the cultivation world was destroyed.

It was equivalent to the physical version of a World Spirit.

Being able to survive under the power of True Immortals, the hardness of this black stone was imaginable.

However, the moment the black stone entered the World Returning to Void Formation, it was as if it was simultaneously bombarded by countless sharp carving knives.

Clearly visible etchings instantly appeared on the black stone.

The speed at which the etchings appeared increased faster and faster.

With a "poof," the black stone shattered into pieces, cut by the immortal formation.

However, the World-Ending storm's power remained undiminished.

It continued to blow fiercely.

These small stone fragments were cut smaller and smaller, about to become invisible to the naked eye.

"Compared to the World-Ending Immortal Formation in my previous life, the power has indeed weakened."

"But since it's driven by Essence of Primal Force, it's absolutely acceptable."

After completing the test, Li Fan immediately halted the great formation and collected the black stone fragments that had been cut into fine sand-like particles.

"Excellent forging material, it cannot be wasted. It can resist the power of True Immortals for a moment, and it can save lives at critical junctures."

Next, Li Fan also conducted downgrade verification on other immortal formations he mastered, such as Desolate Falling and Empty Chamber Blooming Flowers.

Without exception, all were successfully achieved.

The immortal formations that previously only existed in the theory of the Dissolution Disc could finally manifest in the real world, before Li Fan had mastered the power of True Immortals.

He couldn't help but feel a surge of joy.

After savoring the mystique of the immortal formations, Li Fan immediately returned to the Xuanhuang Realm.

He quietly began to set up formations in various places of the world that had not yet been sublimated.

With Li Fan's current attainment in formations and the assistance of the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc, even without the Azure Nether Great Heavenly Venerate's assistance, setting up formations would not be too difficult.

The main limitation was the raw materials and the quantity of Essence of Primal Force.

Even though the number of Netherfolk in this life had accumulated sufficiently, compared to Li Fan's all-around needs, the Essence of Primal Force was still somewhat insufficient.

A portion had to be reserved for emergencies.

After the accumulated resources were depleted, Li Fan had no choice but to wait for the Netherfolk to produce Essence of Primal Force before slowly setting up formations.

During this period, Li Fan did not forget to actively inquire with Mo Rubin, who was comprehending a trace of flaw at the foot of the The Great Barrier.

"Brother Mo, thirty days have passed. Have you gained any insights?"

After a long while, Mo Rubin's response slowly came.

"Not yet, for now. But I feel that I'm not far from true enlightenment."

"Brother Mo, you said that if there were no results within thirty days, you would immediately turn back and never look at the secrets of the The Great Barrier again." Li Fan sighed and reminded him.

Mo Rubin was silent for a while.

Then, with a slightly frenzied earnestness, he said, "Give me another thirty days. I'm just one step away, if I leave now, I'm afraid I'll never be reconciled in this life. Give me another thirty days!"

"Thirty days later, I... I will definitely make a decision!"

Mo Rubin did not respond further.

Li Fan smiled slightly.

The secrets of the The Great Barrier were like the murals on Xiake Island for the martial arts heroes, to Mo Rubin.

The attraction it held even surpassed his own life.

It was indeed not something that could be easily given up.

Even if Li Fan asked again after thirty days, the answer would surely be the same.

"If it weren't for the strange black vortex that appeared in the center of the star sea, Mo Rubin probably wouldn't have even set a thirty-day limit."

Thinking of that inexplicable black qi, a shadow flickered in Li Fan's eyes.

He had already guessed that the appearance of this black qi was related to his rash use of the Ascending Array.

However, Li Fan had re-investigated all the locations where he had used the Ascending Array before.

Not all places spawned black qi.

Li Fan speculated that it might be related to things falling from "higher places."

"Just like the splashes of water, only when the object falling into the water reaches a certain limit will the splashes be significant enough."

"My personal shortcut, falling from a high place, is insignificant."

"But if it's a realm..."

"The power of falling is enough to spawn black qi."

"But the center of the star sea is an exception. Perhaps it's related to the special nature of the water surface itself."

Li Fan pondered in silence.

He had observed the spread rate of this black qi in the star sea.

He determined that before he completed the Azure Nether sublimation plan in this life, this black qi would not cause any impact on the Xuanhuang Realm.

Therefore, even if he ignored it for the time being, it would not be a major problem.

"The only thing worth worrying about is that if there were a little more black qi, it might alert the Dao Comprehending True Immortal in the Immortal Ruins."

As it turned out, that True Immortal was not truly oblivious to the external environment.

If something that affected him, or even threatened him, occurred, he would definitely break away from his Dao Comprehension state.

The disturbance caused by the Medicine King Cauldron and the Void Return Great Formation in his previous life's reincarnation was the best proof.

"Is the Tribulation of Dao Erasure imminent?"

Li Fan whispered, echoing Mo Rubin's speculation about the black qi.

His intent, however, was locked onto a mass of black qi sealed by golden light within his body.

It was obtained from the True Immortal flesh and blood that he had decomposed using the White Circle Falling Mortal Technique before.

The power level of this black qi was clearly not on the same level as that generated by falling after ascension.

Yet, it still gave Li Fan a pounding heart.

"What was the cause of the Tribulation of Dao Erasure that destroyed the Immortal Realm back then?"

This, of course, was not a problem that Li Fan should be concerned about at present.

But as his strength continued to advance, it was an unavoidable reality.

Li Fan's ascension and fall were by no means the fundamental cause of the black qi's birth. It was merely a trigger, prematurely igniting the World-Ending calamity hidden beneath the calm surface.

Li Fan was certain that even without his actions in this life, the lower star sea would eventually follow in the footsteps of the former Immortal Realm.

"It's truly a relentless advance, giving one no room to breathe."

"How difficult it is to achieve true eternal freedom."

As for the various aspects of the black qi, Li Fan currently had no way to counter them. He could only snort coldly, firmly storing its existence in his mind.

It took Li Fan nearly a month to finally complete the deployment of the World Returning to Void Great Formation in this life.

The formation's network was subtly hidden beneath the Azure Nether land.

Once the Essence of Primal Force was condensed into one, as long as the formation was not activated, the beings within the realm would no longer be able to detect it.

The moment the formation was completed, among the beings in the Xuanhuang Realm, only a very few felt a strong sense of impending doom in their hearts.

But this feeling soon disappeared, as if it was entirely their hallucination.

Even the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao only had a vague perception of Li Fan's actions and was not very certain.

This could be seen from the fact that the Azure Nether Heavenly Dao's favor had hardly decreased.

Li Fan's eyes, devoid of any emotional fluctuation, looked at the various states of beings in the Xuanhuang Realm, from fear to returning to calm.

"Sometimes, one still has to believe in their intuition."

He murmured this softly, and as Li Fan was about to return to Great Qi, his gaze suddenly fell upon a being in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Li Fan was not unfamiliar with this person.

It was Zhang Haobo.

At the beginning of the reincarnation, Li Fan had some interactions with him and He Zhenghao.

However, as Li Fan's strength grew stronger and stronger, these people gradually fell out of his sight.

This time, it was merely a casual glance as he was completing the formation and leaving.

But it was precisely this casual glance that reignited Li Fan's interest in Zhang Haobo.

In this life, Li Fan began the deployment of the Immortal Descent, World Returning to Void Great Formation habitually starting from the familiar Cloudy Sea.

And a month ago, when he had just begun setting up the formation, Zhang Haobo, still a mortal, was on Cloudy Sea's Glazed Island.

But now, a month later, Zhang Haobo had moved his entire family away from Cloudy Sea.

"Did the Scarlet Flame Burning Sea happen earlier?" Li Fan was slightly taken aback.

He calculated with his fingers but found no signs of the Burning Sea calamity arriving early.

"Why did he run?" Li Fan became somewhat interested.

His divine sense locked onto Zhang Haobo.

He discovered that ever since escaping Cloudy Sea, Zhang Haobo still had trouble sleeping or eating. He even seemed to want to lead everyone to flee further.

However, due to the strong opposition from his family who were already exhausted, Zhang Haobo finally compromised and abandoned the idea.

But he still looked worried, often looking up at the sky, as if he was concerned about something.

His family naturally couldn't understand his behaviour.

Zhang Haobo was dejected and troubled every day.

Perhaps in the entire Xuanhuang Realm, only Li Fan could understand the source of his worries.

"He can actually sense the world-ending killing intent I laid down?"

Li Fan's expression was dazed, as if he had returned to the time when Zhang Haobo, as a fisherman, told him about the changes in Cloudy Sea and then fled with his family.

Then, with a gentle wave of his hand, Zhang Haobo appeared before Li Fan, as if frozen in ice.

www●● C〇

If Zhang Haobo's awareness of the changes in Cloudy Sea was due to his fisherman's intuition, then his vague premonition of the world-ending crisis after the completion of the World Returning to Void Great Formation was definitely extraordinary.

"Could it be that the old acquaintance from the past hides some secret?"

Li Fan's divine sense swept over Zhang Haobo's body.

He was still a mortal, without cultivation, and there was no possibility of hiding from Li Fan.

In Zhang Haobo's mind, almost fused with his brain tissue, was a shimmering fragment of a mirror.

It was only about one-third the size of a fingernail.

The aura emanating from it was not unfamiliar to Li Fan.

"This is..."

"A fragment of the Boundless Mirror?"

After careful observation, Li Fan instantly understood the reason.

The spirit of the Boundless Mirror, Sun Luyuan, had once said that there were still some fragments of the Boundless Mirror in the Xuanhuang Realm.

In his previous life, he had accompanied the search and found most of them.

But some were still missing. Perhaps they had been swallowed by the Azure Nether Heaven and Earth, and involved in the cycle of Heavenly and Earthly Marvels.

And it was one of these Boundless Mirror fragments that caused Zhang Haobo's unusual premonition.

The Boundless Mirror had the ability to deduce the future, and consequently, Zhang Haobo had developed a premonition of the impending disaster.

"A mere fragment can sense the great formation I set up?" Li Fan frowned.

He then took out the fragment, held it in his palm, and observed it carefully.

"So, this fragment is the core part responsible for external perception and data collection for the Boundless Mirror. It is even more sensitive than the main body of the Boundless Mirror that Sun Luyuan found."

"As an immortal artifact, it is normal to be able to sense an immortal formation."

Li Fan looked at Zhang Haobo, who was still standing frozen.

"Unfortunately, this immortal artifact fragment is too small."

"When Zhang Haobo was a mortal, this immortal artifact fragment could still influence him."

"But when Zhang Haobo embarked on the path of cultivation, especially when he reached the Foundation Establishment realm and had his own Foundation Establishment Oddity, the influence of this immortal artifact fragment on him was weakened instead."

"Perhaps it was also some resentment or retaliation towards Zhang Haobo for not recognizing a treasure when he saw one, and instead choosing to fuse with other oddities."

Li Fan smiled. In his palm, the Azure Nether World-Ending Mutation: Time Flows, Seas Change into Mulberry Fields, boomed into action.

The mirror fragment seemed to sense something, flashing and its light changing more rapidly.

But in Li Fan's hand, there was no possibility of escape.

As time flowed, like the light and dark changes of sunrise and sunset, this mirror fragment transformed into streaks of flowing light.

It was blown away by the wind, disappearing into heaven and earth.

Like its main body, it met the same fate, becoming nourishment for the Azure Nether Heaven and Earth, fed by Li Fan.

Sensing that the Azure Nether's favor, which had slightly dropped due to the formation setup, had returned to normal, Li Fan nodded with satisfaction.

With a wave of his hand, he sent Zhang Haobo back to his original position.

Without the interference of the Boundless Mirror fragment in his mind, the uncontrollable worry that had been troubling him would cease to exist.

From then on, he would live a carefree life with his family on the Azure Nether land.

Whether it was fortunate.

Or unfortunate.

Zhang Haobo's incident served as a reminder to Li Fan.

Although the immortal formation was complete, and beings in the Xuanhuang Realm could no longer detect it, immortal artifacts like the Heavenly Profound Mirror, even if they couldn't sense the immortal formation itself, might still be able to sense the crisis caused by it.

"We need to be more defensive."

"But there's no need to worry too much. After all, what can they do just by sensing it?"

A condescending glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

"If they dare to show themselves, then it's just right..."

"Burn them all as nourishment for the Xuanhuang Realm!"

Li Fan, who now mastered the method of downgrading immortal formations and could deploy immortal formations at any time, indeed had the right to say this.

"Also..."

Li Fan's gaze swept again over the beings of the Xuanhuang Realm that had flashed by before.

He specifically focused on those who, even now, with the immortal formation hidden, still had a vague sense of the World Returning to Void Great Formation.

After an inspection, he did find some immortal artifact fragments that were still being digested.

They were all at the end of the realm's digestion process and were very small in scale.

To Li Fan, they were all useless items.

He simply fed them all to the Azure Nether Heaven and Earth.

Then he monitored again.

Ultimately, there was no further gain.

Li Fan slowly withdrew his gaze.

"It seems that there are very few secrets hidden in the Xuanhuang Realm that are useful to me."

"As for the remaining ones..."

"I'll have to explore them after I ascend with the Heavenly and Earthly Immortal Souls," Li Fan couldn't help but sigh.

While preparing for the Azure Nether's sublimation, Li Fan also had a task from the Mystic Immortal Boat. He first used a ritual to define a pocket world with a population of thirty million as a token of completion.

Li Fan paused again.

Because he sensed that the Nameless One from the Thirteen Peaks world was about to emerge.

With a stir of his heart, the scene of that pocket world instantly appeared before his eyes.

Having completed the integration with the pocket world's Heavenly Dao, Nameless joyfully descended the mountain.

After bidding farewell to his few remaining relatives in the world, Nameless took a step and leaped out of the Thirteen Peaks world.

Before him appeared, swimming in the dark void, a school of over a hundred Void-Cracking Whales.

The Void-Cracking Whales swam in groups, carving out the void as they played.

This grand and magnificent scene deeply captivated Nameless, who had never seen a scene beyond the mountains.

It took him many days before he finally regained his senses.

Then, with some reluctance, he walked step by step towards the Xuanhuang Realm.

Strictly speaking, at this moment, Nameless had not yet embarked on the path of cultivation, merely a weak mortal.

But possessing the pocket world's Heavenly Dao, he was not simply a mortal without the strength to even truss a chicken.

With the guidance Li Fan had secretly planted, the Immortal Execution Great Formation naturally could not trap Nameless.

Nameless followed step by step, breaking through layers of formations like Li Fan did in the past.

Finally, he descended into the Xuanhuang Realm!

The vast sky, the white mist that spanned the land.

The scorching sun, the gentle breeze that blew.

Sensing the beauty beyond his comprehension, Nameless was enthralled.

He remained still for a long time.

Just as he had quietly lain on the mountaintop before, comprehending the world's Heavenly Dao.

A profound aura emanated from Nameless.

He had successfully introduced qi into his body and stepped into the Qi Refining stage in an instant.

His aura continued to surge, but suddenly it stopped as abruptly as a river encountering a dam.

Nameless, who had been closing his eyes in contemplation, couldn't help but open them, full of confusion.

When he looked up at the sky again, he saw the various restrictions left by the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerates in this world.

In the past, he could have instantly transformed into Soul Transformation like Mr. Bai.

But now, the times had changed.

However, Nameless was not discouraged.

Just like the Heavenly Dao Bai that Li Fan had summoned in the past, he followed the current cultivation rules of the Xuanhuang Realm and began to wander the Azure Nether land, searching for the materials needed for cultivation.

Nameless extended his hand, feeling the wind blowing in the Xuanhuang Realm.

He searched for Heavenly and Earthly Marvels needed to break through to Foundation Establishment.

He remained still for a long time.

Then, he suddenly opened his eyes and took a step.

...

"He didn't immediately initiate the ritual to enter the Fallen Immortal Realm, but chose to cultivate instead." Li Fan observed Nameless's every move from the shadows, saying with great interest.

Li Fan was not worried about Nameless's anomaly affecting his plan.

Because he sensed that the hints he left behind were still effective.

"However, because they were merely hints, his subjective initiative is much stronger compared to Sun Tianci, who acted like a puppet."

"Cultivating? Fine, let him cultivate."

"Before him, the Immortal Path cannot be trodden, and Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerates are above. No matter how talented he is, he cannot cultivate beyond the Dharma-Preachers."

"Even if a Doctrine Transmitter himself were to arrive, he would have to sit down and talk things through with me properly."

Despite saying this, Li Fan still separated a simulated personality to constantly monitor Nameless's actions.

His plans for this life could not afford any mistakes.

Shifting his attention away from Nameless, he returned to the silver eyes before him, which were like pets.

In recent times, having been fed too many world Heavenly Lattices, the silver eyes, a Simulated Heavenly Lattice created by Li Fan, seemed to be on the verge of a final transformation.

The aura emanating from it was turbulent and uncertain.

His eyeballs kept spinning, but the center always revolved around Li Fan.

Li Fan pondered, and finally selected a world Heavenly Lattice of a medium-sized pocket world.

He fed it to the silver eyes.

A ray of light then burst forth from them.

Chapter 1358: The Immortal Puppet Finally Descends into the World

The sudden burst of light was so dazzling that Li Fan instinctively narrowed his eyes.

Li Fan felt more than just the light itself. It was a mysterious rhythm that had inexplicably descended and converged on the silver eyes.

Li Fan had encountered similar rhythms during his myriad reincarnations.

It was exactly the same as what appeared from the vortex outside the heavens when the pocket world ascended.

However, the rhythm now appearing on the silver eyes was more powerful and unfathomable.

Even with Li Fan's current cultivation and understanding of the Great Dao, he could not fathom its essence.

Under the shroud of the rhythm, it was as if a brush was rapidly painting and adding countless details to the silver eyes.

Though the eyes remained unchanged, to Li Fan, the observer, they became increasingly "vibrant."

In the end, even Li Fan, the creator of these eyes, felt a sense of unfamiliarity with his own creation.

When "vibrancy" reached its apex in the evolution of the silver eyes, it began to spread to the Great Qi pocket world.

Like a spring breeze brushing the earth, thunder echoing faintly, and rain moistening all things silently.

The power of "ascension" silently nourished every inch of land in the Great Qi pocket world.

Even though Li Fan had already used "Creation" to push this pocket world's transformation with forces like the changes of heaven and earth, this new power could still further elevate it.

"This is true power of creation, not driven by the True Immortal Sigils of 【Creation】. Instead, it is the flow of the Great Dao, a phenomenon that naturally descends and arises."

"It is the rules themselves depicted by the True Immortal Sigils of 【Creation】."

"Or rather, just a part of it… it will be of great use to me in elevating the Xuanhuang Realm in this lifetime!"

Li Fan stared intently at everything happening in the Great Qi pocket world, trying to engrave every detail into his memory.

The rhythm of creation, from its descent to its disappearance, lasted less than ten breaths.

In the pocket world, only Li Fan could perceive this transformation of heaven and earth.

When the surging rhythm subsided, the changes it brought continued, unfolding in the world, imperceptible to all living beings.

Li Fan was immersed in the scene he had just witnessed, savoring its profoundness.

When he calmed down and looked at the inverse-created Heavenly Lattice in the silver eyes, he noticed a change in the eyes.

Unlike before, they did not constantly stare at him with a fawning expression.

Most of the time, the eyes were closed. They would only open occasionally, and their target of observation was not Li Fan, but the various aspects of the Great Qi pocket world below.

It seemed that Li Fan, their creator, was no longer as important to them.

"Interesting…"

Such "unruly" behavior, instead, piqued Li Fan's interest. After careful examination, Li Fan confirmed that the Simulated Heavenly Lattice was still completely under his control.

It was just that, perhaps because it had consumed many pocket world Heavenly Lattices, the eyes had gained a new "mission."

The mission to maintain the normal operation of the pocket world.

The priority of fulfilling this mission was only second to Li Fan's control authority.

Therefore, during periods when Li Fan did not issue commands, the silver eyes instinctively operated in the mode of the "world's Heavenly Dao."

This was closer to a native world's Heavenly Dao than the previous "Simulated Heavenly Lattice."

Or rather, the silver eyes had indeed become the pocket world's Heavenly Dao.

It had completed the transition from "simulated" to "real."

Furthermore, the Heavenly Dao level to which the silver eyes now belonged surpassed the scope of ordinary pocket worlds, thus consequently causing the world itself to change.

"If my previous attempts to elevate the world with the Creation script and Immortal Spiritual Qi were from the outside in, a crude reshaping of the world."

"Then the changes happening in the silver eyes now are from the inside out, a silent and gradual transformation of the world."

"Both methods achieve the same goal, but the latter is clearly more sophisticated."

Li Fan's eyes showed deep contemplation.

While comprehending the entire process, he deduced and improved his plan for elevation in this lifetime.

"World elevation can roughly be seen as the process of reaching a higher position."

"From the outside in is like being forcibly pulled by external forces. Once the external force disappears, there is a risk of a sudden fall. Without an anchor, the entire world could shatter into pieces."

"From the inside out relies on its own foundation to push forward slowly. Step by step, there is no risk of falling. But the drawback is that the entire process is too slow! It takes millions of years, and I cannot wait!"

A flash of realization shone in Li Fan's eyes: "However, I might be able to employ both methods."

His divine sense penetrated the silver eyes, and the entire process of the Simulated Heavenly Lattice's transformation appeared in Li Fan's mind.

It corroborated his external observations. In a short time, he gained a great deal of insight.

"It seems that the optimal solution to elevate the Xuanhuang Realm is to create a Heavenly Lattice and replace the existing one."

"But with my current means, I can still create a pocket world's Heavenly Lattice. However, creating the Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly Lattice…"

Li Fan shook his head slightly.

This was not only because the Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly Dao had devoured countless other cultivation worlds over the millennia.

It was also because the Doctrine Transmitter's Reverse Principle New Law had bound cultivators of the Longevity Realm to the Xuanhuang Realm.

To destroy the Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly Dao and replace it with a simulated one, it would be necessary to eliminate all those Longevity Realm cultivators simultaneously.

Putting aside the Doctrine Transmitter, the Carefree Heavenly Venerate, who presided over the Land of Carefree Bliss, could survive the world-ending immortal formation.

Such a being was beyond what Li Fan could currently kill.

"However, in reality, for countless years, the Heavenly Physician and Doctrine Transmitter have been mending the Xuanhuang Realm with the corpses of other worlds, employing the second method, from the inside out."

"By feeding the Xuanhuang Realm with other worlds."

"Indeed, the Heavenly Physician's goal was not merely to borrow a corpse to resurrect the soul and revive the Heavenly Law Realm. He aimed to go further, to directly propel the revived Heavenly Law Realm towards the Immortal Realm."

"This is what the Book of Heaven Mending mentioned: breaking the cocoon and emerging, ascending to feather transformation!"

"What a pity…"

A cold glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes: "All of this is destined to be a stepping stone for me!"

His consciousness instantly locked onto the fragment of the Immortal Realm hidden within his body, formed by the fusion of six chess pieces.

"In terms of the weight of consumption, perhaps millions of worlds in the lower realms cannot compare to a complete Immortal Realm."

"As long as the last chess piece returns from beyond the heavens, it should be complete. Then, when the Xuanhuang Realm ascends…"

"I will be the one to lead it!"

His thoughts surged, deducing all possible interfering factors at that time.

"The preparations are, in fact, almost complete."

"Next, I need to consider how to prevent the elevation process from being interrupted."

"The Heavenly Physician and Doctrine Transmitter will inevitably return from the star sea. That True Immortal of the Immortal Ruins might also be awakened."

"And also…"

"The Grand Master Tiandu, the Faceless Immortal…"

These were existences that, in the past, every single name would have forced Li Fan to immediately use "Return to Truth."

Now, Li Fan could plan how to resist them.

…

Half a month later.

A disturbance emanating from the Xuanhuang Realm jolted Li Fan from his planning.

It was a reaction from the imprint he had left on the True Yang puppet body.

In this lifetime, by secretly promoting the Xuanhuang Realm's elevation,

As the heavens and earth widened, certain things hidden within the Xuanhuang Realm were also quietly transforming along with it, albeit secretly.

For example, the ancient mutated Celestial-Mortal Miasma hidden in the underground cavern of Flag Ridge Prefecture.

Another example was the True Yang, buried deep beneath the Cloudy Sea, tempered by the Ground Fire Origin Return Array to refine its puppet body.

The power of the ground fire was far more violent and surging than in the previous life.

This caused the True Yang to show subtle signs of premature awakening.

Li Fan flickered and arrived at the bottom of the Cloudy Sea.

Gazing at the puppet body buried beneath the earth, he recalled the scene in the previous life where the True Yang puppet single-handedly resisted the Doctrine Transmitter Heavenly Venerate.

Although it had virtually no power to fight back, it had stubbornly blocked the Doctrine Transmitter.

He mused, "True Yang is indeed a good helper."

"In the previous life, it was beaten too badly by the Doctrine Transmitter…"

"In this lifetime, I will help you regain your lost dignity!"

Li Fan's divine sense instantly pierced through the scorching ground fire and touched the deeply buried True Yang puppet body beneath the earth.

Because it was awakening under the perfect state and slowly on its own, the remaining will of True Yang was not as aggressive as when it was disturbed.

There was no "True Yang's life, never weaker than anyone else."

Instead, there was only the confusion of crossing through eons to arrive in a new era.

"Even after absorbing ten thousand years of ground fire, this body is still too weak."

"At most, it can only reach Soul Transformation Perfection…"

"Can it be said to be worthy of the words 'never weaker than anyone else'?"

Li Fan's words instantly appeared in True Yang's sea of consciousness.

True Yang, gradually awakening from its sleep, was instantly ignited by these words.

The earth roared, and the ground fire erupted.

The gigantic puppet body was about to leap from the seabed.

"True Yang's life…"

True Yang's booming voice, with a low growl, narrated its eternal belief that shone unchanging across ten thousand years.

However, the fierce emotion, like an erupting volcano, instantly subsided upon hearing Li Fan's subsequent casual utterance of "Junior Brother."

This address instinctively evoked a sense of closeness, sorrow, and guilt.

The anger vanished, replaced by a desire to identify the speaker.

"Senior Brother will lend you a hand!"

Li Fan's blurred figure suddenly appeared.

"Nine Heavens…"

"Finger of the Heavens!"

As Li Fan whispered, the entire Cloudy Sea seemed to instantly calm down, like a perfect mirror without the slightest ripple.

A single finger slowly pressed down from the heavens.

Though it was just a single, slender finger, it possessed the might to blot out the sun and moon.

It precisely covered and pressed down upon the gigantic puppet body of True Yang.

The True Yang puppet body, tempered by ten thousand years of ground fire,

Had long surpassed the category of finding rare heavenly treasures.

Yet now, under Li Fan's finger, all parts of the puppet were easily crushed into powder!

True Yang was stunned.

Its unyielding will froze, and then it was about to completely dissipate into heaven and earth.

At this moment, like the voice of its master, Guang Yangzi, slowly echoed in True Yang's fading consciousness.

"Transforming into an object, crossing through eons!"

Accompanying this figure was a body heavily bound by golden chains.

True Yang looked at that body as if seeing its former self.

"Go, True Yang."

"Achieve the strongest in this realm!"

Master Guang Yangzi's aged voice lingered.

True Yang's remaining will instinctively drifted towards that body.

At the same time, it activated the technique 【Manifestation of Others' Autonomy】, which was already branded into its instincts.

With almost no obstruction, True Yang successfully attached itself to that body.

At the same time, True Yang discovered that within this body, there was a strand of thought that was of the same origin as itself, but without independent consciousness.

Without being manipulated, that strand of thought actively came to nourish its consciousness, which was on the verge of destruction.

In a daze, True Yang seemed to see everything that happened during its Body Transformation.

Sealed memories surged into its mind.

A nameless fire was rekindled from the ashes.

True Yang roared that sentence again.

"True Yang's life!"

"Never weaker than anyone else!"

With the unity of mind and will, True Yang's residual consciousness finally settled completely within this body.

True Yang discovered that this body was more like a puppet than a physical body.

A puppet created by the fusion of strange metal and flesh containing terrifying, unknown energy.

"Master was right. This puppet body is far more powerful than the one I forged in the ground fire before."

"Master, I am truly still this useless."

A flicker of guilt passed, and True Yang's final will serenely merged into this flesh-and-blood puppet.

…

The moment True Yang's consciousness was transferred to the flesh-and-blood puppet, Li Fan had already transferred them together to the Great Qi pocket world.

The elevated Simulated Heavenly Lattice, along with the Immortal Formations that were promptly deployed,

Sealed this flesh-and-blood puppet.

The aura surging from the puppet forced even Li Fan to temporarily avoid its edge.

It was a terrifying power far beyond the mortal realm, originating from the True Immortal flesh and blood!

This puppet was made by Li Fan previously, using the copper-cast immortal crane as the skeleton, adhered with True Immortal flesh and blood, and then fused with True Yang's eternal lingering thought.

It was merely an empty shell, lacking life and soul, awaiting True Yang's awakening.

Before Li Fan handed it over to True Yang this time, he had added a large amount of black star stone powder.

In essence, judging solely by its hardness, this puppet might be capable of ignoring the terrifying suction of the Immortal Ruins and walking within the Immortal Ruins with its physical body!

True Yang's consciousness slowly merged with the True Immortal flesh-and-blood puppet.

Li Fan observed the puppet's constantly changing expressions from afar.

"With the eternal lingering thought assisting, it should be able to endure and not be completely eroded by the power contained within the True Immortal flesh and blood."

"But after all, it is only a mortal. The consciousness that can remain when resisting immortal power will not be much."

"Like the previous True Yang puppet, it will act based on instinct in a dazed state…"

"With my previous disguise as Guang Yangzi, it is enough to make him obey my commands."

"However, this puppet is far stronger than the original True Yang puppet."

Li Fan was quite satisfied, observing the changes happening to the Immortal Puppet.

The copper-cast immortal crane came from the Immortal Boat's secret treasury, recorded as being cast from fragments of an Immortal artifact.

The True Immortal flesh and blood were traced back to True Immortal bone hands by Li Fan using the Ancient Character Script.

The black star stone powder was the smallest particle resulting from the cutting of world remnants by world-ending immortal formations.

All three were existences that could contend with immortal power.

And then merged with True Yang's eternal lingering thought…

The puppet before them could truly be called an 【Immortal Puppet】.

The True Immortal flesh and blood, initially merely adhered to the copper bones,

After integrating True Yang's consciousness, it was as if it had found a backbone, even sprouting dense root-like structures that burrowed into the copper bones.

The bones and flesh became completely integrated.

True Yang's eternal lingering thought shone like a brilliant, unextinguishable diamond in its sea of consciousness.

The puppet's appearance became increasingly vivid and clear.

The surging aura slowly subsided, and the newly born True Yang stood quietly.

Its eyes were closed.

It had not withdrawn from the Immortal Formation's protection.

Li Fan tried to issue a command to True Yang in the guise of Guang Yangzi's body transformation.

True Yang indeed behaved very obediently.

Unfortunately, as Li Fan had predicted, during the process of merging with and resisting the True Immortal flesh and blood, True Yang's independent consciousness was severely depleted.

The extent of its residual instincts was even less than anticipated.

"What a pity."

"But with the experience from this lifetime, in the next life, before completing the fusion, I can appropriately increase the intensity of True Yang's consciousness."

Taking the True Yang Immortal Puppet to the depths of the star sea,

Li Fan began testing the strength of this Immortal Puppet body.

First, he unleashed a Great Five Elements Annihilation Sword.

It was a divine ability Li Fan had comprehended himself but had not used for a long time as he increasingly approached immortal power.

The black light, which seemed capable of annihilating everything, struck the True Yang Immortal Puppet but did not even leave a shallow mark!

Li Fan raised his eyebrows, and then countless black sword lights rained down.

They surrounded the True Yang Immortal Puppet.

However, this seemingly sharp and imposing attack could not even rouse True Yang's instinctive self-defense.

True Yang stood still, allowing the black sword light to strike its body.

It was as if it was not facing a killing move but a gentle breeze passing by.

After a long while, Li Fan nodded in satisfaction and ceased activating the Five Elements Annihilation Sword.

"The Immortal Puppet body has indeed achieved immunity to all mortal powers."

"But…"

"This does not mean my Great Five Elements Annihilation Sword will be useless in the future."

"The five elements rotate, advancing relentlessly, annihilating everything. The artistic conception of this divine ability is not inferior. It's just that when facing immortal-grade existences, relying solely on the core of the five elements' power for annihilation is too low." Li Fan mused thoughtfully.

"But if it can be integrated with the transformation of 【True Becomes False】…"

Li Fan flicked his finger, intending to slash a sword towards the distant star Espace.

But he hesitated and could not bring himself to strike.

"My comprehension is still too low. Being able to integrate it into an escape technique is already the limit."

"To use it for combat…"

"Perhaps it will require two or three more cycles of reincarnation. Or, the help of that artifact that can directly simulate reincarnation for Return to Truth."

Li Fan shook his head slightly, calmed his mind, and slowly retracted his finger.

He then began to test the True Yang Immortal Puppet again.

Next were the powers of various True Immortal Sigilss.

With the Essence of Primal Force as ink, Li Fan unleashed all he had learned.

The Immortal Formation sealed them to the sides, preventing energy fluctuations from leaking out.

The power of True Immortal Sigilss descended upon the True Yang Immortal Puppet.

Facing the destructive power of pseudo-immortal grade, the True Yang Immortal Puppet finally showed a slight reaction.

The True Immortal flesh and blood seemed to surge like a bellows, emitting a force field.

It isolated all the effects brought by the True Immortal Sigilss.

This was not an order from Li Fan, but True Yang's action.

It was purely the instinctive reaction of the True Yang Immortal Puppet when facing a threat.

Li Fan sensed this invisible force field, his pupils sharply contracting.

But he continued to activate the True Immortal Sigilss in his hand.

Strands of True Immortal rule power, upon approaching the force field, were absorbed and neutralized.

The storm of True Immortal Sigilss was like a gust of wind.

It merely caused True Yang Immortal Puppet's clothes to flutter.

It did not inflict any damage.

"This is the power of a True Immortal?"

"And it's merely the spontaneous defense of True Immortal flesh and blood…"

Li Fan's eyes gleamed with intensity. He wanted to comprehend and study this invisible True Immortal force field.

However, to his slight disappointment, this field was exactly like the flaw in the The Great Barrier.

Though it was right before his eyes, though it truly existed.

He still could not touch it; it was invisible and unknowable.

A scene suddenly appeared before Li Fan's eyes.

An eagle in the sky looked down at its prey on the ground, then descended with sharp claws.

Just as it was about to capture its prey, it crashed headfirst into a transparent protective glass.

The eagle felt dizzy and barely managed to steady itself.

It flapped its wings against the glass before it, unable to comprehend why it could not advance when its prey was right before its eyes.

It could not comprehend the existence of the glass.

Just as Li Fan currently could not comprehend the existence of the The Great Barrier and the force field.

"True Immortal power is not something I can currently touch."

"But a gentleman is not born extraordinary; he relies on borrowing external things. Being able to temporarily wield it through the True Yang Immortal Puppet is sufficient."

"This way, even when facing Immortal Boats, I will have the capital to overturn the table."

Li Fan stopped his futile efforts.

He began the final attempt.

His expression grew solemn, and he chanted softly, "Nine Heavens' soaring intent, True Immortal descends to the mortal realm!"

He once again unleashed the Finger of the Heavens.

However, this time, it was a full-powered strike.

Burning a clump of True Immortal flesh and blood, and enhanced by the Ascending Array, Li Fan's vision rapidly heightened.

In a flash, it felt as if he stood at the peak of the star sea, with the The Great Barrier before him, visible in the distance.

And the True Yang Immortal Puppet before him, though bearing the word "Immortal,"

Lacked immortal spiritual power, possessing only flesh and blood.

Therefore, it remained below the mortal realm.

In the ascended perspective, the True Yang Immortal Puppet was as small as an ant.

The solemnity and caution he had felt earlier had vanished.

Li Fan suddenly felt a sense of a True Immortal sitting high in the heavens, looking down upon the myriad beings below.

He targeted the True Yang Immortal Puppet, his face arrogant, and pressed down with a finger.

BOOM!

Within the sealed Immortal Formation, a fierce storm erupted.

The soaring intent that annihilated all beings, mixed with the might of descending from high above, manifested as an index finger phenomenon that rapidly expanded from the size of a soybean to a scale resembling a collapsing sky.

It pressed down like a caving firmament!

Facing such a powerful divine ability, the True Yang Immortal Puppet instinctively felt a sense of crisis.

Its eyes emitted a blood-red light, and the True Yang Immortal Puppet raised its hand, supporting the heavens!

Li Fan grunted, his finger pressing against a hard, giant stone.

Trembling, it could advance no further!

Fortunately, the True Yang Immortal Puppet was only defending instinctively and did not counterattack.

Otherwise, Li Fan would have been severely injured in this exchange!

Li Fan did not fare well, and the True Yang Immortal Puppet, enduring Li Fan's strongest divine ability, was not much better off.

After all, it was not a true Immortal Puppet but a fusion of several near-immortal items.

This downward force directly caused parts of the Immortal Puppet's flesh and blood to collapse.

The copper bones crackled, clearly having sustained immense impact.

The purpose was only to test the actual combat power of the True Yang Immortal Puppet, not to destroy it.

Seeing that it had reached its limit, Li Fan finally withdrew his divine ability.

He dispelled the Ascending Array and slowly descended from the peak of the star sea back to the mortal realm.

He slowly circulated his energy, eliminating the internal abnormalities.

Looking at the True Yang Immortal Puppet, Li Fan frowned slightly: "After all, it is only a puppet, not a true life form, and it lacks self-repair capabilities."

"The True Immortal flesh and blood damaged during combat cannot be recovered on its own…"

Just as Li Fan was thinking this, it seemed that True Yang sensed his thoughts.

Driven by the core of eternal lingering thought, the True Immortal flesh and blood attached to the copper bones suddenly surged again.

As if giving birth to one, then two, then three, then all things.

The wounds on the Immortal Puppet from the test were instantly eliminated.

The scarred Immortal Puppet returned to its most powerful state.

Seeing this, Li Fan was stunned.

He suddenly recalled the scene from before when he used the Ancient Character Script to stimulate the True Immortal flesh and blood, and how it proliferated out of thin air when stimulated.

He was speechless for a long time.

After a long pause, he sighed sincerely: "The divine might of a True Immortal is indeed wondrous and unfathomable, not to be underestimated."

He frowned again: "If not for the eternal lingering thought of True Yang as its core, suppressing this mass of True Immortal flesh and blood, this Immortal Puppet might have gone out of control at any slight misstep."

At the same time, Li Fan understood that it was not that the Immortal Puppet lacked repair capabilities.

It was just that the Immortal Puppet's autonomy was too poor; it lacked the will to actively repair itself.

Only when Li Fan reminded or manipulated it would it perform this action.

"It's because the invested True Yang consciousness was too severely worn down."

"Its resistance to damage is sufficient. But to expect it to restrain the Doctrine Transmitter, the Heavenly Physician, or even the True Immortal of the Immortal Ruins would be a stretch."

"It seems that to unleash its maximum combat power, its subjective performance needs to be enhanced."

Li Fan's eyes narrowed: "I remember that Skilled Artisan apparently still has the combat experience of the Immortal Puppet 【Ancestor】 from the Heavenly Mysteries Realm…"

"But this fellow, like Xu Ke, was swept into the abyss depression of the star sea."

Li Fan turned his head, facing the fringe of the star sea, sensing the mark he had left on Skilled Artisan from afar.

As before, Skilled Artisan's aura was very stable, unlike Xu Ke's, which was erratic.

Moreover, compared to before, he seemed to have drawn closer.

"Interesting."

"It seems I don't need to look for him; he'll return on his own."

"That's for the best!"

Li Fan's gaze swept around, and the sealed Immortal Formation suddenly shifted, transforming into the Great Formation of All Things Returning to Void, stirring up a howling storm.

It erased all traces of the battle.

"It's really useful to downgrade Immortal Formations."

After finishing all this, Li Fan did not leave in a hurry.

Instead, he stood quietly, as if waiting for something.

In the star sea, there was eternal darkness and silence.

Li Fan waited patiently for more than half a month.

But what he wanted never arrived.

"It seems my guess was correct. The fall of an ordinary individual after ascending does not attract dark energy."

"Only the weight of a realm, or a fall in a special area like the center of the star sea, will trigger the dark energy."

"This is a summary of the phenomenon. What is the reason behind this phenomenon?"

"The Great Tribulation of Dao Erasure…"

Li Fan murmured and returned to the Xuanhuang Realm with the True Yang Immortal Puppet.

Although the eagle could not comprehend the existence of the glass at first.

When it began to try to touch and study the properties of the glass, changes would eventually occur.

Chapter 1359

In the Great Xuan pocket world, on the Dao Discussion Platform.

The True Yang Immortal Puppet stood behind Li Fan, its eyes closed, motionless. Li Fan sat cross-legged, examining the insights gathered from billions of beings across countless pocket worlds, meticulously selected by the Simulated Heavenly Lattice. These insights pertained to the flaws in the High Wall.

"Is it before us? Nay, it is above! Like a great dam in the heavens! It severs our life force, it blocks our path!"

"The might of the Dark High Wall is unfathomable. Without holy immortal power, how can it be destroyed? Yet, a thousand-mile dike can collapse from an ant's burrow!"

"The body of one, the souls of thousands, the intent of billions. A blazing fire that illuminates the deep darkness."

One had to admit that in the face of an existential crisis, people could indeed unleash unimaginable potential. Among these mortals, whose cultivation barely reached Golden Core, some had, in fact, vaguely touched upon the truth. There were even some insights and thoughts that, after Li Fan read them, subtly inspired him. However, their level was simply too far removed from the High Wall. Even with billions of musings, for them to converge and transmute, to unravel the secrets of the High Wall, was no simple matter. At the very least, Li Fan saw no sign of their success in the short term.

But Li Fan was not in a hurry. He temporarily paused his perusal and flicked out a sword shadow, packaging all these useful thoughts and sending them to Mo Ruben.

"I hope this peerless prodigy of the ancient cultivation world can truly gain something," Li Fan said, gazing at the starry sky with an inscrutable expression. Although the True Yang Immortal Puppet had been forged in this world, according to Li Fan's deductions, True Yang alone would not be enough to protect him and successfully achieve Dao Integration with the Immortal Souls of the super Xuanhuang Realm.

"Besides those encountered in previous cycles, one must also consider what lies beyond the High Wall..."

In Li Fan's mind, the scene from the end of his previous life resurfaced: the advent of Cat Treasure, the collapse of the High Wall, and even the screen of Return to Truth flickering in and out of existence.

"When the Azure Nether Immortal Domain is born, can the High Wall still block and isolate the inside from the outside? If unknown forces beyond the High Wall sense and descend, then the time left for me is truly not much."

Based on his encounters in his previous life, Li Fan calculated the buffer time. "One must strategize for defeat before aiming for victory. Although it may not happen, one must guard against it."

"Among my abilities, Return to Truth is the most fundamental. Secondly, it is my formation mastery that looks down upon the starry sea. Thirdly, it is the Ascending Finger, Nine Heavens Descending Dust. Lastly, it is the various True Immortal Scripts."

In Li Fan's sea of consciousness, the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc, having completed its task of deducing the downgrading of immortal formations, did not rest for a moment. It was currently deducing a formation that could be described as world-shattering. This formation integrated all his present knowledge of formations. It was about using mortal power to tread the path of True Immortals!

Let's list the formations Li Fan currently possessed. Derived from the Primordial Origin Spirit Array were the Starry Enigma, Myriad Spirits Returning to Numbers; Desolate Falling, Empty Chamber Blooming Flowers; and Boundless Unity, Primordial Square. Inspired by the ancient Xuanhuang Realm's Primary Protective Great Formation, Li Fan had personally deduced the formations Simulated Beings and Immortal Descent, All Things Return to Void. One for creation, one for annihilation, their power was not inferior to orthodox immortal formations.

And now, Li Fan intended to combine all these immortal formations, with the concept of the Infinite Method at its core, to create an ultimate defensive immortal formation! Li Fan vividly recalled how in his previous life, the Sacred Emperor had used the Bright Moon Starlight Grand Formation to trap the Four Central Prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance, regardless of cultivation level. Upon entering, anyone would fall into an endless starry sea, trapped and unable to escape. This time, he intended to do the same. However, the target Li Fan planned to enclose was the Xuanhuang Realm itself! To build another formation wall outside the Xuanhuang Realm!

"If I can delay all unstable factors for a while longer... that will be victory!"

The Tribulation End Dissolution Disc's light flickered, and countless formation branches generated, combined, and evolved within it. With the downgrading of immortal formations as a foundation, the original divide between immortal and mortal was broken. The direction of immortal formation deduction proceeded as Li Fan had anticipated.

"The Primordial Square formation can be utilized to guide and analyze those who enter the formation."

"With Empty Chamber Blooming Flowers and Simulated Beings, create infinite worlds that are close to reality with extreme illusions."

"Starry Enigma, Myriad Spirits Returning to Numbers, can arbitrarily adjust the formation's world in an instant..."

"Any form of energy, any type of life, has an environment suitable or unsuitable for it. Combining the essences of various immortal formations, create infinite, ever-changing, inverse realms tailored to weaknesses!"

"To trap people with a realm, to kill people with a realm!"

Just like Li Fan, who possessed the heaven-defying treasure "Return to Truth," he was still trapped within the Xuanhuang Realm and the starry sea. A hundred cycles had passed, and it was evident that more time would be needed to transcend. The formation being deduced by the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc was tailored for every future intruder, creating their own unique Xuanhuang Realm! From a mechanistic standpoint, the fundamental principle of this formation was similar to the infinite illusions Li Fan experienced in his past life within the Immortal Execution Great Formation after leaving Great Xuan, enduring endless cycles. However, it was clear that the reality and delicate detail of the world constituted by this immortal formation far surpassed ordinary illusions.

"Using the foundation of an Xuanhuang Realm encounter with nightmare difficulty as the blueprint, create infinite variations of the Xuanhuang Realm..."

"This formation can be named, 'Bewildering Flowers, Azure Nether Beings'!"

With its name set, its intent condensed, and its formation took shape. The flickering lights within the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc instantly stilled. Then, they erupted outwards with a sudden burst, forming a perfect circular sphere composed of what seemed to be billions of fragments. In each fragment, a world scene, similar yet different to the Xuanhuang Realm, was playing out. In the center of these billions of fragment worlds, the Xuanhuang Realm, encompassed by the High Wall, lay quietly in the heart of the abyssal starry sea, emitting a faint glow that illuminated all the surrounding fragment worlds.

Even Li Fan, the creator of this formation, was momentarily stunned by this magnificent sight. In a fleeting glimpse, Li Fan glimpsed the worlds constructed by the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc. Even though he had struggled in the Xuanhuang Realm for many years, sweat beaded on his forehead at this moment, awestruck by his own creation.

"If I were to get lost in it, I might be suppressed for hundreds of cycles."

"Below True Immortals, even if they understood the true nature of the world they were in, they would have no power to break free..."

"In a sense, this 'Bewildering Flowers, Azure Nether Beings' Great Formation is definitely a High Wall of formations!"

As Li Fan pondered, the sphere of fragments surrounding the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc slowly collapsed inwards, finally returning to the core of the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc. Currently, the Tribulation End Dissolution Disc had only deduced the core part of the "Azure Nether Beings" Great Formation. There was still a long way to go to perfect all the details. However, even just the core of the formation was enough for Li Fan to prepare in advance.

"The amount of Primal Force Essence required to complete this Azure Nether Beings Great Formation, which will envelop the Xuanhuang Realm, is terrifyingly immense."

After a rough estimation, Li Fan's brow furrowed. With the current number of Netherfolk, no matter how hard they tried, they absolutely could not satisfy Li Fan's needs.

"It seems I need to think of other methods."

"Either, to use the beastly reproductive factory method, or to find an alternative energy source equivalent to Primal Force Essence."

Thinking this, Li Fan sent a wisp of his divine sense down to the depths of Great Xuan. The Netherfolk here, since Li Fan captured them and confined them here, had seen their population triple. Every day, besides eating, drinking, and sleeping, they prayed to the great Sage Master. Strangely, not only did they not weaken due to the lack of activity, but they were also much healthier overall than when they were hiding and evading the pursuit of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. This phenomenon was different from Li Fan's previous experiences. In the past, after being exploited, the Netherfolk became extremely weak. Their lifespan shortened, and their reproductive capabilities plummeted. If not cared for properly, they faced the danger of clan extinction.

However, based on the current situation, the Netherfolk seemed to have broken free from this cursed fate. Li Fan recalled and compared the differences between this life and his past lives.

"The method of reproduction is not significantly different. Although I have not excessively oppressed them and have given them enough rest time, the Sacred Emperor in the previous life did the same."

"The Netherfolk in Great Qi also had short lifespans..."

"Could it be?" Li Fan remembered that in this life, he had once possessed a Netherfolk using the method of Dao Pills, attempting to peer into the hidden True Immortal Script within their ancestral Great Heavenly Venerate bloodline.

"Is it related to this script that involves the transformation between immortal and mortal?" Li Fan couldn't help but guess.

"The Netherfolk are the creation of the former Heavenly Mysteries King. Their bloodline is the source that can generate Primal Force Essence, and it is also their original sin."

"Now, their cursed fate has lessened..." Li Fan gradually understood.

"The Heavenly Mysteries King's temperament might not have been absolute. While punishing the Netherfolk, he might have left a sliver of hope. If any Netherfolk could awaken and discover the secret within their bloodline, the chains binding them would be weakened."

To verify his guess, Li Fan acted immediately. The phantom of the Sage Master, to which the Netherfolk devoutly knelt, silently emitted a few streams of dark light, randomly shining into several Netherfolk below. As if receiving divine revelation, these Netherfolk suddenly stiffened. Numerous scenes inexplicably surged into their sea of consciousness. They became extremely excited, first kowtowing and expressing gratitude to the Sage Master's phantom, then immersing themselves in the Sage Master's enlightenment. Their prayers and murmurs grew louder and faster. Like the Netherfolk Li Fan had possessed in the past, their bodies rapidly aged. Some even turned white-haired in an instant, turning into withered bones in the blink of an eye.

This terrifying scene did not scare the praying Netherfolk beside them. Instead, they felt immense envy, their devout faith growing even more fervent. Finally, amidst chanting, all the Netherfolk whom Li Fan had bestowed with divine revelation burned their lives and turned to ash in their enlightenment. At the cost of this, Li Fan keenly sensed that perhaps the curse binding them had been further weakened. The remaining Netherfolk did indeed become stronger. Not just their physique, but also their divine soul and comprehension were enhanced comprehensively. It was as if... they were slowly returning to their original state, the way the bloodline of the first generation Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate should be.

"How could a being chosen by True Immortals from the Upper Realm to be the first generation Great Azure Nether Heavenly Venerate be weak?"

"How could his bloodline be so worthless?" Li Fan narrowed his eyes and continued to spread divine revelations through the Sage Master's phantom. With the current overall number of Netherfolk, they could still withstand such a life-burning form of improvement.

"However, I need to be careful about the degree to which I release the shackles."

"I don't want to face a resurrected Great Heavenly Venerate suddenly appearing at a critical moment this time." Having suffered a loss once, Li Fan was naturally extremely cautious in this regard.

Subsequently, as the Netherfolk slowly returned to their ancestral state, they displayed their incredible vitality and reproductive capacity to Li Fan, not much slower than the creations of the past fleshy factory. Moreover, there were no defective products. All offspring born were extraordinarily strong, more akin to beasts than humans! As the seals on the Netherfolk gradually lifted, the amount of Primal Force Essence generated by each of their prayers also increased exponentially, partially alleviating Li Fan's urgent need.

However, looking at the Netherfolk, whose numbers had doubled again in a short period, Li Fan felt an unusually strong, inexplicable chill surge within him.

"Even under severe restraints, they reached this level. If they were in their prime condition back then..."

"Their reproductive ability would likely be no less than the rumored insect race, and the key is that these Netherfolk are all physically strong. It completely defies common sense." Thinking this, Li Fan subtly trimmed and controlled the slightly inflated number of Netherfolk until it was pleasing to his sight before stopping.

"It seems I need to keep an eye on them to feel at ease." Li Fan separated a wisp of his simulated personality and quietly planted it into the phantom of the Sage Master that the Netherfolk worshipped. He then laid a layer of the newly deduced Azure Nether Beings Great Formation in the area where the Netherfolk lived, ensuring their complete containment, before ceasing.

"One cannot be careless at all." Rhythmically controlling the Netherfolk population for linear growth, and using the Primal Force Essence they produced to construct the "Bewildering Flowers, Azure Nether Beings" Great Formation, time flowed by rapidly.

Until one day... Li Fan suddenly looked up at the starry sky. The Medicine King Cauldron had finally escaped the Immortal Ruins and was falling towards the Xuanhuang Realm from the edge. The sense from the six-in-one Immortal Domain fragments within his body grew stronger, as if urging him to hurry forward and intercept it.

A flash of sword light, and Li Fan had already left the Xuanhuang Realm, emerging outside the world. He looked at the Medicine King True Cauldron, which was gradually growing larger in his vision and wobbling precariously. With a wave of his hand, he directly put it away. He returned with a flourish, seamlessly, without alerting anyone within the Xuanhuang Realm. As if sensing Li Fan's suppression from the outside, the Medicine King True Cauldron continuously emitted wisps of energy fluctuations, attempting to escape Li Fan's control. But it was merely futile struggle. With the Azure Nether Beings Great Formation on the outer layer and the Eternal Void Return Formation on the inner layer, under the deterrent power of the immortal formations, the Medicine King True Cauldron immediately became docile, standing still.

Li Fan sent a wisp of divine sense into the cauldron, navigating it with practiced ease to the core control center. Seeing the emptiness within the core, Li Fan sneered slightly. He reached out his right hand and clenched it. The entire space seemed to twist under this grasp. A blurry figure was thus directly pulled out by Li Fan!

"Senior, spare me!" This figure was naturally the hidden Sect Master of the Medicine King Sect, Liu Ruchen. Pulled out by Li Fan, he completely lost the demeanor of a sect master and cried out in panic! It was not that Liu Ruchen was incompetent, but rather that the methods Li Fan currently displayed were simply mystical and unfathomable. He had somehow advanced all the way to the core center without triggering any of the Medicine King Cauldron's restrictions, and had seen through his hiding method with a single glance. Liu Ruchen's mind raced as he pondered which expert of the Ten Sects this person might be. However, Li Fan appeared as ordinary as a mortal, with no aura leaking, making him impossible to fathom. Only Li Fan's calm expression and gentle glance sent his spiritual senses into a frenzy with warnings, making his hands and feet turn cold.

Just as he was about to speak, Li Fan pointed a finger at his forehead. An immensely powerful force surged like a tidal wave into his divine soul. Already in a severely injured state, barely clinging to life, Liu Ruchen was hit by this heavy blow, becoming on the verge of death, with only aTHREAD of his residual soul remaining.

Under normal circumstances, Li Fan would not resort to soul-searching. However, regarding the clues about fragments of the Immortal Realm secretly left by the Medicine King Sect's ancestor Sun Piaomiao, Li Fan could not afford to be careless. Innumerable images, Liu Ruchen's past memories, flooded in. Li Fan examined them all, meticulously, especially any information about Sun Piaomiao. In Liu Ruchen's era, the name Sun Piaomiao already existed only in distant legends. Even after succeeding as the Grand Master of the Medicine King Sect, Liu Ruchen's knowledge of Sun Piaomiao was mostly derived from a travelogue left by his ancestor. Previously, Li Fan had only heard of the various aspects of this travelogue from members of the Medicine King Sect. Now, reading it word for word in Liu Ruchen's memories, and knowing the answer already, Li Fan indeed discerned some peculiar details.

The travelogue began after Sun Piaomiao established the Medicine King Sect. Without any warning, as the Sect Master of the Medicine King Sect, Sun Piaomiao decided to leave the Xuanhuang Realm and travel through various realms. One should know that at that time, the Medicine King Sect was newly established, with unstable foundations and a multitude of intricate affairs awaiting the Medicine King's attention. Yet, Sun Piaomiao simply packed up, leaving a mess behind, and departed as if it were nothing. If not for his few reliable personal disciples, and the Medicine King Sect's principle of saving the world and assisting the populace, usually avoiding disputes with other sects, the Medicine King Sect likely wouldn't have survived until Sun Piaomiao's return.

Sun Piaomiao's sudden departure, though it could be explained by his unrestrained and unconventional nature, seemed to Li Fan more like he had received some mission and was forced to go. After all, given Sun Piaomiao's strength at that time, the starry sky was not a smooth path for him. It could be seen from his encounter with a starry sky anomaly, nearly perishing and falling heavily into the Carefree Realm.

With this foresight, Li Fan reread Sun Piaomiao's travelogue carefully. Logically, a travelogue should record the memorable parts of the entire journey. However, Sun Piaomiao mentioned nothing about his personal experiences, not even his severe injury; all his writing was dedicated to describing the characteristics of the cultivation worlds he passed through. It was as if he were merely a dispassionate recording camera, lest later generations, wishing to revisit those places, be unable to find them.

"Most importantly, what was the purpose of the pieces he left behind?"

"Since he left such obvious clues for his descendants, he should have mentioned it, even if it was just a word." Li Fan meticulously searched the travelogue, and not finding what he wanted, frowned slightly. To ensure no details were missed, he searched again. With no results, Li Fan then searched through Liu Ruchen's other memories. Fortune favored his persistence. Finally, Li Fan found a potential clue in an anecdote Liu Ruchen had heard from his master in his childhood. This anecdote was merely mentioned by Liu Ruchen's master occasionally, and even Liu Ruchen himself had forgotten it.

"Back then, a severely injured guest came to the Medicine King Sect seeking help."

"His injuries were too severe; no one in the sect could save him. Even the ancestor's personal examination yielded the same conclusion."

"Logically, there isn't a cure for everything in the world. Our Medicine King Sect did its best to save him. Who would have thought that in his despair, this guest would curse our Medicine King Sect? Even with his remaining strength, he launched a frenzied attack on the Medicine King Sect disciples. Our Medicine King Sect saves lives, but we are not so foolish as to tolerate such behavior, and we naturally have our tempers."

"The disciples immediately moved to kill him. But the ancestor stopped everyone, approached the dying guest, pointed to the sky, and said something."

"The guest's body trembled slightly, his malevolence vanishing. He stopped attacking, looked up at the sky, and the ferocity on his face turned into two streams of tears. With a sense of release, he passed away."

"The ancestor sighed softly and ordered us to bury him properly."

Young Liu Ruchen, like everyone who heard the anecdote, naturally asked curiously, "What exactly did the ancestor say to him that could so easily resolve such furious killing intent?"
