Liu Ruchen's master said with a deep sigh, "Birth, old age, sickness, and death. This is the eternal principle of the Great Dao, which even this starry sky cannot avoid. What about you?"

"That's what the ancestor said back then."

Young Liu Ruchen, unable to grasp the gravity of these words at the time, merely nodded innocently and agreed, "Yes! Dying is dying, and he still throws a tantrum. He deserved it!"

But returning to the present, Li Fan could discern a different flavor in Sun Piaomiao's words back then. "At that time, the immortal path was not severed, and everyone aimed to ascend to immortality. Sun Piaomiao's words did not sound like something a medical expert trying to save a patient would say."

"It aligns with my previous conjecture about pessimists in the Immortal Realm." Li Fan pondered secretly and tried to find more clues in Liu Ruchen's memories. As expected, where there was one, there was another. Li Fan indeed found another seemingly suspicious past event. Generally, cultivation sects would establish statues of their founding ancestor for later generations to worship. However, the Medicine King Sect had no statues of Sun Piaomiao whatsoever.

"Master, Master, what did Ancestor look like! How come there isn't even a portrait?"

"Heh heh, Ancestor said back then, rather than worshiping him, it’s better to worship the Medicine King True Cauldron of our sect. We refine medicine, save people, and help the world all thanks to this cauldron! Without the cauldron, there would be no Medicine King, and no future."

"Medicine King True Cauldron, future." Li Fan let out a long sigh and slowly withdrew from Liu Ruchen's memories, standing in contemplation. Liu Ruchen's remnant soul trembled beside him, not daring to disturb him.

"Perhaps it is just my speculation, but in my opinion, the hint left by Sun Piaomiao is already very clear."

"However, this is on the premise that the Medicine King Cauldron is highly likely to be a fragment of the Immortal Realm, which I already know."

"If my guess is correct, Sun Piaomiao must have hinted at the special nature of the Medicine King Cauldron elsewhere, but it was not noticed by his disciples, and the information has since vanished into the river of history."

"If I hadn't coincidentally discovered the abnormality of Sun Piaomiao's遺物 on the Immortal Boat, this secret might have been buried forever." Li Fan looked at the Medicine King Cauldron.

Activating the True-False Transformation, he channeled his Spirit Qi, differentiating a trace of power from the "Scripture of Universal Salvation." Li Fan had cultivated this technique before, and with his current strength far exceeding ordinary Dao Integration cultivators, he could replicate it effortlessly, making it indistinguishable from the genuine Scripture of Universal Salvation.

To Liu Ruchen's immense shock, Li Fan easily broke through the restrictions of the Medicine King True Cauldron and, in doing so, gained control of it.

"The disciples of the Medicine King Sect have degenerated to this extent!"

"Unable to help in times of crisis, yet fleeing for their own lives..."

"Scoundrels!" Li Fan cursed coldly. To Liu Ruchen, these words were like thunder. Knowing everything about the Medicine King Sect, and speaking with such a senior's tone... In an instant, a bold guess surfaced in Liu Ruchen's mind.

"Senior is..." Li Fan ignored him, grabbed Liu Ruchen, and flashed out of the Medicine King True Cauldron. Simultaneously, with a thought, he directly shut down the Great Dream of Ages formation within the Medicine King Cauldron. Then, like a sieve, he shook all the slumbering Medicine King Sect disciples inside, causing them to fall out.

In an instant, the Medicine King Sect cultivators fell from the sky like raindrops. Fortunately, they had all woken up by then, sensing that something was wrong, and quickly stabilized themselves. The Medicine King Sect disciples, in their dazed state, were bewildered. While communicating, their gazes gradually focused on Li Fan, the only stranger. Especially on Liu Ruchen's figure in Li Fan's hand, blurred and on the verge of disappearing.

"Sect Master?!"

"Master?!" The disciples, elders, and Liu San all exclaimed in shock, glaring at Li Fan in anger. Li Fan, however, remained indifferent to the gazes focused on him, continuing to manipulate the shaking Medicine King True Cauldron. Only after all the Medicine King Sect's secret treasures, along with various precious spiritual herbs and medicinal plants contained within, flew out as light clusters did Li Fan stop. He raised his hand, and the All Things Return to Void formation manifested in his palm, covering the Medicine King True Cauldron. Silently, the Medicine King True Cauldron, which had been able to resist for a while in the Immortal Ruins, crumbled into dust.

"Medicine King Cauldron!" Witnessing the destruction of the Medicine King Sect's supreme treasure by Li Fan's hands, the entire Medicine King Sect's members' eyes were filled with fury. They were about to seek revenge against Li Fan. However, the aura of the world-ending immortal formation that inadvertently emanated from Li Fan's fingertips froze them all on the spot, as if they had fallen into an ice cellar.

Chapter 1360: The Dust Cauldron Transforms into an Immortal Chess Piece

No more indignation, no more unwillingness.

Regardless of Dao Integration, Soul Transformation, or Nascent Soul.

Under the Great Formation of "Immortals Descend, All Things Return to the Void," all members of the Medicine King Sect displayed the same demeanor.

Fear, only endless fear filled their hearts.

Only after Li Fan retracted the might of the world-ending formation did the members of the Medicine King Sect slowly emerge from that extreme emotion.

However, as Li Fan remained silent, they dared not move even slightly.

The power of the immortal formation flowed, contained but not dispersed. It formed a self-contained space, enveloping the entire Medicine King Sect.

While it deterred everyone, it also shielded them from the Xuanhuang Realm's law of "Incompatibility of Laws," to prevent these newly awakened Medicine King Sect cultivators from engaging in mutual slaughter.

Then, Li Fan acted as if they didn't exist, examining the minutest particles of the Medicine King True Cauldron. As he predicted, they finally coalesced into the shape of a chess piece.

However, this chess piece was not covered in a layer of gray like those Li Fan had collected previously.

Instead, it was distinctly...

White.

Even the edges of the white piece had a halo of color strikingly similar to the fused chess pieces.

Li Fan extended his hand and drew the white chess piece over. He gazed at it closely. Within the small piece, it seemed that an infinite vitality was gestured.

Before, the chess pieces he had previously subdued within his body, including the fused Immortal Realm fragment, all vibrated slightly.

As if they had welcomed their leader, they erupted in cheers.

An urgent demand, several times stronger than before, emanated from the chess pieces within him.

They seemed eager to fuse with this white chess piece.

This urge even gradually transformed into Li Fan's own desire.

The craving was so intense that even circulating the Immortal Heart Incantation made it difficult to resist.

But Li Fan, after all, possessed an extraordinary will.

With immense fortitude, he managed to forcibly suppress the restless stirring of the chess pieces within his body.

He calmed his mind and was able to once again scrutinize the white chess piece in his hand, comparing it with the six chess pieces sealed within him.

Within Li Fan's body, there was one large and five small. The large one was seven-colored, formed by the fusion of six ordinary gray chess pieces. The five smaller ones orbited the colorful chess piece.

As for the white chess piece before him, although it was a single piece, it felt similar to the fused seven-colored chess piece.

"It seems that what Sun Piaomiao left in the Xuanhuang Realm was the most crucial one."

"A complete Immortal Realm..."

"The last remaining piece is the one on the Sky-Piercing Shuttle."

The thought of seeing a fragment of the shattered Immortal Realm in the future, even for someone as composed as Li Fan, couldn't help but stir his heart.

"Does this fused Immortal Realm contain Immortal Spiritual Qi?"

"Can I use this to ascend to immortality?"

"Are there any remnants of the True Immortals who forged these chess pieces left within the Immortal Realm?"

"Furthermore, are there True Immortals within this Immortal Realm who wish to be reborn along with it?"

Numerous questions surged into Li Fan's mind like a tide.

If it were an ordinary cultivator, even with the Immortal Realm fragment in hand, facing the complete unknown and immense risks within, they would undoubtedly hesitate and be reluctant to activate it.

However, Li Fan, possessing "Return to Truth," had no such concerns.

Especially since, in this era, Li Fan's immortal formation had just been completed, and his Return to Truth's charging protection had doubled, providing him with ample means of defense.

...

The white chess piece, transformed from the Medicine King Cauldron, seemed to possess infinite magical power, drawing the gaze of all the cultivators present.

They faintly sensed that some great secret was hidden behind this chess piece. However, intimidated by the might Li Fan had just displayed, they only dared to watch from afar.

Finally, Liu Ruchen, who had recovered somewhat, mustered his courage and asked, "May I dare to ask, senior, is this chess piece a relic left by our ancestor Sun Piaomiao?"

The reason Liu Ruchen dared to speak was that before Li Fan destroyed the Medicine King Cauldron, he had specifically released the cultivators of the Medicine King Sect from within. This showed sufficient goodwill.

Li Fan stored the white chess piece within his body, suppressing it separately from the others, and then said with a cold laugh, "Sun Piaomiao handed this item to you disciples and grandchildren for so long, even leaving numerous hints, both explicit and implicit, and yet you still cannot discern its true nature..."

"Truly a bunch of trash!"

Li Fan's unsparing scolding indirectly answered Liu Ruchen's question.

Most of the Medicine King Sect disciples showed a flicker of shame on their faces.

Liu Ruchen gave an awkward smile and intended to inquire further, but Li Fan cut him off, "This matter is no longer something you can meddle in."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes, examining Liu Ruchen, and commented, "Although you violated the principles of the Medicine King Sect, leading the entire sect to escape the Xuanhuang Realm was, by coincidence, a good deed!"

With a flick of his finger, countless images flashed in the air.

These were the dramatic changes that had occurred in the Xuanhuang Realm and even the Sea of Stars during the ten thousand years the Medicine King Cauldron was absorbed by the Immortal Ruins.

The members of the Medicine King Sect were stunned into an uproar.

When Li Fan slightly relaxed the protection of his immortal formation, they felt an overwhelming killing intent towards their left and right friends, elders, and fellow disciples surge from their hearts.

Only then did they confirm that Li Fan was not fabricating. Their faces turned ashen, and they lost their souls.

Li Fan ignored them and summoned seven Dao Integration cultivators from the Medicine King Sect, including Liu Ruchen.

"Do you know what this chess piece, transformed from the Medicine King Cauldron, is?"

"It is one of the fragments of the Immortal Realm left by Sun Piaomiao!"

As soon as Li Fan spoke, he sent the Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect reeling.

Then, he controlled himself and slightly released the aura emanating from the seven-colored chess piece sealed within him.

Even a glimpse of the Immortal Realm's law fragments was enough to make these Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect intoxicated.

"The Immortal Realm suffered a calamity, and the signs were evident long ago. Back then, Sun Piaomiao received the Immortal Mandate and left behind a contingency for the revival of the Immortal Realm..."

Li Fan spoke eloquently, narrating the "facts" he had speculated.

"Now, Sun Piaomiao has vanished. Since you are Sun Piaomiao's disciples, you should assist this Venerable in completing the great undertaking of restoring the Immortal Realm!" Li Fan said imperiously, as if it were only natural.

Liu Ruchen and the others had been engrossed in the wonders of the Immortal Realm's laws.

Upon hearing Li Fan's words, they were suddenly dumbfounded.

They looked at Li Fan in unison, their faces filled with disbelief: "Restoring the Immortal Realm? Us?"

"This Venerable has already collected all the Immortal Realm fragments. We are merely waiting for an opportunity."

"At that time, you will only need to assist from the sidelines," Li Fan said indifferently.

Facing the request of Li Fan, who was suspected to be a True Immortal, how could the Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect dare to refuse?

However, they were still uneasy, wondering why such a powerful being, who could destroy their entire sect with a wave of his hand, would need their help.

But since Li Fan didn't say anything, they dared not ask.

Were these people from the Medicine King Sect useful?

To Li Fan, they were naturally useful.

Not for anything like rebuilding the Immortal Realm. But rather to serve as catalysts for the fusion of various powers when the Xuanhuang Realm was elevated.

Chapter 1361

So far, the process of searching for and integrating the chess pieces of the Immortal Realm has been too smooth.

It was so smooth that Li Fan couldn't help but suspect if he would get stuck at the moment of the final integration of the Immortal Realm's law fragments.

If Sun Piaomiao really left any restrictive measures, then the Medicine King Sect, as Sun Piaomiao's descendant, should be able to bypass such restrictions to some extent.

This was only the first aspect.

Li Fan's gaze swept over the seven Dao Integration cultivators present from the Medicine King Sect.

"In the past, your cultivation might have been considered top-tier among cultivators. But after ten thousand years, with the changes of the world, you are now a bit weak. It's even a bit of a struggle to help me."

"Therefore, I will help you increase your strength in a short period of time."

Upon hearing this, Liu Ruchen cautiously asked, "Senior, what kind of 'increase in strength' are you referring to..."

"Nowadays, cultivators cultivate by 'Devouring Heaven and Consuming Earth'. Because they transform the power of heaven and earth into their own use, and every move they make is filled with the might of heaven and earth, they can manipulate Spirit Qi on a scale far exceeding ancient cultivators." As Li Fan spoke, the cultivation methods that defied the principles of heaven and earth were revealed before them.

The expressions of the Dao Integration cultivators from the Medicine King Sect were not very good.

"No wonder the Heavenly Tribulation of 'Incompatibility of Laws' descended. Such methods of cultivation are simply demonic and heretical..." Liu San muttered softly.

Li Fan snorted coldly, "What is evil? What is righteous? In the cultivation world, there is only the distinction between strong and weak! If the strong declare the new methods as just, then they are just!"

Although the Medicine King Sect disciples were unconvinced by these words, they dared not refute them under Li Fan's might.

Li Fan shook his head slightly, "Fine, only when you personally experience the wonders of the new methods will you perhaps change your minds."

With a gentle wave of his hand, detailed information about the Essence of Heaven and Earth appeared before them in an instant.

"Each of you, pick one. I will help you achieve Dao Integration again with the new methods."

The seven of them trembled.

"I choose this one, Scarlet Refinement." Jiang Yushan spoke first.

As a former warden of the Prison of Uncertainty, Jiang Yushan had countless kills and did not care about the distinction between righteous and evil. As long as her strength could be improved, she was willing to try.

"Good! You have discerning eyes! The power of this Scarlet Refinement is balanced and harmonious. It can pacify the after-effects of the rampant killing intent in your body." Li Fan nodded in admiration.

With a leader, the remaining Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect exchanged glances and no longer held back. They began to pick and choose among themselves.

Soon, the Essence of Heaven and Earth was divided.

"Without further ado, I will take you hunting next."

The Wooden Sword Phantasm was unsheathed, enveloping all the cultivators present.

Then, in an instant, they arrived in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Even through the protection of the sword's illusion, Liu Ruchen and the others could still sense the faint influence of the Heavenly Dao of 'Incompatibility of Laws'.

"I cannot protect you forever. The Scripture of Universal Salvation only needs Liu Ruchen to cultivate it. The others can switch to other Dao Integration cultivation methods." As Li Fan spoke, he displayed information on thousands of Dao Integration true arts.

Each of these arts was no less powerful than the Scripture of Universal Salvation, almost blinding them.

"We'll talk about it when you return after achieving Dao Integration."

"Now, cheer up."

Li Fan's figure floated above them.

He looked up at the sky and casually unleashed a decree.

Dark clouds surged, and wind and thunder roared.

A massive vortex immediately formed in the sky.

It was like a rift in the firmament, with countless lightning bolts flashing within.

Li Fan whispered in a voice only he could hear, "Transference of Heavenly Principles!"

The five true words, spoken in reverse, reached the heavens.

Li Fan used the Heavenly Mandate of the False, and soon, seven blurred figures simultaneously responded and appeared within the vortex.

They were precisely the favored Essence of Heaven and Earth that the Medicine King Sect disciples had each chosen earlier!

As the seven Essences of Heaven and Earth appeared, the eyes of the Medicine King Sect disciples instantly turned red.

Each of these figures was as tempting as the Elixir of Longevity to cultivators. And now, with the seven gathered...

If it weren't for Li Fan's power, which firmly suppressed them, this group of Medicine King Sect Dao Integration cultivators would have lost their minds and charged out recklessly.

Facing such immense temptation, Li Fan's expression remained unchanged.

As the Essences of Heaven and Earth appeared, the Immortal Formation quietly sealed the area.

The Essences of Heaven and Earth had keen perception.

Sensing the severed connection to the origin of heaven and earth, they immediately awoke from their daze.

But before they could act,

Li Fan's five-fingered cloud covered them.

Li Fan casually pressed down with his palm.

The seven Essences of Heaven and Earth felt as if the weight of the entire world was pressing down on them!

In an instant, they were unable to move!

Moreover, the invisible shackles and binding forces pressing down on them continuously intensified.

Li Fan's five fingers slightly curled, turning his palm into a claw.

Bang! Bang! Bang!

The sounds of the law bodies of the Essences of Heaven and Earth exploding inch by inch were heard repeatedly!

Under the terrifying immense force, their figures were forced to contort.

At the brink of death, the law power within them attempted a final struggle, churning and surging, trying to escape Li Fan's control.

But like constantly crashing waves, they were ultimately unable to shake the majestic dam.

All the struggles of the Essences of Heaven and Earth were destined to be in vain.

Their dying burst not only failed to shake the shackles on themselves but instead accelerated their demise.

Even in their state of glazed-over greed, the scene of Li Fan suppressing seven Essences of Heaven and Earth with a single palm deeply shocked the present Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect.

It was only when Li Fan's stern shout came that they recovered from their shock, "What are you standing around for?"

Liu Ruchen and the others felt the restraining force on their bodies disappear and no longer suppressed their inner greed.

They all surged towards their predetermined targets.

With their killing moves unleashed upon the Essences of Heaven and Earth suppressed by Li Fan.

Only when they truly engaged with the Essences of Heaven and Earth did the Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect personally experience the power of the great forces of heaven and earth.

Even though the Essences of Heaven and Earth could not fight back and could only be passively attacked,

Even though the Essences of Heaven and Earth had already been severely wounded by Li Fan's palm,

They had almost exhausted all the Spirit Qi in their bodies before they could barely kill these Essences of Heaven and Earth.

"Even among all the Essences of Heaven and Earth, the ones you selected for me, Senior, are definitely top-tier." A thought couldn't help but surface in their minds.

"And such powerful Essences of Heaven and Earth had absolutely no power to resist in front of Senior..."

The Medicine King Sect disciples once again gained a clear, quantitative understanding of Li Fan's strength.

As each Essence of Heaven and Earth was killed, Li Fan also released the seal of the Immortal Formation.

Inheriting the power of the Essences of Heaven and Earth, the power of the Xuanhuang Realm's law origin directly poured down from the giant vortex in the sky.

Like pouring clouds, it descended upon the Medicine King Sect disciples.

Their auras multiplied.

Seven newly ascended Dao Integration Immortal Venerables descended upon the Xuanhuang Realm!

At the same time, a phenomenon occurred between heaven and earth.

The fall of a single Essence of Heaven and Earth was enough to shake the world. Seven simultaneous falls...

A phenomenon identical to those that occur when cultivators die illuminated the sky.

The Medicine King Sect disciples felt an omnipresent, almost tangible, terrifying malevolence from heaven and earth!

And although Li Fan had not personally attacked, he had Transferred the Heavenly Principles and suppressed the Essences of Heaven and Earth.

He was also the culprit behind the demise of the Essences of Heaven and Earth!

The heavenly malevolence he faced was thousands of times that of the Medicine King Sect's Dao Integration cultivators combined!

The previous goodwill vanished, as if facing an irreconcilable enemy.

As he stood against heaven and earth, the malevolence, like a tangible entity, swirled around him, transforming into sinister whispers.

This made the Medicine King Sect disciples, who had always upheld the belief of saving the world and its people, feel unaccustomed.

But if they were to return the power they had already obtained to the heavens...

That was impossible.

They would rather fight against heaven and earth!

Under such circumstances, Li Fan was unhurried, having already prepared, and stood before the Medicine King Sect's Dao Integration cultivators.

He directly looked up at the sky and stated the reason for his actions.

The process of the Xuanhuang Realm's sublimation would be aided by several forces.

For example, the power of the Star Seas' revival, or the residual power of other cultivation realms that had been sealed.

Or the Immortal Spiritual power from the legacy of the Great Heavenly Venerates.

Such a multitude of complex and vast forces was like a potent medicine.

The Xuanhuang Realm, with its current fragmented and weak body, might not be able to withstand it.

Therefore, a medicinal primer was needed as a buffer.

The Medicine King Sect disciples who had today devoured the Essences of Heaven and Earth of the Xuanhuang Realm were this primer!

Next, Li Fan would first infuse the power of the Xuanhuang Realm's revival into their bodies through various means.

It was not about handing over the power to them.

Instead, they would serve as intermediaries and buffers.

When the Xuanhuang Realm officially sublimates, the Dao Integration Immortal Venerables will fall, and all forces will return to heaven at once!

An external application and internal utilization, working in tandem!

The medicine will cure the illness, and sublimation is in sight!

...

Li Fan's earnest explanation could roughly be summarized in a few words: "I'm doing all this for your own good!"

However, these reasons were not fabricated by Li Fan.

They were based on actual events.

This was something even the Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly Dao could sense.

The current Xuanhuang Realm was too far from its sublimation goal.

The total amount of power to be absorbed even subtly exceeded the Xuanhuang Realm's own capacity.

There was indeed a possibility of it being unable to absorb the benefits.

The suddenly increased heavenly malevolence stopped abruptly. The Azure Nether Heavenly Dao seemed to be contemplating.

Then, after a brief stalemate, the malevolence finally receded slowly.

This scene, in the eyes of the Medicine King Sect disciples,

Was Li Fan facing the Azure Nether Heaven and Earth alone, and then, through some unknown method, the heavenly malevolence vanished.

Such a feat was truly unheard of.

The reverence of the Medicine King Sect disciples for Li Fan deepened.

After successfully achieving Dao Integration with the new methods, their strength surged significantly.

Especially Liu Ruchen, not only did his injuries fully recover, but he also gained some insights during the Dao Integration process.

At this moment, Liu Ruchen, who had returned to the Great Xuan pocket world, was reporting his own insights to Li Fan.

"According to what Senior previously explained, to advance further in Dao Integration with the new methods, one must defy the principles of heaven and earth."

"However, during our Dao Integration, we have already consumed the Essence of Heaven and Earth. What is the Essence of Heaven and Earth? It is the embodiment of heavenly principles and the continuation of earthly reasoning."

"Therefore, the easiest entry method to defy principles is to follow the vine to find the melon, and follow the shadow to find the person. Find the heavenly principles behind the Essence of Heaven and Earth that you have consumed."

Liu Ruchen expounded eloquently, "For example, the Essence of Heaven and Earth I consumed, 'Crimson Threads', is actually a continuation of the principle of vitality."

"With a concrete direction, the principles of heaven and earth are no longer ethereal. Through continuous cultivation and enlightenment, one can find the origin of these principles. But to reverse these heavenly principles is almost unimaginably difficult."

"...It's like grabbing your own hair and lifting yourself up. Without the help of other forces, it's almost an impossible task."

...

Li Fan quietly listened to Liu Ruchen's explanation.

He had to admit that as someone who could succeed the position of sect leader, Liu Ruchen's comprehension was indeed extraordinary.

The other new Dao Integration cultivators from the Medicine King Sect listened attentively, their faces filled with thoughtful expressions.

Finally, after Liu Ruchen had nothing more to say, they all looked at Li Fan in unison.

"To gain so much insight on your first day of entering Dao Integration with the new methods, you are very good."

Li Fan's faint praise made Liu Ruchen feel deeply honored.

"However, you still think too simply. In the thousands of years of the Xuanhuang Realm, only a handful of people have managed to achieve Longevity by defying principles."

"And it has been a long time since any new Longgevity cultivators have appeared, do you know why?"

"Think about it carefully."

Li Fan's guidance ended abruptly, causing the Medicine King Sect disciples' expressions to change, and their minds to wander.

Next, the days for the seven Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect were very fulfilling.

They re-cultivated new Dao Integration techniques and stabilized their newly ascended foundations.

From time to time, they would listen to the preaching of a phantom Sage Master from below the Preaching Platform.

They would also spar with a mysterious and unfathomable senior whose aura was unfathomable and who was not good at words.

Even if this senior stood still, the Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect, despite pouring all their strength, could not even slightly harm him.

Therefore, they were able to freely unleash their attacks and test their learned skills.

As for the other Medicine King Sect disciples...

Li Fan looked at the smaller pink eye that branched off from the silver eye in front of him.

Tens of thousands of thread-like strands converged to form a thick long bridge, connecting the silver and pink eyes.

"The power of 'Forget Worry' pervades the Xuanhuang Realm, not just within the territory of the Five Elders Council."

"So there's no need to go to the Five Elders Council to enter the Land of Carefree Bliss. It's just that previously, a method couldn't be found."

"But now, I have dispatched a total of nine thousand six hundred and thirty-two vanguard soldiers..."

"The complete synchronization of awareness with the Simulated Heavenly Lattice is enough to lock onto the Land of Carefree Bliss through their thoughts."

The myriad threads acting as a bridge were precisely the cultivators dispatched by Li Fan who had entered the Land of Carefree Bliss earlier.

And sleeping within the pink eye were hordes of disciples from the Medicine King Sect below the Dao Integration realm!

Their physical bodies were under Li Fan's control, and with the sect leader's command, these Medicine King Sect disciples could obey orders even within the Land of Bliss.

Furthermore, as they belonged to the Medicine King Sect, they already possessed an extraordinary tacit understanding and bond.

This made their actions and exploration within the Land of Bliss more efficient.

In addition to the Medicine King Sect disciples, there were also a large number of Great Xuan cultivators within the pink eye.

Densely packed, they plunged in one after another, exploring the Land of Bliss.

The pink eye had not deciphered the secrets of the Land of Bliss.

It was merely using the cultivators who had entered the Land of Bliss earlier to establish an entrance to the Land of Bliss within the Great Xuan pocket world.

The moment the pink eye was generated, Li Fan had eagerly awaited the arrival of the power of the Carefree Heavenly Venerate.

Unfortunately, it seemed that Carefree was indifferent to such trivial matters.

Li Fan was truly disappointed that Carefree did not appear.

"I hope these people can give me some surprises."

Li Fan always had a premonition.

The secrets hidden within the Land of Carefree Bliss might be more important than he imagined.

...

The Immortal Realm was only one step away from reappearing.

Li Fan first sealed the already collected pieces within the Great Xuan pocket world using the Immortal Formation.

Then, he instructed the Dao Integration cultivators of the Medicine King Sect to set up the "Grand Sky Ritual" within the mortal pocket world, creating the illusion that he was still far away in the Great Qi, busy with the ritual.

His main body would remain in the Great Xuan, immobile.

He unleashed a Wood Sword Phantasm, quietly sending Tian Yang outside the Immortal Boat.

A trace of divine sense was attached to the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet, controlling its actions.

The reason Li Fan's main body did not personally stealthily steal it was that Li Fan had already undergone the Grand Sky Ritual with the Immortal Boat Elders.

Although the Immortal Boat side did not elaborate, Li Fan could vaguely guess his approximate location, as all the elders who participated in the Grand Sky Ritual could sense it at all times.

This sense was not particularly strong and would even become ineffective once outside the Immortal Boat.

However, if there was close contact, he would undoubtedly be exposed instantly.

The Immortal Boat elders were still useful to Li Fan, and it was not yet time to fall out with them.

Therefore, Li Fan decided to send Tian Yang to act.

With a thought, the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet's body expanded hundreds of times in an instant.

It lay quietly, floating in the dark void.

Then, it suddenly accelerated, heading towards the Immortal Boat.

There was no aura emanating from the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet.

It was like a colossal meteorite hurtling towards the Immortal Boat.

Such a massive entity, openly crashing towards it, was naturally sensed by the Immortal Boat immediately.

Because the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet's speed was not too fast, they initially thought it was just ordinary debris.

They casually emitted a beam of light, intending to shatter the stone.

But the light fell on Tian Yang without even causing a ripple, and the impact continued. Only then did the Immortal Boat suddenly realize something was wrong.

Several figures shimmered successively, led by Jian Daosheng, an Elder of the Immortal Boat.

With their combined efforts, they finally slowed down the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet's impact speed.

And blocked it outside the Immortal Boat.

"What is this?"

Jian Daosheng asked with a strange expression.

Without Li Fan's instructions, Tian Yang closed its eyes and remained still, allowing the Immortal Boat members to inspect it.

A trace of Li Fan's divine sense was hidden within the core Immortal Puppet's Eternal Residual Will, concealed by the Immortal Formation.

"It seems to be... the corpse of a giant?"

"No, this aura is extraordinary. And its bones..."

Soon, they discovered the extraordinary nature of the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet.

Jian Daosheng did not dare to delay and quickly sent a message.

Before long, other Immortal Boat Elders arrived one after another.

After all, they were a civilization that had existed since ancient times, and the knowledge of the Immortal Boat members was indeed extraordinary.

Soon, they roughly understood the origin of the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet.

"Immortal artifact wreckage as bones, True Immortal flesh and blood as skin. Hiss..."

"This is an Immortal Puppet?"

All the elders were shocked and stunned.

"How could it have drifted here?"

"There must be something strange. Caution is paramount!"

Everyone smelled a conspiracy.

"What should we do?" The elders looked at Zhong Daogong.

Zhong Daogong pondered, then struck the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet in front of him with a "Manifest" character.

He intended to use the power of True Immortal Script to probe the origins of this Immortal Puppet.

However, he did not expect that although the Immortal Puppet was dormant, there was a mystical force field protecting it.

The True Immortal Script, possessing immense power, could not affect the dormant Immortal Puppet in the slightest!

This discovery caused the expressions of the Immortal Boat elders to change drastically.

"This..."

After all, the Immortal Boat's greatest reliance was its various True Immortal Scripts.

Now, an existence that could be inherently immune to True Immortal Scripts had descended from the sky, how could they not feel fear?

Zhong Daogong reached out, calming everyone.

He stared at the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet with a solemn expression.

Then, Zhong Daogong first returned to the Immortal Boat, and when he returned, he held a green dagger that flowed like water in his hand.

The surrounding light flickered, and Zhong Daogong set up numerous defenses before cautiously approaching the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet.

He attempted to use this green dagger to cut off a piece of flesh and blood.

Li Fan had previously visited the first and second floors of the Immortal Boat's secret treasury but had not seen this dagger.

And this item, containing unknown power, was actually able to slowly break through the force field surrounding the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet!

But...

*Clang!*

The dagger collided with the True Immortal flesh and blood, producing a sound like metal striking metal.

It could not break it in the slightest.

The dagger's green radiance rippled, as if it had suffered a great impact. Zhong Daogong's eyes flashed with a hint of heartache. Knowing that it was impossible, he quickly retracted the dagger and retreated.

Wiping the cold sweat from his forehead, he said to those present, "It is indeed an Immortal Puppet. The pressure from the True Immortal flesh and blood, and the defense that can ignore the power of True Immortal Scripts..."

The faces of the Immortal Boat elders changed again.

After a discussion, they tried various methods but still could not truly break through the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet's defense or even cut off a piece of True Immortal flesh and blood.

The elders looked at the Immortal Puppet before them with unwillingness.

Then, after an unknown decision was made, most of the Immortal Boat elders actually retreated.

Only three elders were left to guard the Immortal Puppet from afar.

One day, two days...

Days passed, and the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet remained quietly lying in the dark void without any movement.

The elders of the Immortal Boat responsible for guarding it were also replaced one after another.

From smooth handovers at the beginning, to arguments gradually emerging later.

Thus, after half a year.

Near the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet, a group of Immortal Boat elders gathered again.

"Just leaving this Immortal Puppet here is not a solution."

"Yes, someone has to be sent to guard it. It came inexplicably from the starry sky, and if we don't stop it, who knows when it might return to the starry sky."

"We can only watch it like this. Should we bring it back to the Immortal Boat? The risk is too great."

"Indeed, this Immortal Puppet's arrival is too strange..."

The elders argued incessantly.

But their gazes, during the exchange, were always fixed on the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet not far away.

Finally, Zhong Daogong interrupted their conversation, "In the past six months, we have studied the force field attached to this Immortal Puppet and have made some progress."

"But it is obvious that if we can completely deconstruct the Immortal Puppet..."

A flicker of greed flashed in the eyes of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Bringing the Immortal Puppet back to the Immortal Boat, although it carries great risk, I believe it might be worth a try. After all, from the current situation, only that thing can break through this Immortal Puppet's defense."

As he said this, the entire place fell silent.

Shortly after, the elders nodded one after another.

Through eye contact, their opinions gradually reached a consensus.

The elders worked together, as if weaving a net,

Dragging the Tian Yang Immortal Puppet and pulling it into the Immortal Boat.

Chapter 1362

The Immortal Boat, though a vessel carrying a civilization that had endured for millennia, did not possess an internally vast space. This was why the boat's inhabitants constantly struggled with meager resources.

As Li Fan had anticipated, the True Yang Immortal Puppet was dragged by the Immortal Boat's elders into the boat’s hidden treasure trove.

The first floor, the second floor... The Heavenly Star Lotus bloomed across the sky. Countless rays of light flickered, and orbs of light intertwined, forming a gateway. The elders all cast spells in unison, and the gateway creaked open.

Inside the passage, an unnerving, faint green light emanated, exuding ominous auras that sought to spread and erode the surroundings. The Heavenly Star Lotus, stimulated by the green light, differentiated into star-light lotuses, blocking the gateway. A boundless sea of lotuses. Even as the green light passed through, causing the lotuses to wither one by one, it couldn't break through the blockade by the sea of lotuses for a time.

"Quick!" Zhong Daogong urged, as if greatly fearing the green light’s escape. The elders, aware of the danger, slowly guided the slumbering giant puppet into the third level of the treasure trove. Only Jian Daosheng, of their group of elders, followed inside. He wore a starlight armor, a seven-colored light alms bowl atop his head, and stood on a single, flat leaf boat. Though his appearance was somewhat comical, it clearly indicated the importance he placed on this mission.

The gateway slowly closed, leaving only a line of light extending from Jian Daosheng's starlight armor to connect with the outside. It was not completely sealed. Through Jian Daosheng's perspective, the appearance of the Immortal Boat's treasure trove, the third level of the Myriad Insights Record, slowly revealed itself to everyone.

Within the large, spherical, hollow space, countless green, viscous tissues continuously writhed, emitting bloodcurdling sounds. They grew and attached themselves to the walls. A gigantic gray stone statue stood within the hollow. The green tissues spread throughout the hollow, and their growth trajectory seemed to originate from the statue's gray form. The green sea submerged more than half of the statue’s body. Thousands of green trails extended from the statue's head. Each trail originated from a hollow eye socket within the head. This gray stone statue depicted some bizarre creature: a human body, but with a head devoid of facial features, instead covered in eyes.

The moment the True Yang Immortal Puppet entered the third level of this treasure trove, even though it exuded no aura, it immediately attracted the attention of the green substance within the hollow. Like tendrils, they traversed the air, attacking the True Yang from all directions. Jian Daosheng used this opportunity to hide within one of the statue's hollow eye sockets.

The green tendrils were blocked by the invisible force field surrounding the True Yang. However, perhaps due to the proximity, they sensed the presence of True Immortal flesh and blood on the True Yang, becoming even more excited. The entire hollow, filled with green, was activated, and surged towards the True Yang with immense agitation. In an instant, the True Yang Immortal Puppet was submerged by the endless green, vanishing into a patch of green light, surrounded by sounds like silkworms gnawing.

Li Fan's wisp of divine sense, examining the True Yang's conveyed sensations, was surprised. "Hmm? Can't see these green entities at all?" The information from the True Yang left Li Fan bewildered. "It's like… rain hitting the wind…" Li Fan mused, his divine sense no longer intruding from the outside. Instead, he isolated his perception and used the True Yang to "see" his surroundings. The world around him instantly became quiet. It was as if he had arrived in a vast wilderness, atop a high mountain, or within a deep canyon.

Gurgling streams, like knives, relentlessly carved stone and split mountains day and night. Howling winds and fine drizzles, like axes, incessantly chopped and reshaped the terrain. The True Yang was like this mountain, this land, this valley. It was being slowly but resolutely and ruthlessly eroded by the invisible forces of temporal change around it.

The True Yang Immortal Puppet instinctively activated its protective measures. However, based on the True Yang’s conveyed intention, it could only last for about half a year under the erosion of the green substance. If it didn't counter-attack actively.

Li Fan temporarily refrained from acting. From the True Yang's perspective, this vast hollow did not contain any writhing green tissues, allowing it to see the third level of the Immortal Boat's treasure trove clearly. The peculiar gray statue with a thousand eyes that was shaped like a human body caused Li Fan’s heart to tremble. The treasure light, flickering within the thousand hollow eye sockets of the statue's head, made Li Fan understand. "The aura of the last chess piece." "It seems these eye sockets are the Immortal Boat's treasure repositories." "Not completely filled, with less than a handful of items visible." "There must be unknown means to protect them, as they don't appear to be unprotected." "Jian Daosheng… where did he go?" "Hmm, this gray statue seems different from before." Li Fan rapidly analyzed the current situation. The third level of the Immortal Boat's treasure trove was indeed not simple; it even contained a power capable of harming the Immortal Puppet.

However, now, besides the True Yang Immortal Puppet's own strength, there was also the power of an immortal formation that Li Fan had prepared in advance. Even if it couldn't defeat the enemy, escaping would definitely not be a problem. Therefore, Li Fan had no intention of acting directly and chose to observe further.

After Jian Daosheng merged with the gray statue through some method, the erosion speed of the green substance seemed to suddenly quicken. In the True Yang’s perception, it was as if fierce winds howled and heavy rains poured. Amidst the storm, the various powers constituting its form were being washed away and diluted.

"Interesting." Although Li Fan had never encountered this green substance before, he detected a faint sense of familiarity from it. Especially the fact that his and the True Yang’s perceptions were completely different, due to their differing immortal and mortal perspectives. This point caused Li Fan to make a connection.

The sound of wind and rain grew louder. Facing the bizarre substance's erosion and surrounding danger, Li Fan showed no panic. He quietly contemplated. After an unknown amount of time… Like a bolt of lightning illuminating the night sky, Li Fan suddenly snapped back to attention: "The Devouring Calamity?" It wasn't referring to the Devouring Calamity itself, but rather that their auras were almost of the same origin. However, the Devouring Calamity that Li Fan had sensed was several degrees more potent than the encroaching green substance before him. It was as if the wind and rain he'd perceived were amplified to their extreme. Thinking of this, Li Fan’s gaze shifted to the gray statue in the vast hollow. "The encroaching green substance is used to erode the power of the Immortal level." "If that's the case, this statue then…" The voices of the Immortal Boat’s elders, echoing in the vast hollow, confirmed Li Fan's guess. Through the starlight cloth left by Jian Daosheng outside the gateway, the Immortal Boat elders inside and outside the treasure trove could communicate with each other. However, their voices were unclear, as if separated by a world.

"Old Jian cannot stay in the Desolate God for long." "Though the Desolate God is dead, and even its consciousness has been completely wiped out, it was still a being above the mortal realm…" It was like a routine reminder. Periodically, different elders would speak, reminding Jian Daosheng, who was merging with the Desolate God. After all the elders had spoken, Jian Daosheng reappeared. In the short time he was missing, his appearance seemed to have changed. Li Fan was certain it wasn't his imagination. It was the influence of the Desolate God statue on Jian Daosheng!

"Desolate God…" Li Fan’s thoughts raced. In the ancient Xuanhuang Realm, there was a powerful sect called the Desolate God Sect. They wielded the Desolate God Seal, capable of summoning twelve Desolate Gods from the upper realm to descend and suppress all enemies. In the eyes of the Desolate Gods, cultivators were like ants; hence, the Desolate God Sect was invincible in its era, dominating almost all opposition. But later, for reasons unknown, the Desolate Gods gradually refused to respond to mortals, no longer descending to the lower realm. With their greatest reliance gone, the Desolate God Sect was destroyed.

"Is this Desolate God the same one?" "A Desolate God is not an Immortal. Otherwise, it would not have served mortals, even if mortals sacrificed and pleaded." "But it possesses the power of an Immortal…" "A servant of the Immortals?" A bold guess surfaced in Li Fan's mind, and his emotions changed when he looked at the statue.

After separating from the Desolate God stone statue, Jian Daosheng remained hidden within one of the hollow eye sockets. He responded remotely to the Immortal Boat elders outside. First, he uttered a series of strange sounds resembling a secret code, then spoke, "The quality of this Immortal Puppet is absolutely not low. It could endure the Desolate God's corrosive power for so long without showing signs of collapse." "Should I increase the guidance?" Zhong Daogong quickly stopped him: "Forget it, let's take it slowly. Otherwise, once the decay accumulates, the Heavenly Star Lotus may not be able to contain it." "Besides, you may not be able to handle it either." Jian Daosheng nodded with apparent regret.

"Are there any signs of the Immortal Puppet reviving?" Zhong Daogong asked again. "None. It seems to truly be a puppet that has lost its control core. Otherwise, facing a crisis like a sword hanging over its head, it wouldn't be so quiet." "That's good. We just need to wait." "Once the erosion reaches halfway, immediately pull the Immortal Puppet out again."

The Immortal Boat elders discussed amongst themselves, seemingly deciding the fate of the slumbering Immortal Puppet. Meanwhile, the True Yang, being eroded by the surrounding corrosive green substance, suddenly sent a reminder to Li Fan. "You can temporarily retract the True Immortal flesh and blood into the Immortal Bronze bones." "The corrosive power’s ability to damage that Immortal artifact remnant will be greatly weakened."

Li Fan pondered, temporarily stopping the True Yang’s actions. He even had the True Yang actively retract its force field defense, using its flesh and blood to feel the erosion of the corrosive green substance. "Don’t worry, True Immortal flesh and blood can be regenerated. I can even forge new Immortal bones for you. As long as the core isn’t damaged, these are minor matters." Only the True Yang Immortal Puppet, having lost most of its subjective initiative, would endure the fatal crisis and comply with Li Fan's instructions.

The force field was voluntarily withdrawn by the True Yang. The green substance immediately came into direct contact with the True Immortal flesh and blood. The speed of corrosion and erosion was far faster than Li Fan had imagined. It was like dry grass quickly igniting, but instead of fire, it was the corrosive green substance that ignited the True Immortal flesh and blood. The green light spread fiercely, burning away and leaving piles of ashes. The active flesh and blood turned into stone-like statues. The instantaneous change sent a shiver through Li Fan, the observer. Even more shocking to Li Fan was the sensation conveyed by the True Yang when its flesh and blood’s life force was depleted. It was not like normal aging or the gradual loss of vitality. Instead, the life force that constituted the elements of life was instantly ignited and vanished. Words could not accurately describe the feeling. Only through direct experience could one understand the horror brought about by the direct extraction of one of the constituent elements of life.

A rabbit dies, and a fox mourns; one feels for its fellows. The moment the life force was extracted, the remaining elements within its life were also agitated. In terror, they disintegrated. Li Fan seemed to see the intricately intertwined lines of the Great Dao that constituted the True Yang Immortal Puppet. After one thread was pulled out, the rest collapsed! In an instant, the powerful Immortal Puppet turned to dust!

With a thought, Li Fan manipulated the True Yang Immortal Puppet to retract a small portion of its flesh and blood back into the Immortal bones at the last moment. When the corrosive green substance encountered the Immortal bones forged from the Immortal artifact remnant, it was like hitting a wall. Its advancing momentum immediately halted. Li Fan saw clearly. The most crucial reason for the green substance's erosion to fail was that the Immortal bones did not contain the Dao of Life!

"If it were the Devouring Calamity from the Immortal Realm’s tribulations, the outcome would be different. These so-called Immortal bones would likely turn to dust in an instant!" "So, the different tribulations in the Immortal Realm are derived from different Great Dao principles? Special attacks against Daos?" "The Dao Erasure Tribulation…" Li Fan fell into contemplation.

In the vast hollow, Jian Daosheng, seeing the Immortal Puppet's defensive power instantly disappear and nearly completely eroded in an instant, exclaimed in surprise. "Why so fast?" Instinctively, he merged with the Desolate God statue again, intending to control the corrosive green substance and slow down the erosion.

Li Fan had not forgotten the purpose of his journey. With a thought, the slumbering True Yang Immortal Puppet finally opened its eyes. The force field reappeared, repelling the green substance clinging to its exterior. The True Immortal flesh and blood surged out from the Immortal bones, restoring the puppet from a skeleton to its form. However, its body was no longer as large as before. With a flash, it moved to the position of the gray statue's head.

Facing the puppet's sudden outburst, Jian Daosheng seemed to have anticipated it. Dozens of the thousand eyes on the head suddenly fixed on the True Yang Immortal Puppet, unleashing fierce, scorching beams of light. These beams not only possessed immense destructive power, causing the puppet's defensive force field to flicker violently, but they also acted like ropes, binding the True Yang Immortal Puppet.

In the vast hollow, light after light flashed. One by one, the Immortal Boat elders appeared. Zhong Daogong's voice echoed continuously, "This was originally just a precaution against accidents, but we didn't miscalculate!" "Do you really think we, the Immortal Boat, are a bunch of fools? Sending it over so obviously, did you expect us to fall for it?" "Heh, our Immortal Boat has been in seclusion for ten thousand years. The only possible connection to the outside world that could attract covetous eyes is that gray chess piece left by Sun Piaomiao. We've been waiting for you to come, but we never expected you to use such a foolish method!" Mocking voices echoed, and then the Immortal Boat elders, one after another, flew into the Desolate God's hollow eye sockets. Occupied by the Immortal Boat elders, the previously dim eyes were re-ignited, shooting out white, scorching brilliance. As the number of light beams increased, the shackles winding around the True Yang Immortal Puppet grew heavier. The True Yang Immortal Puppet wanted to move but found the binding force from the Desolate God unexpectedly powerful, making it difficult to budge!

"So this isn't the third level of the Myriad Insights Record." "It’s a trap." He spoke in a low voice, looking at the Desolate God ahead, which seemed to have regained its vitality by merging with the Immortal Boat elders. The grayness receded from its body, and the corrosive green substance that had occupied most of its body retreated below its knees. The ancient Desolate God, with its thousand eyes, locked onto the True Yang Immortal Puppet.

The True Yang was pieced together by Li Fan using all his immortal power. It was not a puppet truly crafted by a True Immortal. Facing the resurrected Desolate God, it gradually fell into a disadvantage in the struggle, being slowly suppressed. Just as victory seemed assured, the Immortal Boat elders spoke proudly in response. "Indeed! How could we leave such a slumbering Immortal Puppet unattended in our Immortal Boat's sacred ground?" "We originally thought we would have to work harder to lure you out. We didn't expect you to lose your patience so quickly!" "A mere Immortal Puppet, trying to barge into the Immortal Boat alone to steal treasures? You underestimate us too much!"

Cold mockery and taunts erupted one after another. However, the binding force from the Desolate God did not lessen; instead, it intensified. Furthermore, Li Fan sensed that as its vitality slowly recovered, a different aura began to emerge from the Desolate God's body.

Creak, creak… Besides the thousand-eyed light beams, an invisible pressure instantly weighed down on the True Yang Immortal Puppet. In a trance, a true ancient Desolate God appeared before Li Fan. Its face was ferocious, with all thousand eyes staring intently!

"It was my carelessness." "I just didn't expect your Immortal Boat to be willing to use that chess piece as bait? The aura from the Immortal Realm fragment is not something that can be faked." "Aren't you afraid of a mistake, and the chess piece falling into my hands?" The True Yang Immortal Puppet's low voice first admitted its mistake, then asked with some surprise.

"We only have this last one left anyway. If we can't form a complete set, this single piece is useless!" "Hmph, you can't catch a wolf without sacrificing your dog. If we hadn't lured you into action, we wouldn't have easily activated this Desolate God…" "Hehe, not only is the chess piece real, but the other treasures are also real! Since we're acting, we'll do it convincingly!" "Stop the nonsense, capture him completely first!"

Buzz, buzz, buzz. Amidst the continuous voices of the Immortal Boat elders, the ancient Desolate God raised its right hand, as if to reach out and seize the True Yang Immortal Puppet. The giant palm was about to descend, surrounded by numerous light beams locking it in place. The True Yang Immortal Puppet seemed to be facing a desperate situation. However, for some reason, the puppet showed no sign of despair.

"Your plan…" "Is very good." "But unfortunately, it all ends here today." The True Yang Immortal Puppet looked at the ancient Desolate God in the vast hollow. "Today, I will teach you a lesson." "In the cultivation world, the strong are respected. All schemes are but a joke in the face of absolute power!" A faint light suddenly flashed on the True Yang Immortal Puppet's forehead. A gust of wind arose in the vast hollow.

"Not good! Stop him quickly!" The Immortal Boat elders instantly sensed something was wrong. The Desolate God's thousand eyes suddenly unleashed unprecedented brilliant light. Its life force grew more concentrated, and the Desolate God's movements quickened severalfold. But it was too late.

"Immortals Descend, All Things Return to Void!" A world-ending gale erupted from the faint light on the True Yang Immortal Puppet's forehead, then swept outwards. To Li Fan's surprise, the corrosive green substance, suppressed by the Desolate God's life force, not only remained unaffected by the immortal formation that annihilated everything, but it seemed to gain strength, using the power of the world-ending immortal formation to once again erode the Desolate God’s body.

The Void Return Immortal Formation, the corrosive green substance. With the dual crisis superimposed, the Desolate God's lower body was completely submerged by the destructive power, leaving only the thousand-eyed head.

"Ancient God, carrying the fate of Immortals!" "Guardian Against Calamity!" "Condense!" As the Immortal Boat elders shouted in unison, the eye sockets in the head that flickered with light quickly moved and merged into one in an instant! A colossal, hollow eye suddenly appeared in the center of the ancient Desolate God’s face! Sacred power manifested, repelling the approaching destructive force below.

Seeing this, the True Yang Immortal Puppet advanced instead of retreating. Wielding the power of the world-ending immortal formation, it faced the one-eyed Desolate God head-on. Behind it, countless green masses, like dragons, pythons, and snakes, surged forward, following closely. Two forces from the Immortal Realm collided.

Facing the Desolate God’s single eye, the True Yang Immortal Puppet’s remaining True Immortal flesh and blood melted like snow. But its Immortal bones remained, its momentum undiminished. Using the residual power of the immortal formation, under the gaze of the Desolate God's single eye, it pressed forward, successfully arriving at the side of the head, where the other hollow eye sockets were located.

The frantic voices of the Immortal Boat elders rang out. The True Yang Immortal Puppet had locked onto the last chess piece. It reached out and attempted to retrieve it. It felt a binding force similar to the scorching light emanating from the Desolate God's eye sockets earlier, but even stronger. It was enough to block the probing of most cultivators in the world. But compared to the puppet’s power, it was insignificant. With a slight exertion, it took the last gray chess piece into its hand.

Li Fan quickly looked at the nearest target. After taking another item, he sensed the immortal formation's storm subsiding and the Desolate God about to react. Li Fan did not hesitate, activating the True Yang Immortal Puppet to escape quickly.

"Close the entrance!" Nangong Lie's somewhat frantic voice could be vaguely heard. "Are you crazy! Do you want us to be buried with the Desolate God?" The vast majority of elders maintained their reason, and the exit of the Heavenly Star Lotus remained open. Li Fan passed through, glancing around at the treasures in the second level of the treasure trove. He tried to take some, but found they were encased in lotuses. Without special means to open the lotuses, he could only destroy the entire lotus. After all, Li Fan’s main body had not personally arrived, and the power of the immortal formation he left behind had been expended. The True Yang Immortal Puppet no longer lingered, transforming into a beam of light and fleeing. It treated all protective restrictions within the Immortal Boat as nonexistent. Before leaving, Li Fan seemed to see the surging green substance, like a tide, engulfing the Desolate God’s head through the gateway.

A moment later. The True Yang Immortal Puppet did not immediately return to Great Xuan to deliver the chess piece to Li Fan’s main body. Instead, it stood quietly in the void, looking at the Immortal Boat not far away. The Immortal Boat trembled slightly but finally subsided again.

"As expected, they have some tricks." "They could even block the corrosive green substance ignited by the world-ending immortal formation." "Desolate God…" Li Fan's heart was heavy. Based on the brief confrontation, the Desolate God hidden within the Mystic Immortal Boat, even if its strength was not fully unleashed, was on par with the True Yang Immortal Puppet. Its strength in its prime was evident. "However, it is merely a servant of the True Immortals." "And the Mystic Immortal Boat can control this ancient Desolate God…" "They have truly taken the art of using external forces to its extreme," Li Fan mused with slight admiration. "In my previous life, under the world-ending immortal formation, this Desolate God was nowhere to be seen." "It seems the vast hollow is not located inside the Immortal Boat, but is a passage opened by the Heavenly Star Lotus."

While Li Fan was contemplating, the Immortal Boat, which had previously calmed down, began to move again. It was not pursuing the True Yang Immortal Puppet but had changed its hidden location in the starry sea. "From the Immortal Boat's perspective, having lost the chess piece, the enemy has also lost the method to locate the Immortal Boat." "As long as they hide again, they should regain some peace." "As for the loss of another immortal treasure…" Li Fan’s divine sense swept over another item in the True Yang Immortal Puppet’s hand besides the gray chess piece. It was an ancient bronze coin. The patterns on both sides were different. However, no matter what method Li Fan used, he could not discern what was engraved on it.

Shifting his attention from this immortal treasure coin, Li Fan cast one last glance at the Mystic Immortal Boat. "These losses are bearable for the wealthy Mystic Immortal Boat." "It is likely that the Immortal Boat's true trouble will stem from the Desolate God." "After all, borrowing the power of a True Immortal is not so easy," Li Fan smiled and controlled the True Yang Immortal Puppet to fly towards the Heaven's Horizon, Arm's Length teleportation formation.

Before long, he had returned to the Great Xuan pocket world. Li Fan's main body had already prepared new True Immortal flesh and blood to rearm it. The True Yang Immortal Puppet handed the two obtained treasures to Li Fan and began to adapt to its new body. During the battle with the thousand-eyed Desolate God, the True Yang had instinctively gained some insights. After a period of silence, it slowly entered a state of seclusion. Seeing this, Li Fan did not disturb it.

He first examined the bronze coin. With his main body inspecting it, his divine soul was powerful enough to finally vaguely discern the patterns on the coin. One side was engraved with magnificent, continuous palaces. The other side, however, showed countless images superimposed and constantly changing.

"No wonder I couldn't see them clearly with my divine sense earlier." "The speed of these changes…" Li Fan’s expression changed slightly. Gripping the coin, Li Fan narrowed his eyes, trying to make out each fleeting image. At the same time, the Dao-Melting Stone in his mind emitted a faint glow, recording all the scenes one by one, and then rebuilding them. Thus, after sixteen days, Li Fan finally completed the recording of all the scenes depicted on this seemingly small bronze coin.

"This bronze coin records a star domain in a certain part of the Immortal Realm upper realm?" A magnificent scroll, reconstructed before Li Fan, slowly unfolded. "There are no True Immortals, only pure natural landscapes and scattered architectural structures." Li Fan carefully observed this scene of the Immortal Realm. The moment he had a clear view of this Immortal Domain landscape, a name naturally appeared in Li Fan's mind. "Northern Coldness." "The palaces on that side of the bronze coin should be the domain of Lord Northern Coldness." Recalling the memories seen in the True Immortal flesh and blood earlier, Li Fan mused. "I wonder what kind of structure the Immortal Realm had in the past?" "Judging by this, could there really be a so-called Immortal Emperor?" "If so, what was the status of the Nameless True Immortal?" Li Fan’s expression was somewhat strange as his thoughts drifted.

Chapter 1363

With his thoughts gathered, Li Fan tightly gripped the "Northern Coldness" immortal coin from the Immortal Realm, attempting to decipher its purpose. "It can't just be simple currency, can it?" Li Fan vaguely felt that this immortal coin held other secrets.

First, he tried infusing it with primal force essence to activate it. However, primal force essence was merely the energy form closest to immortal spiritual power in the lower realms; it did not equate to true immortal spiritual power. When faced with the Northern Coldness immortal coin, a genuine creation of the Immortal Realm, it naturally lost its efficacy. The surging primal force essence, like a tide, simply struck the surface of the immortal coin, unable to penetrate.

Li Fan withdrew the primal force essence and, after a moment of contemplation, ascended to the void outside the Xuanhuang Realm. He activated the Ascending Array, attempting to observe it from a higher dimensional perspective. As expected, it differed from his usual observations. As his "potential" continuously rose, the side of the coin displaying constantly changing imagery began to flash slower, and he could perceive more of the overall scene simultaneously.

And then... on the celestial canvas depicting the panoramic view of the Northern Coldness Immortal Realm, a vague shadow faintly emerged! Li Fan could not discern its features. The moment he looked, the Spirit Qi within him boiled uncontrollably. In an instant, he could no longer maintain his elevated "potential" and plummeted back to the mortal realm. However, the boiling of his internal Spirit Qi did not cease. Li Fan frowned, intending to use greater power to forcefully suppress this abnormal boiling. But this decision was like adding fuel to the fire. It seemed ignited by an nameless flame, burning fiercely and unceasingly until all his Spirit Qi and body were consumed. Only then did it end.

A short while later, with a strange fluctuation, Li Fan's body reappeared in the void. With each breath, his stamina and Spirit Qi had become replenished. "Not only my Spirit Qi and body, but even my divine soul was almost affected," Li Fan checked the state of his new body with a grave expression. "Just a mere glance at that figure..."

"Is this the punishment for mortals attempting to glimpse the face of a True Immortal?" "If it weren't for my strong survival abilities, any cultivator in the current Xuanhuang Realm at the Dao Integration realm would likely not have survived this punishment." "That figure is definitely not an ordinary True Immortal. The realm of the nameless..." Li Fan mused.

He temporarily sealed away the Northern Coldness immortal coin, not rushing to integrate the Immortal Realm fragments. Instead, he suppressed it within the Lesser Great Qi pocket world and then leisurely headed towards the Mystic Immortal Boat. Simultaneously, he remembered to halt the arrangement of the Grand Sky Ritual to avoid arousing suspicion from the Mystic Immortal Boat.

During his journey, Li Fan sensed the changes that had been occurring within his body recently. Although the changes were extremely subtle, Li Fan's control over himself had reached a point where he could see through everything clearly, naturally perceiving them. He touched his face, "It's actually transforming towards the appearance of that Thousand-Eyed Desolate God... Is this the price for using the power of the Desolate God?" "I haven't personally participated in it, only being influenced by the past Grand Sky Ritual." A flicker of interest flashed across his face. Playing the part, Li Fan first returned to the Mystic Immortal Boat's original location. Finding no trace of the Mystic Immortal Boat, he stood dumbfounded for a while. Then, using the spiritual connection between the Grand Sky Rituals, he located the Immortal Boat's new hidden spot.

The Immortal Boat's main gate was tightly shut, and no elders came out to greet him. Li Fan showed an anxious expression and directly activated his aura as a reminder. After waiting for a while longer and seeing no response from the Immortal Boat, he prepared to force his way in. At this moment, Zhong Daogong's somewhat weak voice finally came through, "Don't worry, we're fine." "It's just temporarily inconvenient to meet..."

Li Fan first breathed a sigh of relief, then what Zhong Daogong said made him feel indignant, "After the Grand Sky Ritual, we are already of one heart. You still don't trust me?" Zhong Daogong sighed and explained, "Not at all, not at all. Haven't you noticed the changes in yourself?" Li Fan looked utterly astonished. After observing himself, his body trembled violently, "What exactly happened?" Zhong Daogong then slowly recounted the entire story of their recent encounter with the Immortal Puppets. Li Fan's expression shifted continuously, wanting to speak but hesitating.

"Fortunately, that puppet was also severely injured. In the final moment, it only snatched that last chess piece and an immortal realm bronze coin, causing no greater damage to the Immortal Boat. Otherwise, I would truly have deserved to die ten thousand times." "The main thing is that we underestimated the power that immortal puppet could unleash. I never expected that the current Star Sea would still have beings capable of contending with Desolate Gods," Zhong Daogong coughed lightly. After a long silence, Li Fan finally said, "Even if I were there, I fear I would have fallen into the trap. After all, it's an immortal puppet, immune to True Immortal Sigils, and possessing genuine True Immortal flesh and blood..."

"Could it be that the Star Sea harbors a civilization that completely surpasses both the Immortal Boat and Great Qi?" Li Fan feigned shock. "It's likely that's the case," Zhong Daogong said, then changed the subject, "Now that the civilization has collected all the chess pieces, they will likely focus all their energy on recreating the ancient Immortal Realm and won't target us for the time being."

"They didn't leave any tracking methods? Losing such a treasure just like that is truly unwilling to accept." "Even if we couldn't defeat them, trailing them to ascertain their strength and causing a ruckus would be good. At the very least, let them know that our Mystic Immortal Boat is not to be trifled with," Li Fan snorted. Zhong Daogong did not refute Li Fan, his expression as usual, "It's just a matter of being outmatched. The Mystic Immortal Boat has always prioritized survival and doesn't engage in disputes of pride. Moreover, none of us has yet comprehended your astonishing escape technique." Li Fan was speechless.

"This Thousand-Eyed Desolate God can be considered one of our Mystic Immortal Boat's final trump cards. Although it can unleash immortal-grade power, it requires lengthy preparatory work. And afterwards, we have to face the backlash of the Desolate God..." "The reason I didn't let you meet us temporarily is that you, as a part of the Grand Sky Ritual, were not affected by the Thousand-Eyed Desolate God. Like an anchor, it has delayed our gradual transformation process," Zhong Daogong briefly explained to Li Fan. "Your standing outside is actually beneficial for us to recover." Li Fan nodded, accepting this explanation.

"Do you need any help? I remember there was a Dao Venerate in Great Qi who once researched the topic of changes after being influenced by True Immortal power..." Zhong Daogong paused, seemingly hesitating for a moment. Finally, he rejected Li Fan's kind offer, "No need to worry. After all, we have considerable experience dealing with True Immortal Sigils power for many years."

Li Fan felt a bit regretful, "Alright. I was also worried about the safety of the Immortal Boat, which is why I came here at great risk. After all, I am currently in the process of secretly carrying out the ritual..." "Currently, the ritual has covered thirty million people. If all goes smoothly, it can still increase by three to five times," Li Fan reported his progress. Zhong Daogong's tone finally showed a hint of joy, "That's good. This will definitely minimize the backlash from the Star Sea." "It's just a minor incident, without much impact. We still need to prioritize the overall situation; there must be no mistakes in the ritual. You should return as soon as possible!" As he spoke, he was clearly showing Li Fan the door.

"It seems they are still suspicious of me after all. In their extremely weakened state, they dare not let me enter." "However, they are constrained by the Grand Sky Ritual, which still requires me to find sacrifices, so they haven't openly fallen out." Li Fan understood clearly and was about to cup his hands in farewell.

Boom! A wave-like impact, like a giant wave, suddenly arrived from the distant The Great Barrier. The speed of its passage was too fast, and to conceal his abilities before the Immortal Boat, Li Fan pretended not to have reacted. Carried by this impact, he was dragged for several thousand miles in the Star Sea before finally stabilizing himself. The Mystic Immortal Boat, in its hidden state, was directly revealed by this strange and powerful impact. It flailed incessantly, like a small boat on a stormy sea.

"What happened?" Li Fan returned to the vicinity of the Immortal Boat in a somewhat disheveled state, gazing at the The Great Barrier from which the impact originated, and asked with surprise and uncertainty. The Mystic Immortal Boat was also somewhat bewildered. "In the records of our Immortal Boat, such a phenomenon has only occurred three times..." "We have no clue about its origin." "What a pity. If it weren't for our current state of severe injury and recovery, we would definitely pursue its source." With this anomaly, the other elders of the Mystic Immortal Boat also emerged. They all appeared somewhat weak and with lacking vitality.

Li Fan sensed the receding fluctuations and discovered that their power dissipated significantly as they propagated through the Star Sea. It seemed the residual True Immortal forces scattered throughout the Star Sea were an obstruction to their movement. "I'll go take a look!" Li Fan cupped his hands towards the Immortal Boat and volunteered. "Don't worry, if I can't find the source, I'll return immediately!" Without waiting for the Immortal Boat's personnel to respond, Li Fan summoned his Wood Sword phantom and sped towards the direction of the anomaly.

Quickly crossing the Great Wall of Broken Realms and following the residual energy fluctuations in the Star Sea, he was about to reach the source. Li Fan's expression, however, became solemn. He discovered that this terrifying anomaly seemed to be emanating from the breach in that The Great Barrier! This discovery made Li Fan's heart leap. He accelerated his escape speed.

A few breaths later, when Li Fan arrived at the breach in the The Great Barrier, he found that Mo Rubbin, who was supposed to be comprehending the secrets of the The Great Barrier, only had half a head left and was unconscious. The Wood Sword and Dao Comprehension phantom he had left behind were still present, seemingly unaffected by the recent wave of energy. "No wonder I didn't notice..." "What's going on? Does the The Great Barrier fight back and injure people? Could it be that Mo Rubbin really comprehended something?" Li Fan's thoughts raced. After an examination, he found that Mo Rubbin was only severely injured but not dead, which somewhat eased his mind.

As he was about to examine the breach in the The Great Barrier again, his expression suddenly changed. He faintly sensed a familiar aura rapidly approaching this location! "Heavenly Physician?!" "Did he also detect that anomaly and come here?" Li Fan pondered for a moment and quickly made a decision. There was no need to confront the Heavenly Physician directly at this moment. If he discovered Li Fan's secret plan to elevate the Xuanhuang Realm, it would undoubtedly introduce more variables. The Wood Sword phantom flickered, quickly taking Mo Rubbin's half-head and fleeing the scene.

"Strange, the Mystic Immortal Boat previously mentioned observing such strange fluctuations several times." "If this fluctuation was caused by Mo Rubbin comprehending the breach in the The Great Barrier, doesn't that mean someone has done this before?" Recalling the Heavenly Physician who had rapidly arrived, Li Fan vaguely understood. "The Heavenly Physician actually discovered the breach in the The Great Barrier long ago?" "And he has even comprehended it more than once and gained something?" "Truly not to be underestimated. Even with the Immortal Formation in hand now, it's still the case," Li Fan was inwardly shocked.

After flying past the Great Wall of Broken Realms and reaching a deserted area in the Star Sea, Li Fan began to heal Mo Rubbin's injuries. With the infusion of a large amount of Spirit Qi and divine soul power, Mo Rubbin gradually woke up from his severe coma. His flesh and blood also slowly began to grow back. "Uh..."
